sādhyo yuktaḥ api cāgneḥ sadhyatāyāṃ anupalabdhataddharmaḥ katham anumapakaḥ syāt anupalabdhe tu jvalane na taddharmatayā dhūmo gṛhītuṃ pāryate upalabdhe tu hutabhuji bhavad api niṣphalam eva dhūmasya tadharmatāgrahaṇam anumeyasya tadānīm abhāvāt tasmād agniviśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamāno deśa eva sādhyaḥ sa ca svarupataḥ pratyakṣo pi parokṣadhamaviśiṣṭatayā anumeya iti dhūmadharmayogāt agnidharmavān sa evānumīyate so numānasya viṣayo liṅgīty ucyate parokṣagrahaṇaṃ caitad abhiprāyam eva kvacit tu vyāptismaraṇasamanantaram eva pratyāsīd ataḥ pramātuḥ jhaṭiti samunmiṣannakasmād eva pratyakṣībhavati vibhāvasur iti na tadviśiṣṭatayā pi dharmiṇaḥ parokṣatvam avakalpata iti tadvyāvṛttaye parokṣagrahaṇam nityaparokṣasyāpi ceśvarādṛṣṭendriyāder anumeyatāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ tasmād yathocitāl liṅgāt yathoktaniyamasmṛteḥ yathoktaliṅgivijñānam anumānam iti sthitam nanu saty anumanasya prāmāṇye lakṣaṇāśrayaḥ kāryo vicāraḥ na punaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tasya yujyate tatha cāhuḥ prāmāṇyasyāgauṇatvāt anumānād arthaniścayo durlabhaḥ pakṣadharādirūpaṃ hi liṅgasya balād gauṇyā vṛttyā darśayitavyam dharme hi sādhye na hetoḥ paksadharmatvam agnidharmatvāt dhūmasya dharmiṇi sādhye hetor ananvayitvam na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvata ity anvayaḥ dvaye tu sādhye dvayam api nāsti na hi dahanamahīdhrayoḥ dhūmo dharmaḥ nāpy evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvatāgnī iti dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sadhye tadubhayam aghaṭamānam eva napy agniviśiṣtadharādharadharmatayā dhūmaḥ prathamam upalabdhuṃ śakyate na cāpy evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgnimān parvata iti tasmād avaśyaṃ pakṣadharmatvānvayavyavahārasiddhaye dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi rūḍhaḥ paksaśabdaḥ tadekadeśe tathaiva yojane tigauṇalaksaṇatvād indriyārthasannikarṣajatvādivad agauṇalakṣaṇatvābhāvād anumānam apramāṇam api ca viśeṣe nugamābhāvāt sāmānye siddhasādhanāt tadvato nupapannatvāt anumānakathā kutaḥ sāhacarye ca sambandhe visrambha iti mugdhata śatakṛtvo pi taddṛsṭau vyabhicārasya saṃbhavāt daśakāladaśābhedavicitrātmasu vastuṣu avinābhāvaniyamo na śakyo vaktuṃ āha ca avasthādeśakālādibhedād bhinnāsu śaktiṣu bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhir atidurlabhā bhavann apy avinābhāvaḥ paricchettuṃ na śakyate jagattrayagatāśeṣapadārthālocanād vinā na pratyakṣīkṛtā yāvaddhūmāgnivyaktayo khilāḥ tāvat syād api dhūmo sau yo nagner iti śaṅkyate ye tu pratyakṣato viśvaṃ paśyanti hi bhavādṛśāḥ kiṃ divyacakṣuṣām eṣām anumānaprayojanam sāmānyadvārako py asti nāvinābhāvaniścayaḥ vāstavaṃ hi na sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcana vidyate bhūyodarśanagamyā pi na vyāptir avakalpate sahasraśo pi taddṛṣṭau vyabhicarāvadhāraṇāt bahukṛtvo pi vastvātmā tatheti pariniścitaḥ deśaklādibhedena dṛśyate punar anyathā bhūyodṛṣṭyā ca dhūmo gnisahacārīti gamyatām agnau tu sa nāstīti na bhūyodarśanād gatiḥ na cāpi dṛṣṭimātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ tatraiva niyatatvaṃ hi tadanyābhāvapurvakam niyamaś cānumānāṅgaṃ gṛhītaḥ pratipadyate grahaṇaṃ cāsya nānyatra nāstitāniścayaṃ vinā darśanādarśanabhyāṃ hi niyamagrahaṇaṃ yadi tad apy asat anagnau hi dhūmasyeṣṭam adarśanam agniś ca kiyān sarvaṃ jagaj jvalanavarjitam tatra dhūmasya nāstitvaṃ naiva paśyanty ayoginaḥ tad evaṃ niyamābhāvāt sati vā jñāptyasaṃbhavāt anumānapramāṇatvadurāśā parimucyatām anumānavirodho pi yadi ceṣṭavighātakṛt viruddhāvyabhicāro vā sarvatra sulabhodayaḥ ata evānumānānām apaśyantaḥ pramāṇatām tadvisraṃbhaniṣedhārthaṃ idam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ hastasparśādināndhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā anumānapradhānena vinipāto na durlabhaḥ api ca yatnenānumito py arthaḥ kuśalair anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyuktarair anyair anyathaivopapādyate atrābhidīyate kim ayam anumānasvarūpākṣepa eva kriyate uta tattattārkikopalakṣitatallakṣanākṣepaḥ iti tatrānumānasvarūpaṃ cāśakyanihnavam eva sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt abalābalagopālahālikapramukhā api buddhyante niyatād arthāt arthāntaram asaṃśayam anumānāpalāpe tupratyakṣād api durlabhā lokayātreti lokāḥ syuḥ likhitā iva niścalāḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭam api padārthajātaṃ tajjātīyatvaliṅgavyāpareṇa sukhasādhanaṃ itarakāraṇam iti vā niścitya tadupādadate jahati vā laukikāḥ athāvicāritaram aṇīyataiva tattvaṃ na tu lakṣaṇaniyamaḥ śakyakriyas tasyeti lakṣaṇākṣepo yam ucyate so py ayuktaḥ yataḥ yaṃ kañcid artham ālokya yaḥ kaścin nāvagamyate kañcid evāksipaty artham arthaḥ kaścid iti sthitiḥ tatra vastisvabhāvo yam iti pādaprasārikā dṛśyate hy avinābhūtād arthād arthāntare matiḥ ato yaddarśanād yatra pratītir upajāyate tayor asty arthayoḥ kaścit sambandha iti manmahe tadātmatātadutpattī na śraddadhati tadvidaḥ sāhacaryaṃ tu sambandha iti no hṛdayaṅgamam tasmin saty eva bhavanaṃ na vinā bhavanaṃ tataḥ ayam evāvinābhāvo niyamaḥ sahacāritā kiṃkṛto niyamo syāsminn iti ced evam uttaram tadātmatādipakṣo pi naiṣa praśno nivartate jvalanāj jāyate dhūmaḥ na jalād iti kā gatiḥ evam evaitad iti cet sāhacarye pi tatsamam tarkasya yāvān viṣayaḥ sa tāvati nirūpyate vastusvabhāvabhede tu na tasya prabhaviṣṇutā ayaṃ ca viṣayo yukteḥ yaduktaṃ niyamād vinā nārthād arthāntare jñānaṃ atas tasya prakalpanam tataḥ paraṃ tu niyamo py eṣa kiṃkṛtaḥ iti na yuktiḥ prabhavati tādātmyatadutpattyor anupapannatvāt ato niyama eva viramyte na ca pratibhāmātram ānumānikī pramitir iti vaktuṃ yuktam niyatāt kutaścid eva vastuni pratītidarśanād ity uktatvāt niyamaś ca yady agṛhīta eva pratītyaṅaṃ bhavet nārikeladvīpavāsibhir api dhūmadarśanāt kṛśānur anumīyate na caivam astīti niyamagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam yac ca vikalpitaṃ aśakyaṃ tadgrahaṇam iti tatra kecid ācakṣate mānasaṃ pratyaksaṃ pratibandhagrāhīti pratyakṣānupalaṃbhābhyāṃ analasahacaritam agneś ca vyāvartamānaṃ dhūmam upalabhya vibhāv asau niyato dhūma iti manasā pratipadyate manaś ca sarvaviṣayaṃ kena vā nābhyupeyate asannihitam apy artham avdhārayituṃ kṣamam na ca sakalatribhuvanavivaraniruddhadhūmāgnivyaktisārthasākṣātkaraṇam upayujyate jvalanatvādisāmānyapuraśaratayā vyāptigrahaṇāt yat tūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ vāstavaṃ nāstīti tat śabdārthacintāprasaṅge pratisamādhāsyate apare punaḥ yogipratyakṣakalpaṃ yauktikaṃ sambandhagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ pratipedire kila dhūmatvāgnitvasāmānyapuraskāreṇa vyāpyavyāpakayor anvayo nāma gṛhyatām vyatirekas tv anagnibhyaḥ dhūmasya grahītavyaḥ anagnayaś cātivitatāḥ na ca teṣv anagnitvaṃ nāma sāmānyam asti tena samas tatrailokyāntargatāgnyanagnigatānvayavyatirekagrāhipratyakṣavyatirekeṇa na pratibandho vadhṛto bhavet anavadhṛtaś ca na pramāṅgam asti ca prameti yuktibalāt pratibandhagrāhakam ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam idam aśeṣavyaktiviṣayam asaṃvedyamānam api kalpitam iti yauktikam ucyate anye punaḥ ata eva tatkalpanābhayāt bhūyodarśanaparicchinnasāmānyapuraśarānvayam anapekṣitavyatirekaniścayam eva liṅgaṃ gamakam abhyupāgaman yathoktam mama tvaddṛṣṭimātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti ayam āśayaḥ bhūyodarśanatas tāvat udeti matirīdṛśī niyato yam aneneti sakalaprāṇisāksikā tāvatā ca gamakatvam autsrgikaṃ siddhyati mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu vipakṣe darśanaṃ bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ na ca so sti nādya yāvad anagnau dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ anutpanne pi bādhake tadāśaṅkanam ayuktam ity uktaṃ taiḥ doṣajñāne tv anutpanne na śaṅkyā niṣpramāṇatā iti etat tu na cāru vyatirekaniścayam antarena pratibandhagrahaṇānupa patter ity uktatvāt jñāpakatvād dhi niyamaḥ svagrahaṇam apekṣate niyamaś cāyam ucyate yat tasmin sati bhavanaṃ tato vinā na bhavanam iti bhūyodarśanataś ca tasmin sati bhavanam ity anvayamātraparicchedād ardhagṛhīto niyamaḥ syāt tato vinā na bhavanam ity asyārthasyāparicchedād iti apare punaḥ anagnitvasāmānyam antareṇāpi yogipratyakṣakalpanām akurvanta eva mānasapratyakṣagamyam anvayavyatirekam āhuḥ dhūmāgnisāmānye tāvat sahacarite upalabdhe tadvat tadabhāvāv api sahacaritāv upalabhyete eva dhūmatvasāmānyasyānagnau jalādav adarśanāt sarvagatatve pi sāmānyānāṃ vṛttibhedo niyāmaka iti vakṣyate yady api cānagnitvaādyabhāvasāmānyaṃ nāsti tathā pi pratiṣedhyāgnitvasāmānyānugamasiddhyaiva tadabhāvānugamagrahaṇaṃ siddhyati sakalavyaktivijñānam anaṅgaṃ vyāptiniścaye bhāvasāmānyayor yadvad tathaiva tadbhāvayoḥ bhāvayoḥ sāhacaryaṃ yat anvayaṃ tat pracakṣate vyatirekaṃ tu manyante sāhityaṃ tadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvas tu bhaved yatrāpy abhāvayoḥ tayor evānvayas tatra vyatirekas tu bhavayoḥ tad evam abhāvānvayavad bhāvavyatireko pi pratyakṣagamyo bhavaty eva iyān eva viśeṣas tu bhāvayor yādṛśī yayoḥ vyāpyavyāpakatā saiva vyatyastā tadabhāvayoḥ abhāvayos tu gamyagamakabhāve bhāvayor vyāptivyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ evañ ca pratiṣedhyānugamapūrvakasāmānyābhāvadvayānugamapratyayopapatteḥ anvayavyatirekaniścaye pi na yogipratyaksam upayujyate bhavābhāvsāhacaryam avadhāryaṃ manasā niyamajñānasiddher ity alaṃ nirvandhena tasmāt niyamavat tadgrahaṇopāyo py astīti siddham gṛhīte niyame yāvat punaḥ kvacid dharmiṇi dhūmāder liṅgasya grahaṇāṃ na vṛttaṃ tāvan na bhavati liṅgino vagatir iti sambandhagrahaṇakālāpekṣayā dvitīyaṃ talliṅadarśanam apekṣītavyam saiveyaṃ pakṣadharmatocyate pakṣadharmānvyavyatirekaniścaye saty api pratyakṣāgamavirodhena pratipakṣopanipātena vā na gamakatvam iti tadaparṃ lakṣaṇadvayam upadiṣṭaṃ abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ asatpratipakṣatvaṃ ceti tadevam anubhavasiddhatvāt anumānasvarūpam iva tasya lakṣaṇām api tāntrikakathitam apratyākhyeyam api ca yadi tāntrikaviracitam avācakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tat svayam anavadyam āvedyatām na tu taddoṣeṇa lakṣyam apy anumānaṃ nihnotuṃ yuktam yat punar abhāṇi pramāṇāsyāgauṇatvād anumānād arthaniścayo durlabha iti tan na buddhyāmahe na hi pramāṇasya kiñcid gauṇātvam iha paśyāmaḥ pakṣadharmādipadāni yadi nāma vyākhyātṛbhiḥ gauṇāni prayuktāni kim etāvatā pramāṇaṃ gauṇībhavet śabdāntareṇa hi tallakṣaṇābhidhāne na kaścidgauṇatādipramādaḥ yad apy avādi viśeṣe nugamābhāvāt sāmānye siddhasādhanāt iti tad apy asādhu sādhyasya mattvarthasya dārśitatvāt yad api avasthādeśakālabhedāt ity abhyadhāyi tad api na bhayāvaham samyagavadhṛtāyāṃ vyāptau viplavābhāvāt pramātur eva tatrāparādhaḥ nānumānasyeti yad api vyāhāri viruddhānumānavirodhayoḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt kutracic ca viruddhāvyabhicāriṇi iṣṭavighātakṛtaś ca sulabhatvād iti tad apy ālajālam prayojakahetau prayukte saty evaṃprāyāṇām anavakāśatvāt sadvitīyaprayogās tu na bhavanti prayojakāḥ utprekṣāmātramūlatvād dhetvābhāsā bhavanti te iti vakṣyāmaḥ na viśeṣaviruddhaś ca na cāstīṣṭavighātakṛt hetau supratibaddhe hi naitāḥ santi viḍambanāḥ tādṛśā cānumāne puṃṣo rtham adhigacchataḥ nāndhena tulyatā hastasparśānumitavartmanā yatnenānumito yo rthaḥ kuśalais anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyogaśatenāpi so nyathā nopapādyate suśikṣitatarāḥ prāhuḥ dvividham anumānam kiñcit utpannapratīti kiñcid utpādyapratīti īśvarādyanumānaṃ tūtpādyapratīti tatra dhūmānumānādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ kena neṣyate ato hi sādhyaṃ buddhyante tārkikair akṣatā api yat tv ātmeśvarasarvajñaparalokādigocaram anumānaṃ na tasyeṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tat tv adarśibhiḥ ṛjūnāṃ jāyate tasmāt na tāvad anumeyadhīḥ yāvat kuṭilitaṃ ceto na teṣāṃ viṭatārkikaiḥ evaṃ tu kathayadbhis taiḥ paraṃ nāstikyam ātmanaḥ khyāpyate sma jaḍatvaṃ vā nānumānāpramāṇatā na hia sambandhagrahaṇopāyavaicitryād apramāṇātā bhavitum arhati na kāryādisvarūupeṇa tat kim īdṛśatraividhyena darśiteneti vatipratyayam āśrityānyathā vyācakṣate pūrvavad iti atra sambandhagrahaṇakāle liṅgaliṅginoḥ pratyakṣataḥ svarūpam avadhārya punas tādṛśaiva liṅgena tādṛg eva liṅgī gamyate tata pūrveṇa tulyaṃ vartata iti pūrvavad anumānam yathā mahānase dhūmāgnī sahacaritau dṛṣṭvā punaḥ dhūmāgnyanumānam nanu pratyakṣapratītyā viṣayagatasakalaviśeṣasākṣātkaraṇakṣamayā tulyā nānumanikī matir iti kathaṃ kriyātulyatvam tadabhāvāt kathaṃ vatiḥ satyam evam tathā pi vahner eva tādṛśasya vailakṣaṇyāpādakaviśeṣavacchinnasyaliṅgena garahaṇāt adūraviprakarṣeṇā kriyātulyatvam upapatsyate śeṣavan nāma pariśeṣaḥ sa ca prasaktapratiṣedhe anyatrāprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ yathā kvacit pradeśe dhūmenāgnimātre numite kim indhano yam agniḥ iti vimarśe prasaktānāṃ tṛṇaparṇākāṣṭhādīnāṃ aprasaṅgāc ca gomayendhano gniḥ parikalpyate yathā vā śabde drvyakarmatvapratiṣedhāt sāmānyādāv aprasaṅgāc ca guṇatvānumānaṃ vakṣyate sāmanyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu yatra sambandhakāle pi liṅgisvarūpam apratyakṣaṃ nityaparokṣam eva sāmānyato vyāptigrahaṇād anumīyate yathā śabdādyupalabdhyā śrotrādi karaṇām indriyāṇām atīndriyatvāt na kadācit pratyakṣagamyatvam atha ca chedanādikriyāṇāṃ paraśvadhādikaraṇapūrvaka vyāptigrahaṇāt śabdādyupalabdhikriyāṇāṃ karaṇāpūṛvakatvam anumīyate atra vativyākhyāne codayanti pūrvavad evam ekam anumānam uktaṃ syāt na trividham yato na tāvad anavagatavyāptikaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ bhavati viśeṣāṇām anantatvena ca tadanvayavyatirekayor duravagamatvāt sarvatra sāmānyenaiva vyāptigrahaṇam yac cetthaṃ vyāptijñānaṃ tat tulyaṃ tritaye pi ataḥ sarvaṃ pūrvavad eva syāt vateḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt tad etad ayuktam avāntaraviśeṣasya suspaṣṭasya bhāvāt vyāptipūrvakam anumānam ity etāvatā yady ekavidham ucyate tat satyam evaṃ prakāram evedam tasmin saty api tu sāmye bhedāntarasaṃbhavāt traividhyam asya pratipādyate tathā hi dhūmajvalanayoḥ pūrvaṃ pratyakṣeṇā grahaṇāt idānīṃ tenaiva bhūmena sa evāgnir anumīyate iti pūrvavad idam anumānam ucyate yat pratyakṣapūrvakam iti prasiddham nanu dhūmāntareṇa vahnyantarānumānaṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakam ka ekam āha na pūrvavad iti kathaṃ tarhīdam ucyate tenaiva dhūmeneti jātyabhiprāyam etad ucyate na vyaktyabhiprāyam nanu sāmānyatas tarhi tatparicchedāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam evedaṃ syāt na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya nityaparokṣānumeyaikaviṣayatvāt prasaktapratiṣedhādinā ca niyatasādhyaparicchedahetuḥ pariśeṣanumānam ucyate yathā gomayendhanadahanānumānam udāhṛtam śabde va guṇātvakalpanam sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu nityaparokṣaviṣayam udāhṛtam eva śrotrādyanumānam tad evaṃ bhedasaṃbhvāt trividham anumānam iti yuktam āstām vā udāharaṇābhedaḥ ekatrāpy udāharaṇe traividhyam abhidhātuṃ śakyate yathā icchādikāryaṃ āśritam kāryatvāt ghaṭavat ity āśrayamātre sādhye pūrvavad anumānam prasaktaśarīrendriyādyāśrayapratiṣedhena viśiṣṭāśrayakalpane tad eva pariśeṣānumānam anumeyasya nityaparokṣatvāt tad eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca tarhi pariśeṣānumānasya sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya ca ko veśeṣaḥ ucyate pariśeṣānumānapravṛttāv anyaḥ panthāḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasyānyaḥ icchādikāryaṃ dehādivilakṣaṇāśrayam śarīrādiṣu bādhakapramāṇopapattau satyāṃ kāryatvād iti sāmānyatodṛṣṭāsya kramaḥ pariśeṣānumānasya tv itthaṃ pravṛttiḥ icchāder aśrayatvena prasaktāni śarīrendriyamanāṃsi niṣidhyante dikkālādau ca tatprasaṅgo nāsti tatpāriśeṣyād ātmaiva tadāśraya iti pariśeṣānumāne ca sarvatra naiṣa niyamaḥ sādhyasyātiparokṣatvam iti gomayāgnikalpanādidarśanāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu nityaparokṣaviṣayam eveti sūktaṃ traividhyam apare punaḥ adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇāviṣayaṃ śaktikriyānumānaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāharanti devadattādāv api kriyāyāḥ parokṣatvāt calatīti pratyaye hi na devadattasvarūpātiriktakriyātattvapratibhāsaḥ ya eva devadattātma tiṣṭhat pratyayagodaraḥ calatīty api saṃvittau sa eva pratibhāsate aviralasamullasatsaṃyogavibhāgaprabandhaviṣayatvāc calatītipratyayasya na sarvadā tadutpādaḥ kathaṃ tarhi nityaparokṣe kriyāsvalakṣaṇe numānaṃ kramata iti cet kāryasya kādācitkatvena kāraṇapūrvakatvāt paridṛśyamānasya dravyasvarūpasya kāraṇātve sarvadā kāryotpādanaprasaṅgāt sarvadā tatsvarūpasadbhāvāt na ca sarvadā kāryam utpadyata iti tadatiriktakriyānumānam evaṃ śaktāv api draṣṭavyam kriyāśaktisvarūpasya ca nityaparokṣatvāt taddṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānam ucyate na tu viśeṣaviṣayam viśeṣavyāptigrahaṇāsyāsaṃbhavād iti tad idam anupapannam parispandarūpasyotkṣepaṇādibhedavataḥ karmaṇaś calatyādipratītau prakāśamānatvena pratyakṣatvāt na tasya nityānu meyatvam saṃyogavibhāgālambanatve tu saṃyujtate vibhajyate iti pratītiḥ syāt na calatīti yathāviṣayaṃ pratyayotpādāt saṃvedanānusāriṇī ca viṣayavyavasthā anyathā ghaṭapratyaye pi paṭasyālambanatā syāt saṃyogavibhāgālambanatve sati tiṣṭhaty api calatpratyayaḥ prāpnoti tatrāpi saṃyogavibhāgasaṃbhavāt sthāṇau ca śyenasaṃyogavibhāgavati calatītipratibhāso bhavet aviralatadupajananaprabandhe pi bhūtabhāvinoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ parokṣatvāt vartamānayor grahaṇam tau ca calitvā pi sthite devadatte sta iti tatrāpi kathaṃ na calatīti pratyayaḥ nirantaraṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgaśreṇidarśanāt bhūmāv api bhaved buddhiḥ calatīti manuṣyavat atha manuṣe yatkriyājanyatvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ tatraiva calatītyādibuddhiḥ nānyatra devadattakriyayā ca tau janyete na niṣkriyayā bhūmyeti na tasyāṃ tathā pratyayaḥ yady evaṃ kriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt kriyālambana evāyaṃ pratyayaḥ na saṃyogavibhāgālambanaḥ tadālambanatve hi tayor dvayavṛttitvāviśeṣāt viśeṣe kāraṇāṃ vācyam yena puruṣa evāyaṃ pratyayaḥ na bhūmāv iti devadattakriyājanyatvena tu na viśeṣaḥ yataḥ kriyāyāḥ parokṣatve sati tad eva na vidmaḥ kim asau devadattāśrayā kriyā kiṃ vā bhūmyāśriteti saṃyogavibhāgakāryānumānasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt na ca devadatte gacchati bhūmau anavaratavahadvahalasaṃyogavibhāgavaty api vā taraṅgiṇītīrapāṣāṇe calatīti pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt kriyāviṣaya eva calatītipratyayaḥ na saṃyogavibhāgālambanaḥ saṃyogavibhāgāgrahaṇe pi ca nirālambe vihāyasi viharati vihaṅgame calatīti saṃvedanaṃ dṛśyate na a gaganasaṃyogaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣetaravṛttitvāt gandhavahamahīruhasaṃyogavat vitatālokāvayavyākāśaḥ tatsaṃyogaś ca patriṇāḥ pratyakṣa iti cet naitad evam tamālanīlajīmūtasamūhapihitāmbare niśīthe sandhakāre pi calatkhadyotadarśanāt na tatrālokāvayavī kiś cana timirāvayavī vā vidyate iti kena saṃyogo gṛhyate vibhāgo vā bhūkampotpāte ca jāte calati vasumatīti matir asti na tatra saṃyogavibhāgau gṛhyete bahulaniśīthe ca na tarām tasmān na saṃyogādyālambanā calatīti matiḥ api tu kriyālambanaiveti na ca nityaparokā kriyā numātum api śakyā kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvena bhavanmate sambandhagrahaṇānupapatteḥ na hi te dravyasvarūpaṃ kāraṇām api tu kriyāviśiṣṭam kriyāyāś ca parokṣatvān na tadāviṣṭadravyagrahaṇāṃ sughaṭam iti kāraṇātvāgrahaṇāt ghaṭādāv api durghaṭā vyāptipratītiḥ ātmā numāne tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ ghaṭādeḥ kāryasyāśritasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt tasmān na kāryānumeyā kriyā na ca saṃyogānumeyā saṃyogāntaṃ karma itinyāyāt vartamānāyāḥ kriyāyās tenānumātum aśakyatvāt kriyā numānavādaś ca sāmānyalakṣaṇe vistareṇa nirastaḥ etena śaktyanumānam api vyudastaṃ veditavyam purā ca savistaram atīndriyaśaktinirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam eva tenādṛṣṭakriyāśaktisvalakṣaṇam iti kṣamam nedaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ iti pūrvoktaṃ eva sat iti matupi vatau vā pratyaye varṇyamāne trividham idam ihoktaṃ yuktam evānumānam parakaviracitānāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ tv amuṣmin sati na bhavati śobhā bhāsvatīvendubhāsām bauddhoktapratibandhadūṣaṇadiśā tallakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam bhūyodṛṣṭamitānvayaikaśaraṇaṃ śocyaṃ punaḥ śāvaram sāṅkhyānāṃ tu kuto numānaghaṭanopādānarūpā yataḥ teṣāṃ jātir asau ca tadvikṛtivadbhinneti duḥstho nvayaḥ idam idānīṃ cintyate yad etad indriyādisannikarṣajatvādinā lakṣitam asmadādipratyakṣaṃ tatkila prāyaśo vartamānakālaviśiṣṭavastuviṣayam evam idam anumānam api kiṃ tadgocaraṃ eva kiṃ vā kālāntaraparicchede pi kṣamam iti tad ucyate trikālaviṣayam anumānam iti kasmāt traikālyagrahaṇāt trikālayuktā arthā anumānena gṛhyante bhūtā nadīpūreṇa vṛṣṭir anumīyate saiva bhaviṣyantī meghonnatyā dhūmena vartamāno gnir iti ataś a yan mīmāṃsakair ucyate codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayituṃ nānyat kiñ ca iti tad ayuktam codanāvat pramāṇāntarasyāpy evaṃ jātīyakaviṣayatvopapatteḥ pratyakṣam api yogīnāṃ trikālaviṣayaṃ uktam asmadādīnām api kvacit iti atra codayanti kāle sati traikālyagrahaṇaṃ cintyam sa eva tu durpapādaḥ tadabhāve kasya vartamānādivibhāgo nirūpyate na tāvad gṛhyate kālaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ghatādivat cirakṣiprādibodho pi kāryamātrāvalambanaḥ na cāmunaiva liṅgena kālasya parikalpanā pratibandho hi dṛṣṭo tra na dhūmajvalanādivat pratibhāsātirekas tu kathañcid upapatsyate pracitāṃ kājcid āśritya kriyākṣaṇaparamparām na caiṣa grahanakṣatraparispandasvabhāvakaḥ kālaḥ kalpayituṃ yuktaḥ kriyāto nāparo hy asau muhūrtayāmāhorātramāsartvayanavatsaraiḥ loke kālpanikair eva vyavahāro bhaviṣyate yadi tv eko vibhur nityaḥ kālo dravyātmako mataḥ atītavartamānādibhedavyavahṛtiḥ kutaḥ evam ākṣipte sati pratyakṣagamyatām eva kecit kālasya manvate viśeṣaṇatayā kāryapratyaye pratibhāsanāt krameṇa yugapat kṣipraṃ cirāt kṛtam itīdṛśāḥ pratyayā nāvakalpante kāryamātrāvalambanāḥ na hi viṣayātisayam antareṇa pratibhāsātiśayo vakalpate arūpo nanv ayaṃ kālaḥ kathaṃ gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā rūpam eva tavā rūpaṃ kathaṃ gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā kathaṃ vā rūpavanto pi parokṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt pratītir anveṣyā kiṃ nimittaparīkṣayā nanu dravye yam niyamaḥ na rūpādau dravye pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat rūpavat tat pratyakṣam iti yena paramāṇūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ syāt kin tu yat pratyakṣaṃ tat rūpavad iti tad uktam trayāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvarūpavattvadravatvādīni iti nedaṃ daivikaṃ vacanaṃ yad anatikramaṇīyam na ca vacanena pratyakṣatvam apratyakṣatvaṃ vā vyavasthāpyate pratyakṣatvaṃ hi endriyikapratītiviṣayatvam ucyate tac ced asti kālasya nīrūpasyāpi pratyakṣatā kena vāryate rūpavattvaṃ taddravyāṇām astu tathā darśanāt na cānuddhāṭitākṣasya kṣiprādipratyayodayaḥ tadbhāvānuvidhānena tasmāt kālas tu cākṣuṣaḥ svatantra eva tarhi ghaṭādivat kasmān na gṛhyate kāla iti cet vastusvabhāva eṣa na paryanuyogārhaḥ rūpidravyaviśeṣaṇatāṃ gatasya tasya grahaṇam na daṇḍādivat svatantrasyāpīti gaganādes tv anyaviśeṣaṇatayā pi na grahaṇām astīti tasyāpratyakṣatvam na tv arūpatvāt atha vadet viśeṣaṇasyāpi rūpavat eva daṇḍāeḥ cakṣuṣā grahaṇām na kālāder iti tad ayuktam arūpasyāpi sāmānyādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇāt dravye niyama iti cet uktam atra yad eva nayanakaraṇakāvagamagocare saṃcarati tad eva cākṣuṣaṃ rūpavad arupaṃ vā dravyam adravyaṃ veti evaṃ guru dravyam iti kārtasvarādau pratibhāsāt gurutvam api pratyakṣaṃ na patanānumeyam eva tasmāt svatantrabhāvena viśeṣaṇatayā pi cākṣuṣajñānagamyaṃ yat tat pratyakṣam upeyatām ata eva pratyakṣaḥ kālaḥ evaṃ samānanyāyatvāt pūrvāparādipratyayagamyā dig api pratyakṣā veditavyeti anye manyante daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalaṃ itivad viṣayātirekasyāgrahaṇāt pratyayātiśayasya ca parokṣakālapakṣe pi tatkāraṇākasyopapatter anumeya eva kālaḥ apratyakṣatvamātreṇa na ca kālasyanāstitā yuktā pṛthivyadhobhāgacandramaḥparabhāgavat apratibhāsamāno pi kālaḥ saṃskāra ivendriyasahacaritaḥ pratyabhijñāṃ kṣiprādipratītiṃ janayiṣyati kṛtaś pratyakṣalakṣaṇe mahān kaliḥ kiṃ viṣayabhedād evapratibhāsabhedaḥ utopāyabhedād api iti tad alaṃ punas tadvimardena pramāṇām iti nirṇītaṃ pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam tasmān na kalpanāmātraṃ cirakṣiprādisaṃvidaḥ na cāsāṃ paridṛśyamānakāraṇavinirmitatvam upapadyate kriyamāṇasya paṭādeḥ kāryasya tadutpādakasya ca tantuturīvemaśalākākuvindādikāraṇābṛndasya sāmye pi kvacit tūrṇaṃ kṛtam kvacic cireṇa kṛtam iti pratibhāsabhedadarśanāt nimittāntaraṃ cintanīyam nanu parispandādikriyābheda evātra nimittam kaścit parispandaś caturaḥ kaścin manthara iti kvacit kṣiprabuddhiḥ kvacic cirabuddhir iti naitaccāru parispandagatayor api cāturyamāntharyayor nimittāntarakāryatvāt parispande pi cireṇa gacchati śīghraṃ dhāvatīti cirakṣiprādipratītir dṛśyate āha na devadattādiparispandanibandhanāḥ kramākramādipratyayāḥ kin tu grahamakṣatrādiparispandanibandhanāḥ sa eva ca grahatātādiparispandaḥ kāla ity ucyate tatkṛta evāyaṃ yāmāhorātramāsādivyavahāraḥ tasya svata eva bhedādaupādhikabhedakalpanākleśo na bhaviṣyati bhedaparicchede nālikāpraharādir upāyaḥ iyatī nālikāiyan muhūrtam iyān prahara iti tatraikasmin muhūrte prahare vā nirvarttyamāneṣū bahuṣu kāryeṣu yugapad iti bhavati matiḥ muhūrtāntarāpekṣeṣu krameṇeti tasmāt grahādiparispanda eva tais tair nimittair upalakṣyamāṇapramāṇāḥ kāla iti kālavidaś ca jyotirgaṇakāsta evainaṃ budhyante tad asāṃPratam candrādigrahaparicchede pi kramādipratītidarśanāt cireṇāstaṃ gato bhānuḥ śītāṃśuḥ śīghram udgataḥ uditāv iva dṛśyete yugapad bhaumabhārgavau iti dṛśyate pratibhāsaḥ na ca grahāntaraparispandakāraṇāka eṣa śakyate vaktuṃ anavasthāprasaṅgāt tasmān na grahādiparispandaḥ kālaḥ kin tu vastvantaram yat kṛto yaṃ kramākramādivyavahāraḥ nanu bhavatkalpito pi kālaḥ kiṃ svata eva kramākramasvabhāvaḥ hetvantarād vā svatas tasya tatsvabhāvatve kāryasyaiva paṭādeḥ paridṛśyamānasya tatsvabhāvyaṃ bhavatu kiṃ kālena hetvantarapakṣe tv anavasthā tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣatvād iti tad etad bāliśacodyam śuklaguṇādāv apy evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyatvāt guṇasya svataḥ śuklasvabhāvatve dravyasyaiva tad bhavatu kiṃ guṇena guṇāntarakalpane tv anavastheti atha tatra tathā darśanāt nedaṃ codyam tad ihāpi samānam kāryeṣu paṭadiṣu nimittāntarakṛtaḥ kramādivyvahāraḥ nimittāntare nimittāntaraṃ na mṛgyam iti tasmād asti yugapadādivyavahārahetuḥ kālaḥ ataś caivam dṛṣṭaḥ parāparatvasya dikkṛtasya viparyayaḥ yuvasthavirayoḥ so pi vinā kālaṃ na siddhyati dūrataradigavacchinno devadattādiḥ para iti pratibhāsate nikaṭadigavacchinnas tu apara iti te ete dikkṛte paratvāparatve viparivartamāne dṛśyete dūrastho hi yuvā apara ity ucyate nikaṭastho pi sthaviraḥ para iti tad atra na kālavyatiriktaṃ kāraṇām upapadyate ity ato numīyate kālaḥ sa cāyam ākāśavat sarvatraikaḥ kālaḥ yathā kāśaliṅgasya śabdasya satvatrāviśeṣāt viśeṣaliṅābhāc caikaḥ tathā sarvatra tadvyavahārād vibhuḥ avayavāśrayānupalaṃbhāt niravayavaḥ anāśritaś ca anāśritatvād eva dravyam ata evāvayavavibhāgādināśakāraṇānupapatter nitya iti nanu evañcaikatvāt kālasya kuto vartamānādivibhāgaḥ tadabhāvāt kathaṃ trikālaviṣayam anumānam ucyate ucyate na tāttvikaḥ kālasya bhedo vartamānādiḥ kin tv asann apy asau vyavahārasiddhaye kenacid upādhinā kalpyate kaḥ punar asāv upādhiḥ kriyeti brūmaḥ nanu tasyā api na svato vartamānādibhedaḥ paṭhitam iti tatkramena tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam atra vṛddhanaiyāyikās tāvad evam upamānasvarūpam ācakṣate saṃjñāsaṃjñisambamdhapratītiphalaṃ prasiddhetarayoḥ sārūpyapratipādakam atideśavākyam evopamānam gavayārthī hi nāgariko navagatagavayasvarūpas tadabhijñām āraṇyakaṃ pṛcchati kīdṛk gavayaḥ iti sa tam āha yadṛśo gaus tādṛśo gavayaḥ iti tad etad vākyam aprasiddhasya prasiddhena gavā sādṛśyam abhidadhat taddvārakamaprasiddhasya gavayasaṃjñābhidheyatvaṃ jñāpayatīty upamānam ucyate nanu śabdasvabhāvatvād asya āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ ity anena gatārthatvān nedaṃ pramāṇantraṃ bhavet na ca saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaparicchedaphalatvena pramāṇāntaratayā vaktavyā phalavaicitryeṇa pramānānantyaprasaṅgāt laukikakāni hi vacanāni vaidikāni ca vidhiniṣedhabodhakāni nānāphalāny api bhavanti na śabdatām atikrāmanti ucyate yatra śabdapratyayād eva tatpraṇetṛpuruṣapratyayād eva vā arthatathātvam upāyāntarānapekṣam avagamyate sa āgama eva tata eva tadarthapratīteḥ yatra tu puruṣaḥ pratītyupāyam aparam upadiśati tatra tata evopāyāt tadarthāvadhāraṇam upāyamātrāvagame tu śabdavyāpāraḥ yathā parārthānumāne agnimān ayaṃ parvataḥ dhūmavattvāt mahānasavad iti atra hi na puruṣopadeśaviśvāsād eva śailasya kṛśānumattāṃ pratipattā nimittāntaranirapekṣaḥ pratipadyate api tu tadavabodhakadhūmākhyaliṅgasāmarthyād eva tad iha yady āṭaviko nāgarikāya gavayārthine nāgariko nāraṇyakavākyād eva taṃ prāṇinaṃ gavayaśabdavācyatayā buddhyate kin tu sārūpyaṃ prasiddhena gavā tasya paśyati kim āraṇyakavākyena na saṃpratyayo nātarakasya na brūmo na saṃpratyaya iti kin tu sārūpyam upāyāntaraṃ tadavagatāv asāv upadiṣṭāvān iti tato vagatir bhavanti na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti na śābdī sā pratītiḥ api tv aupamānikīti vacanam api bhavad idam upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram iti yuktam bhāṣyākṣarāṇy api caitatpakṣasākṣyacchāyām iva vadanti lakṣyante tāni tu granthagauravabhayān na yojyante ity alaṃ prasaṅgena adyatanās tu vyācakṣate śrutātideśavākyasya pramātur aprasiddhe piṇḍe prasiddhapiṇḍasārūpyajñānam indriyajaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattiphalam upamānam taddhīndriyajanitam api dhūmajñānam iva tadagocaraprameyapramitisādhanāt pramāṇāntaram śrutātideśavākyo hi nirīkṣase tam eva gavayaṃ vidyāḥ sa cāyaṃ saṃjñino grahaḥ sambandhakaraṇaṃ ceha viśeṣeṣu na yujyate ānantyāt kin tu sāmānye tac cattham avadhāritam pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ saṃjñākarmeti na hi vaidikī codanā kalpanāmātraṃ veti sarvathaitasyāḥ pramiteḥ sādhanam upamānaṃ pramāṇam iti siddham tad idam āha prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam prasiddhasādharmyād iti karmadhārayaḥ tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bahuvrīhir va pradiddhaṃ ca tat sādharmyaṃ prasiddhena gavā vā sādharmyaṃ gavayasya prasiddhaṃ vā sādharmyaṃ yasya saḥ prasiddhasādharmyā gavayaḥ tasmāt prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam sādhyaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ tasya sādhanaṃ bodhanam saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānaṃ vā sādhyaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ jananam ity arthaḥ evaṃ prasiddhasādharmyajñānam upamānaṃ phalaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānam ity uktaṃ bhavati sādhyasādhanaśabdena karaṇasya pramāṇatām bravīti etac ca mantavyaṃ sarvatra paribhāṣitam ata eva madhye likhitam idaṃ yad ubhayataḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇāni sāmānyam ucyate sadṛśapratyaye hetuḥ tathā sādṛśyam ucyate nanu upamānalakṣaṇam asmin mokṣaśāstre kvopayujyate āgamāt tāvat ātmajñānaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ setikartavyatākam avagamyate anumānād pramātuḥ pramāṇāntaraṃ bhavatīti abhyupagantavyam tad idam anupapannam evaṃvidhapratītyabhāvāt prasiddhena hi sādṛśyaṃ aprasiddhasya gamyate gavā gavayapiṇḍasya na tu yukto viparyayaḥ tathā hi aśrutātideśako nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhramenn adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ gosadṛśaṃ prāṇinam upalabhamāna evaṃ buddhyate bravīti ca aho nu gavā sadṛśa eṣa kiś cana prāṇī iti na tv anena sadṛśo gaur iti jñānam gavayasādṛśyam avagatam iti citram na citram vyaktitiraskṛtasya grahaṇāt nanu idam api citrataram gṛhītaṃ ca vyaktitiraskṛtaṃ ceti vyaktir hi grahaṇam eva tattiraskāre ca nāsty eva grahaṇam ucyate kiñciccitram tasmāt smṛtireveyam tathā hi pratīti anena sadṛśo gaurmayā nagare dṛṣṭaḥ iti natu adyaitatsadṛśo gaurdṛśyate iti buddhiḥ nanu pratiyogigrahaṇādvinā kathaṃ grāmyasya sādṛśyagrahaṇam atra bhavataivātmanaḥ pratikūlamabhihitam sāmānyavacca sādṛśyaṃ ekaikatra samāpyate pratiyoginyadṛṣṭe pi tasmāttadupalabhyate sa ca bhūyo vayavasāpnānyayogo gṛhītagavayavenāpi nāgarakeṇa grahītuṃ śakyate atha tadā tadgrahaṇe pi sati na tasya sadṛśapratyayaḥna tarhi bhūyo vayavasāmānyayogaḥ sādṛśyam kintu sadṛśapratyayahetuḥ sādṛśyam yathoktam sādṛśyaṃ sadṛśapratyayahetutvam eva bhūyo vayavasāmānyayoge ca tallakṣaṇe citrādāvavyāptiḥ ativyāptiś ca prāṇyantareṣu visadṛśeṣvapi tadavayavasāmānyānāṃ khurādīnāṃ bhāvāt bhūyastvaṃ tu kiyatteṣāmiti na vidmaḥ yāvatā sādṛśyapratyayotpattiriti cet tarhi sadṛśapratyayahetutvam eva sādṛśyamastviti yuktam tasmāt gavayadarśanātpūrvamapi gavayanabhivyaktisādṛśyamagrahaṇopapatteḥ smṛtireveyam atha mataṃ yathā naiyāyikānāṃ atideśavākyavelāyāṃ sopapluvā saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhabuddhiḥ upamānānnirupaplavībhavati evamiyamapi yo sau pūrvaṃ vyaktitiraskṛtā gavi gavayasādṛśyabuddhirabhūt sedānīṃ upamānādvyaktibhaviṣyatīti naitadasthigavayagrahīṇā pratyakṣeṇaiva tatspaṣṭatāsiddheḥ yathā bhavadbhirnaiyāyikā uktāḥ atha tvadhikatā kācit pratyakṣādeva sā bhavet iti tathā naiyāyikā api yuṣmān vakṣyanti nanu vanasthapramāturgavaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ grāmavartini gavi sādṛśyabuddheḥ spaṣṭatāmādadhīta kiṃ kurmaḥ tadarśanānantaraṃ suspaṣṭatatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagopiṇḍasmaraṇāt nanu ata evedamupamānaṃ pramāṇāntaramucyate pratyakṣasya sannihitagavayasvarūpamātraniṣṭhatvāt parokṣe ca gavi gavayasādṛśyapratyayasya vispaṣṭasyānyato siddheriti uktamatrasmṛtireveyam tathā vabhāsanāt anadhigatārthagrāhi ca pramāṇamupagacchanti bhavantaḥ bhavatu vā smṛtivilakṣaṇeyaṃ pratītiḥ tathā pyanumānajanyatvāt na pramāṇāntaramāviśati smaryamāṇe gauḥ dharmī etatsadṛśa iti sādhyo dharmaḥ etadavayavasāmānyayogitvāt sannihitadvitīyagavayapiṇḍavat tadasannidhāne sāmānyena vyāptir darśayitavyā yatra yadavayavasāmānyayogitvaṃ tatra tatsādṛśyam yathā yamayoriti viśeṣṭasya tadyogasya hetutvānnānaikāntikatvam sāmānyayogo nyaḥ anyacca sādṛśyamityuktvāt na pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ avyutpannasya nārikeladvīpavāsinaḥ vālasya vā tatpratyayānutpādāt na vyāptir nairapekṣeṇa sā pratīririti vaktavyam tasmāditthamanumānajanyatvāt smṛtitvād vā pūrvoktādasaṃbhavād eva vā naiyamavagatirupamānakāryeti siddham kaścāsya bhavadupamānasya svatantropayogaḥ evaṃ hy āhurbhavantaḥ aparīkṣāmiṣeṇāpi lakṣaṇāni vadatrayam na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati  nanu ukta evopayogaḥ saurye carau dravyadevatāsārūpyādāgneyavidhyantalābhaḥ āgneyo ṣṭākapālaḥ ityupadiṣṭadṛṣṭādṛṣṭetikartavyatākalāpatayā nirākāṅkṣo vidhiḥ sauryaṃ caraṃ nirvapet grahmavarcasakāmaḥ ityatra pradhānamāgropadeśādvidhyādirastina tu vidhyantaḥitikartavyatā bhidhānam na cānitikartavyatākaṃ karma prayogayogyam ataḥ kimiyamitikartavyatājātamiha gṛhyatāmityapekṣāyāṃ carupuroḍāśayorvrāhyādyauṣadhasādhyatvena dravyasādṛśyātsūryāgnyośca tejasvitayā devatayoḥ sārūpyādāgneyetikartavyatā saurye kriyata ityupamānād gamyate api ca kvaciccoditadravyādāvalabhyamāne pratinidhyupādānena karmasamāpanāt pratinidhimāgropādāne prāpte vrīhisadṛśanīvāroopādānamupamānātpratīyata iti tadāha  bhinnānumānādupameyamuktā sauryādivākyairna sahāyi dṛṣṭam sādṛśyato gnyādiyutaṃ kathaṃ nu pratyāyayedityupayujyate naḥ pratinidhirapi caivaṃ vrīhisādṛśyayogāt bhavati tadapacāre yatra nīvārajātau tadapi phalamabhīṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇasyopamāyāḥ prakṛtirapi ca gauṇairbādhyate yatra cānyaiḥ  tadetadasamañjasamprasiddhenāprasiddhasya sādṛyam avagamyate ityeṣabhavad bhirutsṛṣṭaḥ panthaḥ viparyayastvāśritaḥ yadapyadṛṣṭena nūtanenāprasiddhena gavayena vākyasiddhasya goḥ sādṛśyamupamānāt pratīyata ititadihāpi nijñatitikartavyatākena govatprasiddhenāgreyena sauryasya gavayavadaprasiddhasya sādṛśyamavagamyate na tu gavayena goḥsauryeṇāgreyasya tadiha yasya vidhyantārthitā na tatropamānātsādṛśyāvagamaḥ yatra vā tadavagamaḥ na tatretikartavyatā rthitvam nanu saurye vidhyantārthini pratīyamāne dravyadevatāsārūpyāderāgneyaḥ smaraṇapathamavataratīti tata evāsau vidhyantamadhigacchatīti evamapi smaraṇamātrāt siddhe rthe kimupamānena āgreyasmaraṇādeva taditikartavyatā saurye upādāsyate smṛtiviśeṣa eva viṣayādhikyādupamānamucyate iti cet prativihitametadityalaṃ prasaṅgena kiñcopamānapratipāditārthaḥ na codanālakṣaṇatāṃ vibharti tasmānna yujyeta tato dhigantuṃ āgreyavidhyantaviśeṣalābhaḥ pratinidhirapi caivaṃ nāsti nīvārajāteḥ na hi bhavadupamānāt brīhisādṛśyabuddhiḥ bhavati tu matireṣā brīhayastatsadṛkṣāḥ iti na ca phalamasyāḥ kiñcidasti pratīteḥ bhavatyaṅgaṃ yāge kvacana gavayālambhanamataḥ tadākārajñāne pratinidhiviveke ca kṛtinām upāyatvaṃ yuṣmatkathitamupamānaṃ na bhajate parigrāhyaṃ tasmāt pravaramunigītaṃ sumatibhiḥ ityupamānam iti dvitīyamāhnikam tṛtīyamāhnikam śabdaparīkṣā upamānānantaraṃ śabdasya vibhāgasūtre nirdeśāttasya laiṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitumāha āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ ityucyamāne paryāyamātroccāraṇāt akārake śabdamātre pramāṇyaprasaktiriti tadvinivṛttaye pūrvasūtrāt sādhyasādhanapadamākṛṣyate tathā pi śabdāntarajanake prasaktiriti pratyakṣasūtrāt jñānapadasya smṛtijanakasya vyavacchedārthaṃ cārthagrahaṇasya saṃśayaviparyayajanakanirākaraṇāya ca vyavasāyātmakāvyabhicāripadayoranuvṛttirityevamavyabhicārādiviśeṣaṇārthapratītijanaka upadeśaḥ śabda ityuktaṃ bhavati tadevaṃparyāyamevopadeśaśabdaṃ śabdalakṣaṇamapekṣitapūrvasūtropāttaviśeṣaṇapadaṃ kecidvyācakṣate āptagrahaṇaṃ ca lakṣaṇaniścayārthamāhuḥ ghrāṇarasanatvakcakṣuḥśrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ ityatra bhūtagrahaṇaṃ vakṣyate evaṃ hyaitihyasya na pramāṇāntaratā bhaviṣyati upadeśarūpatvāviśeṣāditi anye tu bruvate yuktamupadeśapadameva śabdalakṣaṇam yuktaṃ ca tanniścayārthamāptagrahaṇam pūrvasūtropāttaviśeṣaṇapadānuvṛttistu nopayujyate sāmānyalakṣaṇānantaraṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaprakramāt sāmānyalakṣaṇena ca smṛtyādijanakasakalapramāṇābhāsavyudāse kṛte sajātīyapratyakṣādivyadaccheda eva kevalam idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ tatra ca paryāyatayā paryāptamupadeśapadameva buddhyādipadavaditi kiṃ viśeṣaṇānuvṛttikleśana iti apara āha anavalambitasāmānyalakṣaṇānusaraṇadainyamanadhyāhṛtaprāktanaviśeṣaṇapadamāptopadeśaśśabdalakṣaṇam na cākārakeṇa śabdāntarakāriṇā vā smṛtijanakena vā saṃśayādhāyinā vā śabdena kiñcidupadiśyata iti nirvacanasavyapapekṣāt upadeśagrahaṇādeva tannivṛttiḥ siddhā mithyopadeśe tu rathyāpuruṣādivacasi viparītapratītikāriṇi prasaṅgo na nivartata iti tatpratikṣepārthamāptagrahaṇam aitihye yathārthapratītihetāvāptānumānānna pramāṇāntaratvamiti tasmādyathāśrutameva sūtraṃ śabdalakṣaṇārthaṃ yuktam bhavatvevam upadiśyata iti ko rthaḥ abhidhānakriyā kiyate keyamabhidhānakriyā nāma pratītiriti cet cakṣurāderapi tatkaraṇatvādupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ svāvagatipūrvikā pratītiriti cet dhūmāderapyupadeśatāprasaṅgaḥ cakṣurāderapi tatkaraṇatvāt upadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ svasādṛśyena pratītiriti cet bimbasyāpi pādādyanumitāvupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ śabde ca tadabhāvādanupadeśatvaṃ syāt śabdāvacchinnā pratītiriti cet śrotrasya tajjanakatvādupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ śabdasya ca svāvacchedena pratītijanakatvaniṣedhādanupadeśatvaṃbhavet nāpi śabdakaraṇikā pratītiḥ abhidhānakriyāvivakṣāyāṃ ākāśānumāne vā tasyopadeśatvaprasaṅgā dityabhidhānakriyāsvarūpāniścayāt na tasyāḥ karaṇamupadeśaḥ ucyate śrotragrāhyavastukaraṇikā tadarthapratītirabhidhānakriyā itthaṃ loke vyavahārāt uktaḥ abhihitaśca sa evārtho loke vyapadiśyate yastu tathāvidhapratītiviṣayatāṃ pratipannaḥ śrotragrāhyasya varṇarāśerevārthapratītikaraṇatvāt na tu śrotrapratyayaviṣayaḥ sphoṭatmā śabdaḥ śrotragrahaṇe hyarthe śabdaśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ varṇā eva ca śrotragrahaṇāḥ yato rthapratītiḥ sa śabda iti tūcyamāne dhūmādirapi śabdaḥ syāt agṛhītasambandhaśca śabdaḥ śabdatvaṃ jahyāt arthapratipatterakaraṇāt nanu pratīteḥ saṃvidātmakatvāt nābhidhānakriyā nāma kācidapūrvā saṃvidanyā vidyate tatkaraṇasya copadeśatāyāmatiprasaṅga ityuktamsatyamsaṃvidātmaiva sarvatra pratītiḥ sā cakṣurādikaraṇikā pratykṣaphalam liṅgakaraṇikā numānaphalam śrotragrāhyakaraṇikā śabdaphalam na hidṛśyate anumīyate abhidhīyata iti paryāyaśabdāḥ tatpratītiviśeṣajanane ca śabdasyopadeśatvamucyate ākāśānumānavivakṣādau tu tasya liṅgatvamevetyalaṃ prasaṅgena āpto bhaṣyakṛtā vyākhyātaḥāptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣāprayukta upadeṣṭā ca iti dharma ityupadeṣṭavyaḥ kaścidartho vivakṣitaḥ sākṣātkaraṇametasya yathārthamupalambhanam na tu pratyakṣeṇaiva grahaṇamiti niyamaḥ anumānādiniścitārthopadeśino pyāptatvānapāyāt cikhyāpayiṣayā yukta ityuktā vītarāgatā upadeṣṭetyanenoktaṃ pratipādanakauśalam vītarāgo pi mūkādirupadeṣṭumaśaktaḥ kiṃ kuryāt vaktuṃ śakto pi sākṣātkṛtadharmā pyavītarāgo na vakti tūṣṇīmāsta iti tasya ca pratipādye rthe vītarāgatvamiṣyate sarvathā vītarāgas tu puruṣaḥ kutra labhyate ṛṣyārthalamecchasāmānyaṃ vaktavyaṃ cāptalakṣaṇam evaṃ hi loke pyāptoktathā vyavahāro na naṅkṣyati ye pyāptiṃ doṣakṣayamācakṣatetairapi doṣakṣayaḥ pratipādyartheṣveva varṇanīyaḥ anyathā līke dṛśyamānasyāptoktinibandhanasya vyavahārasya nihnavaḥ syāt athavā vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthatvācchāstrasya tatpraṇeturāptasyeśvarasya yathāśrutamevedaṃ lakṣaṇam sa sākṣātkṛtadharmaiva dharmasyeśvarapratyakṣagocaratvāt cikhyāpayiṣāprayukta iti kāruṇika eva bhagavāniti vakṣyate upadeṣṭā ca vedādyāgamānāṃ tatpraṇītatvasya samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt āha āstāṃ tāvadetat idaṃ tu cintyatām kimarthamidaṃ punaśśabdasya pṛthaglakṣaṇamupadiśyate śabdasya khalu paśyāmo nānumānādvibhinnatām atastallakṣaṇākṣepāt na vācyaṃ lakṣaṇāntaram parokṣaviṣayatvaṃ hi tulyaṃ tāvahayorapi sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca sambandhāpekṣaṇāhayoḥ agṛhīte pi sambandhe naikasyāpi pravartanam sambandhaśca viśeṣāṇāmānantyādati durgamaḥ yathā pratyakṣato dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā gniranumīyate tathaiva śabdamākarṇya tadartho pyavagamyate anvayavyatirekau ca bhavato trāpi liṅgavat yo yatra dṛśyate śabdaḥ sa tasyārthasya vācakaḥ pakṣadharmatvamapyamiti śabda eva yato rthavān prakalpayiṣyate pakṣo dhūmo dahanavāniva tatra dhūmatvasāmānyaṃ yathā vahati hetutām bhotvādiśabdasāmānyaṃ tadvadatrāpivakṣyati evaṃ viṣayasāmagrīsāmyādekatvaniścaye na vilakṣaṇatāmātraṃ kiñcidanyatvakāraṇam pūrvavarṇakramodbhūtasaṃskārasahakāritā puruṣāpekṣavṛttitvaṃ vivakṣānusṛtikramaḥ ityādinā viśeṣeṇa na pramāṇāntaraṃ bhavet kāryakāraṇadharmādiviśeṣo trāpi nāsti kim yatheṣṭaviniyojyatvamapi nānyatvakāraṇam hastasaṃjñādiliṅge pi tathābhāvasya darśanāt dṛṣṭāntanirapekṣattvamabhyaste viṣaye samam anabhyaste tu sambandhasmṛtisāpekṣatā dvayoḥ anekapratibhotpattihetutvamapi vadyate aspaṣṭaliṅge kasmiṃmaścidaśca ityādiśabdavat sphuṭārthānavasāyāśca pramāṇābhāsato yathā liṅge tathaiva śabde pi nānārthabhramakāriṇi api ca pratibhāmātre śabdājjāte pi kutracit āptavādatvaliṅgena janyate niścitā matiḥ ata eva hi manyante śabdasyāpi vipaścitaḥ āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyādanumānatāma kiñca śabdo vivakṣāyāmeva prāmāṇyamaśnute na bāhye vyathicāritvāt tasyāṃ caitasya liṅgatā tatrābhidhīyate dvividhaḥ śabdaḥpadātmā vākyātmā ceti tatra vākyamanavagatasambandhameva vākyārthamavagamayitumalam abhinavaviracitaślokaśravaṇe sati padasaṃskṛtamatīnāṃ tadarthāvagamadarśanāt ataḥ sambandhādhigamamūlapravṛttinā numānena tasya kathaṃ sāmyasaṃbhāvanā padasya tu sambandhādhigamasāpekṣatve satyapi sāmagrībhedāt viṣayamedāccānumānādbhinnatvam viṣayastāvadvisadṛśa eva padaliṅgayoḥ tadvanmātraṃ padasyārtha iti ca sthāpayiṣyate anumānaṃ tu vākyārthaviṣayamatrāgniḥ agnimān parvata iti tataḥ pratipatteḥ uktaṃ ca tatra dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhya iti nanu padānyapi vākyārthavṛttīni santigomān aupagavaḥ kumbhakāra itisatyamkintu teṣvapi sākāṅkṣatā styeva padāntaramantareṇa nirākāṅkṣapratyayānutpādāt gomān kaḥ ityākāṅkṣāyā anivṛtteḥ api ca parvatādiviśeṣyapratipattipūrvikā pāvakādiviśeṣaṇāśca tatirliṅgādudeti padāttu viśeṣaṇāvagatipūrvikā viśeṣyāvagatiriti viṣayabhedaḥ nanu uktaṃ yathā numāne dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhyaḥ evam ihārthaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥsādhyo bhavatu maivam śabdasya hetutvāt na ca hetureva pakṣo bhavitumarhatīti nanu yathā gnimānayaṃ dhūmaḥ dhūmatvāt mahānasaghūmavadityuktaṃ  sā deśasyāgniyuktasya dhūmasyānyaiścakalpitā iti evaṃ gośabda evārthavattvena sāhyatām gośabdatvādityādi sāmānyaṃ ca hetūkriyatām itietadapi dūrghaṭamśabdasya dharmiṇaḥ kiṃ arthaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā sādhyate pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā arthapratītiviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā na tāvadarthaviśiṣṭatvaṃ sāhyam śailajvalanayoriva śabdārthayoḥ dharmadharmibhāvābhāvāt athārthaviṣayatvācchabdasyārthaviśiṣṭatetyucyate tadapyayuktam tatpratītijananamantareṇa tadviṣayatvānupapatteḥ pratītau tu siddhāyāṃ kiṃ tadviṣayatvadvārakeṇa taddharmatvena yadi tu tadviṣayatvamūlā taddharmatvapūrvikā rthapratītiḥ arthapratītimūlaṃ taviṣayatvam taditaretarāśrayam tasmānnārthaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ nāpyarthapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ tadarthitayā śabdaprayogābhāvāt na śaktisiddhye śabdah kathyate śrūyate pi vā arthagatyarthamevāmuṃ śṛṇvanti ca vadanti ca nāpyarthapratītiviśiṣṭāḥ śabdaḥ pakṣatāmanubhavitumarhati siddhyasiddhivikalpānupapatteḥ asiddhayā pi tadvattvaṃ śabdasyārthadhiyā katham siddhāyāṃ tatpratītau vā kimanyadanumīyate jvalanādāvapi tulyo vikalpa iti cet na hi tatrāgnirdhūmena janyate api tu gamyate iyaṃ tvarthapratītirjanyate śabdenityasyāmeva siddhāsiddhatvavikalpāvasaraḥ tasmāt tridhā pi na śabdasya pakṣatvam api ca gośabde dharmiṇi gatvādisāmānyātmakasya hetorgrahaṇaṃ tato vyāptismaraṇam tataḥ parāmarśaḥ tato rthapratipattiriti kāladrādhīyastvāt dharmī tirohito bhavet na parvatavadavasthiti tasya api tūccaritapradhvaṃsitvaṃ śabdasya na ca śabdamarthavattvena lokaḥ pratipadyate kintu śabdāt pṛthagevārthamiti na sarvathā śabdaḥ pakṣaḥ ato dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyasyedvāsaṃbhavācchabdaliṅgayormahān viṣayabhedaḥ sāmagrībhedaḥ khalvapipakṣadharmānvayādirūpasāpekṣyanumānaṃ vyākhayātaṃ śabde tu na tāni santi rūpāṇi tathā ca śabdasya pakṣatvapratikṣepānna taddharmatayā gatvādisāmānyasya liṅgatā na cārthasya dharmitvam siddhyasiddhivikalpānupapatteḥ na ca taddharmatvaṃ śabdasya śakyate vaktum tatra vṛttyabhāvāt pratītijanakatvena taddharmatāyāmucyamānāyāṃ pūrvavaditaretarāśrayaḥ pakṣadharmādibalena pratītiḥ pratītau ca satyāṃ pakṣadharmādirūpalābhaḥ api ca yadyarthadharmatayā śabdasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ bhavet tadā  anavagatadhūmāgnisambandho pi yathā dhūmasya parvatadharmatāṃ gṛhṇātyeva tathā navagataśabdārthasambandho pi arthadharmatāṃ śabdasya gṛhṇīyāt na ca gṛhṇātītyato nāsti pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeti anvayavyatirekāvapi tasya durupapādau deśe kāle ca śabdārthayoranugamābhāvāt na hi yatra deśe śabdaḥ tatrārthaḥ yathoktaṃ śrotriyaiḥ mukhe hi śabdamupalabhāmahe bhūmāvartham iti vayaṃ tu karṇākāśe śrotramupalabhāmaheityāstāmetat nāpi yatra kāle śabdaḥ tatrārthaḥ idanīṃ yudhiṣṭhirārthābhāve pi yudhiṣṭhiraśabdasadbhāvāt arthaśabdārthayoḥ anvayābhāve pi tadbuddhyoranvayo grahīṣyate ityucyate tarhi vaktavyaṃkiṃ arthabuddhāvutpannāyāmanvayo gṛhyate anutpannāyāṃ vā anutpannāyāṃ tāvat svarūpāsattvāt kuto nvayagrahaṇam utpannāyāṃ tvarthabuddhau kimanvayagrahaṇeneti naiṣphalyam tatpūrvakatve tu pūrvavaditaretarāśrayam etena vyatirekagrahaṇamapi vyākhyātam nanu āvāpodvāpadvāreṇa śabdarthasambandhe niścīyamāne upayujyete evānvayavyatirekau yathoktam yatra yo nveti yaṃ śabdamarthastasya bhavedasau iti satyametatkintu samayabalena siddhāyāmarthabuddhau samayaniyamārthāvanvayavyatirekau śabde nānvayavyatirekakṛtā ca dhūmāderivāgneḥ tato rthabuddhiḥ api ca dhūmādibhyaḥ pratītiśca naivāvagatipūrvikā ihāvagatipūrvaiva śabdādutpadyate matiḥ sthaviravyavahāre hi bālaḥ śabdāt kutaścana dṛṣṭvā rthamavagacchan taṃ svayamapyavagacchati yatrāpyevaṃ samayaḥ kriyate etasmācchabdādayamarthastvayā pratipattavya ititatrāpi pratītireva kāraṇatvena nirdiṣṭā draṣṭavyā tasmādanyo liṅgaliṅginoravinābhāvo nāma sambandhaḥ anyaś ca śabdārthayoḥ samayaparanāmā vācyavāc akabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ pratītyaṅgam evaṃvidhaviṣayabhedāt sāmagrībhedācca pratyakṣavadanumānādanyaḥ śabda iti siddham yat tu pūrvavarṇakramāpekṣaṇādivailakāṇyamāśaṅkya dūṣitam kastatra phalguprāye nirbandhaḥ yatpunarabhihitam āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyādanumānatā iti tadatīva subhāṣitam viṣayabhedāt āptavādatvahetunā hi śabdārthabuddheḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyate na tu saiva janyate yadāha anyadeva hi satyatvamāptavādatvahetukam vākyārthaścānya eveha jñātaḥ pūrvataraṃ ca saḥ tataścedāptavādena satyatvamanumīyate vākyārthapratyayasyātra kathaṃ syādanumānatā janma tulyaṃ hi buddhīnāmāptānāptagirāṃ śrutau janmādhikopayogī ca nānumāyāṃ trilakṣaṇaḥ iti na ca prāmāṇyaniścayādvinā pratibhāmātraṃ taditi vaktavyam śabdārthasaṃpratyayasyānubhavasiddhatvāt etena vivakṣāviṣayatvamapi pratyuktam na hi vivakṣā nāma śabdasya vācyo viṣayaḥ kintvartha eva tathā vivakṣāyāṃ hi śabdasya liṅgatvamiha dṛśyate ākāśa iva kāryatvāt na vācakatayā punaḥ śabdāduccaritācca vācyaviṣayā tāvatsamutpadyate saṃvittistadanantaraṃ tu gamayetkāmaṃ vivakṣāmasau arthopagrahavarjitat tuniyamātsiddhaivamājīvatā tadvācyārthaviśeṣitā tvavidite naiṣā tadarthe bhavet nanu siddhe pramāṇattve bhedābhedaparīṣaṇam kriyate na tu śabdasya prāmāṇyamavakalpate arthapratītijanakaṃ pramāṇamiti varṇitam vikalpamātramūlatvāt nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśantyamī artho nirūpyamāṇaśca ko vā śabdasya śakyate vaktuṃ na jātirna vyaktiḥ na tadvānnāma kiś cana sambandho pyasya nārthena nityo sti samayo tha vā śakyaḥ sannapi vā boddhumarthe kathamatīndriye vākyārtho pi na nirṇetuṃ pāryate pāramārthikaḥ niyogabhāvanābhedasaṃsargādisvabhāvakaḥ tatpratītyabhyupāyaś ca kiṃ padārthaḥ padāni vā vākyaṃ vā vyatipaktārthaṃ sphoṭo veti na lakṣyate siddhāyāmapi tadbuddhau tasyā draḍhimakāraṇam nityatvamāptoktatvaṃ vā na samyagavatiṣṭhate pade nitye pi vaidikyo racanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ nityā vā kṛtakatve pi kṛtāḥ keneti durgamam kartā sti sa ca nirdvandvaḥ sa caikaḥ sa ca sarvavit sa ca kāruṇiko veti pratipattuṃ na śakyate parasparaviruddhāśca santi bhūyāṃsa āgamāḥ teṣāṃ kasyeśvaraḥ kartā kasya neti na manmahe vede doṣāśca vidyante vyāghātaḥ punaruktatā phalasyānupalaṃbhaśca tathā phalaviparyayaḥ kīdṛśaścārthavādānāṃ viruddhārthābhidhāyinām mantrāṇāṃ
