tataḥ kasyacit saṅkalpavighātadvārakānaiśvaryaprasaṅgāt ityeka eveśvaraḥ tadicchayā karmāṇikāryeṣu pravartante ityupapannaḥ sargaḥ tadicchāpratibandhāt stimitaśaktīni karmāṇyudāsata ityupapannaḥ pralayaḥ evañca yaduktaṃ tasmādadyavadevātra sargapralayakalpanā samasta kṣayajanmabhyāṃ na siddhyatyapramāṇikā iti etadapi asāṃpratam tiṣṭhitu vā sargapralayakālaḥadyatve pi yathoktanayena tadicchāmantareṇa prāṇināṃ karmavipākānupapatteravaśyamīśvaro hyupagantavyaḥ itarathā sarvavyavahāravipralopaḥ taduktam ajño janturanīśo yamātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā iti nanuevaṃ tarhi īśvarecchaiva bhavatu kartrī saṃharkrī ca kiṃ karmabhiḥ maivamkarmabhirvinā jagadvaictryānupapatteḥ karmanairapekṣyapakṣe pi trayo doṣā darśitā eva īśvarasya nirdayatvaṃ karmacodanānarthakyamanirmokṣaprasaṅgaśceti tasmāt karmaṇāmevaniyojane svātantryamīśvarasyana tannirapekṣam kiṃ tādṛśaiśvaryeṇ prayojanamiti cetnana prayojanānuvarti pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati kiṃ vā bhagavataḥ karmāpekṣiṇo pi na prabhutva mityalaṃ kutarkalavaliptamukhanāstikālāpaparimardena tasmāt kutārki kodgītadūṣaṇābhāsavāraṇāt siddhastrailokyanirmāṇanipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ ye tvīśvaraṃ nirapavādadṛḍhapramāṇasiddhasvarūpamapi nābhypayanti mūḍhāḥ pāpāya taiśaha kathā pi vitanyamānā j āyeta nūnamiti yuktamato virantum yasyecchayaiva bhuvanāni samudbhavanti tiṣṭhanti yānti ca punarvilayaṃ yugānte tasmai samastaphalabhoganibandhanāya nityaprabuddhamuditāya namaḥ śivāya vedapauruṣeyatvasādhanaprakaraṇam nanutrailokyanirmāṇanipuṇe parameśvare siddhe pi tatpraṇītatvaṃ navedasyāvakalpate pade śabdārthasambandhe vedasya racanāsu vā kartṛtvamasyāśaṅkyeta tacca sarvatra durvacam varṇarāśiḥ kramavyaktaḥ padamityabhidhīyate varṇānāṃ cāvināśitvāt kathamīśvarakāryatā sambandho pi na tatkāryaḥ sa hi śaktisvabhāvakaḥ śabde vācakaśakriśca nityaivāgnavivoṣṇatā racanā api vaidikyo naitāḥ puruṣanirmitāḥ kavipraṇītakāvyādiracanābhyo vilakṣaṇāḥ evaṃ ca vede svātantryamīśvarasya na kutracit kāmaṃ tu parvatāneṣa vidadhātu bhinattu vā svataḥprāmāṇyasiddhau tu vede vaktranapekṣatām vadāmo na tu sarvatra puruṣadveṣiṇo vayam anapekṣatvamevāto vedaprāmāṇyakāraṇam yuktaṃvaktā pi vedasya kurvannapi karotu kim kathaṃ punaramī varṇāḥ śrutamātratirohitāḥ nityā bhavantuko yaṃ vā śabdasvātantryadohadaḥ ucyate śabdasya na hyanityatve yuktiḥ sphurati kāvana pratyakṣam arthāpattiś ca nityatāṃ tvadhigacchataḥ tathā hianityatvahetava ime kila kathyanteprayatnānantaramupalabdheḥ kāryaḥ śabda iti kāryatvānityatvayoḥ parasparāvinābhāvāt ekatarasiddhāvanyatarasiddhirbhavatyeveti kvacit kiñcit sādhanamucyate prayatnapreritakauṣṭhyamārutasaṃyogavibhāgānantaramupalabhyamānaḥ śabdastatkārya eveti gamyate uccāraṇādūrdhvamanupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ na hyenamuccaritaṃ muhūrtamapyupalabhāmahe tasmādvinaṣṭa ityavagacchāmaḥ karotiśabdavyapadeśācca kāryaḥ bdaḥ śabdaṃ kuruśabdaṃ mā kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate te nūnamavagacchanti kāryaḥ śabda iti nānadeśeṣu ca yugapadupalambhāt teṣu teṣu deśeṣu śabdena vyavahārāt sarvatra yugapadupalabhyate śabdaḥ tadekasya nityasya sato nupapannam kāryatve tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānāmupapadyate nekadeśasambandha iti śabdāntaravikāryatvāccānityaḥ śabdaḥ dadhyatreti ikāra eva yakārībhavatīti sādṛśyāt smṛteścāvagamyate vikāryatvācca drākṣekṣurasādivadanityatvamasyeti kāraṇavṛddhyā ca vardhamānatvāt bahurbhimahāprayatnairuccāryamāṇo mahān gośabda upalabhyatealpairalpaprayatnairuccāryamāṇo lpa ityetacca tantuvṛddhyā vardhamāna paṭa iva śabdo pi hetuvṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ kāryo bhavitumarhatīti ta ete sarva evāprayojakā hetavaḥ tathāhipratyabhijñātaḥ siddhe nityatve prayatnānantaramupalaṃbhāt abhivyaktiḥ prayatnakāryā śabdasyanotpattiriti gamyate tadevaṃ vyaṅgye pi prayatnānantaramupalambhasaṃbhavādanaikāntikatvam abhivyañjakānāṃ ca pavanasaṃyogavibhāgānāmacirasthāyitvānna ciramuccāraṇādūrdhvamupalabhyate śabdaḥ prayogābhiprāyaś ca karotiśabdavyapadeśo sya bhaviṣyatigomayāni kurukāṣṭhāni kurvitivat tasmātso pi naikāntikaḥ nānādeśeṣu yugapadupalambhanaṃ ekasya sthirasyāpi śabdasya vivasvata iva setsyati nikāryatvaṃ tvasiddhamevaśabdāntaratvāt dadhiśabdaikārāntaḥ saṃhitāvyatiriktaviṣayavṛttiḥ yakārastvayamanya eva aci parataḥ saṃhitāviṣaye prayujyamānaḥ na punarikāra evāyaṃ yakārībhūtaḥ kṣīramiva daghibhūtamupalabhyate na hīcuyaśāstālavyā iti sthānasādṛśyamātreṇa tadvikāratvavarṇanamucitamaprakṛtivikārayorapi nayanotpalapallavayoḥ sādṛśyadarśanāt iko yaṇaci iti pāṇinismṛterapi nāyamarthaḥ ikāro yakārībhavatikṣīramiva dadhībhavatīti kintvasmin viṣaye yaṃ varṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥasminnayamiti sūtrārthaḥ siddhe śabde rtha sambandhe ca tacchāstraṃ pravṛttam iti āratāmupaite vidhyatīti saṃprasāraṇe sati tasmādaiddha eva varṇānāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ nāpi kāraṇavṛddhyā vardhate śabdaḥ balavatā pyuccāryamāṇāni bahubhiścatāvantyevākṣarāṇi dhvanaya eva tathā tatra pravṛddhā upalabhyante navarṇā iti tasmād anityatā siddhiḥ naivaṃ prāyair asādhanaiḥ śabdasya nityatāyāṃ tu saiṣā rthāpattir iṣyate śabdasyoccāraṇaṃ tāvad arthagatyartham iṣyate na coccāritanaṣṭo yam arthaṃ gamayituṃ kṣamaḥ sarveṣām avivādo tra śabdārthavyavahāriṇām yadavijñātasambandhaḥ śabdo nārthasya vācakaḥ vedyamānaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sthavirasvyavahārataḥ drāghīyasā na kālena vinā śakyeta veditum tathā hi gāṃ śuklām ānaya ity ekavṛddhaprayuktaśabdaśravaṇe sati ceṣtmānam itaraṃ vṛddham avalokayan bālastaṭasthaḥ tathārthapratītiṃ tāvat kalpayati ātmani tatpūrvikāyāś ceṣṭāyā dṛṣṭatvāt pramāṇāntarāsannidhānadetaddhṛddhaprayuktaśabdasamanantaraṃ ca pravṛtteḥ tata eva śabdāt kim apy anena pratipannam iti manyate tataḥ kṣaṇāntare tam arthaṃ tena vṛddhenānīyamānam upalabhmāna evaṃ buddhyate ayam artho mutaś śabdād anenāvagata iti sa cārtho nekaguṇakriyājātivyaktyādirūpasaṃkula upalambhyate śabdo py anekapadakadambakātmā śrutaḥ tat katamasya vākyāṃśasya katamo rthāṃśo vācya ity āvāpoddhāpayogena bahukṛtvaḥ śṛṇvan guṇakriyādiparihāreṇa gotvasāmānyam asmanmate tvammate vā tadvanmātraṃ gośabdasyābhidheyaṃ nirdhārayatīti evaṃ dīrghādhvasāpekṣasambandhādhigamāvadhi śabdasya jīvitaṃ siddham iti nāśuvināśitā bhavatu vā vinaśvarasyāpi śabdasya sambandhagrahaṇam tathāpi tasmin gṛhītasambandhe śabde vinaṣṭe sati katham anavagatasambandhādabhinavādidānīm anyasmāc chabdād arthapratipattiḥ anyasimin jñātasambandhe yadanyo vācako bhavet vācakāḥ sarvaśabdāḥ syur ekasmin jñātasaṅgatau na ca vaktā vyavahāramāṇaḥ tadaiva śabdaṃ coccārayati sambandhaṃ karoti ca etaṃ ca vyutpādayati paraṃ ca vyavahārayatīti na hi yugapadimāḥ kriyā bhavitum arhanti evam adarśanāt atha ādau sambandhagrahaṇe vṛtte tasmin vinaṣṭe pi gośabde tatsadṛśam abhinavakṛtam api śabdam upaśrutyārthaṃ pratipatsyante vyavahartāra ity ucyate tad pai na caturaśram sādṛśyasyāgrahaṇāt na hi gośabda ivāyam iti pratītir dṛṣṭā api tu gośabda eveti na ca bhūyo vayavasāmānyayogarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ varṇānām anavayavānām upapadyate abhinavasya śabdasya svayam arthavattvānavadhāraṇāt katham ayam amutaḥ śrotā pratipadyeta iti śaṅkamāno vaktā kathaṃ prayogaṃ kuryāt atha so py arthavatsadṛśam eva prayuṅkte nārthavanatṃ tarhi yatsadṛśam asau prayuṅkte tasyāpy anyasādṛśyādevārthavatteti jagatsargakālakṛtasya mūlabhūtasyārthavataḥ śabdasya smaraṇaṃ syāt tanmūlatvādvyavahārasya na caivam asti na ca ttaḥprabhṛtyadyayāvat sādṛśayam anuvartate tatsādṛśyakalpanāyāṃ mūlasādṛśyavināśāt viśeṣatas tu śabdānām bhinnair vaktṛmukhasthānaprayatnakaranādibhiḥ na nirvahati sādṛśayaṃ śabdānāṃ dūravartinām sādṛśyajanitatve ca mithyaivārthagatir bhavet dhūmānukārinīhārajanyajvalanabuddhivat tasmāt sādṛśyanibandhanārthapratītyanupapatteḥ gośabda eva sthāyītyabhyupagamanīyam nanu yathā dhūmavyaktibhede pi dhūmatvam atim avalambya sambandhagrahaṇādivyavahāranivahanirvahaṃaṃ evam iha gakārādivarṇavyaktibhede pi sāmānyanibandhanas tannirvāhaḥ kariṣyata iti maivaṃ tatra hi dhūmatvasāmānyaṃ vidyate dhruvam śabdatvaṃ vyabhicāry atra gośabdatvaṃ tu dhurghaṭam bhinnair ayugapatkālair asaṃsṛṣṭair vinaśvaraiḥ varṇair ghaṭayituṃ śakyo gośabdāvayavī katham anārabdhe ca gośabde gośabdatvaṃ kva vartatām paṭatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaṃ na hi tantuṣu vartate nanu mā bhūt gośabdatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhinnākāragakārādivyaktivṛttibhir eva vā gatvādijātibhiḥ kāryaṃ pūrvoktam upapadyate etad api nāsti gatvādijātīnām anupapatteḥ bhedābhedapratyayapratiṣṭho hi vyaktijāipravibhāgavyavahāraḥ iha cāyam abhedapratyayo varṇaikyanibandhana eva na jātikṛtaḥ bhedapratibhāsas tu vyañjakabhedādhīna iti kuto jātivyaktivyavahāraḥ gotvādijātinirākaraṇe py eṣa prakāraḥ samāna iti cet na vyaktibhedasya suspaṣṭasiddhatvena vyañjakādyupādhinibandhanatvānupapateḥ parasparavibhaktasvarūpatayā hi śābaleyabāhuleyapiṇḍāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante sthite ca vyaktibhede sarvatra gaur iti tadabhdapratyayasyānanyaviṣayatvād iṣyata eva gotvajātiḥ iha punaḥ gakāravyakto bhinnāḥ śābaleyādipiṇḍavat kva nāma bhavatā dṛṣṭāḥ yenāsāṃ jātim icchasi śiśaou paṭhati vṛddhe vā strījane vā śuke pi vā vaktṛbhedaṃ prapadyante na varṇavyaktibhinnatām tathā ca gargaḥ paṭhati māṭharaḥ paṭhatīty uccārayitṛbheda eva pratīyate amuṃ gaviśeṣam eṣa paṭhatīti nocāryamāṇabhedaḥ ekavaktṛprayoge pi tasyaivoccāraṇaṃ punaḥ gaṅāgaganagargādau na rūpāntaradarśanam drutādibhedabodho pi nādabhedanibandhanaḥ na vyaktibhedajanitaḥ śābaleyādibodhatvat abhyupagate pi gatvasāmānye tasya drutādibhedapratibhāse saty api bhinnatvam eṣitavyam aupādhika eva tasmin bhedapratibhāso varṇanīyaḥ so yaṃ gakāravyaktāv eva kathaṃ na varṇayate tasyā evaikatvād ekapratyayaḥ bhedabhramas tu vyañjakādhīna iti evaṃ hi kalpanā laghīyasī bhavati tasmān na nānāgakāravṛttigatvasāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcid asti api ca gogurugohādau bhinnājupaśleṣakārita eva vyañjaneṣu buddhibhedaḥ paropādhir avadhāryate so yam akṣv api paropādhir eva bhavitum arhati varṇāśritatvāt vyañjakabhedapratyayavad iti tasmāt gatvavat atvasāmānyam pai nāsti yat punaḥ aṣṭādādaśabhedaṃ avarṇakulam ucyate tadaupādhikam eva hrasvādīrghaplutaśvṛtavivṛtādibuddhīnāṃ dhyvanibhedānuvidhāyitvāt vivṛtaḥ saṃvṛtād anyo na gakārād vakāravat api tv akāra evāsau pratibhāti yathā tathā kathaṃ tarhi śabdabhedābhāve bhinne arthapratipattī araṇyaṃ āraṇyam iti dhvanikṛte eva te bhaviṣyataḥ aśabdadharmasya dīrghatvāde katham arthapratītyaṅgatvam iti cet turagavegavad bhaviṣyati yathā turagadehastho vegaḥ puṃso rthasiddhaye paradharmo pi dīrghādir evaṃ tasyopakārakaḥ itaś caitad akārasāmānyam anupapannam atvaṃ hi na dīrghaplutayor anugataṃ bhavati ātvaṃ na hrasvaplutayoḥ ātvaṃ na hrasvadīrghayor iti tasmād ekatvād varṇānāṃ nāvāntarajātayaḥ saṃbhavati śabdatvaṃ tu niyatārthapratipattau vyabhicārīty ato nātra dhūmādinyāyaḥ tenārthapratyayaḥ śabdād anyathā nopapadyate na cen nityatvam ity asmin arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatā anumānād anyathātvam arthāpatter na dṛśyate tenānumānam apy etat prayoktuṃ na na śakyate tad idam ucyate śabdo dharmo nitya iti sādhyo dharma sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣārthapratipādakatvāt dhūmādijātivat tad idam uktaṃ nityatvaṃ tu syād darśanasya parārthatvāt iti evaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāt prabhṛti ārthapratipater avasthitasya vināśahetvabhāvād ātmādivan nityatvam na hy ayam avayavavināśānnaśyati śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt tad eva katham iti cet ucyate svalpenāpi prayatnena yadi varṇaḥ prayujyate yadi vā nānubhūyeta śakalo nānubhūyate sāvayave hi vastuni dvidhā avayavā dṛśyante ārabdhakāryāścānārabdhakāryāś ceti iha punar ārabdhakāryā anārabdhakāryā vā paṭe tantvādaya iva varṇe na kvacd avayavā upalabhyante na cānumīyante liṅgābhāt nāpy aśrayavināśād vināśaḥ śabdasya ātmādivadanāśritatvāt akāśāśritapakṣe vā tannityatvāt na cānyaḥ kiś cana śabdanāśasya hetur asti kṣayo yathopabhgena śastrādicchedanena vā saṃbhāvyate paṭādīnāṃ naiva śabdasya karhicit tasmāt tirohito py āste yadi śabdaḥ kṣaṇāntaram mṛtyor mukhādapakrāntaḥ punaḥ kenaiṣa hanyate itaś ca nityaḥ śabadaḥ saṅkhyābhāvāt aṣṭakṛtvo gośabda uccārita iti vadanti na tv aṣṭau gośabdā iti  tenaikatvam avagamyate yo yaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vihitaḥ kṛtvasucpratyayaḥ sa kriyāvatām abhede bhavati tenoccāraṇāvṛttimātram tad uktam kriyāvatām abhede hi kriyā vṛttiṣu kṛtvasuc tatprayogāt dhruvaṃ tasya śabdasyāvartate kriyā iti kriyābhyāvṛttisattāyām abhede ca kriyāvatām saṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt kṛtvasucpratyayaṃ viduḥ tad anena prakāreṇa pratyabhijñānam ucyate pramāṇaṃ śabdanityatve sakalaśrotṛsākṣikam tathā hy asti sa evāyaṃ gośabda iti vedanam śrautraṃ karaṇakāluṣyabādhasandehavarjitam śrotrendiriyavyāpārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt śrautram idaṃ vijñānam na caitaj janakasya karaṇasya kim api daurbalyam upalabhyate na ca kiṃsvid iti koṭidvayasaṃsparśitayā idaṃ vijñānam upajāyate na ca naitad evam iti pratyayāntaram asimin bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ idānītanāstitvaprameyādhikyagrahaṇāc cedam anadhigatārthagāhy api bhavitum arhati bhaganmate ca gṛhītagrāhitve pi pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyate na hi tad aprāmāṇyaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate śākyair iva bhavadbhiḥ kṣaṇikapadārthān abhiupagamāt na sādṛśyanimittatvaṃ vaktuṃ tasyāś ca yujyate sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ vā dvayasyāpi niṣedhanāt kaiścittirohite bhāvādityaprāmāṇyam ucyate tad asat tatpratītyaiva tirodhānaniṣedhanāt jīvati tvanmate py eṣa śabdastricaturān kṣaṇān pratyabhijñā ca kālena tāvatā na na siddhyati ekakṣaṇāyuṣi tv asmin pratītir atidurlabhā na khalvajanakaṃ kiñcit vastu jñānena gṛhyate iti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhṅge vakṣyate api ca yathā niśīthe rolambaśyāmalāmbudaḍambare pratyabhijñāyate kiñcit aciradyutidhāmabhiḥ tathā viratasaṃyogavibhāgakramajanmabhiḥ pratyabhiñāyate śabdaḥ kṣaṇikair api mārutaiḥ atrāha mārutair ity upoddhātena sādhu smṛtam tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyabhijñānam pratham eva śabdasya yan niyatagrahaṇaṃ tad abhivyaktipakṣe durghaṭam nityatvāt vyāpakatvāc ca sarve sarvatra sarvadāśabdāḥ santīti bhedena grahaṇe kiṃ niyāmakam dhvanayo hi nāma saṃyogavibhāgaviśeśitā vāyavaḥ vāyuvṛttayo vā saṃyogavibhāgāḥ te hi śabdasya vyañjakā iṣyante taiś ca karaṇaṃ vā saṃskriyate karma vā dvayaṃ vā sarvathā ca pramādaḥ karaṇe saṃskṛte tāvat sarvaśabdaśrutir bhavet gakārāyaiva saṃskāra ity eṣa niyamaḥ kutaḥ api ca stimitasamīraṇāpasaraṇam eva karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ sa cāyaṃ taddeśavyavasthitasakalatadviṣayasādhāraṇa eva yathā javanikāprāyaprāptasaramīkṣaṇam raṅgabhūmiṣu taddeśam aśeṣaṃ vastu paśyati tathā prasarasaṃrodhisamīrotsāraṇe sati śrotraṃ taddeśaniḥśeṣaśabdagrāhi bhaviṣyati ākāśaṃ ca śrotram ācakṣate bhavantaḥ tac ca vibhu niravayavaṃ ceti kvacid eva tasmin saṃskṛte sati sarve ca tadaiva saṃskṛtakaraṇāḥ saṃpannā iti sarva eva śṛṇuyuḥ iti badhiretaravyavasthā dusthitā viśaye tu saṃskriyamāṇe tasyānavayavasya vyāpinaś ca saṃskṛtatvāt sarvatra śravaṇam iti madreṣvabhivyakto gośabdaḥ kaśmīreṣv ai śrūyeta na hi tasyādhāradvārakaḥ saṃskāraḥ ākāśavadanāśritatvāt ākāśāśritatvapakṣe pi tad ekatvāt nāpi bhāgaśaḥ saṃskriyate gośabdaḥ tasya niravayatvāt uktaṃ hi alpīyasā prayatnena śabdam uccaritaṃ matiḥ yadi vā naiva gṛhṇati varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam iti ubhayasaṃskārapakṣe tu doṣadvayasyāpy anativṛtiḥ sarveṣāṃ grahṇaṃ sarvatra śravaṇam iti na ca samānadeśānāṃ samānendriyagrāhyāṇāṃ ca bhāvanāṃ pratiniyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatvam upalabdham gṛhe dadhighaṭīṃ draṣṭuṃ ānīto gṛhamedhinā apūpānapi taddeśān prakāśayati dīpakaḥ tasmāt kṛtakapakṣa eva niyatadeśaṃ śabdasya grahaṇaṃ parikalpate nābhivyaktipakṣa iti api ca abhivyaktipakṣe tīvramandavibhāgaḥ abhibhavaś ca śabdasya śabdāntareṇa na prāpnoti na hi śabdastīvro mando vā kaścit svatastasya bhedābhāvāt saṃskārasya ca tadabhivyaktihetoḥ na kācana tīvratā mandatā vā yadanusāreṇa viṣaye tathā buddhiḥ syāt pavanadharmo vā tīvrādir bhavan kathaṃ śrotreṇa gṛhyeta sāvayave hi vastuni sakalaviśeṣagrahaṇāgrahaṇasaṃbhavāt tad apekṣayā pratītibhedo bhavet iha tu niravayave śabde na tathopapadyate iti tasmāt kṛtakapakṣa eva śreyān iti atrocyate karaṇasaṃskārapakṣe eva tāvad astu tac ca karaṇaṃ kiñcid eva marudbhir uāhitasaṃskāraṃ kiñcid eva śabdaṃ gṛhṇāti yathā tālvādisaṃyogavibhāgā bhavatāṃ mate utpādakatayeṣyante kecid varṇasya kasyacit tathā tadvāyusaṃyogavibhāgāḥ kecid eva naḥ kasyacid grahaṇe śaktāḥ śrotraṃ kurvanti saṃskṛtam yathā ca teṣām utpattau samarthyaniyamas tava tathaivaiṣām abhivyaktau sāmarthyaniyamo mama vyañjakānāṃ niyamo na dṛṣṭa iti cet ka evam āha sahasrākṣaḥ tathā hi pṛthivyām eva vartamāno gandhaḥ samānadeśo bhavati samānendriyagrāhyaś ca ghrāṇaikaviṣayatvāt tasya ca niyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatā dṛśyata eva kvacit pācakasaṃparkādarkāṃśusparśataḥ kvacit kvacit salilasaṃsekāt gandho bhivyajyate bhuvaḥ na ca pavanajanisaśskāram eva śrotraṃ manyate atha vā viṣayasaṃskārapakṣo bhvatu tathā pi nātiprasaṅgaḥ niyatadeśasyaiva tatra saṃskārāt na cāsya bhāgaśaḥ saṃskāraḥ niravayavatvāt tathā pi jātivad asya grahaṇaniyamo bhaviṣyati tathāca bhāvatām eva pakṣe yathā sarvagatā jātiḥ piṇḍadeśaiva gṛhyate na ca kārtsnyagṛhītā pi niṇḍe nyatra na dṛśyate tathā sarvagataḥ śabdaḥ nādadeśeṣu gṛhyate kārtsnyena ca prayāṇakāvadhiḥ kaś ca gacchato sya tapasvinaḥ ekaśrotrapraviṣṭo vā sa śrūyetāparaiḥ katham niṣkramya karṇādekasmāt praveśaḥ śravaṇāntare yad īṣyeta kathaṃ tasy ayugapadvahubhiḥ śrutiḥ evāyam artha upekṣituṃ yuktaḥ iti kāryatvapakṣe mūḥ śrutās tārkikakalpanāḥ athābhivyaktipakṣe sya śṛṇu śrotriyakalpanām vivakṣāpūrvakaprayatnapreryamāṇas tāvad vegavattayā kriyāvattayā ca kauṣṭhyo bahir niśarati samīraṇa iti suspaṣṭam etat pratyakṣanikaṭapavanavādināṃ pakṣe pavanasamaye vaktṛvadananikaṭanihitahastasparśenaiva sa upalakṣyate anumeyāmārutapakṣe pi tadānīmāsyasamīpasannidhāpitatūlakrakarmaṇā so numīyate sa gacchan sarvatodikkaḥ stimitānilanodanam karoti karṇākāśe ca prayāti śrutiyogyatām sa ca prayatnatīvratvam andatvena tadātmakaḥ śabde tathāvidhajñaptihetutāmavalambate sa caiṣa gacchann uddāmavegayogāhitakriyaḥ śaravadvegaśāntyaiva na dūraṃ gantum arhati sa mūrtaḥ prasaranmūrtaiḥ aparaiḥ pratibadhyate kuḍyādibhirato nāsya śrutir vyavahitātmanaḥ sa vegagatiyogitvāt āgacchati yato yataḥ śrotā tatas tataḥ śabdaḥ āyāntam abhimanyate sa tu śaṅkhādisaṃyogapreryamāṇaḥ samīraṇaḥ śabdasyāvarṇarūpasya bhavati vyaktikāraṇam śabdo yad api varṇātmā śrotragrāhyo na vidyate tathā pi tatra śabdatvaṃ śravaṇena grahīṣyate tad iha na kadācid asmābhir adhikā kalpana kṛtā mārutagater asyāḥ sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt karṇākāśasaṃskrāmātram adṛṣṭaṃ kalpitam tad api kāryārthāpattigamyatvān nāpūrvam iti apakṣapātinaḥ sabhyāḥ satyam utpattyapekṣayā śabdasya kalpanām āhuḥ abhivyaktau laghīyasīm tad evam abhivyaktipakṣe niyatagranaṇopapateḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaprāmāṇyāt nityatvam evopagantavyam yā tv anaikantikatvoktiḥ dhīkarmapratyabhijñayā pratyakṣe codyamānā sau darśayatyatimūḍhatām tenānumānadoṣeṇa pratyakṣaṃ na hi dūṣyate siddhāntāntaracintā tu bhavet bhṛśamasaṅgatā nirbādhaṃ pratyabhijñānam asti cet buddhikarmaṇo tayor apy astu nityatvaṃ no cet kā śabdatulyatā tasmān nityaḥ pratyabhijñāprabhāvāt sddhaḥ śabdaḥ paśyatāṃ tārkikāṇām arthāpattiḥ pūrvam uktā ca tasmin asthāyitve yuktayaś ca vyudastāḥ asti ca vede vacanaṃ siddhām anuvadai yaddhruvāṃ vācyam talliṅgadarśanād api nityaḥ śabdo bhimantavyaḥ śikṣāvidas tu pavanātmakam eva śabdaṃ ācakṣaṃte tadasamañjasamapratīteḥ arhanmataprathitapudgalaparyudāsanītyā ca vāyvavayavā api vāraṇīyāḥ ye pi sthūlavināśadarśanavaśādbrūyuḥ kṣaṇadhvaṃsinaḥ bhāvāṃs te pi na śakruvanti gadituṃ śabdasya vidhvaṃsitām ante hi kṣayadarśanāt kila tathā teṣāṃ bhramo smin punaḥ śabde nāntaparikṣayāviti kathaṃ kumbhādivad bhiṅgitā śabdānityatvasiddhāntaḥ atra brūmahe na khalu bhavad abhihitamet pramānadvayam api śabdanityatāṃ prasādhayitum arhati yāvatā yadarthāpattiravādi darśanasya parārthatvād iti sā kṣīṇaiva arthapratīter anyathā py upapannatvāt tatra sādṛśyam apy anabhyupagatam eva dūṣitamityasthāne kliṣṭā bhavantaḥ gatvādijātīrāśritya sambandhagrahaṇādikaḥ arthāvagatiparyantaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasetyasi nanu gatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ etad eva parīkṣyatām asmin samāpyate vādaḥ marmasthānam idaṃ ca naḥ pratikṣipte ca gatvādau nārthasaṃpratyayo nyathā pratyabhijñānabhūmiś ca nānyā stīti vayaṃ jitāḥ siddhe tu gatvasāmāṇye tat evārthavedanam tad eva pratyabhijñeyam iti yūyaṃ parājitāḥ tenānyat sarvam utsṛjya vādasthānakaḍambaram gatvādijātisiddhyarthamathātaḥ prayatamahe tatredaṃ vicāryatām ya eṣa gakārabhedapratibhāsaḥ sa kiṃ vyañjakabhedakṛtaḥ uta varṇabhedaviṣayaḥ iti vyañjakabhedakṛte tasmin ekatvād gakārasya kiṃvṛtti gatvasāmāṇyaṃ syāt varṇabhedaviṣayatve tu tadbhedasiddher abhedapratyayasya viṣaya mṛgya iti tadgrāhyam aparihāryaṃ gatvasāmānyam tad ucyate nāyaṃ vyañjakabhedakṛtaḥ gakārabhedapratyayaḥ yadi hi vyañjakabhedādhīna eṣa bhedapratibhāsaḥ tarhi yaralavādivarṇabhedapratyayo pi tatkṛta eva kim iti na bhavati tataś ca sakalavarṇavikalpātītam ekanamavayavaṃ śabdabrahma vaiyākaraṇavad abhyupagantavyam atha manuṣe yaralavādīnām itaretarabibhaktasvarūpaparicchedād viṣayabhedakṛta eva bhedapratyayaḥ nopādhinibandhana iti tarhi gaṅgāgaganagargādau gakārabhedapratibhāso py eṣa na vyañjakabhedādhīno bhavitum arhati tatrāpi parasparavibhinnagakārasvarūpapartibhāsāt śukasārikāmanuṣyeṣu hi vaktṛbhede sati jyañjakanānātvasaṃbhāvanayā varṇabhedapratyayasya attkṛtatvaṃ kāmamāśaṅkyetāpi vaktrekatve tu gaganādau kutaḥ tatkṛto bhedaḥ nanu tatrāpi maruto bhinnā eva vyañjakāḥ mukhaṃ tv ekaṃ bhavatu kiṃ tena tad api vā bhinnam ity eke ucyate sa tarhi marutāṃ bhedaḥ yaralavādiṣv api tulya iti mā bhūt eṣām api bhedaḥ nanu yaralavānāṃ viśeṣapratītir asti gakāre tu sā nāstīty uktaṃ uccāraṇasyaiva tatra bhedaḥ noccāryasyeti naitat sāram mā bhūdeṣa viśeṣa iti pratītiḥ bhedabuddhis tu vidyata eva anyā ca viśeṣabuddhir ucyate anyā ca bhedabudhir iti viśeṣāpratibhāse pi kvacid vicchedapratītiviśeṣāt nanu atrocyate dṛśyate śābaleyādivyaktyāntaravilakṣaṇā bāhuleyādigovyaktiḥ tena bhedo sti vāstavaḥ na tu drūtādibhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate gavyaktyantaravicchinnā gavyaktiraparā sphuṭā iti naitad uktam śābalaiyādau prativyakti sāsnākhurakakudādyavayavavartino viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante te ca sthūlatvāt sugamā bhavanti yatra tu nilataṇḍulakulatthādau pratisikthaṃ viśeṣā na pratibhāsante tatra viśeṣapratītyabhāve pi vicchedapratibhāso vidyata eva sikthāt sikthāntaratvena pratibhāsāt evam ihāpy eṣa gakāraviśeṣa iti pratibhāsābhāve pi vicchedagrahaṇāt gakāranānātvam nanu taṇḍulādāv api sikthāt sikthāntare viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsanta eva tadapratibhāse bhedasyāpi grahītum aśakyatvāt maivaṃ vādīḥ yatne sati caturaśratrikoṇavartulatvādiviśeṣā apyamutra pratibhāsiṣyante evaṃ gakāreṣv api prayatnaṃ vinā pi tu prathmākṣanipāta eva vicchedabuddhir utpadyata iti tayaiva nānātvasiddhiḥ nanu naivānadhigataviśeṣasya vicchedabuddhir utpattum arhatīti viśeṣabuddhir eva vicchedabuddhiḥ naitad evam bhramaṇādikarmakṣaṇānāṃ sūkṣmaviśeṣāpratibhāse pi vicchedapratibhāsāt nanu tatrāpi viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ kalpyate anyathā vicchedapratītyanupapatteḥ yad evaṃ varṇeṣv api gaganādau vicchedapratītidarśanāt kalpyatāṃ viśeṣagrahaṇam nanu asty eva tat kin tv aupādhikaṃ sphuṭike raktatāpratyayavat viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sphuṭikasya śuddhasya dṛṣṭatvāl lakṣādyupādhinimittako bhavatu raktatāpratyayaḥ varṇānāṃ tu nityam evodāttādiviśeṣavatāṃ pratibhāsāt tadrahitānām anupalabdheś ca naisargika evāyaṃ bhedaḥ tadyathā buddhīnāṃ ghaṭapaṭādiviṣayaviśeṣaśūnyatānām asaṃvedanāt prativiṣayaṃ nānātvaṃ tathā varṇānām api pratyudāttādiviśeṣaṃ nānātvm na ca buddhir evaiva nityā ca viṣayabhedopādhinibandhanas tadbheda iti sāmpratam svayam eva buddhijanma pratyakṣam ity abhidhānāt asmābhiś ca buddhinityatāyā upariṣṭānnirākariṣyamāṇatvāt viṣayabhedāc ca tadbhedābhidhāne viṣayasyāpi kuta idānīṃ bhedaḥ buddhibhedād iti cet itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ tad imāḥ svata eva bhedavatyo buddhayaḥ viṣayāṇām api svata eva bhedo bhavati sa tu buddhiḥ jñāyata ity alamarthāntaragamanena yathā ca śuklaguṇasya bhāsvaradhūmarādibhedavato nānātvaṃ tathā varṇasyāpy udāttādibhedavataḥ śuklaguṇo py eka eva āśrayabhedāt tu tadbheda iti cet aho rasasamārūḍho bhaṭṭaḥ karmaikaṃ buddhir apy ekā jagatyekaḥ sito guṇaḥ taccaitannityam ity etāḥ strīgṛhe kāmukoktayaḥ api ca ekātmavādo py evam evāvataret sukhiduḥkhyādibhedasya śarīrabhedenāpy upapatteḥ advaitasya ca nātidavīyaneṣa panthā ity alamalīkavikatthanena tasmāt gaganāvakāropaśreṣakṛta eva bhedapratyayaḥ na svarūpabheda iti taduktam akārasyāpi bhavanmate bhedābhāvāt avidyamāne ca tadupaśleṣe digajaḥ diggaja iti bhedena pratibhāso bhavaty eva tathā ca samadaḥ sammadaḥ paṭaḥ paṭṭaḥ āsanaṃ āsannaṃ malaḥ mallaḥ avikaḥ avikkaḥ patiḥ pattiḥ patanaṃ pattanaṃ ityādāv api varṇabhedapratītiḥ arthapratītibhedo pi digajadiggajādau śabdāntaranimittako bhavitum arhati na dviru ccāraṇakṛtaḥ granthādhikyād arthādhikyam noccāraṇabhedāt śatakṛtvo pi prayukte gośabde sāsnādimadarthavyatiriktavācyasaṃpratyayābhāvāt tathā ca diggaja iti dvigakārako nirdeśa ity ācakṣate śabdavidaḥ na dvir gakāra uccārita iti nanu gogurugirigehādāv ajbhede pi gakārapratyayānuvṛtter eka evāyaṃ gakāraḥ maivaṃ vocaḥ eṣa eva hi bhedapratyayaḥ asmābhir upadarśitaḥ vinā pi ca ajupaśleṣaṃ diggajādau bhedapratyayao varṇitaḥ na ca vayamabhedapratyayam apahnumahe kintu bhedapratyayasyāpy abādhitasya bhāvāt ananyathāsiddhitvāc ca gavādivat sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatāṃ brūmaḥ vyañjakabhedanibandhanatvaṃ tu yaralavādāv api vaktuṃ śakyam ity uktam eva api ca śābaleyādibhedapratyayasyāpi vyañjakabhedanibandhanatvāṭt eka evāsau syāt nanu tatra ko vyañjakaḥ yadbhedakṛtaḥ piṇḍabhedapratyaya iṣyate āha ca na piṇḍavyatirekeṇa vyañjako tra dhvanir yathā piṇḍavyaṅgyaiva gotvādijātir nityaṃ pratīyate iti tad anyuktam hotvajāteḥ gatvavad idānīṃ avivādāspadībhūtatvāt piṇḍabhedapratyayasya cakṣurvyāpārabhedād apy upapatteḥ nanu sakṛd api vyāpṛtalocanasya parasparavibhaktapiṇḍapratibhāso bhavati maivam tadānīṃ gomārapratītiḥ eṣa śābaleya eṣa bāhuleyaḥ iti tu viśeṣagrahaṇe cakṣur vyāpārabhedo parihāryaḥ yadi ca ādyagopiṇḍbhede prathamākṣasannipātajā buddhiḥ subhagatāṃ gatā gakārabhede tarhi kiṃ kṛtam asyā daurbhāgyam tatrāpi prathamaśrotravyāpāravelāyāmanavagatavyañjakavibhāgasyāpi gaganagaṅgādau gakārabhedaḥ pratibhāsata evety alaṃ prasaṅgena tad ayaṃ vastusaṃkṣepaḥ upekṣyatāṃ vā sarvatra sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahāraḥ iṣyatāṃ vā gotvādivat gakārabhedavṛtti gatvasāmānyam atvam api gatvavad apratyākhyeyam itaretaravilakṣaṇānām akārāṇāṃ hrasvadīrghaplutādibhedena pratibhāsāt yaḥ punaḥ ākāre py akārapratyabhijñānaṃ brūyāt tasya īkārokārapratītiṣv api akārasyaiva grahaṇaprasaktiḥ actvāviśeṣāt atha tadaviśeṣe pi avarṇāt ivarṇasya bhedaḥ iṣyate sa tarhy ākārasya na nihnotavyaḥ evañ ca sati araṇyāraṇyaśabdābhyāṃ bhinnārthapratītir upapatsyate udāttānudāttasvaritasaṃvṛtavikṛtādibhedo pi śabdavidāṃ pratyakṣa eva gītajñānām ieva svaragrāmabhāṣāvibhāgaḥ tasmāt aṣṭādaśabhedaṃ akāram ācakṣate atvaṃ ca tatsāmānyaṃ avarṇakulaśabdena vyavaharantīti yat tu dhvanidharmasyāpi dīrghādeḥ arthapratipattyaṅgatvaṃ turagavegavad uktam tad apy ahṛdayaṅgamam śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyante lokāḥ na marudbhyaḥ atha marutām api tathā vyutpatteḥ arthapratītihetutvaṃ tarhi vyutpattir eva pramāṇaṃ syāt na śabdaḥ vyutpatter avyabhicārāt śabdasya ca vyabhicārāt ity āstām etat tasmāt gatvādisāmānyaiḥ arthasaṃpratyayātmanaḥ kāryasya pariniṣpatteḥ na varṇavyaktinityatā apara āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūrata eva gatvādyaparasāmānyam mahāsāmānyam api śabdatvaṃ varṇeṣu nopapadyate vyaktyantarānusandhānaṃ yatraikavyaktidarśane tatraikarūpasāmānyaṃ iṣyate tatkṛtaṃ ca tat gakāraśrutivelāyāṃ na vakārāvamarśanam bāhuleyaparāmarśaḥ śābaleyagrahe yathā śabdaḥ śabdo yam ity evaṃ pratītis tv aprayojikā eṣā hi śrotragamyatvaṃ upādhim anurudyate tad etanniranusandhānasyābhidhānam anusandhānapratyayasya sāmānyasiddhāv aprayojakatvāt anusandhānaṃ hi sārūpyāt vijātīyeṣv api bhavati gavayagrahaṇasamaye gopiṇḍānusandhānavat tasmāt abādhitaikarūpapratyayapratiṣṭha eva sāmānyavyavahāraḥ samānabuddhigrāhye pi sāmānye vasthite kvacit bhavaty anyānusandhānaṃ kvacid vā na bhavaty api tad asti khaṇḍamuṇḍādau piṇḍasārūpyakāritam gakārādiṣu varṇeṣu tadabhāvāt tu nāsti tat na tu sāmānyābhāvāt na ca sārūpyam eva sāmānyaṃ sāṅkhyavad abhidhātuṃ yuktam vijātīyeṣv api gogavayādiṣu tasya dṛṣṭatvāt yadi ca śabdaḥ śabdaḥ ity anuvṛttabuddheḥ śrotragamyatvopādhikṛtatvam ucyate tarhi gavādāv apy ekabuddheḥ bāhadohādyekārthakriyākāritvanibandhanatvāt gotvādijātinihnavaḥ bauddhavan mantavyaḥ na caitad evam tat gotvavat śabdatvam api na pratyākhyeyam etena brāhmaṇatvādisāmānyam api samarthitaṃ veditavyam upadeśasahāyaprtyakṣagamyatvāt na copadeśāpekṣaṇāt apratyakṣatvaṃ tasya bhaviturmahati gotvādipratyayasyāpi sambandhagrahaṇakāle tadapekṣatvadarśanāt uktaṃ ca na hi yat giriśṛṅgamāruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti na caupādhikaḥ paiṭhīnasipaippalādiprabhṛtiṣu brāhmanapratyayaḥ upādher agrahaṇāt aupādhikatvasya gotvādāv api vaktuṃ śakyatvāt api ca upadeśanirapekṣam api cakṣuḥ kṣatriyādivilakṣaṇāṃ saumyākṛtiṃ brāhmaṇajātim avagacchati ity eke tadalamanayā kathayā prakṛtam ucyate gatvādibhir jātibhir eva arthasaṃpratyayopapatteḥ yad uktaṃ darśanasya parārthatvāt iti etad ayukutam etena sarvatra yagapadyādityetad api prtyuktam sambandhaniyamasya gatvādibhya eva siddheḥ yad api saṅkhyābhāvāt kṛtvasucprayogadarśanamudagrāhi tad api vyabhicāri kṛtaṃ kānyasya tanvaṅgyā trirapāṅgavilokanam caturāliṅganaṃ gāḍhaṃ aṣṭakṛtvaś ca cambanam iti tadbhede pi darśanāt atha tatra strīpuṃsayor abhede cumbanādikriyāmātrabheda evety ucyate tathā py apūrveṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhuktavatsu pañcakṛtvo brāhmaṇā bhuktavantaḥ iti vyavahāro dṛśyate evaṃ śabde pi tatsaṅkhyāvyavahāro hi dṛśyate kavinā sad anuprāse nibaddhe kṣaraḍambare gakāro bahavo dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyavaharanti hi yad api pratyabhijñānaṃ taddvārakam udāhṛtam tasyāpi siddhe prāmāṇye jātyālambanatā bhavet nṛttābhinayaceṣṭādipratyabhijñānato vayam na śabdapratyabhijñānam uttārayitum īśmahe viśeṣaṃ pratybhijñāne na paśyāmo manāgapi stambhādipratyabhjñāsu na tadaivāvināśadhīḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgapratīkāraṃ tena tāḥ kartum īśate śabdasya pratyabhijñānavelāyām eva dṛśayate śabdarūpasya vidhvaṃsaḥ iti tannityatā kutaḥ yady api kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyam asmābhir api samarthayiṣyate tathāpi stambhādipratyabhiñāyāḥ śabdapratyabhiñāyā eṣa eva viśeṣaḥ yad atra dhvastaḥ śabdaḥ iti tadivapratyayo jāyate ata eva tirohite pi bhāvādiyaṃ apramāṇaṃ pratyabhijñety āhuḥ yady api dhriyate smākaṃ śabdo dvitrān api kṣaṇān ptatyabhijñā tu kālena tāvatā nāvakalpate tathā hi śabda utpadyate tāvat tataḥ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsāyogāt tataḥ tena jñāena śabdo gṛhyate tataḥ saṃskārabodhaḥ tataḥ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsāyogāt tataḥ tena jñānena śabdo gṛhyate tataḥ saṃskārabodhaḥ tataḥ pūrvajñātaśabdasmaraṇam tatas tatsacivaṃ śrotraṃ mano vā śabdapratyabhiñānaṃ janayiṣyati tadā śabdo grahīṣyata itīyat kuto sya dīrghamāyuḥ pratyabhiñāprāmāṇyād eva tāvad āyus tasya kalpyata iti cet satyaṃ kalpyate yadi vināśapratyayaḥ tadaiva na syāt api ca gośabdo yam aśvaśabdo yam iti tadabhidhānaviśeṣollekhāt nānānusmaraṇaṃ tasya tadaivāvaśyam āpatet vijñānāyoagapadyāc ca kālo dīrghataro bhavet yad apy uditamuddāmameghaśyāmāsu rātriṣu sāmyaṃ saudāminīdhāmajanyayā pratyabhijñayā tad asat kāladairghyeṇa tadavasthityasaṃbhavāt vidyuddṛṣṭe ca vṛkṣādau nāśasaṃcittyasaṃbhāvāt pratyabhiñā nāma smaryamāṇānubhūyamānasāmānādhikaraṇyagrāhiṇī saṃskārasacivendiryajanyā pratītir iti kecit anye manyante smaryamāṇapūrvajñānaviśeśitārthagrāhitvāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ tadviśeṣaṇasya ca arthasya bāhyendriyagrāhyatvānupapatteḥ stambhādāv api mānasī pratyabhiñeti nirbandhastv iha nāsitikaṃ sā yathā stu tathā stu vā śabde vināśajñānāt tu na sā nityatvasādhikā bādhyabādhakabhāve tu niyamo nanu dṛṣṭāta eṣa pradarśyate nanu pratyakṣeo pi dṛṣṭāntasya ko vasaraḥ satyam grāhakāstu bhavādṛśāḥ svayam anavabudhyamānā evaṃ budhyante yat tu pravṛddharabhasatayā buddhikarmādāv api nityatvasamarthanam tat atyantamalaukikam ity uktam kiṃ nāma śabdanityatvasamarthanatṛṣā turaḥ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva sakalaṃ pātum icchasi tasmād alamatirabhasapravṛttābhiḥ buddhikarmādinityatvasamarthanakathābhiḥ yat punaḥ abhivyaktipakṣe śabdasya grahaṇe niyamābhāvam āśaṅkya śrotrasaṃskāreṇa viṣayasaṃskāreṇa ybhayasaṃskāreṇa vā nityaṃ grahaṇm uvavarṇitam tadvañcanāmātram samānadeśānāṃ samānendriyagrāhyāṇaṃ pratiniyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatvādarśanāt ye punar atra gandhā udāhṛtāḥ te samānendiriyagāhyā bhavanti na samānadeśāḥ ekabhūmyāśritatvena tulyadeśatvakalpane bhavet samānadeśatvaṃ himavadvindhyayor api ekatve pi bhuvo bhānti padārthāḥ pārthivāḥ pṛthak vyajyante tadadhiṣṭhānāḥ gandhāstais tair nibandhanaiḥ bhavatv anāśritāḥ śabdāḥ yadi vā kāśasaṃśritāḥ sarvathā bhinnadeśatvaṃ eṣāṃ vakutuṃ na śakyate nanu yatahivatve pi nabhasaḥ tadbhāgakalpanayā pratipuruṣaṃ śrotrendriyabhedaḥ evaṃ tadbhāgakalpanayaiva śabdānām api asamānadeśatvāt niyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatā bhaviṣyati naivam upapadyate yatraiva vaktṛmukhākāśadeśe śrotṛśrotrākāśadeśe vā gośabda upalabdhaḥ tatraivāśvaśabda idānīm upalabhyate na punar atimuktakusume ya upalabdho gandhaḥ sa bandūke madhūke vā kadācid upalabhyata iti tasmāt samānadeśatvāt na vyaktau niyamo bhavet utpattau tu vyavasthāyāṃ tadbhāve upapadyate nādaiḥ saṃskiryatāṃ śabdaḥ śrotraṃ vā dvayam eva sarvathā niyamo nāsti vyañjakeṣv iti niścayaḥ vyavasthā vyañjakānāṃ cet ucyate dṛṣṭakāritā utpattau dṛśyamānāyāṃ dṛṣṭam apy avirodhakam na ca stimitamārutāpanayanavyatiriktaḥ kiś cana śrotrasaṃskāro vidyate tatra cātiprasaṅga uktaḥ etad atiriktasaṃskārakalpanāyāṃ tu adṛṣṭakalpanā sthire ca śabdasaṃskāragrāhiṇi sati punar abhivyaktasyāpi gośabdasya śravaṇaṃ syāt tadgrahaṇahetoḥ saṃskārasya sthiratvāt tatkṣaṇikatve tu śabdakṣaṇikataiva sādhvī pratīyamānatvāt yat tu bhrgṛmitraḥ tam eva saṃskāraṃ śrotrendriyam abhupaiti tad idam apūvikaṃ kim api pāṇḍityam indriyasya hi saṃskāryasya saṃkāraḥ na saṃskāra evendriyam lokāgamaviruddhatvāt pratipuruṣaṃ yāvacchabdaṃ bhinnasya kṣaṇikasya cendriyasya kalpanam anupapannam anaśvaratve tu śaśvad eva śabdakolāhalaprasaṅga iti yat kiñcid etat bhaṭṭenaiva sopahāsam eṣa dūṣitaḥ pakṣa iti kim atra vimardena yad api bhaṭṭa āha yadi tv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ tārkikoktiviparyayaḥ tato vedānusāreṇa kāryā dikśrotratām ati iti tad apy asāṃpratam diśāṃ kāryāntarākṣepāt āgamānyapratvataḥ āhopuruṣikāmātraṃ digdravyaśrotrakalpanam indriyāṇāṃ bhautikatvasya sādhayiṣyamāṇatvāt diśaś ca amūrtatvāt nendriyaprakṛtitvam vyāpakatvāviśeṣe vā kālātmano r api tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ tasyor anyatra vyāpārakatvāt nendriyaprakṛti tvam iti cet digdravye pi tulyam etat āgamas tvanyapara eva yathā hi sūryaṃ cakṣurgamayatāt diśaḥśrotram iti paṭhyate evaṃ antarikṣamasum iti ca paṭhyata eva na cāsavo ntariksaprakṛtikāḥ pavanātmakatvāt tasmāt kṛtaṃ diśā ākāśadeśa eva karṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnaḥ śabdanimittopabhogaprāpakadharmādharmopanibaddhaḥ śrotram ity uktam nanu dharmādharmakṛtaśrotraniyamavat abhivyaktiniyamo pi śabdasya tatkṛta eva bhaviṣyati kim iti tadaniyamo nityatvapakṣe codyata iti naitad yuktam cakṣurādīndriyāṇāṃ vaikalyaṃ adṛṣṭanibandhanaṃ andhakāraprabhṛtiṣu dṛśyate na punaḥ padārthasthitir aṣṭavaśāt viparivartate vyañjakadharmātikrame hi himam api śaityaṃ svadharmam atikrāmet vyañjakeṣu niyamo na dṛṣṭa ity uktam dṛṣṭe ca varṇabhede niyatopalabdhihetau saṃbhavati sati kim ayam adṛṣṭam astake bhāra āropyate kathaṃ cābhivyaktipakṣe tīvramandavibhāgaḥ tīvratādayo hi varṇadharmā vā syuḥ dhvanidharmā vā varṇadharmatve tīvrāt gakārāt anyatvaṃmandasyetyasmanmatānupraveśaḥ dhvanidharmatvapakṣe tu śrotreṇa grahaṇaṃ katham na hi vāyugato vegaḥ śravaṇenopalabhyate yat tu vyaktidharmāḥ kṛśatvasthūlatvādayaḥ jātāv upalabhyante iti darśitam tat kāmam upapadyetāpi jāteḥ vyakteḥ taddhiarmāṇāṃ ca samānendriyagrāhyatvāt iha tu sparśanagrāhyaḥ pavano tīndriyo tha vā taddharmāḥ śravaṇe śabde gṛhyanta iti vismayaḥ yat tu buddhir eva tīvramandavatīti tadatīva subhāṣitam asati viṣayabhede buddhibhedānupapatteḥ kiñ ca nityaparokṣā te buddhir evaṃ ca nādavat tadagrahe na tīvrāditaddharmagrahasaṃbhavaḥ aho tīvrādayas tīvre prāpāte patitā amī yo gṛhyate na taddharmā yaddharmā sa na gṛhyate yaścābhibhavavṛttāntaḥ tvanmate marutām asau anile cābhibhūte pi śabdo na śrūyate katham dīpe bhibhūte raviṇā na hi rūpaṃ na gṛhyate niyatavyañjakatvaṃ tu pratikṣiptam adarśanāt yat tu śāṅkhādiśabdānāṃ śrotragrāhyatvasiddhaye śabdatvaṃ tatra tadgrāhyaṃ ity avādi tad apy asat satyaṃ vadata dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā kvacid īdṛśam āśrayasya prokṣatve tatsāmānyopalambhanam śabdo na te sty avarṇātmā na śaṅkho varṇasambhavaḥ  na nādavṛtti śabdatvaṃ iti tadgrahaṇaṃ katham yat puanaḥ saṃpradhāritaṃ vyaṅgyakāryapakṣayoḥ kva śabdagrahaṇe gurvī kalpanā bhavati kva vā ladhvī iti tad api maulapramānavicārasāpekṣatvāt aprayojakam yadi maulapramāṇena sādhitā nityaśabdatā tvaduktā kalpanā sādhvī maduktā tu viapryaye kauṣṭhyena bahiḥ prasaratā samīraṇena sarvataḥ stimitamārutāpasaraṇaṃ kriyate ity etad eva tāvad alaukikaṃ kalpitam agrerūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyostiryaggamanaṃ aṇumanasoścādyaṃ karmetyadṛṣṭakāritāni iti marutāṃ tiryaggamanasvabhāvatvāt ūrdhvam adhaś ca śabdaśravaṇaṃ na bhavet yāvan na veginā nyena prerito mātariśvanā tāvannaisargiko vāyuḥ na tiryaggatim ujjhati adhomukhapraykto pi śabda ūrdhvaṃ pratīyate uttānavadanokto pi nādho na śrūyate ca saḥ kauṣṭhyavāyoḥ balīyān bhavatīti kathaṃ tenāpasāryeta anya eva sūkṣmā vāyavaḥ śabdāvarnakāriṇaḥ na punar ete paridṛśyamānāḥ śyāmākalatālāsyopadeśinaḥ mātariśvāna iti cet na viśeṣe pramāṇābhāvāt yaṃ ca sūkṣmā api vāyavaḥ tirodadhati taṃ sutarāṃ balīyāṃso pi vivṛṇuyuriti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt sajātīyaśabdasantānārambhapakṣa eva yuktyanuguṇaḥ tathāhi sajātīyaguṇārambhiṇaḥ guṇāsatāvad dṛśayanta eva api bhavati adṛṣṭādhīnasaṃsaragāṇāṃ sahakārinām anavasthānāt vīvreṇāpi śanair evaṃ atīvrārambhasambhavaḥ sīdatsacivasāmarthyasāpekṣakṣīṇavṛttinā vīcīsantānadṛṣṭāntaḥ kiñcit sāmyād udāhṛtaḥ na tu nākāśamātrasyeti yad api guṇatvam asiddhaṃ śabdasyeti tatra kecit aśritatvāt guṇatvam ācakṣate tad ayuktam āśritatvaṃ guṇatve hi na prayojakam iṣyate ṣaṇṇām api padārthānāṃ āśritatvasya saṃbhavāt dikkālaparamāṇvādinityadravyātirekiṇaḥ āśritāḥ ṣaḍapīṣyante padārthāḥ kaṇabhojinā na ca vyomāśritatvam api śabdasya pratyakṣam apratyakṣe nabhasi tadāśritatvasyāpy apratyakṣatvāt katham ādhārapārokṣye vrūmaḥ prasaktayoḥ dravyakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhe sāmānyādāv aprasaṅgāc ca guṇa evāvaśiṣyate śabdaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ na dravyaṃ śabdaḥ ekadravyatvāt adravyaṃ vā bhavati dravyaṃ ākāśaparamāṇvādi anekadravyaṃ vā hyaṇukādi kāryadravyam ekadravyaṃ tu śabdaḥ ekākāśāśritatvāt tasmān na dravyam nāpi śabdaḥ karma śabdāntarajanakatvāt karmaṇo hi samānajātyārambhakatvaṃ nāsti sattāśabdatvādisāmānyasambandhāc ca sāmānyāditrayaprasaṅgo sya nāsitīti pāriśeṣyāt guṇa eva śabdaḥ nanu guṇatvasiddhau satyāṃ ākāśāśritatvaṃ śabdasya bhaviṣyati guṇasya dravyānāśritasyādarśanāt pṛthivyādīnāṃ ca śabdāśrayatvānupapatteḥ tataś ca guṇatve sati ekadravyatvaṃ ekadravyatve sati guṇatvam itītaretarāśrayatvam tathā ca samānajātīyārambhakatvam api guṇatvasiddhimūlam eva guṇatve sati śabdsasyākāśāśritatvāt tadātmakena śrotreṇa grahaṇam tac ca deśāntaragatasaṃyogavibhāgaprabhvasya śabdasya santānam anatareṇa śrotradeśaprāptyabhāvāt na siddhyatīti guṇatvasiddhimūlā santānakalpanā santānakalpanāyāṃ ca samāmajātyārambhakatvāt karmavyavacchede sati guṇatvasiddhir itītaretarāśrayatvam eva ucyate nobhayatrāpy eṣa doṣaḥ śrotragrāhyatvād eva śabdasyākāśāśritatvaṃ kalpyate samānajātīyārambhakatvaṃ ca guṇatvāt ākāśaikadeśo hi śrotram iti prasādhitam etat prāpyakāritvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ vakṣyate na cākāśānāśritatve śabdasya śrotreṇa prāptir bhavati na cāprāptasya grahaṇam iti tadāśritatvaṃ kalpyate evaṃ samānajātīyārambhakatvam api tat eva śrāvaṇatvāt dūravartinaḥ śabdasya śravaṇe sai kalpyate na tu guṇatvād iti netaretarāśrayam kāryātvād ākāśāśritatvaṃ kalpyata ity eke nanu kāryatvād ākāśāśritatvam ākāśāśritatve sati niyatagrahaṇapūrvaṃ pūrvarītyā kāryatvam iti naitad evam bhedavināśapratibhāsābhyām eva kāryatvasiddheḥ kim arthas tarhi niyatagrahaṇasamarthanāya ayam iyān prayāsaḥ kriyate niyatagrahaṇam pai kāryapakṣānuguṇam iti darśayitum na punar eṣaiva kāryatve yuktir ity alaṃ sūkṣmekṣikayā apara āha parispandavilakṣaṇatvasya pratyakṣatvāt akarmatvaṃ śabdasya sādhayte na samānajātyārambhakatvāt itītaretarāśrayasparśo pi nāstīti tasmāt sarvathā pariśeṣānumānāt śabdasya guṇatvasiddhiḥ kathaṃ tarhy asya mahattvādiyogaḥ nirguṇā guṇāḥ iti hi kāṇādāḥ asti hi pratītiḥ mahān śabdaḥ iti samānajātīyaguṇābhiprāyaṃ tat kaṇādavacanam iti na doṣaḥ tasmād ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ api ca yathā tmaguṇatā hīcchādveṣāder upapatsyate śabdo nayena tenaiva bhaviṣyati nabhoguṇaḥ ye tu sthitam tad idam uktaṃ sūgrakṛtā ādimattvādaindriyakatvāt kṛtakavad upacārāc cānityaḥ śabdaḥ  iti ādimatvāditi saṃyogavibhāgādīnāṃ śabde kārakatvaṃ na vyañjakatvam iti darśitam ataś ca na prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ anaikāntikam aindriyakatvād iti kāryapakṣa eva śabdasya niyataṃ grahaṇam ity uktam pratipuruṣaṃ pratyuccāranaṃ ca śabdabhedasyaindriyakatvād iti vā hetvarthaḥ tena prtyabhijñādurāśā śrotriyāṇām apākṛtā bhavati kṛtakavad upacārād iti tīvramandavibhāgābhibhavādivyavahārādarśanāt sukhaduḥkhādivad anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti darśitam tathā prāgūrdhvam uccāraṇād anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇānupalabdheś ca  ity anena sūtreṇa śabdābhāvakṛtam eva tadagrahaṇam ity uktam na hi stimitā vāyavaḥ śabdamāvarītum arhanti mūrtaṃ hi mūrtena vyavadhīyate nāmūrtaṃ ākāśādivat na ca prakṛtyaivākāśādivad atīndriyaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt kṣaṇikapratītes tatkālam eva śabdasyāvasthānam iti asthānahetor api nānyathāsiddhatvam vārtikakṛtā śabdānityatve sādhanam abhihitaṃ anityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimattve satyasmadādibāhyakaraṇapratyakṣatvāt ghaṭavat iti yat tu atra jātīnām api jātimattvad anaikāntikatvam udbhāvitam ekārthasamavāyena jātirjātimatī yataḥ iti tat atyantam anupapannam nismāmānyāni sāmānyādīnīti suprasiddhatvāt na hi ghaṭe ghaṭatvapārthivatve staḥ iti ghaṭatvasāmānye pi pārthivatvasāmānyam astīti śakyate vaktum ato niravadya evāyaṃ hetuḥ tena yad ucyate svayaṃ caite prayujyante hetutveneti kiṃ tv idam evaṃ nityatve durlo yuktimārgaḥ tasmān mantavyaḥ kārya eveti śabdaḥ vācoyuktitve vaidiko yo nuvādaḥ nyāye pratyukte kiṃphalastatprayogaḥ eva hi sthūlaḥ sattvadyadi kṣaṇikatāṃ kathayet purā va śabdas tadaiṣa katham akṣaniko bhidheyaḥ yuktyantarādyadi tad eva hi tarhi cintyam kiṃ prauḍhivādabahumānapraigraheṇa alam ativitatoktyā tyajyatāṃ nityavādaḥ kṛtaka iti nyajñiaḥ gṛhyatām eṣa śabdaḥ sati ca kṛtakabhāve tasya kartā purāṇaḥ kaviraviralaśaktiḥ yukta evendumauliḥ iti śrījayantabhaṭṭakṛtau nyāyamañjaryāṃ tṛtīyam āhnikam caturtham āhnikam śabdaparīkṣā evaṃ kṛtakatve varṇānāṃ sādhite sati varṇātmanaḥ varṇātmanaḥ padāt prabhṛti sarvatra puruṣasya svātantryaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati padanityatvapakṣe pi vākye tadracanātmake kartṛtvasaṃbhavāt puṃsaḥ vedaḥ katham akṛtrimaḥ tathā ca vaidikyo racanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ racanātvāt laukikaracanāvat eṣa ca pañcalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prayojakaś ceti gamaka eva na hetvābhāsaḥ na tāvad ayam asiddho hetuḥ śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye ityādiṣu vedavākyasandabheṣu padaracanāyā svarakramādiviśeṣavatyāḥ pratyakṣatvena pakṣe hetoḥ vartamānatvāt nāpi viruddhaḥ kartṛpūrvakatvavati sapakṣe kumārasambhavādau racanātvasya vidyamānatvāt nāpy anaikāntikaḥ kartṛhiteṣu gaganādiṣu gaganakusumādiṣu vā racanāyā adṛṣṭatvāt nāpi kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā vede vaktrabhāvaniścayānutpādāt nāpi satpratipakṣaḥ prakaraṇacintāhetoḥ sthāṇupuruṣaviśeṣānupalabdher iva hetutvenānabhidhānāt nāpi paramāṇvanityatāyām iva mūrtatvaṃ aprayojakam idaṃ sādhanam racanāvyāpārāṇāṃ kartṛvyāpārasādhyatvāvadhāraṇāt yathādhūmasya jvalanādhīna ātmalābhaḥ jñaptis tudhūmād agneḥ tatha kartradhīnā racanānām abhinirvṛttiḥ pratītis tu tābhyaḥ kartur iti tasmāt prayojaka evāyaṃ hetuḥ nanu satpratipakṣatve vivadante tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ pratihetur iha gīyate vedasyādhyayanaṃ sarvaṃ gurvadhyayanapūrvakam vedādhyayanavācyatvāt adhunā dhyayanaṃ yathā iti naitad yuktam evaṃ prāyāṇām prayogāṇām aprayogāṇām aprayojakatvāt na hi tacchabdavācyatvakṛtaṃ anāditvam upapadyate āha kim iti sadasadvivekavikalaśākaṭikādipravādavipralabdhaḥ evaṃ bhrāmyasi kila svalpam api karma mātrā vopadiśyamānaṃ tadvacanapratyayād anuṣṭhīyate tad ayam iyān anekakleśavittavyayādi nirvartyo vaidkaḥ karmakalāpaḥ evam eva tadupadeśinam āptaṃ saṃsmṛtvaiva kriyate iti mahān pramādaḥ evañ ca sati uccāvacakaviracitajaratpustakalikhitakāvyavat asmaryamāṇakartṛkeṇa vedena vyavahārānupapatteḥ avaśyasmaraṇīyaḥ tatra kartā syāt na ca kadācana deveṣu vyavahāravicchedaḥ saṃbhāvyate yena tatkṛtaṃ jaratkūpārāmādiṣv iva teṣu kartrasmaraṇaṃ syāt tasmād avaśyaṃ smaryeta kartā na ca saṃsmaryate samartuṃ śakyate vā smṛtir hi bhavantī tad anubhavamūlā bhavati na ca mūle pi kartranubhavaḥ kasyacij jātaḥ sargāder abhāvāt bhāve vā kartur aśaīratvena darśanayogyatvābhāvāt saśarīratvapakṣe vā puruṣaḥ ko pi tādṛśaḥ tadānīṃ dṛśyamāno pi vedaṃ kurvan na dṛśyate adhīyamāne dṛṣṭe smin tadā saṃśerate janāḥ kim eṣa racayed vedaṃ uta vā nyakṛtaṃ paṭhet yatkṛtaṃ vā paṭhed eṣaḥ tasminn api hi saṃśayaḥ bhaṅgyā cedamānāditvaṃ unmīlad iva dṛśyate asatyādipramāṇe ca kartṛtā nubhavaṃ prati smṛtiḥ prabandhasiddhā pi spṛśatyandhapramparām yogibhir grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ ity etad api durvacam kartṛtā hṛdi durbādhā kathaṃ gṛhyeta tair api yogibhis sā gṛhīteti vayam etan na manmahe amanvānāś ca gacchema visrabdhāstatpathaṃ katham vedāt kartravabodhe tu spaṣṭam anyonyasaṃśrayam tato vedapramāṇatvaṃ vedāt kartuś ca niścayaḥ tasmāt paurvāparyaparyālocanārahitayathāśrutamantrārthavādamūlā bhrāntir eṣā na punaḥ paramārthataḥ kaścit kiñcit vedasya kartāraṃ smarati tasmāt akṛtakā vedāḥ avaśyasmaraṇīyasyāpi kartuḥ asmaraṇāt na ca vyadhikaraṇo hetuḥ asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād ity evaṃ sādhanaprayogāt atrocyate api tat gurvadhyayanapūrvakatvaṃ sādhanam upekṣitaṃ yājñikaiḥ ayam abhinavo hetuḥ asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvāt iti prayuktaḥ atsmād astu nāma nainān hetvantaropanyāsinaḥ nigṛhnīmaḥ akṣudakatheyaṃ prastutā ayam api asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād iti hetuḥ kiṃ svatantra evākartṛkatvasiddhaye prayujyate uta asmaduparacitaracanātvapratighātāya iti tatra na tāvad anumānaṃ anumānāntaraparipanthi kathayitum ucitam pratyakṣāgamavat anumānasyāpy anumānabādhakatvānupapatteḥ na hi tulyabalayoḥ anumānayoḥ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ tulyavalatvād eva atulyabalatve tu yatkṛtaṃ anyatarasya daubalyaṃ tata eva tadaprāmāṇyasiddheḥ kim anumānabādhayā tadviḍambanārthaṃ tadabhidhānam iti cet tad apy ayuktam ekatra dharmiṇi yugapaditaretaravirodhidharmadvayaprayojakahetudvayopanipātāyogāt na hi dvyātmakāni vastūni bhavtum arhanti ity avaśyam anyataraḥ tatrāprayojakahetuḥ aprayojakatvād eva tasyāgamakatve kiṃ viḍambanārthena hetvantareṇa prayuktena viruddhāvyabhicāry api nāma na kaścid dhetvābhāsa iti vaksyāmaḥ prakaraṇasapto pi na yaḥ kaścit satpratipakṣo hetur iṣyate api tu saṃśayabījabhūtaḥ anyataraviśeṣānupalambhaḥ bhrāntyā hetutvena prayujyamānaḥ tathocyata iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt parodīr itaṃ hetuṃ nirācikīrṣatā vādinā tadgatapakṣavṛtitādidharmaparīkṣaṇe manaḥ khedanīyam na hi pratihetvanveṣiṇā vṛthā ṭāṭyā kartavyā nanu kataradanayoḥ sādhanayor aprayojakaṃ racanātvāt asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād iti ca ucyate racanātvam eva prayojakam na hi puruṣam antareṇa kvacid akṣaravināsa iṣṭavya bho bhagavantaḥ sambhyāḥ kvedaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kva vā śrutaṃ loke yadvākyeṣu padānāṃ racanā naisargikī bhavati yadi svabhāvikī vede padānāṃ racanā bhavet paṭe hi hanta tantūnāṃ kathaṃ naisargikī na sā śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya asty uttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā iti tulye racanātve kvacit kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ aparatra tadviparyaya iti mahān vyāmohaḥ evaṃ hi dhūmo pi kaścit anagnika ity api syāt kim idānīṃ kumārasaṃbhvatulyo sau vedaḥ saṃpannaḥ aho sarvāstikadhuryeṇa vedapramāṇyaṃ sādhitaṃ naiyāyikena alam upahāsena racanāmātram eva tulyaṃ vedasya kumārasaṃbhavena nānyāt na ceyatopahasituṃ yuktam kim asya śabdatvasāmānyaṃ śaṅkhaśabdasādhāraṇaṃ nāsti sattāsāmānyaṃ vā sarvasādhāraṇam iti nanu yāḥ kālidāsādiracanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ tebhyo vilakṣaṇaiveyaṃ racanā bhāti vaidkī ihādhyayanavelāyāṃ rūpād eva pratīyate akṛtrimatvaṃ vedasya bhedais tais tair ananyagaiḥ nāmākhyātoopasargādiprayogagatayo navāḥ stutinindāpurākalpaparakṛtyādigītayaḥ śākhāntaroktasāpekṣavikṣiptārthopavarṇanā ityādayo na dṛśyante laukike sannibandhane tenādhyetṛgaṇāḥ sarve rūpāt vedam akṛtṛmam manyanta eva loke tu pītaṃ mīmāṃsakair yaśaḥ vedā na paṭhitā yais tu tv ādṛśaiḥ kuṇṭhabuddhiḥ kāryatvaṃ bruvate te sya racanāsāmyamohitāḥ ucyate mīmāṃsakāḥ yaśaḥ pibantu payo va pibantu buddhijāḍyāpanayanāya brāhmīghṛtaṃ vā pibantu vedas tu puruṣapraṇīta eva nātra bhrāntiḥ yathā ghaṭādisaṃsthānāt bhinnam apy acalādiṣu saṃsthānaṃ kartṛmat siddhaṃ vede pi racanā tathā yac cātra kiñcid vaktavyaṃ tat pūrvam eva savistaramuktam api ca yadvilakṣaṇeyaṃ racanā tadvilakṣaṇa eva kartā numīyatām na punas tadapalāpo yuktam yāścaitāḥ nirvivādasiddhakartṛkāḥ kālidāsādiracanāḥ camatkāriṇyaḥ tāsāmanyonyavisadṛśaṃ rūpam upalabhyata eva amṛteneva saṃsiktāḥ candaneneva carcitāḥ candrāṃśubhir avonmṛṣṭāḥ kālidāsasya sūktayaḥ prakaṭarasānuguṇavikaṭākṣararacanācamatkāritasakalakavikulāḥ vāṇasya vācaḥ pratikāvyaṃ ca tāni tāni vaicitryāṇi dṛśyanta eva nāmākhyātādivaicitryamātreṇa kartrabhāvo vede rūpād eva pratīyata iti nūtaneyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ api ca yadi rūpe samāśvasiti bhavato manaḥ tadā ādimadarthābhidhānam api vedasya rūpaṃ kathaṃ na parīkṣase babaraḥ prāvāhaṇirakāmayata kusurabinda auddālakirakāmayata purūravo mā prapataḥ iti pratisargaṃ punas teṣāṃ bhāvān anāditvam iti cet pratisargaṃ tarhi vedānyatvam api bhviṣyati yathoktam pratimanvantaraṃ caiṣā śrutir anyā bhidhīyate iti rūpād akṛtrimattve ca kalpanā kalpitaiva sā ādimadvastubuddhis tu vācakair akṣaraiḥ sphuṭaiḥ teṣāṃ anyathāvyākhyānaṃ tu vyākhyānam eva paṭhanta eva tv adhyetāraḥ tata ādimato rthān bahūn avagacchantīti nānādirvedaḥ tasmān na racanātavm aprayojakam kartrasmaraṇam eva tvaprayojakam asiddhatvāt siddham api vā vede kartrasmaraṇam anyathāsiddham vedakaraṇakālasya atidavīyastvāt tatpraṇetuś ca puṃsaḥ sakalapuruṣavilakṣaṇatvāt niyataśarīraparigrahābhāvāt idantayā sya pāṇinipiṅgalādivat smaraṇaṃ nāsti na tu sa nāsty eva anumānāgamābhyāṃ tadavagamāt kathaṃ pakṣadharmatayā grahītuṃ śakyate kartrasmaraṇam taddhyekapuruṣasambandhi vyabhicarati sarvapuruṣasambandhi tu duravagamam sarve pumāṃsaḥ kartāraṃ vedasya na smarantīti kathaṃ jānāti bhavan na hi tava sakalalokahṛdayāni pratyakṣāṇi sarvajñatvaprasaṅgāt na ca yat tvaṃ na jānāsi tat anyo pi na jānātīti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt tasmād asmaryamānakartṛkatvaṃ durbādham eva api ca kartur smaraṇe sati sutarāṃ vedārthānuṣṭhānaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ śithilībhavet na hy akartṛka evopadeśaḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhann api vā prāmāṇyaniścayanimittābhāvāt kathaṃ visraṃbhabhūmir asau bhavet bādhakābhāvamatrāc ca prāmāṇyaniścayo vacasām ity uktaṃ prak tasmāt āptapratyayād eva nirvicikitsaṃ vedārthānuṣṭhānaṃ sapratiṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati nānyatheti tasmān na kartrasmaraṇasya racanātvapratipakṣatayopanyāsaḥ upapannaḥ nāpi svatantram evedaṃ kartrabhāvasādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati anupalabdhir iyam anena prakāreṇa kilocyate sā nupapanā anumānena kartur upalambhāt anumānenāpi yadupabdhaṃ tadupalabdham eva bhavati nanu kartrabhāvasmaranab adhitvāt anumānam idaṃ ayuktam itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt anulabdhau siddhāyāṃ anumānanirāsaḥ anumānanirāse ca sati anupalabdhisiddhiḥ anumānaprāmāṇye pi samāno doṣa iti cet na tasya pratibandham ahimnā prāmāṇyasiddheḥ na hi tasyānupalabdhinirāsāpekṣaṃ prāmāṇyam attretat syāt na vayaṃ kartrabhāve prāmāṇyaṃ brūmaḥ sakalalokapadārthavyavahāriṇo hi mīmāṃsakāḥ paraṃ tu vedasya pauruṣeyatāṃ bruvāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ tccāsya nāstīti balād anupalabdhyā tadabhāvaniścayo vyavatiṣṭhata iti syād etad evam yady anumānaṃ na syāt uktaṃ ca racanātvāt ity anumānam yat punar avādi vedeṣu puruṣasya kartṛtvam aśakyaṃ grahītum iti tad apy asādhu parokṣasya kuvindāder abhinavaprāvarakapaṭādau kārye kathaṃ kartṛtā vagamyate paṭādiracanāṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya cet sā numīyate vede pi racanāṃ dṛṣṭvā kartṛtvaṃ tasya gamyatām śarīraparigraham antareṇa prāṇinām upadeśasya kartum aśakyatvāt kadācidīśvaraḥ śarīram api gṛhṇīyād iti kalpyate niyataśarīraparigrahābhāvāc ca vyāsādivadasau na smaryate tataś ca adya sadyaḥ kaviḥ kāvye yathā karteti mīyate tathā tatkālajaiḥ puṃbhiḥ so pi karteti māsyate yathā parakṛtā śaṅkā tasmin kāvye vyapaiti te vede py anyakṛtā śaṅkā tathā teṣāṃ vyapaiṣayti parokṣam anumānena yac ca budhyāmahe vayam pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ tac cety uktaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca tad evaṃ kartṛtāmitau mūlapramānam astīti smṛtau nāndhapraṃparā mantrārthavādamūlatvaṃ tata eva na tatsmṛteḥ yathoditānumānādipramāṇāntarasaṃbhavāt yad api itaretarāśrayamabhāpi puruṣokte vedepramāṇyaṃ vedaprāmāṇyāt puruṣasiddhir iti tad api na samyak pūrvaṃ parihṛtatvāt anumānāt prasiddhe kartri vedavākyaiḥ tatpratīter upodvalanamipyate na tv āgamaikaśaraṇa eva kartravagamaḥ uktaṃ ca pūrvam api pṛthivyādinā kāryena kartur anumānam kiṃ yenaiva kartrā pṛthivyādikāryaṃ nirmitaṃ tenaiva vaidikyo racanā nirmitāḥ iti cet om ity cyate kim antra pramāṇam iti cet ucyate tarhi sarvajñaḥ sraṣṭuṃ prabhavatīdṛśam vicitraṃ prāṇibhṛtkarmaphalabhogāśrayaṃ jagat tatkarmaphalasambandhavidā tadupadeśinaḥ tenaiva vedā gcitāḥ iti nānyasya kalpanā ekenaiva ca siddhe rthe dvitīyaṃ kalpyema kim anekakalpanābījaṃ na hi kiñcana vidyate jagatsarge tāvat eka eveśvara iṣyate na dvau vahavo vā bhinnābhinnāśayakalpane ekatravaiyarthāt itaratra vyavahāravaiśasaprasaṅgena tata ekasyeśvaratvavighātāt tathā hi anekeśvaravādo hi nātīva hṛdayaṅgamaḥ te cet sadṛśasaṅkalpāḥ ko rthao bahubhirīśvaraiḥ saṃkalpayati yadekaḥ śubham aśubhaṃ vā pi satyasaṅkalpaḥ tatsidhyati tadvibhavāt ity aparas tatra kiṃ kuryāt bhinnābhiprāyatāyāṃ tu kāryavipratiṣedhataḥ nūnam ekaḥ svasaṅkalpavihatyā nīśvaro bhavet ekasya kila saṅkalpaḥ rājāyaṃ kriyatām iti hanyatām iti cānyasya tau samāviśataḥ katham rājyasaṅkalpasāphalye vihatā vadhakāmanā tasyāḥ saphalatāyāṃ vā rājyasaṅkalpaviplavaḥ tena citrajagatkāryasaṃvāhānuguṇāśayaḥ eka eveśvaraḥ sraṣṭā jagatām iti sādhitam evaṃ jagatsargavat sa eva vedānām apy ekaḥ praṇetā bhavitum arhati nānātvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāc ca tena yad ucyate nanv ekaḥ sarvaśākhānāṃ kartetyavagataṃ kutaḥ bahuvo bahubhir granthāḥ kathaṃ na racitā ime iti tatparihṛtaṃ bhavati ataś ca ekakartṛkā vedāḥ yataḥ parasparavyaktiṣaktārthāpadeśino dṛśyante ekam eva hi karma vedacatuṣṭayopadiṣṭaiḥ pṛthagbhūtair apy ekārthasamavāyibhir aṅgaiḥ anvitaṃ prayujate tatra hi hautraṃ ṛgvedena yajurvedenādhyvaryavaṃ audgātraṃ sāmavedena brahmatvam atharvavedena ca kriyate pauṣpalādiśakhābhedopadiṣṭāṃ ca tattadaṅgajātaṃ tatra tatrāpekṣyate tatra sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ ekaṃ karmety āhuḥ etac ca adūra eva agre nirṇeṣayte ekābhiprāyabaddhatvaṃ tena sarvatra gamyate bhaved bhinnāśayānāṃ hi katham ekārthamīlanam kāvyasamasyāpūraṇe kā vartā iti cet tatrāpi prathamasyaiva kaves tadvastudarśanāt tadabhiprāyavedī tu so nyastam anuvartate anyathā nanvitaṃ kāvyaṃ syād viśvavasukāvyāvat anvitatve tu sā nūnaṃ ādyasyaiva kaver matiḥ ihāpy ekāśayābhijñadvitīyeśvarakalpane ekābhiprāyataiva syāt kiṃ ca tatkalpane phalam tasmād eka eva kartā sarvaśākhānām kāṭhakādivyapadeśas tu prakṛṣṭādhyayananibandhano bhaviṣyatīti bhavadbhir apy uktam api ca yathā taror vikṣiptāḥ śākhā bhavanti na ca kṛtsnaṃ puṣpaphalapatram ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ sannihitaṃ bhavati kin tu kasyāñcit kasyāñcit evaṃ vedasyāpi śākhāḥ pṛthagaṅgakarmopadeśinyo vikṣiptāś ca tāsāṃ ca vṛkṣaśākhānāṃ ekasmāj janmabījataḥ tathaiva sarvaśākhānāṃ ekasmāt puruṣottamāt kartā ya eva jagatām akhilātmavṛttikarmaprapañcaparipākavicitratājñaḥ viśvātmanā tadupadeśaparāḥ praṇītāḥ tenaiva vedaracanā iti yuktam etat āptaṃ tam eva bhagavantam anādimīśaṃ āśritya viśvasiti vedavacaśu lokaḥ teṣām akrtṛkatayā na hi kaścid evaṃ visrambhameti matimāniti varṇitaṃ prāk evañ ca padavākyaracanādau tāvat vedeṣu puruṣāpekṣitvam upapāditam yad api sambandhakaraṇe puruṣānapekṣatvam ucyate citrabhānor iva dahanaśaktiḥ śabdasya naisargikī vācakaśaktiḥ vyutpattis tu vṛddhebhya eva vyavaharamāṇebhya upalabhyata iti kim atra puruṣaḥ kariṣyati iti tad apy aghaṭamānam puruṣaparipāṭitasamayasambandhavyatirekeṇa śabdād arthaprtyayānupapatteḥ nanu vaiva śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ kaścid asti kasyedaṃ puruṣasāpekṣatvaṃ vā nirapekṣatvaṃ vā cintyate na hi śabdārthayoḥ kuḍyavadarayor iva saṃyogasvabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayor iva samavāyatmā vā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣa upalabhyate tanmūlatvā ca sambandhāntarāṇy api na santi tad uktaṃ mukhe śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmavartham iti nāpy anumīyate śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇānupalambhāt na ca śabdadeśe arthaḥ saṃbhavati na cārthadeśe śabdaḥ sthanakaranaprayatnanāṃ taddhetūnāṃ ghaṭādyarthapradeśe nuplambhāt vyāpakatvaṃ tu śabdasya pratiṣiddham eva ucyate na saṃśleṣalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthasambandhaḥ asmābhir abhyupagamyate tat kiṃ kāryakārananimittanaimittikāśrayāśrayibhāvādayaḥ śabdasyārthena sambandhāḥ ete pi na tarām na tarhi tasya kaścid arthena sambandhaḥ na nāsti śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ pratyayanimittahetutvāt dhūmādivat tat kiṃ śabdo numānam eva syāt kas tarhi samaya iti brūmaḥ ko yaṃ samayo nāma abhidhānabhidheyaniyamaniyogaḥ samaya ucyate yad evaṃ kimanāśaṅkanīyasaṃśleṣaparicodanena taddūṣaṇena ca ucyate śabdārthābhedavādināṃ hi vaiyākaraṇānāṃ eṣa saṃśleṣarūpaḥ sambandho balādāpatatīti ta eva pratikṣepyante āha yadi vaiyākaraṇavarṇito na saṃśleṣa upapattimān samayo yam anupapanna eva sa hi puruṣakṛtaḥ saṅketaḥ na ca puruṣecchayā vastuniyamo vakalpate tadicchāyā avyāhataprasaratvāt artho pi kim iti vācako na bhavati śabdaś ca vācyaḥ na caivam asti dahanam anicchann api puruṣaḥ dhūmāt na taṃ pratyeti jalaṃ vā tata icchann api pratipadyate tatra yathā dhūmāgnyoḥ naisargika evāvinābhāvo nāma sambandhaḥ jñaptaye tu bhūyodarśanādi nimittam āśrīyate evaṃ śabdārthayoḥ sāṃsiddhika eva śaktyātmā sambandhaḥ tadvyutpattaye tu vṛddhavyavahāraprasiddhisamāśrayaṇam svābhāvike sambandhe sati dīpādivat kiṃ tadvyutpattyapekṣaṇeneti cet na śabdasya jñāpakatvāt jñāpakasya dhūmādeḥ etat rūpaṃ yat sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣaṃ svajñāpyajñāpakatvam udyotādayas tu pratyakṣasāmagryantargatatvāt na vyutpattyapkṣyā bhavanti śaktis tu naisargikī yathā rūpaprakāśinī dīpādeḥ tathā śabdasyārthapratiādane tasmāt na samayamātrāt arthapratipattiḥ api ca abhidhānābhidheyaniyamaniyogarūpaḥ samayaḥ jñānam eva na tato rthāntaram jñānaṃ cātmani vartate na ca śabdārthayor iti na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ syāt kiñ ca samayaḥ kriyamāṇāḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ vā kriyate pratipuruṣaṃ vā sargādau vā sakṛdīśvareṇa iti pratyuccāraṇaṃ prāktana eva kriyate nūtano vā navasya tāvat kriyamāṇasya katham arthapratyāyanasāmarthyam avagamyate tad avagatau vā kiṃ tatkaraṇena pūrvakṛtasya tu kṛtatvād eva punaḥ karanam anupapannam ekasya vastunaḥ jñaptir asakṛd āvartate notpattiḥ pratipuruṣam api sambandhaḥ bhinnaḥ abhinno vā kriyate bhedapakṣe katham ekārthasaṃjānam gośabdasya sāmnādimānarthaḥ kesarādimānaśvaśabdasya iti abhede pi tathaiva kṛtasya karanayogat jñānam eva sambandhasya karaṇam sargādāv api sakṛtsambandhakaranam ayuktam tathāvidhakālāsambhavād eva na hi śabdārthavyavahārarahitaḥ kaścit kāla upapadyate tasmān nityasyaiva sambandhasya lokato vyutpattiḥ na punaḥ karaṇam vyutpattipakṣaṃ ca na karaṇapakṣābhihitā doṣāḥ spṛśanti pratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratyakṣaṃ hīdam upalabhyate vṛddhānāṃ hi svārthe vyavaharamāṇānāṃ upaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ tatas tataḥ śabdāt taṃ tam arthaṃ pratiyanti te pi vṛddhā yadā bālā āsan tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ tathaiva pratipannavantaḥ te py anyebhya iti nāstyādiśaṃsārayati api ca samayamātraśaraṇaḥ śaktiśūnyaḥ śabdaḥ katham akṣinikocahastasaṃjñādibhyaḥ bhidyeta sa hi tadānīṃ kaśāṅkuśapratodābhi ghātasthānīya eva bhavati tathā ca śabdād arthaṃ pratiadyāmaha iti laukiko vyapadeśo vadhyeta asmayād arthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti syāt samayapakṣe ca yadṛcchāśabdatulyatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ prāpnoti tena gavāśvādiśabdānāṃ niyataviṣayatvaṃ na syāt yat punar ucyate jātiviśeṣe cāniyamāt samayarūpaḥ sambandha iti jātiśabdenātra deśo vivakṣitaḥ kila kvacid deśe kaścic chabdaḥ deśantaraprasiddham artham utsṛjya tato rthāntare vartate yathā coraśabdastaskaravacanaḥ odane dākṣiṇānyaiḥ prayujyate etañ ca samayapakṣe yujyate nitye tu sambandhe kathaṃ tadarthavyabhicāra iti tad apy ayuktam sarvaśabdānāṃ sarvārthapratyayānaśaktiyuktatvāt kvacid deśe kenacid arthena vyavahāraḥ ata eva cānavagatasambandhe śrute sati sandeho bhavati kam arthaṃ pratyāyayitum anenāyaṃ śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ syāt iti asatyāṃ hi śaktau akṛtasamaye nirālambanā pratyāyakatvā śaṅketi athavā āryadeśaprasiddha eva śabdānām arthaḥ itaras tu mlecchajanasammato nādaraṇīya eva tasmāt samayapakṣasyātidaurvalyāt akṛtrima eva śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti na tatra puruṣasya prabhaviṣṇutā atrocyate na nityaḥ sambandha ypapadyate śabdavat arthavac ca tṛtīyasya tasya pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena apratīyamānatvāt nanu śaktirūpaḥ sambandha ity uktam śaktiś ca tadāśriteti kathaṃ dharmyantaravat pṛthaktayā pratīyeta naiatt sāṃpratam svarūpasahakārivyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ grāg eva vistarataḥ pratikṣiptatvāt na ca śaktiḥ pratyakṣagamyāḥ dravyasvarūpavad anupalambhāt nānumeyā kāryāṇām anyathā pi ghaṭamānatvāt kalpayitvā ca śaktiṃ aparihāryaḥ asmayaḥ samayam antareṇārthapratipatter asiddheḥ siddhe ca samaye tata evārthasiddheḥ kiṃ nityasambandhāśrayaṇena yat tūktam samayasya puruṣecchādhīnatvāt asyāś ca avyāhataprasaratvāt vācyavācakavyatyayaḥ syāt iti tad anuktam śaktyabhāve śabdasyaiva vācakatve yogyatvāt kā punaḥ śaktyabhāve yogyatā sveti cet yo yaṃ gatvādijātiyogaḥ kramaviśeṣopakṛtaḥ gatvautvādisamānyasambandho hi yasya bhavati sa vācakatve yogya iti itaras tu vācyatve yathā dravyatvādyaviśeṣe pi vīranatvādisāmānyavatāṃ kaṭaniṣpattau tantutvādisāmānyavatāṃ ca paṭanippattau na ca tatra śaktir astīty uktam na ca kāraṇe kāryaṃ sad iti sāṅkhyair itva bhavadbhir iṣayate tasyām asatyām api śaktau sāmānyaviśeṣasambandhasya niyāmakatvāt na vācyavācakayor vyatyaya iti na śaktirūpaḥ śabdāṛthayoḥ sambandhaḥ na ca tayor avinābhāvo dhūmāgnyor iva sambandhaḥ tatra hi sambandhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ evaṃ pratīyate dhūmo gniṃ vinā na bhavati iti iha punaḥ ayam asmāt pratīyate iti etāvateva vyutpativarvasānam ata eva avagatipūrvikaivāvagatir ihetyanumānāt śabdasya meda uktaḥ prakāśakatvam api śabdasya samayaprasādopanatamegha na svābhāvikam sāṃsiddhike hi tathātve bhramitvādiprayuktāt anyato vā yataḥ kutaś cit abhinavād api dīpād iva śabdād arthapratītiḥ syāt yat tu naisargikie pi prakāśakatve śabdasya dhūmāder iva jñāpakatvāt sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣatvam uktam sa eṣa viṣama upanyāsaḥ na hi dhūmādeḥ pratyāyakatvaṃ svābhāvikam analāvinābhāvitvaṃ tu tasya nijjaṃ balam tatra cāgṛhyate tasmin pratītir eva na jāyate iti yuktaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ pratītyartham iha tu pratītiśaktir eva svabhāvikī bhavatā bhyupagamyate sā cet svābhāvikī kiṃ vyutpattyaekṣaṇena iti yadi cocyate pratyāyaka iti pratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā vagacchāmaḥ na prathamaśravaṇa iti yāvat kṛtvaḥ śrutena iyaṃ saṃjñā ayaṃ saṃjñī ity avagamyate tāvat kṛtvaḥśrutād arthāvagama iti so yaṃ samayopayoga eva kathito bhavati saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandho hi samaya evocyate tad upayogam antareṇa pratyāyakatvānavagamāt na svābhāvikī śaktiḥ yat tv abhyadhāyi samayasya jñānātmakatvāt ātmani vṛttiḥ na śabdārthayor iti etad apy acatruaśram tadāśrayatvābhāve pi jñānasya tadviṣayatvopapatteḥ yad apy abhāṇi samayamātraśaraṇe sṛṇipratodanodananirviśeṣe śabde śabdārthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti vyapadeśaḥ na syād iti tad api yat kiñcit naisargikaśaktipakṣe pi śakter arthaṃ paratipadyāmahe na śabdāt iti vyapadeśaḥ syāt avinābhāvād aginiṃ pratipadyāmahe na dhūmāt iti syāt tadaṅgatvād avinābhāvādeḥ na tathā vyapadeśa iti cet tad itaratrapi samānam dhūme hi vyāptipūrvatvaṃ śabde samayapūrvatā nānayos tad apekṣāyāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vihanyate api ca laukiko vyapadeśaḥ samayapakṣasākṣitām eva bhajate devadattenoktaṃ amutaḥ śabdād anu arthaṃ pratipadyasveti ity evaṃ hi vyapadeśati lokaḥ tasyāt samaya eva ataś caivaṃ deśāntare saṅketavaśena tata eva śabdād arthāntarapratipattiḥ nanu atroktaṃ sarve śabdāḥ sarvārthapratyāyanaśaktiyuktā iti kenacid arthena kvacidvyavahāra iti tad etad ayuktam śaktīnāṃ bhedābhedavikalpānupapatteḥ na śabdasvarūpāt bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ tathā navabhāsāt avyatireke ca ekasmācchabdādananyatvāt parasparam avyatirekastāsāṃ syāt na ca bhinnakāryānumeyā bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ kāryabhedasyānyathā py upapatteḥ sarvaśaktiyoge ca sarvārthapratyayaprasaṅgaḥ samayopayogo niyāmaka iti cet sa evāstu kiṃ śaktibhiḥ yad apy agādi śabdaśaravaṇe sati sarvārthaviṣayasandehadarśanāt sarvatra tasya śaktiḥ kalpyata iti tad apy asāram na hi śaktikṛtaḥ sandehaḥ kin tu gatvādivarṇasamānyanibandhanaḥ tathā ca gatvādijātimatāṃ varṇānāṃ arthe vācakatvam avagatam amī tajjātiyogino varṇāḥ kasyārthasya vācakāḥ syuḥ iti bhavati sandehaḥ yat punar avādi sa eva śabdasyārthaḥ yatrainam āryāḥ prayuñjata na mlecchajanaprasiddha iti tad etat katham iva śapatham anatreṇa pratipadyemahi na hi mlecchadeśe pi tadarthapratyayo na jāyate bādhyate vā sandigdho veti kathaṃ na śabdārthaḥ āryaprasiddhir bādhiketi cet āryaprasiddher api mlecchaprasiddhiḥ kathaṃ na bādhikā akṣādivac ca vikalpamānārthopapatteḥ vyavasthitaviṣaya eva vikalpobhaviṣyati pikanematāmarasādiśabdānāṃ ca bhavadbhiḥ mlecchaprayogāt arthaniścaya āśrita eva aveṣṭyadhikaraṇe rājaśabdaṃ āndhraprasiddhe rthe varṇitavanto bhavanta iti alam avāntaracintatena tasmāt samaya eva sambandha iti yuktam tad uktaṃ jātiviśeṣe cāniyamāt iti atha yad uktaṃ sayamaḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ sargādau sakṛt kriyate iti pratyuccāraṇaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ ca tatkaraṇaṃ anabhyupagatam eva dhūṣitam sargādau sakṛd eva samayakaranam iti na pakṣaḥ ata eva na sarvaśabdānāṃ yadṛcchātulyatvam keṣāñcid eva śabdānāṃ asmādibhir adyatve saṅketakaraṇāt tata eva yadṛcchāśabdā ucyante sargādiśca samarthita eva īśvarasiddhāvapyavikalam anumānam upanyastam eṣa eva cāvayor viśeṣaḥ yad eṣa śabdārthasambandhavyavahāraḥ tavānādiḥ mama tu jagatsargāt prabhṛti pravṛtta iti adyatve tu śabdārthasambandhavyutpattau tulya evāvayoḥ panthāḥ tatrāpi tvayaṃ veśeṣaḥ yat tava śaktiparyantā vyutpattiḥ mama tu tadvarjam iti tathā ceyam iyatī vyutpattiḥ loke dṛśyate yat ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka iti na punaḥ śaktiparyantā vyutpattir asti tathā hi yatra śṛṅgagrāhikaya śabdam arthaṃ ca nirdiśya sambandhaḥ kriyate tatreyantam evainaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka iti yatrāpi ca vṛddhebhyaḥ vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ vyutpadyate tatrāpīyadevāsau jānāti ayam arthaḥ amutaḥ śabdāt anena pratiapnna iti na tv anyā asya kācicchaktir astīti iyatyaiva ca vyutpattyā śabdād arthapratyayopapatteḥ asyāścāparihāryatvāt adhikakalpanābījābhāvāc ca na nityaḥ śabdārthaśambandhaḥ ata eva ca sambandhaḥ tripramāṇakaḥ iti yat tvayocyate tad asmābhir na mṛṣyate śabdavṛddhābhidheyāṃś ca pratyakṣeṇātra paśyati iti satyam anyathā nupapattyā tu vetti śaktiṃ dvayātmikām ity etat tu na satyam anyatha py yupapatter ity uktatvāt tasmāt dvipramāṇakaḥ sambandhaniścayaḥ na tripramāṇakaḥ tad evaṃ śabdasya naisargikaśaktyātmakasambandhābhāvāt īśvaraviracitasamayanibandhanaḥ śabdārthavyavahārah nānādiḥ nanu īśvara pi sambandhaṃ kurvan avaśyaṃ kenacit śabdena karoti tasya kena kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ śabdāntareṇ cet tasyāpi kena kṛtaḥ tasyāpi kena iti na kaścid avadhiḥ tasmād avaśyam anena sambandhaṃ krvatā vṛddhavyavahārasiddhāḥ kecit akṛtasambandhā eva śabdā abnhypagantavyāḥ asti cet vyavahārasiddhiḥ kim īśvareṇa kiṃ vātatkṛtena samayena ity ānādipakṣa eva śreyāt ucyate astramāyuṣmatā jñātaṃ viṣayas tu na lakṣitaḥ asmadādiṣu doṣo yaṃ īśvare tu na yujyate nānākarmaphalasthānaṃ icchayaivedṛśaṃ jagat sraṣṭuṃ prabhavatas tasya kauśalaṃ ko vikalpayet icchāmātreṇa pṛthivyāder iyataḥ kāryasya karaṇasmadādīnāṃ yanmanorathapadavīm api nādhirohati tad api yataḥ saṃpadyate tasya kiyānayaṃ prayāsaḥ tad atreśvarasadbhāve paraṃ vipratipattayaḥ tasmiṃs tu siddhe ka evaṃ vikalpānām avasaraḥ uktaṃ ca tatiddhau nirapavādam anumānam vayaṃ tu na kartāra eva sambandhasya yata evam anuyujyemahi aṅgusyagreṇa nirdiśya kañcidarthaṃ puraḥsthitam vyutpādayanto dṛśyate bālānasmadvidhā api tasmāt īśvaraviracitasambandhādhigamopāyabhūtavṛddhavyavahāralabdhatadvyutpattisāpekṣaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayatīti siddham na ca nityasambandhābhāve pi śabdasyārthāsaṃsparśitvaṃ samayabalenārthapratyayasyābādhitasya siddher ity uktatvādityalaṃ vistareṇa tasmāt pade ca vākye ca sambandhe ca svatantratā puruṣasyopapanneti vedānāṃ tatpraṇītatā tasmād āptoktatvād eva vedāḥ pramāṇam na nityatvāt nanu āptoktatvasya hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ katham avagamyate na pratyakṣeṇa kṣoṇīdharadharmatvam iva dhūmasya vedānām āptapraṇītatvam avagamyate śravaṇayugalabalalabdhajanmani pratyaye vedākhyaśabdarāśer eva pratibhāsāt na codāttādivat varṇadharmatvena āptoktatvaṃ gṛhyate nāpy anumānam asiminn arthe liṅgābhāvāt prāmāṇye hi vedasya āptoktatvaṃ liṅgam āptoktatvānumitau tu na liṅgāntaram upalabhāmaha iti kutasyaḥ pakṣadharmatvaniścayaḥ ucyate alaṃ sarasvatīkṣodena ukta eva pakṣadharmatvaniścayopāyaḥ tathā hi śabdasya sādhitaṃ tāvad anityatvaṃ svistaram racanāḥ kartṛm atyaś ca racanātvād iti sthitam kartā sarvasya sarvajñaḥ puruṣo stīti sādhitam kāryeṇānuguṇaṃ kalpyaṃ nimittam iti ca sthitam pratyakṣādiviśvādaḥ vede parihariṣyate vyāghātapaunaruktyādidoṣāś ca vacanāntare vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāṃ upayogaś ca vakṣyate na mātrāmātram apy asti vede kiñcid apārthakam śabdabrahmavivartādikalpanāś ca purodetāḥ sarvāḥ parihariṣyante kāryatvasya virodhikāḥ itthaṃ ca sthite kim anyad avaśiṣṭaṃ vedeṣv āptoktatāniścayasya so yaṃ sakalaśāstrārthasthitau satyāṃ pakṣadharmatvaniścayaḥ hetoḥ āptoktatvasya gīyate yat tu pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā tanniścyānimittam iti vikalpitam tatra pratyakṣamāstām anumānādīni ca yāni racanātvādīnyuktāni yāni ca paradarśanadviṣi vakṣyante tāni sarvāny āptoktatāyāḥ pakṣadharmatāsiddhyaupayikānītyalaṃ vistareṇa vyāptiḥ punar asya hetoḥ āyurvedādivākyeṣu niścīyate pippalīpaṭolamūlader apy auṣadhasya ittham upayogāt idam abhimatamāsādyate asya ca kṣīracukrādivirodhyaśanasya parihārādidamaniṣṭam upaśāmyatītyādiṣv āyurvedśāstreṣu pratyakṣeṇa tasyārthasya tathā niścayāt arthāvisaṃvāditaṃ nāma prāmāṇyaṃ pratipannaṃ taccedamāptavādaprayuktam ataḥ yatrāptavādatvaṃ tatra prāmāṇyam iti vyāptir gṛhyate tathā mantrāṇāṃ prayoge vṛścikabhujagadaṣṭasya bhakṣitaviṣasya vā nirviṣatvaṃ apasmārapiśācarūpikāgṛhītasya tadunmocanaṃ atirabhasojjihāneṣu duṣṭameghaṣu sasyarakṣaṇam ity evam upalabdham atas teṣāṃ viṣabhūtāśaniśamanakuśalānāṃ āptā upadeṣṭāra iti tatrāpi tathaiva vyāpitniścayaḥ nanu āyurvedādau prāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣādisaṃvādāt pratipannam nāptaprāmāṇyāt ataḥ kathamāptoktatvasya tatra vyāptigrahaṇam naitad evam pratyakṣādisaṃvādāt tanniścīyatāṃ nāma prāmāṇyam utthitaṃ tu tat āptoktatvāt pratyakṣādāv apy arthakriyājñānasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyasya jñaptiḥ utpattis tu guṇavatkārakakṛtyet uktam nadyādivākyāni ca vipralambhakapuruṣabhāṣitāni visaṃvadanti loke dṛśyante tenāptapraṇītatvam eva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyakāranam kāraṇaśuddhim antareṇa samyakpratyayānutpādāt niścayopāyas tu pratyakṣaṃ bhavatu na tu tatkṛtam eva pramāṇyam ataḥ yuktam āptoktatāyāḥ āyurvedādau vyāptigrahaṇam nanu evam api na yuktam āptokttatvasya tatra paricchettum aśakyatvāt anvayavyatirekamūlam eva āyurvedavākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam nāptakṛtam anvayavyatirekau ca yāvaty eva dṛśyete tāvaty evārthe prāmāṇyam yathā harītakyādivākyārthe yatra tu tayor adarśanaṃ tatrāpramāṇyam yathā somarājyupayoge samāḥ sahasraṃ jīvyate iti āpte tu kalpyamāne rdhajaratīyaṃ syāt arthe tasyāptatvam ardhe ca katham anāptatvam iti tad idam anupapannam anvayavyatirekayoḥ grahītum aśakyatvāt tau hi svātmani vā grahītuṃ śakyete vyaktyantare vā vyaktyantare pi sarvatra kvacid eva vā vyaktiviśeṣe sarvathā saṃkaṭo yaṃ panthāḥ vyādhīnāṃ tannidānānāṃ tadupacayāpacayānāṃ tadupaśamopāyānāṃ auṣadhānāṃ tatsaṃyogaviyogaviśeṣāṇāṃ tatparimāṇānāṃ tadasavīryavipākānāṃ deśakālāpuruṣadaśābhedena śaktibhedasya ekena janmanā grahītum aśakyatvāt janmāntarānubhūtāmāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ asmaraṇāt jano nantastāvannivavir iha vyādhinivahaḥ na saṃkhyātuṃ śakyā bahuguṇarasadravyagatayaḥ vicitrāḥ saṃyogāḥ pariṇatipūrveti ca kutaḥ cikitsāyāḥ pāraṃ tarati yugalakṣair api naraḥ yad eva dravyam ekasya dhātor bhavati śāntaye yogāntarāttadevāsya punaḥ kopāya kalpate yā dravyaśaktir ekatra puṃsi nāsau narāntare harītakyāpi nodbhūtavātakuṣṭe virecyate śaradyudriktapittasya jvarāya dadhi kalpate tad eva bhuktaṃ varṣāsu jvaraṃ hanti daśāntare na copalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcit asti tacchaktivedane yenaikatra gṛhītā sau sarvatrāvagatā bhavet yo vā jñātuṃ prabhavati puruṣaḥ tatsāmarthyaṃ niravadhiviṣayam syāt sarvajñaḥ sa iti na vimatiḥ tasmin kāryā svavacanakathite athocyate anādir evaiṣā cikitsakasmṛtiḥ vyākaraṇādismṛtivat saṃkṣepavistaravivakṣayaiva carakādayaḥ kartāraḥ na tu te sarvadarśinaḥ na ca smṛtāvandhaparaṃparādoṣaḥ samūlatvāt yathā vyākaraṇasmṛteḥ śiṣṭaprayogo mūlaṃ evam ihānvayavyatirekau śiṣṭavirodhe sati yathā mūlavirodhinī pāṇinyādismṛtir apramāṇam tathā cāhuḥ iha na bhvaty anabhidhānāt iti evaṃ vaidyasmṛtir api anvayavyatirekaviruddhā na pramāṇam iti tad etad anyuktam anvayavyatirekayor yathoktanayena paricchedāsambhavena tanmūlatvānupapatteḥ yadi hy anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ aśeṣadravyaśaktīr niścitya carakādibhir viracitaṃ śāstram itīdṛśam anvayavyatirekitvam ucyate tad ay ayākṛtam adyatve yātantāvanvayavyatirekau vayam upalabdhuṃ śaknumaḥ tāvadbhyāṃ tābhyāṃ ekadeśasaṃvādāt pramāṇyakalpanāt tatra pravartatām na tu tau tāvantau śāstrasya mūlaṃ bhavitum arhataḥ sarvair asmadādibhis tādṛśaśāstrapraṇayanaprasaggāt anāditvam api śāstrāṇāṃ vedavad anupapannam carakādikrtṛsmṛteḥ kālidāsāsismṛtivad avigītatvāt na ca cikitsāsmaranaprabandhaevāyam anādiḥ tathātve andhaparaṃparā kāraṇānavadhāraṇāt na ca tad uktaṃ tanmūlaṃ bhavitum arhati vyudstatvāt tasmāt sarvajñapraṇīta evāyurvedaḥ nanu aviduṣām upadeśo nāvakalpata iti vidvāṃsaḥ carakādayaḥ kalpyantām te tu pratyakṣeṇaiva sarvaṃ viditavant ity atra kiṃ mānam ucyate anvayavyatirekayor nirāsāt nānumānasyaiva viṣayaḥ vedamūlatvam api manvādismṛtivat ayuktaṃ kalpayitum kartṛsāmānyāsaṃbhavād iti varṇayiṣyāmaḥ puruṣāntaropadeśapūrvakatve carakeṇava kim aparāddham upamanamānāśaṅkanīyam evāsminn arthe arthāpattis tu na pramāṇāntaram apramāṇyaṃ tu nāsti bahukṛtvaḥ saṃvādadarśanāt ataḥ pariśeṣāt pratyakṣīkṛtadeśakālapuruṣadaśābhedānu sārisamastavyastapadārthasārthaśaktiniścayāḥ carakādayaḥ iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum yad evaṃ kathaṃ tarhi somarājyādivakyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāre cārdhajaratīyam ity uktam naiṣa doṣaḥ karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyāt eṣu vyabhicāro bhaviṣyati vaidkeṣu ca karmasu mīmāṃsakasya samāno guṇaḥ kārīryādau kā te vartā yasyāṃ na syād iṣṭau vṛṣṭiḥ vaiguṇyaṃ cet kartrādīnāṃ atrāpy evaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum yadi vidhuram abhuktaṃ karma śastrīyam anyat phalavighaṭanahetuḥ kalpyate so pi tulyaḥ kvacid atha phalasaṃpat dṛśyate tatprayoge tad iha dṛḍhaśarīrāh santi dīrthāyuṣaś ca āyurvedas tasmāt āptakṛto nānyamūla iti siddham evaṃphalavedādau prakāśam āptapraṇītatvam tasmāt āptoktatvasya siddham āyurvedādau vyāptigrahaṇam vyāptipradarśanāyaiva sūtrakṛtā sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt  ity uktam dṛṣṭārthaśabde gṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ āptoktatvaṃ adṛṣṭārthe pi prāmāṇyaṃ sādhayatīti ata evoktaṃ mantrāyurvedaprāmāṇyavac ca tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyāt  iti nanv atrāpi na vaidyakaṃ viracayan dṛṣṭo muniḥ sarvavit tadvyāptigrahaṇaṃ jane yadi vṛthā yurvedasaṃkīrtanam satyaṃ kin tu dṛḍhā tathāpi carakādyāptasmṛtir vaidyake nāsau cānyanibandhaneti kathitā tasyeha dṛṣṭāntatā ity āyurvedavākyaprabhṛtiṣu bhavati vyāptir āptoktāyāḥ pūrvoktena krameṇa sphuṭamakathi tathā pakṣadharmatvam asyāḥ na pratyakṣāgamābhyām apahṛtaviṣayā nānumānāntareṇa vyādhūtā veti saiṣā bhajati gamakatāṃ pañcarūpopapatteḥ anapekṣatayā na vedavācāṃ ghaṭate niṣpratimaḥ pramāṇabhāvaḥ kva girām ayathārthatānivṛttiḥ puruṣapratyayam antareṇa dṛṣṭā tatpratyayāt bahutaradraviṇavyayādisādhyeṣu karmasu tapaśu ca vaidikeṣu yuktaṃ pravartanamabādhanakena naiva tatsiddhir ity alam asammata eṣa mārgaḥ tasmād āptoktatvād eva devāḥ pramāṇam iti siddham anye tu anyathā vedaprāmāṇyaṃ varṇayanti tasya hi prāmāṇye abhyupagataparalokaḥ anabhyupagataparaloko vā paro vipratipadyate tatrānabhupagataparalokaṃ prati tāvat ātmanityatādinyāyapūrvakaṃ paralokasamarthanam eva nidheyam paralokavādināṃ tu mate yad etat sukhiduḥkhyādibhedena jagato vaicitryaṃ dṛśyate tad avaśyaṃ karmavaicitryanibandhanam eva karmāṇi cānanuṣṭhitāni nātmānaṃ labhante alabdhātmanāṃ ca nabhaḥkusumanibhānāṃ kuto vicitrasukhaduḥkhādiphalasādhanatvam tasmāt anuṣṭhānam eṣām eṣitavyam anuṣṭhānaṃ ca nāviditasavrūpāṇāṃ karmaṇām upapannam ajānan puruṣaḥ tapasvī kim anutiṣṭhat tad avaśyaṃ jñātvā nuṣṭheyāni karmāṇi tad idānīṃ teṣāṃ parijñāne ko bhypāyaḥ na pratyakṣaṃ asmadānīnāṃ svargādyadṛṣṭapuruṣārthasādhanāni karmāṇi darśayituṃ na ca tāvatā nuṣṭhānasiddhiḥ uktaṃ ca adharme dharmarūpe vā py avibhakte phalaṃ prati kim apy astīti vijñānaṃ narāṇāṃ kvopayujyate iti upamānaṃ tv atra śaṅkyamānam api na śobhate nāpi parasparam upadiśanto laukikāḥ karāṇi paralokaphalāni jātīyur iti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ ajñātvā upapādayatāṃ āptatvāyogāt jñātuṃ tu laukikānāṃ durghaṭam pramāṇābhāvād ity uktatvāt eva eva hi puruṣopadeśaparaṃparākalpanāyāṃ andhaparaṃparānyāyaḥ syāt tasmād avaśyaṃ abhyupagataparalokaiḥ paralokaphalāni karmāṇi kurvadbhiḥ śāstrāt karmāvabodho bhyupagantavyaḥ śāstraṃ ca vedā eveti siddhaṃ tatprāmāṇyam nanu lokapratisiddhita eva dharmādharmasādhanāni karmāṇi jñāsyante kiṃ śāstreṇa upakārāpakārau hi dharmādharmayor lakṣaṇam iti prasiddham evaitat tathā ha vyāsahaḥ idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ pāpaṃ śatādhyayane pi ṛco vai brahmaṇaḥ prāṇāḥ ity abhyupakamya ātharvaṇo vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ iti paṭhyate tathā ye sya prāñco raśmayaḥ tā evāsya prācyo madhunāḍyaḥ ṛca eva puṣpam ity upakramya paṭhita atha ye syodañco raśmayaḥ tā evāsyodīcyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ atharvāṅirasa eva madhukṛtaḥ iti tathā taittarīye tasmād vā etasmāt prāṇamayāt anyo ntara ātmā manomayaḥ iti prastutya tasya yajur eva śiraḥ eva vedānāvedayate nānyathā hi caturdeśasaṃkhyā paryate smṛtyantare ca spaṣṭam evoktam aṅgāni vedāścatvāraḥ mīmāṃsānyāyavistaraḥ purāṇāṃ dharmaśāstrṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa itianyatrāpy uktam
