nyatra catvāraścaturṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragāḥ dharmajñāḥ pariṣat ity uktam śaṅkhalikhitau ca ṛgyajuśāmārtharvavidaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit dharmavit vākyavit naiyāyiko naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pañcāgnir iti daśāvarā pariṣat ity ūcatuḥ prācetase catvāro vedavidaḥ dharmaśāstravid iti pañcāvarā pariṣat ity uktam tathā ca paṅktipāvanaprastāve caturvedaṣaḍaṅgavit jyeṣṭhasāmago tharvāṅgiraso py ete paṅkitpāvanā gaṇyante tad ayam evamādivedacatuṣṭayapratiṣṭhāpraguṇa eva prācuryeṇa dharmaśāstrakārāṇāṃ vyavahāraḥ anye pi śāstrakārāḥ tathaiva vyavaharanto dṛśyante tathā ca mahābhāṣyakāro bhagavān patañjaliḥ atharvavedam eva prathamam udāhṛtavān śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye iti mīmāṃsābhāṣyakāreṇāpi vedādhikaraṇe kāṭhakaṃ kālāpaṃ maudgalaṃ paiṣpalādakam iti yajurvedādivat atharvaveda pi pauṣpalādakamudājahe sarvaśāstrādhikaraṇe pi vedāntaraśāsvāntaravat maudgalapauṣpalādakākhye atharvaśākhe apy udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ tathā ca prathamayajño nāma caturṣu na kaścid asti ity adhikaraṇānta eva likhitam evaṃ śrutismṛtiviśiṣṭacāravyavahāravidāṃ atra vipratipattisaṃbhāvanaiva nāsti āha na brūmaḥ atharvavedo na pramāṇam iti kintu trayībāhya iti ucyate trayapīyaṃ atharvavedabāhyaiva na kevalam evaṃ trayyām api parasparabāhyatvam asty eva ṛksāmabāhyāni yajūṃṣi yajusmāmabāhyā ṛcaḥ ṛgyajurbāhyāni sāmānīti kiyānayaṃ dosaḥ sarvabhāvānām itaretarasāṅkarye saditatvāt ye hi śabdātmānaḥ granthasandarbhasvabhāvāḥ ye ca tad abhidheyā arthasvabhāvāḥ te sarve nyonyasaṃmiśritātmāna eva na ca pareṇātmānaṃ saṃmiśriyanto pi te svarūpam apahārayantīti athocyeta nedṛśaṃ trayībāhyatvam atharvavede vivakṣitam api tu yad eṣa na trayīpratyayaṃ karmopadiśati na tatsambaddhaṃ kiñcid iti tad asya trayībāhyatvam iti etad api na sādhūpariṣṭam iṣṭipaśvekāhāhīnasatrādikarmaṇāṃ tatropadeśadarśanāt sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma iti nyānāt trayyupadiṣṭe pi karmaṇi sambaddham atharvavedāt kim api lamyata eva nanu bhavati sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma tatpunaḥ trivedīsambaddhasarvaśāstrāpratyayam eva nātharvaśāskhāpratyayaṃ yataḥ somayāgādikarmaṇāṃ ṛgvedena hrautraṃ yajurvedanādhvaryavaṃ samāvedenaudgātraṃ kiyate nātharvavedena kiñcid iti tad ayuktam atharvavedena brahmatvasya karaṇāt tathā ca gopathabrāhmaṇam prajāpatis somena yakṣyamāṇo vedānuvāca kaṃ vo hotāraṃ vṛṇīyam iti iti prakamya tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi hautraṃ veda yajurvidam evādhvaryuṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi ādhvaryavaṃ veda sāmavidam evodgātāraṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi audgātraṃ veda atharvāṅgirovidam eva brahmāṇaṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi brahmatvaṃ veda ity abhidhāya punar āha atha cetraivaṃvidhaṃ hotrāraṃ adhvaryumudgātāraṃ brahmāḥaṃ vā vṛṇute purastād eva vaiṣāṃ yajño ricyata iti tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ kuryāt yajurvidam evādhvaryuṃ sāmavidam evodgātāraṃ atharvāṅgirovidam eva brahmāṇam iti tathā yadūnaṃ ca viriṣṭaṃ ca yātayāmaṃ ca karoti tadatharvaṇāṃ tejasā pratyāpyāyayet iti narte bhṛgvaṅgirobhyaḥ somaḥ pātavayaḥ iti nanv etāḥ śrutīḥ atharvāṇa evādhīyate nānye trayīvidaḥ te tv evaṃ paṭhanti yadṛcā hautraṃ kriyate yajuṣā dhvaryavaṃ sāmnā audgātraṃ atha kena brahmatvaṃ kriyate iti trayyā vidyate brūyāt iti tathā ca tadṛccaiva hautramakurvata yajuṣā dhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātraṃ yad eva trayyai vidyāyai śukraṃ tena brahmatvam iti ucyate vayam apy evam ādīni vākyāni na nādhīmahi kiṃ tv eṣām ayam evārthaḥ atharvāṅgirovid eva brahmeti katham yato na trayī nāma kim api vastvantaram api tu trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ samāhāra iti samāhāraś ca samāhriyamāṇaniṣṭo bhavati samāhriyamāṇāś ca ṛgvedādayaḥ trayaḥ hautrādiparatvena caritārthāḥ na punas tatra bhedam arhanti ekaikaśaḥ caritārthānāṃ samudāyo pi caritārtha eva samudāyabuddhau hi vibhajyamānāyāṃ samudāyina eva sphuranti nāvayavivadarthāntaram te cānyatra vyāpṛtāḥ kiṃ tu khalu ṛgvedādīnāṃ brahmatvaṃ kurvatāmatibhāro bhavati na brūmaḥ atibhāra iti kintu tryātmakatvena brahmatvakartavyatopadiśyate tryātmakaścānyatamo pi tebhyo na bhavati vedaḥ atharvavedas tu tryātmaka eva tatra hi ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānīti trīṇy api santi tena brahmatvaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ trayyā kṛtaṃ bhavati nanu yastrīn vedānadhīte tena cet brahmatvaṃ kriyeta tatkiṃ trayyā na kṛtaṃ bhavati bāḍham ity ucyate so pi ekasmai vā kāmāyā nye jajñakratavaḥ samādhīyante sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau iti śrutāv api yogasiddhyadhikaraṇanyāyena asyatamam eva buddhāvādhāya vidadhyāt na samudāyaṃ buddhāvāropayituṃ śaknuyāt ity ekenaiva tatkṛtaṃ bhavati na trayyeti nanu anye pi trayātmakā vedāḥ yad evaṃ sutarāmatharvavedo na pṛthak karaṇīyaḥ sarveṣāṃ rūpāviśeṣāt teṣāṃ pṛthak pratiṣṭhaīḥ savaiḥ svaiḥ ṛgādibhir eva vyapadeśa iti na te samudāyaśabdavyapadeśyāḥ yat tu vākyāntare trayyai vidyāyai śukraṃ tena brahmatvam iti tatreyaṃ caturthī ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāne prayuktā śukram iti sāramācakṣate tena trayīvidyāyāḥ sāreṇa brahmatvaṃ kriyata ity uktaṃ bhavati na ca trayyeva trayyāḥ śukraṃ bhavati na cātyantaṃ tato tharvāntaram eva tenedam atharvavedātmakam eva trayyāḥ śukram iti manyāmahe tryātmakatvād iti manyāmahe tryātmakatvād iti śukram iti ca guhyam āhuḥ atharvaśabdo pi rahasyavacanaḥ yajñātharvāṇaṃ vaidikasyā iṣṭayaḥ iti tena ayī śukrarūpeṇātharvavedena brahmatvam itīttham atharvavedasya na trayībāhyatvam itthaṃ sarvaśākhapratyayam ekaṃ karma ity atra na sarvasabdaḥ saṅkocito bhavati ata eva brahmavedaḥ atharvaveda iti pūrvottarabrāhmaḥe paṭhyate ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo brahmavedaḥ iti tathā ca kāṭhakaśatādhyayane brāhmaṇe brahmaudane evaitajuṣṭaṃ nirvapati catuśśarāvo bhavati catvāro hīme vedāḥ tāneva bhāginaḥ karoti mūlaṃ vai brahmaṇo vedāḥ vedānām etanmūlaṃ yadṛtvijaḥ prāśnanti tadbrahmaudanasya brahmaudanatvam iti tathā puṃvākyādvipralaṃbhakāt dṛṣṭānuguṇyasāmarthyāt codanaiva laghīyasī iti tatra kecit paridṛśyamānamantrārthavādabalonnītavidhimūlatvaṃ manyate anye viprakīrṇaśākhāmūlatvam apare punaḥ smṛtisamākhyā nugṛhītā bhaviṣyati pratyakṣamūlatve hi vedavadatrāpi kaḥ smṛtiśabdārthaḥ kiñ ca vedamūlatve sati smṛteḥ śrutivirodhe sati tadatulyakakṣyatvāt bādhyatvaṃ suvacaṃ bhavati kptam ekatra mūlaṃ itaratra kalpyam yāvad eva bhavān smṛteḥ śrutiṃ kalpayituṃ vyavasyati tāvad etadvirodhinī pratyakṣaśrutā śrutiravatarati hṛdayapatham iti kathaṃ tadā mūlakalpanāyai smṛtiḥ prabhavet tad āha so yamābhāṇako loke yadaśvena hṛtaṃ purā  tataścāt gardabhaḥ prāptuṃ kenopāyena śaknuyāt iti apara āha vikalpa evātra yuktaḥ kila dvividho vedaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ anumīyamānaś ca śrūyamāṇaś ca śrutir ity ucyate anumīyamānaś ca smṛtir iti dvāv api caitāvanādī iti kiṃ kena vādhyate vyaktāvyakto hi veda evāsau ata eva na mantrārthavādādimūlakatvakalpanaṃ yuktam smaryamāṇasya vedasyānāditvāt nanu evaṃ vedamūlatvena prāmāṇye varṇyamāne bāhyasmṛtīnām api prāmāṇyaṃ vadantaḥ pravādukāḥ kathaṃ prativaktavyāḥ ucyate pratyuktā eva te tapasvinaḥ uktaṃ hi bhagavatā jaimininā api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt iti kartṛsāmānyād iti ko rthaḥ ekādhikārāvagamād iti ya eva vedārthānuṣṭhāne dhikṛtāḥ kartāraḥta eva smṛtyarthānuṣṭhāne ācamānādismārtapadārthasaṃvalitatayaiva vedistaraṇādivaidikapadārthaprayogadarśanāt na tvevam ekādhikārāvagamo bāhyasmṛtiṣu vidyate tasmāt manvādismṛtaya eva pramāṇaṃ na bāhyasmṛtayaḥ nanu mānvādismṛtayo pi vedamūlatvāt pramāṇaṃ nānyata iti atrocyate tadetadvadamūlatayā prāmāṇyaṃ yogipratyakṣaṃ dharmagrāhakamamṛṣyamāṇāḥ kilācakṣate bhavantaḥ etac ca na yuktam yathā hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā sarvasyeśitā sarvadarśī sarvānukampī ca vedānāṃ praṇetā samarthitaḥ tathā yogipratyakṣam api dharmagrahaṇe nipuṇamasmadādipratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ prayakṣalakṣaṇe samarthitam eva tasmāt tanmūlā eva manvādideśanāḥ bhavantu yat tu trikālānavacchinnaḥ kathaṃ partyakṣagamyo dharmaḥ syād iti codanaiva tatra pramāṇam ucyate prativihitaṃ tat īśvarapratyakṣasamarthanena sādhyasādhanasambandhasya svargāgnihotrādigatasya yathā grāhakam īśvarapratyakṣaṃ evaṃ aṣṭakādigatasya tasya grāhakaṃ mantrādipratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kim atra trikālānavacchedena avacchedaena vā kaṛtyam yad evaṃ aṣṭakādikarmaṇāṃ dharmatvāgrahaṇāt asarvajña īśvaraḥ syāt jñātvā vā nupādaśat akāruṇiko bhavet naiṣa doṣaḥ sarvaṃ jānātyeva bhagavān kiñcit svayam upadiśati kiñcit parānupadeśayati te hi syānugrāhyā bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ ca tadanugrahakṛtaiva tathāvidhajñānaprāptiḥ mantrādīnāṃ pratyakṣo dharma iti vede pi paṭhyate nanu evaṃ pratyakṣamūlatvāviśeṣāt śrutismṛtyor virodhe vikalpaḥ prāpnoti bṛhadrathantaravidhyor iva na vādhyavādhakabhāvaḥ na hīśvarapratyakṣasya yogipratyakṣasya ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ naisargikāhāryakṛtas tu bhaviṣyati kiṃ tena ucyate bhavatu vikalpaḥ ko doṣaḥ vedamūlatvavādibhir api kaścid vikalpo vyākhyāt eva viṣayavibhāgena vā vikalpo vyākhyāsyate na ca śrutismrtivirodhodāharaṇaṃ kiñcid astīti svādhyāyabhiyuktāḥ tasmād āptapratyakṣamūlatvena vedānām iva dharmaśāstrāṇām api pramāṇyam etena itihāsapurāṇaprāmāṇyam api nirṇītaṃ veditavyam itihāsapurāṇaṃ hi pañcamaṃ vedam āhuḥ uktaṃ ca itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛhayet bibhetyalapaśrutādvedaḥ māmayaṃ pratariṣyati iti atha vā kim asmākaṃ durabhiniveśena vedamūlatvāt smṛtīnāṃ smṛtivat purāṇānām api bhavatu prāmāṇyam prāmāṇye tāvad avivādaḥ sadācārasyāpyanupanibaddhasya vedamūlatvād eva bhavatu prāmāṇyam sarvathā tāvat vedāścatvāraḥ purāṇaṃ smṛtir iti ṣaḍimāni vidyāsthānāni sākṣātpuruṣārthasādhanopadeśīni pūrvoktarītyā pramāṇam vyākaraṇādīni tu ṣaḍaṅgāni aṅgatvenaiva tadupayogīni na sākṣāddharmopadeśīni kalpasūtreṣv api vikṣiptakarmatramaniyamasaṃgrahamātram nāpūrvopadeśaḥ mīmāṃsā vedavākyavicārātmikā vedapramāṇyaniścayahetuś ca nyāyavistara ity āmukha evoktam tad imāni caturdaśavidyāsthānāni pramāṇam kānicit sakṣād upadeśīni kānicit tadupayogīnīti siddham yāni punar āgamāntarāṇi paridṛśyante tāny api dvividhāni kānicit sarvātmanā vedavirodhenaiva pravartante bauddhadivat kanicit tadavirodhenaiva siddhatvāt mūlāntarasya lobhamohādeḥ kalpayitum aśakyatvāt na hi tatra idaṃ prathamatā smaryate vedavad ekadeśasaṃvādāś ca bhūmnā dṛśyanta iti kuto mūlāntarakalpanāvakāśaḥ na ca vedapratipakṣatayā teṣām avasthānam vedaprasiddhacāturvarṇyādivyavahārāparityagāt manvādicodanānyāyaḥ sa yady api na vidyate śaivāgame tathā py asya na na yuktā pramāṇatā sarvopanipadām arthāḥ niḥśreyasapadaspṛśaḥ vivicyamānā dṛśyante te hi tatra pade pade ye ca vedavidām agryāḥ kṛṣṇadvaupāyanādayaḥ pramāṇam anumanyante te pi śaivādidarśanam pañcarātre pi tenaiva prāmāṇyam upavarṇitam aprāmāṇyanirmittaṃ hi nāsti tatrāpi kiñcana tatra ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇetā kathyate sa ceśvara eva ekasya kasyacid aśeṣajagatprasūtihetognādipuruṣasya mahāvibhūteḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāryavibhāgayogāt brahmeti viṣṇur iti rudra iti pratītiḥ vede ca pade pade eka eva rudro vasthe na dvitīyaḥ idaṃ viṣṇur vicakrame iti rudro viṣṇuś ca paṭhyate tadyogāś ca tadārādhanopāyā vede pi coditā eva śaivapañcarātrayos tu tadyogā evānyathopadeśyante na caiṣa eva vedavirodhaḥ vaikalpikatvād upāyānām ataḥ āptapraṇītatvāt vedāviruddhatvāc ca tayor apramāṇyam ye tu saugatasaṃsāramocakāgamāḥ pāpakācāropadeśinaḥ kas teṣu prāmāṇyam āryo numodate buddhaśāstre hi vispaṣṭā dṛśayte vedavāhyatā jātidharmocitācāraparihārāvadhāraṇāt saṃsāramocakāḥ pāpāḥ prāṇīhiṃsāparāyaṇāḥ mohapravṛttā eveti na pramāṇaṃ tadāgamaḥ niṣiddhasevanaprāyaṃ yatra karmopadiśyate prāmāṇyakathane tasya kasya jihvā pravartate tato yady api siddhiḥ syāt kadācit kasyacit kvacit brahmahatyārjitagrāmyabhogavannarakāya sā niṣiddhācaraṇopāttaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kena āptoktatvaṃ bhavati nānyathā mahājanaś ca vedānāṃ vedārthānugāmināṃ ca purāṇadharmaśāstrāṇāṃ vedāvirodhināṃ ca keṣāṃcid āgamānāṃ prāmāṇyam anumanyate na vedaviruddhānāṃ bauddhādyāgamānām iti kutas teṣām āptapraṇītatvam mūlāntaraṃ hi tatra suvacaṃ ajñānalobhādi ity evam abhidhāya vedaspardhino bauddhādayaḥ niṣeddhavyāḥ āha ko yaṃ mahājano nāma kim ākāraḥ kim āspadaḥ kiṃsaṃkyaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ iti vyākyātum arhasi api ca bauddhādayo buddhādīnāptān svāgamaprāmāṇyasiddhaye vadanti mahājanam api nijam tatsiddhaye vandakādikaṃ vadetadāryadeśaprasiddhaṃ sa mahājana ucyate ākāras tu tasya kīdṛśaṃ pāṇipādam kīdṛśaṃ śirogrīvaṃ vā kiyatī tasya saṃkhyā iti puruṣalakṣaṇādīni gaṇayituṃ na jānīmaḥ cāturvarṇyacāturāśramyarūpaścaiṣa mahājanaḥ vedapathapravṛttaḥ āgamāntaravādibhir apratyākhyeya eva mahājanaprasiddhyaiva vedaprāmāṇyaniścayāt kim arthaḥ kaṇṭhaśoṣo yoaṃ iyānāryeṇa saṃśiritaḥ vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyārthaṃ hi idaṃ śāstramārabdham iti gīyate vedaprāmāṇyasya ca mahajanaprasiddhyaiva āgamāntarebhyaḥ kaulādibhyaḥ khecaratādyarthasiddhāv api niṣiddhāracaṇakṛtaḥ kālāntare pratyavāyo vaṃśyabhāvīty uktam tad api na yuktam tasyārthasya tadāgamaniṣiddhatvābhāvāt āgamāntaraniṣiddhatve pi pravrājayet iti tasmāt sarveṣām āgamānāṃ āptaiḥ kapilasugatārhatprabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītānāṃ prāmāṇyam iti yuktam anye manyate sarvāgamānām īśvara eva bhagavān praṇeteti sa hi sakalaprāṇināṃ karmavipākaṃ īśvaro bhavet parihṛtam etat bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata abhytthānam adharmasya tadā tmānaṃ sṛjāmyaham iti śarīram eva śuddhodanasyāpatyaṃ nātmā ataḥ pratiyugaṃ viṣṇur eva bhagavān dharmarūpeṇāvataratītyāgamavidaḥ pratipannāḥ nanu vedasamānakartṛkeṣu āgamāntareṣu kathaṃ tādṛśo mahājanasaṃpratyayo nāsti evaṃ nāsti tena vartmānā bhagavatā katipaye prāṇinaḥ anugṛhītāḥ yeṣāṃ tādṛśa āśayo lakṣitaḥ vaidikena tu vartmānā niśaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇito nugṛhītāḥ iti tatra mahānādaraḥ āgamānatreṣu kṛśa iti ekakartṛke parasparavirodhaḥ katham iti cet vedair evātra vargitaḥ samādhiḥ teṣv api bhūmnaḥ parasparavirodhasya darśanādityuktam tasmād īśvarapraṇītatvād va sarvāgamanāṃ prāmāṇyam apare punaḥ vedamūlatvena sarvāgamaprāmāṇyam abhypāgaman yo hi manvādideśanānāṃ vedamūlatāyāṃ nyeya uktaḥ bhrānteranubhavādvā pi puṃvākyādvipralambhakāt dṛṣṭānuguṇyasāmarthyāt codanaiva laghīyasī iti sa sarvāgameṣu samānaḥ na ca manvādismṛtīnāṃ mūlabhūtā śrutiḥ upalabhyate anumānena tu tatkalpanām āgamāntareṣv api tulyam nanu ca uktaṃ api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt iti tacceha nāsti iti kathaṃ śrutyanumānam naiṣa doṣaḥ ekādhikārāvagamaḥ na prāmāṇye prayojakaḥ miśrānuṣṭhānasiddhau tu kāmaṃ bhavatu kāranam na ca pṛthaganuṣṭhīyamānam api karma na pramāṇamūlaṃ bhavati varṇāśramabhedānuṣṭheyakarmavat kartṛsāmānyaśūnyatvātatha mūlāntarodayaḥ pramāṇam sarvāgamapramāṇatve nanv evam upapādite aham apy adya yat kiñcit āgamaṃ racayāmi cet tasyāpi hi pramāṇatvaṃ dinaiḥ katipayair bhavet tasmān nāpi na pūrvokatanyāyo bhavati durvacaḥ jagatpustakalikhitaṃ yad api tad api kiñcid idānīṃ kenāpi dhūrtena prakhyāpyate maha nayam āgama iti tatrāpyāpta eva praṇetā kalpyatām yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ vaidikaṃ vacanam ucyatāṃ mūlabhūtam iti naitad asty avigītāṃ ye prasiddhiṃ prāpurāgamāḥ kṛtaś ca bahubhir yeśāṃ śiṣṭair iha parigrahaḥ adya pravartamānāś ca nāpūrvā iva bhavanti ye yeṣāṃ na mūlaṃ lobhati yebhyo nodvijate jataḥ teṣām eva ca udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samayādhyuṣite hotavyam iti homakālatrayam api vidhāya nindārthavādaiḥ tad eva niṣedhati śyāmo vā asyāhutim abhyavaharati ya udite juhoti śavalo vā asyāhutim abhyavaharati yo nudite juhoti śyāmaśavalāv asyāhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samayādhyuṣite juhoti na cārthavādamātram etad iti vaktavyam yataḥ vidhānaṃ kalpyate stutyā nindayā ca niṣedhanam vidhis tutyoḥ samā vṛttiḥ tathā nindāniṣedhayoḥ na hi nindā ninditum upādīyate kin tu ninditāditarat praśaṃsitum ity ayam api prakāro tra na saṃbhavati kālatrayasyāpy atra niṣedhāt kasyānyasya tannindayā praśaṃsā strīpuṃsasaṃyogakaraṇāntarasavyapekṣatvāt tadutpatteḥ paśuādiprāptis tu kasyacit adūrakāle pi dṛśyate pratigrahādinā tathā hy āsmatpitāmaha eva grāmakāmaḥ sāṃgrahaṇīṃ kṛtavān sa ca dṛṣṭeṣu kāraṇeṣu tadadarśanāt iṣṭiprayogānantaraṃ caitaddarśanāt iṣṭikṛtaṃ strīpuṃsayogādikāraṇatvam iti niścīyate kiñ ca sevādhyayanakṛṣyādisāmye pi phalabhedataḥ vaktuṃ na yuktā tatprāptiḥ dṛṣṭakāraṇamātrajā bhūtasvabhāvavādādi purastāt pratiṣidhyate tasmān nūnam upetavyaṃ atrānyad api kāraṇam tad uktaṃ tac caiva hi tatra kāraṇam śabdaś ca iti yatra punaḥ aviguṇe pi karmaṇi prayujyamāne āste  iti karmādivaiguṇyagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārthaṃ ṛṣiṇā prayuktam na tu vedasyāprāmāṇyakalpanā sādhvī sādguṇye karmaṇaḥ prācuryeṇa phaladarśanāt api ca vitrātaḥ praśavo bhavanti ity etāvān eva śāstrārthaḥ ānantarye tu na kiñcit pramāṇam asti tad ayaṃ prtyakṣādivisaṃvādaḥ ānantaryaviṣayaḥ citrādicodanā tu anirdiṣṭakālaviśeṣaviṣayeti viṣayabhedān na sātena bādhyate tadāha bhaṭṭaḥ   ānantaryavisaṃvādaḥ nāviśeṣapravartinīm codanāṃ bāvituṃ śaktaḥ sphuṭd viṣayabhedataḥ  iti yat tu karmasvabhāvaparyālocanayā citrāder anantaraphalatvam uktaṃ yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālaṃ mardanasukham iti tad etad atyantam anabhijñasyābhighānam vidhiphalānāṃ kriyāphalatulyatvānupapatteḥ iha kiñcit vidhiphalaṃ bhavati kiñcit kriyāphalam kṛpyāddau tu bhūmipāṭanādi kriyāphalam sasyasampattis tu vidhiphalam kaḥ punaḥ kṛpyādau vidhiḥ asti vārtāvidyāyāṃ vṛddhopadeśo vā kaścid vidhiḥ anvayavyatirekau vā tatra vidhisthānīyau bhaviṣyataḥ loke pi vetanakāmaḥ pacati ityādau pākakriyāphalaṃ odanaḥ vidhiphalaṃ tu vetanam tatra kriyāphalānām evaiṣa niyamaḥ yat kriyām antarabhavitvam vidhiphalānāṃ tu vetanādīnāṃ nāsti kālaniyamaḥ iṣṭāv api havirvikārādi kriyāphalaṃ sadyo bhavaty eva paśuputrādi tu vidhiphalaṃ anavacchinnakālam ata ev mardanasukhaṃ kriyāphalam iti sadyo bhavati mṛdgatas tu puṃsaḥ sevāphalam aniyatakālam grāmakāmo mahīpālaṃ sevetety evamādiṣu laukikeṣu vidhiṣv asti na kālaniyamaḥ paśuvirahakṛtakadarśanādidoṣadūyamānādhikārisvarūpaparyālocanayā sadyaḥphalatvam ucyate tad api na sāṃpratam puruṣecchāmātram etat na pramāṇavṛttam api ca aihikatvaṃ Phalasya tāvatā setsyati na punaḥ paratra vā loke sambhavāt avaśyaṃcaitad evaṃ vijñeyam tathāhi akṛtacitrāyāgānām api iha janmani paśavo dṛśyante te paridṛśyamānasevāpratigrahādikāraṇakā eveti kathyamāe karmanimittatvahāneḥ karmasamūhāt jyotiṣṭomādiphalaṃ pretyānubhūyate tataḥ śeṣeṇa citādinā karmaṇā viśiṣṭaṃ janma pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ tasmāt pūrvajanmakṛtacitrādinibandhanaḥ iha janmani paśulābhaḥ nākarmanimittakaḥ nānyakarmanimittaka ity evam aniyataphalatvāt citrāder iha janmani phalādarśane pi nānṛtatvaṃ tavvodanānām janmāntare hi tā iṣṭayaḥ phalaṃ dāsyantīti atrocyate kiṃ vācanikam etat karmaṇāṃ traividhyam uta puruṣe cchādhīnam iti tatra vacanaṃ tāvat trividhavibhāgapratipādakaṃ nāsti kārīrīṃ nirvapet vṛṣṭikāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta citrayā paśukāmaḥ ity etāvanmātraśravaṇam na hy atra aihikatvaṃ pāralaukikatvaṃ aniyatatvaṃ vā kvacit phalasya paṭhitam vidhivṛttam api iyad eva yat sapratyayapravartanaṃ nām tatra idam evaṃkāmena kartavyam ity etāvān liṅarthaḥ apuruṣārtharūpe tu vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyaḥ tasmāt niṣpramāṇakaṃ traividhyam yas tu citrādīnām aniyataphalatve nyāya uktaḥ citrādīnāṃ phalaṃ tāvat kīṇaṃ tatraiva janmani ityādi sa kārīryām api niścitaihikaphalāyāṃ dadhyodanabhojanasukhasādhanādṛṣṭakāritā paśuvṛṣṭisṛṣṭir bhavatu atha śṛṅgagrāhikayā paśuphalā citreṣṭir upadiśyate tena na sukhasāmānyākṣepakakarmanibandhanaḥ paśulābhaḥ evaṃ tarhi vṛṣṭāv api vacanaṃ nāsti yo vṛṣṭikāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta yadi kāmayeta varṣakaḥ parjanya syād iti nīcaiḥ sado minuyāt ityādau tatra pāralaukikaphalatvaṃ syāt yadi ca cvobhūte juhuyāt iti vacanamahimnaiva hy ātmambharir eva yajamāno bhavati tasyāpi svavāsinī kumārātithibhṛtyādibhojanapūrvakasvabhojananiyamopadeśāt bahutaropakārakatvaṃ tu vṛṣṭer ity alaṃ tulayā yad api pratyāsannatvena kāmyamānatvāt vṛṣṭer aihikatvaṃ kathyate tad api tādṛg eva paśvāder api tathaiva kāmyamānatvāt tatrāvagrahavihitasantāpatayā pratyāsannatvena vṛṣṭir abhilaṣyate ihāpi daurgatyodvegāt āsannatayaiva paśavaḥ kāmyante tasmāt vāridaḥ tṛptam āpnoti sukham akṣayamannadaḥ ityādivacanopadiṣṭasāmānyasukhasādhanādṛṣṭanibandhanaiveyaṃ ihākṛṭakarmaṇāṃ vṛṣṭipaśvādisaṃpattir iti na bṛhaspatimatavat akarmanimittaṃ phalam nāpi karmaphalasādhyasādhanabāvaniyamavyavahārollaṅghanam iti yac ca kārīryāḥ kvacitphalāvisaṃvāde samādhānam uktaṃ phalati yadi n sarvaṃ tat kadācit tad eva dhruvan aparam abhuktaṃ karma śāstrīyam āste  iti tena sā py aniyataphalaiva syāt na hi tatkarmāntaraṃ āsaṃsāraṃ pratibandhakaṃ bhavati phalopabhogād dhi tasyāvaśyaṃ kṣayeṇa bhavitavyam pratibandhake ca kṣīṇī kārīryā svaphalaṃ tadā dātavyam eva sā py adattaphalā na kṣīyata evetyevaṃ janmāntare tatphalasaṃbhavāt tasyā api aniyataphalatvam anena ca prakāreṇa citrāder apy aniyataphalatvaṃ asmābhir iṣyata eva yatra samyakprayuktāyām apīṣṭau karmāntarapratibandhād eva paśūnām anupalambhaḥ kalpyate sarvatha sadyaḥphalatvamātravarjaṃ samānayogakṣemā kārīryā citreṣṭiḥ etena brahmavarcasavīryān nādyagrāmādikāmeṣṭayo pi vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt yathāśrutaṃ gautamaṃ boddhavyam yad apy abhyadhāyi samagrāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa kāmyakarmaprayogāt kutaḥ karmaṇo vaiguṇyāvasara iti tad apy asāram sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttāv api pramādāt asaṃvedyamānavaiguṇyasaṃbhavāt sa ca vicitraḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśitaḥ tasmāt pūrvokta eva pratisamādhānamārgaḥ śreyān yat punaḥ pūrvapākṣikeṇa kathitam kālāntare karmābhāvāt kutaḥ phalam iti tad api na samyak yady apy āphalaniṣpatteḥ karmaṇo nāsty avasthitiḥ tathāpy asty eva saṃskāraḥ puruṣasya tadāhitaḥ karmajanyo hi saṃskāraḥ puṃso buddhyādivad guṇaḥ tasya cāphalasaṃyogāt avasthitir upeyate yathendriyādisaṃyogāt ātmano buddhisaṃbhavaḥ tathā yāgādikarmabhyaḥ tasya saṃskārasaṃbhavaḥ buddhis tu bhaṅgurā tasya saṃskāras tu phalāvadhiḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo hi nānyathā phalakarmaṇoḥ smṛtibījaṃ tu saṃskāraḥ tasyānyair api mṛṣyate tathaiva phalasaṃyogabījaṃ so sya bhaviṣyati sa yāgadānahomādijanyo dharmagirocyate brahmahtyādijanyas tu so dharma iti kathyate kapilās tu antaḥkaraṇasya buddheḥ vṛttiviśeṣam dharmam āhuḥ ārhatāḥ puṇyapudgalān dharmatvena vyapadiśanti śākyabhikṣavaḥ cittavāsanāṃ dharmam ācakṣate vṛddamīmāṃsakāḥ yāgādikarmanirvartyaṃ apūrvaṃ nāma dharmam abhivadanti yāgādikarmaiva śābarā bruvate vākyārtha eva niyogātmā apūrvaśabdavācyaḥ dharmaśabdena ca sa evocyata iti prābhākarāḥ kathayanti tatra puṇyapudgalavṛttipakṣayoḥ kapilārhadgranthakathitayoḥ tanmatanirāsād eva nirāsaḥ ātmanaś ca samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt tasyaiva vāsanā na cetasa iti saugatapakṣo py ayuktaḥ sarvagayāgāntarālavartinaś ca sthirasya nirādhārasyāpūrvasya niṣpramāṇakatvāt jarajjaiminīyapravado py apeśalaḥ api ca phalasya vā kācid utpatsyamānadaśā yāgasya vā śaktiḥ apūrvaśabdenocyate na ca niyogaḥ vākyārtha eva apūrvaśabdavācyaḥ tasyopariṣṭād apākariṣyamāṇatvāt nāpi yo yāgam anutiṣṭḥati taṃ dharmika ity ācakṣata iti yāgādisāmānādhikaraṇyena prayogāt sa eva dharmaśabdavācya iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ tasya kṣaṇikatvena kālāntare phaladātṛtvānupapatteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo pi caikātato nāsty eva yāgadānādinā dharmo bhavatīty api laukikaḥ prayogāḥ santi te cāmī saṃskriyāpakṣasākṣiṇaḥ evaṃ yajñena yajñamayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan iti vaidiko pi prayogaḥ tadviṣaya eva vyākhyeyaḥ tasya sthāyitvena kālāntare phaladānayogyatopapatteḥ saṃskāro nṛguṇaḥ sthāyī tasmād dharma iti sthitam tasmāc ca phalaniṣpatteḥ na citrādau mṛṣārthatā yad api yajñāyudhivākye pratyakṣaviruddham upapādyāte sma bhasmībhāvopalambhāt kāyasyeti tad apy asamīcīnam eṣa iti śarīrābhedopacāreṇa ātmana eva nirdeśāt tasya ca svargagamanaṃ bhavaty eva gamanaṃ ca tadupabhoga eva tasyocyate yathā śarīrādiyogaviyogau janmamareṇe iti na tu vyāpinaḥ parispandātmakakriyāyoga upapadyate jñānacikīrṣāprayatnasamavāyaś ca tasya kartṛtvam iti varṇayiṣyate yajñāyudhasambandho pi svasvāmibhāvādiḥ tasyaiva vyāpakatvāviśeṣe pi vyavasthayopapadyata iti na kaścid atra virodhaḥ tasmāt sarvatra niravakāśam anṛtatvādidūṣaṇam yo pi havanakālavidhau vyāghātadoṣo darśitaḥ so pi na doṣa eva tatrānuṣṭānabhedena kālatritayacodanā yo yasya coditaḥ kālaḥ laṅghanīyo na tena saḥ tataś cānyatamaṃ kālaṃ abhyupetyainam ujjhataḥ nindeti na virodho tra kaścid vidhiniṣedhayoḥabhyāse paunaruktyaṃ ca kāryārthatvād adūṣanam saṃpādyaṃ pāñcadaśyaṃ hi sāmidhenīṣu coditam imam ahaṃ pañcadaśāreṇa vajreṇāpavādhe yo smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ  iti śrūyate ekādaśasāmidhenya ṛcas tu paṭhyante tatrābhyāsam antareṇa pāñcadaśyaṃ nāvakalpyata ity evam avaśyakartavyo bhyāsaḥ sa cāyam aniyamena prāptaḥ vacanena niyamyate prathamottame ṛcau triruccāraṇīye iti tasmāt tatprayojanārthatvāt na punaruktādoṣaḥ abhyāse phalarahite hi paunaruktyaṃ doṣaḥ syād iha tu na tasya niṣphalatvam vyāghātānṛtapunaruktatādi tasmāt vedasya ślathayati na pramāṇabhāvam iyaṃ ca vākyārthavicāraṇā pi prāmāṇyasidhyaupayikīti matvā cakre svaśāstre munineha vedaprāmāṇyanirvāhaṇadīkṣitenananu nādyāpi vedasya bhavadbhir nipuṇair api svadehasaṃbhavā doṣāḥ nikhilāḥ paripiñjitāḥ tathāhi so rodīt yad arodīt tad rudrasya rudratvam  prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakkhidat tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt tato jas tūpara udgāt  devā vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśo na prājānan  ityevamādīnām arthavādānāṃ kiṃ yathāśrutavastuparatvam uta tebhyaḥ kāryarūpārthopadeśaparikalpanam uta liṅādiyuktavākyāntarapratipādyamānakāryarūpārthaupayikatvam iti cintyam sarvathā ca pramādaḥ svarūpaparatve tāvat pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthopadeśāt aprāmāṇyam evāvatarati rodanavapotkhedanadiṅmohāder arthasya tathātve niścayābhāvāt kiñca stenaṃ mano nṛtavādinī vāk  ity evañjātīyakānām arthavādavākyānāṃ vispaṣṭam eva pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthapratipādakatvam na hi nisargata eva sarvaprāṇinām anṛtavādinī vāk bhavati stenaṃ vā manaḥ api ca dhūma evāgner dadṛśe nārciḥ tasmād arcir evāgner naktaṃ dṛśyate na dhūmaḥ  iti pratyakṣaviruddham abhidhīyate naktaṃ dinaṃ dvayor api indriyārthasannikarṣe sati grahaṇāt kiñca etan na vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smo brāhmaṇā vā  iti brāhmaṇajāter upadeśasahāya pratyakṣagamyatvāt tadviruddha eṣo rthavādaḥ śāstravirodho py asti ko hi tadvada yady amuṃṣmil loke sti vā na vā  itiśāstre svargādiphalānāṃ jyotiṣṭomādikarmāṇāṃ upadeśāt keyam anavakptiḥ api ca gargatrirātrabrāhmaṇam adhikṛtya śrūyate  śobhate sya mukhaṃ ya evaṃ veda  iti na hi kasyacit evaṃviditaḥ mukhaṃ śobhata iti pratyakṣavirodhaḥ anyakarmānarthakyaśāṃsī ca kaścid arthavādo bhavati pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti  paśubandhayājī sarvān lokān abhijayati  tarati mṛtyuṃ tarati pāpmānaṃ tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo śvmeghena yajate yaś caivaṃ veda iti yadi pūrṇāhutyaiva sarvakāmāvāptiḥ paśubandhayogenaiva sarvalokajayaḥ aśvam eghavedenaiva tatphalāvāptiḥ tat kim artham anyakarmopadeśḥ upadiṣṭāny api tāni bahukleśasādhyāni karmāṇi vyarthāni bhaveyuḥ anenaiva laghunopāyena tatphalaprāpter darśanāt api ca na pṛthivyām agniś cetavyaḥ nāntarikṣe na divi  iti vede cayananiṣedhe evātra bhaṅgthā bhavet divi cāntarikṣe ca tāvat cayanaprayoga eva nāsti kiṃ tanniṣedhena pṛthivīcayananiṣedhārthaṃ ca yad vākyaṃ tat cayanapratiṣedhārtham eva bhavet apṛthivvydhikaraṇakasya cayanasyānupapatteḥ nāpi tebhya eva kāryarūpārthaparokalpanaṃ upapannam aśakyatvātso rodīt yad arodīt tad rudrasya rudratvaṃ  ity atra kāryaṃ kalpyamānam evaṃ kalpyate rudraḥ kira rurodaḥ ato nyenāpi roditavyam iti tac cāśakyam priyaviprayogajanitasantāpavaśena hi bāṣpamocanaṃ rodanam ucyate na tat codanopadeśāt kartuṃ śakyate prajāpatir ātmano vapām uccikhedaḥ tasmād anyo py evam utkhidet ātmano vapām iti duranuṣṭhāno yam arthaḥ ko hi nāma ātmano vapām utkhidet kasya vā vapāhome sati samanantaram eva hutabhujaḥ paśus tūpara udgacchet iti devā diśo nājñāsiṣuḥ ataḥ anyo pi na jānīyāt iti aśakyopadeśaḥ na hi diṅmoho upadeśāt karyuṃ śakyaḥ na ca sarvasmād arthavādāt vidhiḥ kalpayituṃ śakya iti madhyamo pi satpakṣaḥ nāpi tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhavati śakyāntaravihitakāryarūpārthaupayikatvaṃ hi tadupayogidravyadevatādividhānadvārakaṃ bhavati yathā agnihotraṃ juhoti  ity atra dagdho juhoti  payasā juhoti  iti dravyaviniyogavidheḥ yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti  iti devatāvidher vā na cāyam arthavādeṣu prakāraḥ saṃbhavati na caibhiḥ brīhīn avahanti  brīhīn prokṣati  itivat dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭā vā kācid itikartavyatopadiśyate tasmat na teṣāṃ tadaupayikatvam nanu prekṣāvatāṃ prarocanātiśayakaraṇena pravṛttyutsāham āvahantaḥ arthavādāḥ tadupayogino bhaviṣyati naitad api samyak pravṛttyutsāho hi keṣāṃcin mate nirapekṣaśabdapratyayād eva sidhyati asmanmate tu tatpraṇetṛpuruṣapratyayād iti kiṃ prarocanayā evaṃkāma idaṃ kuryāt  yat kiñcid etat tad evaṃ prakāratrayeṇāpi arthavādapadānām ananvayāt ekadeśākṣepeṇa sarvākṣepa eva kriyata iti apramāṇaṃ vedaḥ nanu yāvaty eva pramāṇāntaraviuddhatvam upalabhyate tāvaty evāprāmāṇyam astu sarvatra tu kutastyā tadāśaṅkā iti maivam tat tatsāmānyāt anyatrāpy anāśvāsaḥ mīmāṃsakapakṣe hi arthavādarahitakevalavedagranthānupalambhāt tadanuṣaṅkeṇa sarvatra sāpekṣatvam avatarari naiyāyikamate tu vedapraṇetur īśvarasya kvacit vitathavāditve dṛśyamāne katham anyatra satyavāditāyāṃ dṛḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavet ity aprāmāṇyaṃ sarvaveti atrābhidhīyate vidhyekavākyatayaiva bhūmnā tāvad arthavādapadāni paṭhyante vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmo vāyur vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati  iti teṣāṃ tadekavākyatvād eva prāmāṇyam vāyur vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā  ity ataḥ yady api kriyā nāvagamyate nāpi tatsaṃbaddhaḥ kaścid arthaḥ tathā pi vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatvaṃ tasya pratīyate bhūtikāmaḥ  ity evam anto vidhyuddeśaḥ katham ekavākyabhāvaḥ padānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvāt nanu bhūtikāmaḥ  ity evam antena vākyena vidheyaṃ vihitam utpāditaṃ pratipattur anākāṅkṣatvaṃ kṛtaś ca śabdakartavyam iti kim anyena kṣepṣṭhā  ityādinā prayojanam tadarthasyaiva stutir iti brūmaḥ nanu stutyā pi kiṃ prayojanam stuto stutaś ca tāvān eva so rthaḥ maivam sastutipade hi vākye stutipadasahitaṃ vidhāyakaṃ vidhāyakaṃ bhavati kim idānīṃ kevalaṃ liṅādiyuktaṃ vākyaṃ na vidhāyakam ucyate yadi stutipadāni na śrūyate tat bāḍhaṃ bhavati vidhāyakam eteṣu ca satsu tatsahitaṃ tadvidhāyakaṃ bhavati na kevalaṃ tathā pratīteḥ stutipadasambandhe sati bhinnavākyatā mā bhūd iti vidhipadena stutipadena ca saṃbhūyārtho vidhīyate tathā vagamāt anyathā hi pratīyamānaḥ padārthānvayaḥ tyajyeta vākyabhedo vā kalpyate tasmān na stutipadānām ānarthakyam nanu kevalasyāpi vidhivākyasya sāmarthyāt kim arthaṃ stutipadāni prayuñjate iti ucyate aparyanuyojyo jaiminīyānāṃ mate śabdaḥ asmākaṃ ca bhagavān īśvaraḥ ukte sati pratipattāro vayaṃ vedasya na kartāraḥ pratipattau ca kramo darśitaḥ evañ ca yady api dravyadevatetikartavyatāvidhānadvārakaṃ aṅgavidhivad arthavādavakyānāṃ kāryaupayikatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi pratītyaṅgatvaṃ na nivāryate ata eva pramāṇo prayogitvam eṣām ācakṣate na prameyopayogitvam kevalavidhipadaśravaṇe hi na tadādriyante yajvānaḥ tatra vidhivibhaktir avasīdati tāṃ nimajjantīm iva arthavādajanitakarmaprāśastyapratyayaḥ uttabhnāti sarvajitā yajeta  ity ataḥ na tathāvidhaḥ śraddhātiśayo bhavati yathāvidhaḥ sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitena sarvaṃ jayati  ity arthavādapadebhyaḥ loke pi iyaṃ gauḥ kretavyā  ity ataḥ na tathā kretāraḥ pravartante yathā eṣā bahusnigdhakṣīrāsuślīlā sāpatyā anaghaprajā ca  ity evamādibhyaḥ stutibhyaḥ svānubhavasākṣiko yam arthaḥ ata eva kecit aśrutārthavādake pi vidhivākye tatkalpanām icchanti yathā kvacit arthavādāt vidhikalpanam iti yathoktam vidhis tulyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ sāmānaviṣayeṣyate  iti anadhigamyamanavidhisambandhāc ca arthavādāt vidhir unnīyate na gmyamānasambandhāt ata eva ca so rodīt  ityevamādibhyaḥ na roditavyam  ityādividhikalpanam iṣyate mudhaiva pūrvapakṣiṇā tad āśaṅkitam vidhyantareṇaikavākyatvaṃ hi pratyakṣam ihopadiśyate barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam  ity asya vidheḥ śeṣo yaṃ so rodīt  ityādiḥ rudro ruroda tasya yadaśru aśīryata tadrajatam abhavat yo hi barhiṣi rajataṃ dadāti purā sya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati  iti tasmāt barhiṣi rajatam na deyam  iti prājāpatyam ajaṃ tūparam ālabhate ity asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ prajāpatir ātmano vapām udkkhidat  iti vapāhomamāhātmyapradarśanārtham ucyate agnau vai pragṛhītamātrāyāṃ vapāyāṃ ajas tūpara udagād iti ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaś caruḥ  ity asya vidheḥ śeṣe yaṃ devā vai devayajanamadhyavasāya diśo na prājānan  iti vyāmohānām ādityaś carur nāśayitā yathā diṅmohasyeti evaṃ tatra tatra vidhiśeṣatvaṃ arthavādānāṃ veditavyam katham punar idam asatyam evocyate rudraruditāt rajatam ajāyata prajāpatihomasamiddhād agneḥ ajas tūpara udagāt  iti ucyate nedam asatyam yad asya vākyasya pratipādyaṃ tatra satyartham evedam na cāsya yathāśruto rthaḥ pratipādyaḥ kintu vidheyo niṣedhyo vā kaścid arthaḥ ihānvākhyāne dvayam āpatati yac ca vṛttāntajñānam yac ca kasmiṃścid arthe prarocanā dveṣo vā tatra vṛttāntajñānaṃ na pravartakam na nivartakam iti prayojanābhāvāt anarthakam anādaraṇīyam prarocanādveṣau pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgatvāt tadarthau gṛhītvā prarocanāyāḥ pravarteta dvEsān nivarteteti tatra tatpratipādyasatyārtha evārthavādaḥ yat tu arudati rudre kathaṃ tadrodanavacanam arodanaprabhave vā rajate kathaṃ tadudbhavatā bhidhānam iti guṇavādamātram gauṇa eṣa vādaḥ śvetavarṇasārūpyādinā rodanaprabhavaṃ rajataṃ ninditum ucyate evaṃ paśuyāge vapāhomapraśaṃsāyai prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakkhidat  iti vṛttāntākhyānaṃ yojanīyam ādityacarupraśaṃsāyai devā vai devayajanamadhyavasāya diśo na prājānan  iti atha vā naiyāyikānām anekaprakārapuruṣātiśayavādināṃ yathāśrute py arthe nātyantam asaṃbhavaḥ rudrasya ruditāt rajatajanma prajāpater vapotkhedaḥ taddhomāt tūparapaśūdgamaḥ devānāṃ devayajanādhyavasāne diṅmoha ity evaṃjātīyakam api satyam astu ko doṣaḥ tatsarvathā nārthavādā na pramāṇam evaṃ stenaṃ mano nṛtavādinī vāk  iti gauṇa eṣa vādaḥ pracchannatayā stenaṃ mana ucyate vāhulyābhiprāyeṇa cānṛtavādinī vāk iti dhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nārcir arcir evāgner naktaṃ dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ  iti dūrabhūyastvābhiprāyeṇa kasmaicit prayojanāya sāyaṃprātarhomadevatāstutaye kathyate na caitadvidmo yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ abrāhmaṇā vā  iti pravarānumantraṇapraśaṃsāyai saṃśaya iva darśitaḥ abrāhmaṇo pi yajamānaḥ pravarānumantraṇena brāhmaṇaḥ syād iti śobhate sya mukhaṃ ya evaṃ veda  iti vidyāpraśaṃsaiṣā śobhata iti śiṣyair udvīkṣyamāṇasya mukham iti sarvān kāmān āpnoti  iti sarvatvaṃ prakṛtā pekṣam stutyarthaṃ cāśvamedhādhyāyane tatphalavacanam hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya cetavyam  iti stutyārthatayā divyantarikṣe pṛthivyāṃ ca cayanaṃ pratiṣidhyate anupahitahiraṇyāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ agnir na cetavyaḥ na punar na cetavya eva tasyām iti ādityo yūpaḥ  iti añjane sati tejasvitayā yūpasya ādityarūpatā stutaye kathyate tatkāryakāritvāc ca yajamānaḥ prastara ucyate na hi mukhyaiva vṛttyā loke śabdāḥ pravartante gauṇyā pi vṛttyā tadvyavahāradarśanat evaṃ vede pi teṣāṃ tathā prayogo bhaviṣyati itthaṃ ca mantreṣv api aindryā gārhupatyopasthānam aviruddham evaṃ stutinindāsvarūpās tāvad arthavādāḥ vidhyekavakyatvena pramāṇam parakṛtipurākalpasvarūpā api tathaiva yojyāḥ kvacit punaḥ arthavādenaiva kaścid aṃśaḥ pūryata iti na tu pratītyaṅgatvam eva tasya kāryāṅgatvam api bhavati yathā pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīr upāsate  iti aśrūyamāṇādhikārasya rātrisatravidheḥ adhikārāṃśo rthavādād eva labhyate yathoktaṃ phalamātreyo nirdeśāt  iti tatra hi pratiṣṭhākāmāḥ satram āsīran  ity arthavādavaśāt gamyate vākyārthaḥ kvacit vidhivākyasyārthasandehe arthavādātmakāt vākyaśeṣāt tanniścayo bhavati yathā aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti  ity añjanadravye ghṛtatailavasādibhedena saṃdihyamāne tejo vai ghṛtam  ity arthavādāt ghṛtenāktāḥ śarkarā upadheyā iti gamyate ityarthavādā vidhinaikyabhāvāt tadvatpramāṇatvam amī bhajante asti pratītyanvayita hi teṣāṃ kvacic ca kāryānvayitā tu dṛṣṭā yad vā svarūpaparatām api saṃspṛśanta prāmāṇyavartmata ime na parityajanti naiyāyikā hi puruṣātiśayaṃ vadantaḥ vṛttāntavarṇam apīha yathārtham āhuḥ ādityayūpavacanādiṣu tu svarūpayāthārthyam ittham upapādayituṃ na śakyam gauṇīṃ tu vṛttim avalambya kṛtā tadarthavyākhyeti teṣv api na viplavanāvakāśaḥ athedānīṃ mantrā vicāryante kiṃ arthaprakāśanadvāreṇa vidhyarthaopayogitā teṣām utoccāraṇamātreṇa iti nanu ubhayathā pi prāmāṇyaviśeṣāt kiṃ tadvicāreṇa na hīdaṃ śāstraṃ vedasyārthavicārāya mīmāṃsāvat pravṛttam api tu prāmāṇyanirṇayāyaiveti satyam prāmāṇyanirṇayāyaivedaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttam avivakṣitārthatve tu mantrāṇāṃ apratipādakatvalakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva bhavet sāmānyāt vedabrāhmaṇavākyānām api tathābhāvaprasaṅga iti vedasya karmāvabodhārthatvaṃ hīyate na ca saṃśayaviparyayajananam evāprāmāṇyam ajñānajanakatvam apy aprāmāṇyam eva tad ucyate uccāraṇamātropakāriṇo mantrāḥ kutaḥ tathā viniyogopadeśāt uta prathā uru prathasva iti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati  iti yady arthaprakāśanopakāriṇo mantrāḥ sāmarthyād eva prathanopayogī maṃtro yam iti kim arthaṃ prathane viniyujyante vacanena yathā sākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa cen nīyate nūnam akṣībhyāṃ na paśyatīti gamyate agnīd agnīn vihara  iti ca karoty evāsau ṛtvik agniviharaṇam kiṃ vacanena uccāraṇamātropakāriṇi mantre taduccāraṇād evādṛṣṭaṃ kiñcit upakārajātaṃ kalpyate vākyakramaniyamāc cāvivaksitārthān mantrān avagacchāmaḥ niyatapadakramā hi mantrāḥ paṭhyante yady arthapratipādanenopakururyuḥ niyatakramāśrayaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt kramāntareṇāpi tadarthāvagamasaṃpatteḥ itaś cavivakṣitārthā mantrāḥ avidyamānārthaprakāśino hi kecid dṛśyante yathā catvāri śṛṅgāḥ trayo asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyānāviveśa  iti na hi catuḥśṛṅgaṃ tripādaṃ dviśiraskaṃ saptahastaṃ kiñcid yajñasādhanam asti yad anena prakāśyate itaś caivam acetanapraiṣapradarśanāt oṣadhe trāyasvainam iti na hy oṣadhir budhyate trāṇāya niyuktā smīti śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ  iti codāharaṇam na hy acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ śrotuṃ niyujyante api caaditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam  iti vipratiṣiddham abhivadanti mantrāḥ kathaṃ saiva dyauḥ tad evāntarikṣaṃ bhavitum arhati keṣāñcic ca mantrāṇāṃ artho jñātum eva na śakyate te katham arthaprakāśanenopakuryuḥ abhyaksāt indra ṛṣṭiḥ  iti sṛṇy eva jarbharītur pharītu  iti indraḥ somasya kāṇukāḥ  iti ca tasmād avivakṣitārthā mantrāḥ api ca uccāraṇam ubhayathā pi kartavyaṃ mantrāṇāṃ adṛṣṭāya vā arthapratyāyanāya vā yato rtham api nānuccaritāḥ śabdāḥ pratyāyayitum utsahante tadavaśyakartavye sminn uccāraṇe tata eva yajñopakāre siddhe kiṃ arthapratipādanadvāraparigraheṇa prayojanam iti tatrocyate kiṃ mantrebhyo rthapratītir eva nāsti kiṃ vā bhavaty api nirnimittā sau uta sannimittā pi grahaikatvapratītivat avivakṣitā iti na tāvat pratītir eva nāsti śabdārthasambandhavyutpattisaṃskṛtam atītaṃ barhir devasadanaṃ dāmi  ity evamādimantraśravaṇe sati tadarthapratīteḥ svasaṃvedyatvāt nāpy asau nirnimittā lokavat padānām evātra nimittatvat vyutpattir api na nāsti ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ ta eva vaidikā ta eva teṣām arthā iti lokavyavahāratas tadvyutpattisaṃbhavāt nāpi bhavaty api mantrebhyo rthapratītiḥ grahaikatvapratītivad avivakṣitā bhavitum arhati avivakṣānibandhanasya kvacid apy abhāvāt grahādivacanāntaranirjñātasaṃkhyatvat somāvasekanirharaṇasya ca sammārgakāryasya sarvagrahasādhāraṇatvāt grahaṃ  itivibhakteś ca karmakārakasamarpaṇamātreṇāpi sārthakyopapatteḥ yuktām ekatvam avivakṣitam iti kathayitum iha tu barhir devasadanaṃ dāmi  ityevamādivākyakriyamāṇakratūpayogidravyādiprakāśanasya vidhyapekṣitatvāt mantreṇa smṛtaṃ karma karoti tathā kriyamāṇaṃ abhyudayakāri bhavatīti na yajñāṅgaprakāśanam avivakṣitam ato noccāraṇamātropakāriṇo mantrāḥ upamantrāṇṃ tu pāvamānīṃ japeta  vaiṣṇavīṃ japeta  iti vidhinaiva tāvanmātrākṣepaṇāt nārthena prakāśitena prayojanam iti kiṃ tatra kriyate yatra tu japeta  iti vidhir na śrūyate na tatra tadarthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ apekṣyamāṇaś copekṣituṃ yuktaḥ nanu yadi japeta  iti vidheḥ vaiṣṇavyādiṣu nārthaḥ vivakṣyate tarhi svādhyāyo dhyetavyaḥ  iti akṣaragrahaṇamātravidhānāt sarvasyaiva vedasyāvivakṣitārthatvaṃ syāt maivam svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam iti dṛṣṭārthatvena vivakṣitārthatvāt etac ca śāstrāntare vistarato nirṇītam iha tu vitanyamānaṃ asmākam avāntaravicārācālatām āviṣkarotītina pratamyate yat tu tadarthaviniyogopadeśād iti avivakṣitārthatvam uktam tatra uru prathā uru prathasva  iti liṅgād eva prathanaviniyoge mantrasya siddhe kāmaṃ tadvidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ anarthakaṃ bhavatu prāptānuvādakatvāt na tu pratīyamānaḥ mantrād arthaḥ tyaktuṃ yuktaḥ tat kiṃ vacanaṃ anarthakam eva nānarthakam pratipannārthaviṣayaṃ tu tat arthavādārthaṃ vā tadvacanam yajñapatim eva tat prathayati  iti yad anena mantreṇa puroḍāśaṃ prathayati tadyajñapatiṃ yajamānam eva prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayatīti kvacit tu guṇārthavidhānam yathā tāṃ caturbhir ādatte  iti evaṃ agnīd agnīn vihara  ityādāv api draṣṭavyam yat tu niyatapadakramatvāt uccāraṇamātropayogino mantrā iti tad apy asādhu mīmāṃsakānām anāditvād vedasya tatkramalaṅghanānupapatteḥ yathoktaṃ  anyathākaraṇe cāsya bahubhyaḥ syān nivāraṇam  iti asmākam api yādṛk īśvarapraṇītaḥ tadanyathākaraṇe kim adhyetṇāṃ svātantryam asti tasmān nārthavivakṣāyai mantrakramaḥ prabhavati brāhmaṇavākyakramavat yad api catvāri śṛṅgāḥ  ity avidyamānārthavacanam aśaṅkitam tad api anabhijñatayā yajñasya vaiṣa guṇavādena sāṃstavaḥ catvāri śṛṅgā iti vedā uktāḥ trayo sya pādā iti savanāni dve śīrṣe iti dampatīyajamānau saptahastāsa iti chandāṃsi tridhā baddha iti mantrabrāhmaṇakalpaiḥ nibaddhaḥ vṛṣabha iti kāmān varṣati roravītīti stotraśastraprayogabāhulyāt śabdāyamānaḥ maho devo martyānāviveśeti manuṣyakartṛka ity evam eṣa yajñaḥ stuto bhavati tad yathā cakravākamithunastanī haṃsadantakeśī kāśavasaneti nadī stūyate oṣadhe trāyasvainam  iti cetanavan niyoga tasyāḥ stutyarthaḥ śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ  iti prātaranuvākastutiḥ itthaṃ nāmaiṣaḥ prātaranuvākaḥ praśasyaḥ yad acetanā grāvāṇo pi śṛṇuyuḥ iti aditirdyauraditir antarikṣam  iti guṇavādād apratiṣedhaḥ tad yathā loke tvam eva me mātā tvam eva me pitā tvam eva me bhaginī tvam eva bhrāteti yat tu keṣāñcin mantrāṇām artho na jñāyata iti sa puruṣāparādhaḥ saṃbhavati na mantrāparādhaḥ arthāvagamopāyeṣu bahuṣu satsv api tadanveṣaṇālasaḥ puruṣaḥ nārtham avagacchati na punar mantro trāparādhyati brāhmaṇavākyavat upāyatas tadarthāvagamadarśanāt upāyaś ca prathamastāvat vṛddhavyavahāra eva tulyatvāl lokavedaśabdārthānām ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ ta eva vaidikāḥ ta eva caiṣām arthā iti yady api ca agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅkṣanat  iti vede kṛtaṇatvaṃ agniśabdaṃ paṭhanti uttānā vai devagavā vahanti  vanaspate hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaste artham  iti laukikavaidikayoḥ śabdayoḥ arthayoś ca nānātvam ivāśaṅkyate tathā pi tathātvapratyabhijñānenāvadhārya īṣadvikṛtās ta eva vede iti laukiky eva vyutpattiḥ lokaprasiddhivipratiṣedhe tu śāstravitprasiddhiḥ pramāṇīkriyate yathā yavamayaś caruḥ  vārāhī upānahau  vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān sañcinoti  iti yavavarāhavetasaśabdāḥ dīrghaśūkasūkaravañ julakeṣu śiṣṭaprasiddhyā niyamyante na priyaṅgukṛṣṇaśakunijambūṣv iti yatra tu śiṣṭaprasiddhir nāsti tatra mlecchhemvo pi tadarthavyutpattir āśriyate yathā pikanematāmarasaśabdeṣu mlecchaprasiddher apy abhāve nigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ tena āśvinasūktaprakramāt jaraṇabharaṇanimittau jarbharītur pharītū  iti dvivacanāntasarūpāvetau śabdau aśvinor vācakāv iti gamyate evm anyatrāpy utprekṣaṇīyam tad anenāpi nimittena na mantrāṇām avivakṣitārthatvaṃ vaktavyam amī tasmād arthaprakaṭanamukhenaiva dadhati kriyārthatvaṃ mantrā na tu paṭhanamātreṇa japavat na taddvāreṇāpi ślathayitum ataḥ śakyata idaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ vede sakalapuruṣārthāmṛtanidhau idam idānīṃ parīkṣyate udbhidā yajeta  citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ  agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ  śyenenābhicaran yajeta  vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta  iti śrūyate tatra kiṃ udbhideti citrayeti agnihotram iti śyeneneti vājapeyeneti guṇavidhaya ete tattatkarmanāmadheyāni iti kim anena parīkṣitena prayojanam ubhayatrāpi prāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyata iti tadartham evedaṃ parīkṣyate yadi tāvat vrīhibhir yajeta  dagdhā juhoti  itivat guṇaḥ kiñcid udbhidādipadair vidhīyate anena dravyaviśeṣeṇa yāgaḥ kartavya iti tadābhāvārthasya yajyādeḥ anyato vagatir mṛgyā anavagatārthe bhāvārthe guṇavidhānasyānupapannatvāt āgneyo ṣṭākapālo bhavati  agnihotraṃ juhoti  iti vidhyantareṇa bhāvārthe codite tatra vrīhibhir yajeta  dagdhā juhoti  iti nanu vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta  ity anenaiva vākyena yāgākhyo bhāvārthaḥ codayiṣyate guṇaś ca tasmin vājapeyākhyo vidhāsyate iti ko doṣaḥ kathaṃ na doṣaḥ arthadvayavidhānena vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt vājapeyena svārājyaṃ kuryāt  ity eko arthaḥ vājapeyena giṇena yāgaṃ kuryāt  iti dvitīyo rthaḥ na ca sakṛd uccaritaṃ vākyaṃ arthadvayavidhānāya prabhavati nanu yajeta  iti rūpasāmyāt ubhayatrāpi sambadhyate yajeta svārājyakāmaḥ vājapeyena ca  iti tulyam asyobhayatrāpi rūpam na rūpasāmyasyāsiddhatvāt svārājyaṃ prāti yajiraprāptatvāt vidhīyate guṇaṃ ca prati prāptatvāt anūdyate anavagate ca karmaṇi guṇavidhānam aghaṭamānam iti avaśyaṃ guṇavidhipakṣe guṇaṃ prati yajiḥ prāptatvād uddeśyo bhavati pradhānaṃ ca sa eva svārājyaṃ prati vidheyatvāt upādeyo guṇaś ceti viruddharūpāpatteḥ na yajir ubhābhyāṃ yugapat sambaddhum arhati yaḥ svārājyaṃ sādhayitum iccheta sa yajetety anyad rūpam yad yajeta tat vājapeyenety anyad rūpam tasmāt bhāvārthaprāptau pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṇāt guṇavidhipakṣe tat apramāṇaṃ vacanam athaiṣa doṣo mā bhūd iti nāmadheyapakṣa āśrīyate tadaiṣām udbhidādipadānāṃ vispaṣṭam evānarthakyam yāvad evoktaṃ bhavati yajeta  iti tāvad eva vājapeyena yajeta  iti evam ānarthakyāt anyatrāpy asamāśvāsaḥ atrocyate guṇavidhipakṣe yathā bhavān āha tathāiva nāmadheyapakṣa eva tu śreyān ity abhyupagamyate tathā hi bhāvārthasya phalaṃ prati karaṇatvāt tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena tṛtīyā prayujyate tatra vājapeyena  iti sādhyaś ca bhavan bhāvārthaḥ karaṇabhāvam anubhavatīti sādhyatvāpekṣayā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena kvacit dvitīyā pi prayujyate agnihotraṃ juhoti  iti nanu guṇavan nāmāpi vidhātavyam eva anabhihitsyānavagamāt tataś ca guṇavidhipakṣaspṛśaḥ vākyabhedādidoṣāḥ tadavasthā eva naitad evam na hy asya karmaṇaḥ idaṃ nāma veditavyam iti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ vedo vidadhāti yogena tu kenacit pravartamānaṃ nāmadheyam avagamyata eva udbhedanam anena paśūnāṃ kriyata iti udbhididam dadhimadhupayoghṛtaṃ dhātāstaṇṭulā udakaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatyam  iti nānāvidhavicitradravyasādhyatvāt citrā agnaye hotram asminn ity agnihotram yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte evam anena dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyam ādatte  ity arthavādāt śyena iva śyeno yāgaḥ tasmāt karmanāmāny etāni yat tu nāmadheyapakṣe nairarthakyam āśaṅkitaṃ tad api na cāru nāmāpi guṇaphalopalabdheḥ arthavad ity abhiyuktaiḥ parihṛtatvāt evaṃnāmedaṃ karmety avagamyate tatra guṇaḥ dravyadevatādiḥ phalaṃ ca tasya svargaḥ paścād avagamyata iti tasmān nāmadheyapadānām aviruddho nvayḥ kvacit punar aprāpte bhāvārthe saguṇam eva tatkarma codyate yathā āgneyo ṣṭākapālo māvasyāyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ cā cyuto bhavati  iti yathā vā etasyaiva recatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeta  itīty alaṃ śastrāntarodgāragahanakathāvistareṇeti nāsti nāmadheyadvāreṇāpi pramāṇatā kṣepaḥ sarvaprakāreṇāpi siddhaṃ devapramāṇatvam iti vedaprāmāṇyasidhyartham ittham etāḥ kathāḥ kṛtāḥ na tu mīmāṃsakacchātapāramithyābhidhānataḥ nanu evaṃ vidhyarthavādamantrānāmadheyānāṃ kāryaupayiktvadarśanāt kārya evārthe vedaḥ pramāṇam ity uktaṃ syāt tataḥ kim siddhe rthe tasya prāmāṇyaṃ hīyate tato pi kim bhūyān bhūtārthābhidhāyigrantharāśir upekṣito bhavet sakalasya ca vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum etat pravṛttaṃ śāstram atra kecid āhuḥ sarvasyaiva vedasya kārye rthe prāmāṇyam tathā hi gṛhītasambandhaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati sambandhagrahaṇaṃ cāsya vṛddhavyavahārāt vṛddhānāṃ ca vyavahāraḥ pānīyam ānaya  gāṃ badhāna  grāmaṃ gaccha  iti kāryapratipādakair eva śabdaih pravartata iti tatraiva vyutpadyante bālāḥ prayojanoddeśena hi vṛddhā vākyāni prayuñjate na ca siddhārthābhinirvartata iti tasya na prayogayogyatvam aprayuñjyamānasya ca na sambandhagrahaṇam agṛhītasambandhasya ca na pratipādakatvam apratipādakasya ca na prāmāṇyam api ca ākhyātapadoccāraṇam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣapratyayānutpādāt avaśyam ākhyātayuktaṃ vākyaṃ prayoktavyam ākhyātapadena ca sādhyarūpo rtha ucyate nāmapadena ca siddhaḥ bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti vākyasya sādhyārthaniṣṭhatete na bhūtārthaviṣaye tasya prāmāṇyam ataś ca kārye arthe śabdasya prāmāṇyam yataś ca kāryarūpo rthaḥ śabdasyaiva viṣaya iti tatra śabdaḥ pramāṇatāṃ labhate siddho arthaḥ prasiddhatvād eva pramāṇāntaraparicchdayogya iti tatpratipādane tatpramāṇāntarasavyapakṣe śabdo bhavati tataś ca tadgrāhiṇaḥ pramāṇāntarasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyaṃ syāt na śabdasya śabdaś ca tadupasthāpanamātra eva niṣṭhaḥ syāt tasmāt śabdaprāmāṇyam icchatā kārya evārthe tatprāmāṇyam aṅgīkartavyam iti atrocyate yat brūṣe kārya evārthe vākyasya vyutpattir iti tad ayuktam evaṃ hi siddharūpo yaṃ tasyārthaḥ  iti kathaṃ tvayocyate na hy alabdhavyutpatteḥ śabdāt arthapratyayo yujyate artapratītiś ca tato dṛśyate vyutpattiś ca tatra nāstīti citram na ca kāryaparair eva śabdaiḥ loke vyavahāraḥ vartamānopadeśakebhyo pi nadyādivākyebhyaḥ vyavahārapravṛtteḥ tatrāpi vyutpattir bhavaty eva api ca aṅgulyādinā puro vasthitam arthaṃ nirdiśya yadā kaścit kathayati asyedaṃ nāma  iti tadā kāryopadeśam antareṇāpi bhavaty eva vyutpattiḥ asmāc chabdād ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ  iti kāryopadeśa evāsāv iticet na tādṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt asyedaṃ nāma  iti hi śrūyate na asmād ayaṃ pratipattavyaḥ  iti asyedaṃ nāma  ity eṣām evākṣarāṇām eṣo rtha iti cet na apadārthasya kyārthatvāyogāt na caivaṃ kalpayitum api śakyate asyedaṃ nāma  ity etāvataiva tatpratipattisiddheḥ pratipattikartavyatā bhidhānasya niṣprayojanatvāt kāryaparād api śabdāt vyutpattir bhavantī na vākyārthamātraparyavasāyinī bhavati kin tv ekaikapadāvāpāpodvāpadvārakapadārthaparyantā sā bhavati padārthavyutpattisaṃskṛtamateś ca abhinavakaviviracitavartamānopadeśaślokaśravaṇe pi vākyārthapratītir dṛśyata eveti nāvyutpattikṛtam aprāmāṇyam vakṣyāmaś ca vākyārthacintāyām api pramāṇāntarasāpekṣatvaṃ tasya pratyuta prāmāṇyam āvahati na pratihanti kiñ cedaṃ sāpekṣatvam iti vaktavyam kiṃ siddhārthābhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya utpattāv eva pramāṇāntarasāpekṣatvam uta tadviṣayasya pramāṇāntaraparicchedayogyatvam ity ubhayathā tiprasaṅgaḥ utpattau pramāṇāntarasavyapekṣatayā yady aprāmāṇyaṃ varṇyate hanta hatam anumānam tasyotpattau pratyakṣādisāpekṣatvāt varṇitaṃ ca tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam  iti tadviṣayasya pramāṇāntaragrahaṇāyogyatāyāṃ tu tadaprāmāṇye pratyakṣādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ aprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti pramāṇasaṃplavasya prāk pratipāditatvāt api ca vidhiyukteṣv api vaidikeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu adhīṣva  gāṃ badhāna  grāmaṃ gaccha ity evamādiṣu anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihārasādhanasāmarthyāvagamena laukikaṃ vākyaṃ apramāṇaṃ syāt ye tu bhūtārthavādiṣu laukikavākyeṣu pravṛttinivṛttikāriṣu vidhiniṣedhau kalpayanti te nitarāmṛjavaḥ śrūyamāṇo pi vidhiḥ anuvādībhavati yatra tatrāśrutaḥ kalpyata iti kim anyad ataḥ paramārjavam pravṛttau tu tatra vidhir aprayojakaeva anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ puruṣārthasādhanasāmarthyāvagamāt puruṣapratyayād vā lokeṣu pravṛttisiddheḥ tatraitat syāt laukikavākyānāṃ vivakṣāparatvāt na kāryārthatvam yathoktaṃ api ca pauruṣeyād vacanāt evam ayaṃ puruṣo vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ naivam arthateti vaidikāni punaḥ apauruṣeyatayā kāryaparāṇy eva vākyāni  iti etad api na peśalam apauruṣeyasya vacasaḥ pratikṣiptatvāt vede pi kartur īśvarasya sādhittvāt na ca puruṣavacanam api vivakṣāparam iti darśitam tathā hi na vivakṣā vākyārthaḥ devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇāṃ daṇḍena  iti padagrāme vivakṣāvādinaḥ padāsyāśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ na ca viṣabhakṣaṇavākyasyeva paragṛhe bhojananivṛttā pauruṣeyavacasaḥ vivakṣāyāṃ tātparyaśaktir api prabhavati na hi sarvātmanā bhidhātrīṃ śaktim avadhīryaiva tātparyaśaktiḥ prasarati iti na vivakṣāparatvam kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacanād uccāritāt vivakṣāvagama iti cet anumānād iti brūmaḥ kāryatvāt padaracanāyāḥ puruṣecchāpūrvakatvam anumīyate arthāvagamapuraśaraṃ ca puruṣavacanāt vivakṣānumānaṃ evam ayaṃ veda  evam ayaṃ vivakṣati  iti arthoparāgarahitasya vivakṣāmātrasya jīvatāṃ nisargata eva siddheḥ ayam artho sya vivakṣitaḥ  ity arthoparajyamānā tu vivakṣā na śakyā arthe navagate vagantum arthaś cet prathamam avagato vākyāt na tarhi tat vivakṣāparam arthaparam eva bhavitum arhati lokavākyānāṃ vivakṣāparatve bāhye rthe sambandhagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt vedād api vākyārthāvagamo na syād ity alaṃ prasaṅgena tasmān na kāryaparatvenaiva śabdasya prāmāṇyam yat punar abhāṇi nākhyātaśūnyaṃ vākyaṃ prayogārham tena vinā nairākāṅkṣyānupapatteḥ ākhyātasya ca bhavyarūpaḥ arthaḥ na nāmna iva bhūtaḥ bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe ca bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti sarvatra kāryaparatvam iti tad api na saṃpratam samāptasya punarutpattiṃ vinā samāptyantarānupapatteḥ tathābhūtasya ca vṛttiprakārasya kvacid apy adarśanāt yā ca samavāyātmikā piṇḍeṣu vṛttiḥ sāmānyasya aulūkyair ucyate tām api na buddhyāmahe vayam kuṇḍabadaravat anyonyaṃ sambandhyete strīpuṃsavad vā ayutasiddhatve tu tadekatvāt kiṃ sambadhyeta ṇa hy ahaṃ mayaiva sambadhye dravyaguṇayor apṛthaksiddhayor api sambandho vidyata eveti cat tad idam unmattasyonmattasaṃvarṇanam guṇino pi guṇavyatiriktasyānupalambhāt ayaṃ guṇī rūpādibhyo arthāntaratvena nātmānam upadarśayati vyatirekaṃ ca tebhyo vāñchatīti citram ayad api nityānityavibhāgena yutasiddheḥ svaśāstre paribhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ anityānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutasiddhiḥ anityānāṃ tu yutāaśrayasamavāyitvam vibhūnāṃ parasparam ākāśādīnāṃ sambandha eva nāsti aiti tad api prakriyāmātram nānātvena siddhiḥ niṣpattiḥ ajñptir vā yutasiddhir ity ucyate tadviparyayād ayutasiddhiḥ ekyena siddhir avaatiṣṭhate tathā ca sati sambandho durvacaḥ aavayavāvayavinor api samavāyātmā sambandha evam eva parihartavyaḥ ayathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ anāniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yutasiddhatā iti aparamāṇvākāśayoḥ paramāṇukālayoś ca sambandha iṣyate nākāśaakālayor anyonyaṃ iti prakriyaiveyam iti alam avāntaracintanena atasmān na jātivyaktyoḥ kācit vṛttir upapadyate asuśikṣitās tu rūparūpilakṣaṇam ācakṣate jātivyaktiyoḥ sambandham aso pi nopapadyate rūpaśabdaḥ kiṃ śuklādivacanaḥ ākāravacanaḥ asvabhāvavacano vā bśuklādiśabdavacanatve nīrūpāṇāṃ pavanamanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ dravyaṇāṃ guṇakarmāṇāṃ bca sāmānyaśūnyatā syāt bākāravacanatve pi avayavasannniveśarahitānāṃ teṣām eva guṇādīnāṃ bsāmānyavattā na prāpnoti bsvabhāvavacanatve tu jātijātimator avyatireka eva bhavet bavabhāti hi bhedena svabhāvo na svabhāvinaḥ bśabdātiriktataiveyaṃ na tu vastvatiriktatā bkiṃ cedaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kiṃ vastutvena vastudharmaḥ vastvantaraṃ vā bvastvantaraṃ tāvan na pratibhātīty uktam bvastudharmo pi tadvyatiriktayā sthitaḥ na cakāsty eva avyabtireke ca sambandhavācoyuktir anupapannety uktaṃ bna ca rūparūpitvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogasamavāyavyatiriktaḥ ko pi bśrotriyaiḥ vivicya vyākhyātuṃ śakyate yathā īdṛg iti tasmāt vācyoyuktibnūtanatāmātram iha kṛtam na tv arthaḥ kaścid utprekṣyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena bapi ceyaṃ jātiḥ bsarvasarvagatā vā syāt piṇḍasarvagatā pi vā bsarvasarvagatatve syāt karkādāv api gomitiḥ caśvadhīḥ śābaleyādau uṣṭrabuddhir jagādiṣu cpadārthasaṅkaraś caivaṃ atyantāya prasajyate cathāpi vyaktisāmarthyaniyamān naiṣa saṅkāraḥ cna hi karkādipiṇḍānāṃ gotvādivyaktikauśalam cmaivaṃ khaṇḍādyabhivyaktam api gotvam anaṃśakam csatvatraiva pratīyeta na vā sarvagataṃ bhavet ctaddeśagarahaṇe tasya na hi kiñcin niyāmakam cdīpavad vyaṃjakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na tu tatpiṇḍavṛttitat csarvatrāgṛhyamāṇaṃ ca sarvatrāstīti ko nayaḥ csarvasarvagataṃ tasmāt na gotvam upapadyate cpiṇḍasarvagatatve tu kāmam etad adūṣaṇam ckin tu naivādya jātāyāṃ gavi gopratyayo bhavetcpiṇḍe nāsīd asaṃjāte jātiḥ jāte va vidyate csaṃkrāmati na cānyasmāt piṇḍād anyatra niṣkriyā cāyāty api na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apojjhati purātanam cna cāṃśair vartate tatra kaṣṭā vyasanasantatiḥ dbhāṭṭās tu bruvate bhinnābhinnam ekaṃ vastu anuyāyi ca vyāvṛttaṃ ca dyat tasyānugāmi rūpaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ yat vyāvṛttaṃ sa viśeṣaḥ tathā dhi dsarvavastuṣu buddhiś ca vyāvṛttyanugamātmikā djāyate dvyātmakatvena vinā sā ca na sidhyati dkevakaviśeṣātmakapadārthapakṣe sāmānyapratīter anālambanatvaṃ sāmānyadmātravāde ca viśeṣabuddher anupapattiḥ dna cāpy anyatarā bhrāntiḥ upacāreṇa veṣyate ddṛḍhatvāt sarvadā buddheḥ bhrāntiḥ syād bhrāntivādinām dna hi mihiramarūcinicayanīrapratītivat sāmānyapratyayopamardena dviśeṣapratītiḥ viśeṣapratyayopamardena vā sāmānyapratītir udeti kin tu davirodhenaiva yugapad ubhayāvabhāsaḥ ata eva nirvikalpabodhena dvyātmadkasyāpi vastuno grahaṇam upeyate dtad etad abhidhīyamānam eva na manojñam ivābhāti dnānārūpatvam ekasyāviruddhaṃ vadatā svayam ddūṣākhyānam aukharyam asmākam apavāritimtad eva sāmānyaṃ sa eva viśeṣaḥ tad evaikaṃ tad eva nānā tad eva nityaṃ tad evānityaṃ tad evāsti tad eva nāsti iti jainocchiṣṭam idam ucyate ucyamānam api na śobhate dṛṣṭatvān na virodhaś cet na tathā tad evedanāt uktaṃ hi nānuvṛttārthagrahiṇī netradhīr iti vicitravikalpaprabandhavipralubdhabuddhayaḥ khakv evaṃ manyante bhavatu te na tv ekaṃ vastu bahurūpaṃ bhavitum arhati ekaṃ hi vastuno rūpaṃ itarat kalpanām ayam nānuvṛttavikalpeṣu visraṃbha ucitaḥ satām drāgito hy anyasaṃsparśanair apekṣyeṇa dṛśyate svalakṣaṇaṃ ato bhadaḥ tāttviko nugamo mṛṣā dṛḍhādṛḍhatvam akṣuṇṇam aparīkṣyaiva saṃvidām dvayapratītimātreṇa dvayā bhyupagamo bhramaḥ na neti pratyayād eva mithyātvaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyām kin tu yuktiparīkṣāpi kartavyā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ na caikaṃ śabalaṃ vastu nirvikalpakagocaraḥ vyktyantarānusandhānād vinā nugamadhīḥ kutaḥ yeṣv anugataṃ teṣu buddhyā nanusandhīyamāneṣu tadvattisāmānyagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt na cānusandhānasāmarthyaṃ buddher asti ata eva na te samyagadhyakṣajajñānavedinaḥ abhedavṛtti pratyakṣaṃ āhut advaitavāñchayā tasmāt bhedāviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya na tadgamyaṃ sāmānyam nanu evam apahnūyamāne sāmānye gaugaur iti śābaleyādiṣu yo yam anuvṛttaḥ pratyayaḥ sa kathaṃ samarthayiṣyate uktam atra vikalpamātram eṣa pratyayaḥ vikalpāś ca nārthādhīnajanmāna iti tathā ca paraparikalpiteṣu sattādisāmānyeṣv api sāmānyam ity anuvṛttavikalpāḥ pravartanta eva na ca sāmānyeṣu sāmānyāntarāṇi saṃbhavanti niśāmānyāni samānyāni ity abhyupagamāt aupādhika eṣa sāmānyeṣv anugatavikalpa iti cet āyupman gavādiṣv api kaṃcid upādhiviśeṣam avalambya gaugaur ity anusyūtavikalpo bhaviṣyati kaḥ punar asāv upādhir iti cet ekārthakriyākāritvam iti brūmaḥ yad eva vāhadohādi kāryam ekena janyate gopiṇḍena tad evānyaiḥ iti teṣv anuvṛttadhīḥ nanu prativyakti kāryaṃ bhinnam eva satyam bhedabubhyabhāvāc ca tad ekam ity upacaryate karkādikāryād anyatvaṃ yathā hy etasya dṛśyate na tathā khaṇḍakāryasya muṇḍakāryād vibhinnatā nanu tathā mā bhūt na tv abhinnam eva khaṇḍamṇḍayoḥ kāryaṃ bāḍham darśanam eva tarhi tayor ekaṃ bhaviṣyati tac cābhinnam nanu darśanam api prativyakti bhinnam eva satyam svapṛṣṭhabhāvi pratyavamarśākhyakāryād ekam ity ucyate yathaiva śābaleyādipiṇḍadarśane sati gaur ity anantaram avamarśaḥ tathaiva bāhuleyapiṇḍadarśane pi gaur ity evāvamarśa iti tadekatvam ucyate tad uktam ekapratyavamarśasya hetutvād dhīr abhedinī ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnām apy abhinnatā iti tasmād aupādhikatvād anuvṛttabuddheḥ na sāmānyaṃ kiñcid vāstavamastīti tatrāha aniṣyamāṇe sāmānye nanu śabdānumānayoḥ kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ sambandhagrahaṇādhīnajanmanoḥ na hi vyaktiṣu sambandhaḥ gṛhītum iha śakyate sa hi vyaktiṣu gṛhyeta sarvāsv ekatra kvacit na sarvāsu deśakālādibhedena tadānantyād aśakyayvāt naikasyāṃ vyabhicārāt tato nyatrāpi sa śabdaḥ pravartamāno dṛśyate agṛhītasambandhe ca na śabdaliṅge pratītim utpādayitum utsahete ucyate syād etad evaṃ yadi pratyakṣaviṣaye savasakṣaṇe śabdaliṅgayoḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt nanu pratyakṣaviṣaye tayor vṛttāv aniṣyamāṇāyāṃ anavasthādidoṣopaghātād apravṛttir eva syāt maivaṃ vocaḥ katham asakṛd abhihitam api na buddhyase vikalpaviṣaye vṛttir iṣṭā śabdānumānayoḥ avastuviṣayāś caite vikalpā iti varṇitam nanu vikalpānām api viṣayaḥ yady anugāmī kaścin neṣyate tadutsīdetām eva śabdānumāne bāḍham asti vikalpānām anusyūto viṣayaḥ sa tu na vāstavaḥ kaḥ punat asāv iti cet ucyate atadrūpaparāvṛttisvabhāvam avahirgatam bahiśtham iva sāmānyaṃ ālambante hi niścayāḥ yā ca bhūmir vikalpānāṃ sa eva viṣaye girām ata eva hi śabdārthaṃ anyāpohaṃ pracakṣate tathā hi na vikalpā vastu spṛśanti kutaḥ ekasyārthasvabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam ko nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate  tasmāt bhramanimittasamāropitākārāntaraniṣedhāya teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ yathā rūpasādharmyasamāropitarajatākāranibāraṇāya śuktau pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate neha rajatam iti tathehāpi śābaleyādisvalakṣaṇe nirvikalpena sarvātmanā paricchinne kutaścin nimittād āropitam agorūpam iva vyavacchiṃt idaṃ vikalpāḥ agaur na bhavati iti na tu goḥ svalakṣaṇe teṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ prāg eva gṛhītatvāt atha brūyāt nānāviśeṣanikarakalmāṣitavapuṣas tasyārthasya kiñcid viśeṣaṇaṃ prāg agṛhītaṃ vikalpair gṛhyata iti tad apy ayukutam nānāviśeṣaṇanikararūṣitasyāpi vastunaḥ tadviśeṣaṇopakāraśaktivyatiriktātmanīnupalambhāt tadabhede sati tadviśeṣaṇopakāryavastusvarūpagrahaṇavelāyām eva tatkhacitagrahaṇasiddheḥ vikalpāntarāṇām ānarthakyam eva tad uktam yasyāpi nānopādher dhīr grāhikārthasya bhedinaḥ tasyāpi nānopādhyāttaśaktir na hy atiricyate nānopādhyupakārāṅgaśaktyabhinnātmano grahe sarvātmanopakāryasya ko bhedaḥ syād aniścitaḥ iti tasmād apohaviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāś ceti nanu apohavādaviṣaye mahatīṃ dūṣaṇavṛṣṭim utsasarja bhaṭṭaḥ tathā hi apoho nāma vyāvṛttiḥ abhāva iṣyate na cābhāvaḥ svatantratayā ghaṭavad avagamyate tad ayam anyāśrito vaktavyaḥ kaś ca tasyāsraya iti cintyam na tāvat gosvalakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ tasya vikalpabhūmitvābhāvāt nāpy avāntarasāmānyaṃ śābaleyatvād tadāśrayaḥ tasyāpi hi sāmānyātmatvena apohasvabhāvatvāt abhāvasya cābhāvāśrayatvānupapatteḥ na ca śābaleyasāmānyam agonivṛtter āśrayaḥ tad dhi aśābaleyanivṛtter āśrayatāṃ pratipadyate na hy evam upapadyate aśābaleyo na bhavatīti gauḥ kin tu śābaleyo śābaleya iti aśābaleyavyāvṛttir hi gośv api bāhuleyādiṣv asti atha śābaleyādisvalakṣaṇasmudāyaṃ agovyāvṛtter āśrayaṃ brūyuḥ so py aghaṭamāna eva samudayivyatirekeṇa tasyānupalaṃbhāt samudāyināṃ ca svalakṣaṇānāṃ deśakālādibhedenānantyāt vargīkaraṇaṃ puruṣāyuṣaśatenāpi na śakyakriyam iti samudāyo pi na tadāśrayaḥ tasmāt sarvasādhāraṇaṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ parisamāptaṃ kim api nūtanaṃ agovyāvṛtter adhikaraṇaṃ abhidhātavyam tac ca gotvam eva tasminn aṅgīkṛte vā kim agovyāvṛttikalpanāyāsena api ca na kevalam āśrayābhāvāt tadagrahaṇam kin tu ya eva te kecid apohyā agorūpās turagādayaḥ tadagrahaṇe pi tadapoho durgraha eva na ca teṣām ānantyāt grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati nāpi vargīkaraṇanimittam eṣāṃ kiñcid asti aśvādayaś ca vidhirūpatayā bhavanmate na gṛhyante kin tv anyavyavacchedenaiveti teṣām api vyavacchedagrahaṇe saiva vārteti nedānīṃ vikalpaiḥ kvacid apoho viṣayīkartuṃ śakyate nirvikalpena ca na kaścid vyavahāra iti sakalayotrotsādaprasaṅgaḥ kiṃ ca ya ete śābaleyādiśabdāḥ te sarva evāpohavācitvāviśeṣāt paryāyāḥ syuḥ apohyabhedād adoṣa iti cet na apohānāṃ bhedābhāvāt bhidyamānatve vā svalakṣaṇavad eṣāṃ vastutvaprasaktiḥ bhavatpakṣe pi sāmānyamātravācitvāviśeṣāt paryāyatvaṃ samāno doṣa iti cet na sāmānyānāṃ vidhirūpatvāt parasparavirahitasvabhāvatayā nānātvāvagamāt apohas tu abhāvamātrarūpāviśeṣāt na parasparaṃ bhidyate karkādiśābaleyādyādhārabhedād apohabheda iti cet na teṣām ādhāratvasya nirastatvāt ādhārabhedena vā tadbhedābhyupagame pratisvalakṣaṇaṃ apohabhedaprasaṅgaḥ tataś ca sāmānyātmatā sya hīyate atha apohyabhedam avadhārya paryāyatā parāṇudyate tad apy asāram tadāpy apohyabhedād bhedo na paryāyatvam apahanti bhākto hy asau na mukhyaḥ na cāpohyabhedād bhedo pi apohasyāvakalpate yo hi saṃbhāvyamānasaṃsargair ādhārair api na bhettuṃ pāryate sa dūravartibhir  alabdhasambandhair atibāhyair a pohyaiḥ kathaṃ bhidyate abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ yady apohyabhedāt apohabhinnatvaṃ apohyaikyāt tarhi tadaikyenāpi bhavitavyam ataś ca gavāśvayor anyāpohena vyavasthāpyamānayoḥ agavo naśvāś ca hastyādayaḥ apohyās tulyā bhūyāṃso bhavanti asādhāraṇas tu ekaḥ gaur aśvegavi cāśvo tiricyate tatraikāpohyabhedāt gavāśvayor bhedo bhavatu bhūyasām apohyānām abhedād abhedo vā bhavatu iti vicāraṇāyāṃ vipratiṣiddhadharmasamavāye bhūyasāṃ syāt sadharmatvaṃ ity a bheda eva nyāyyo bhavet athāsādhāraṇyāt aśvāpoha eva go poha iṣyate sa tarhi siṃhādāv apy astīti so pīdānīṃ gaur bhavet athāśvādiviśeṣoddhoṣarahitam agorūpaṃ vyavacchedyam ucyate tat pratyekaṃ grahītum aśakyaṃ ānantyāt vargīkaraṇakāraṇaṃ ca kiñcin nāstyeva na hi sarveṣām agavām aśvādīnām ekadeśatvaṃ ekakālatvaṃ vā samasti atha gopratiṣedha eva vargīkaraṇaherur iṣyate hanta tarhi gauḥ pūrvasiddha eṣitavyaḥ yatpratiṣedhenāgāvaḥ pratīyeran pūrvasiddhe va gavi labdhe kim agobhiḥ kiṃ vā tadapohena prayojanam pūrvasiddhaṃ gosvalakṣaṇam astyeveti cet na tena vyavahārābhāvāt gosāmānye tu pūrvasiddhe mudhā pohaprayatna ity uktam atha gosāmānyam agopratiṣedhena siddhyati tadā dustaram itaretarāśrayam ahoniṣedhena gosiddhiḥ gosiddhyā cāgoniṣedhasiddhir iti tasmād apohyasyaiva nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt na tadbhedād apohabhedaḥ siddhyati api cāśvādayaḥ sāmānyarūpeṇa vā pohyeran tadviśeṣātmanā vā na viśeṣātmanā tadanantatvāt aśabdavācyatvāc ca sāmānyātmanā tu teṣām apy apoharūpatvād abhāvarūpatvam kathaṃ cābhāvasyaivābhāvaḥ kriyate karaṇe vā pratiṣedhadvayayogāt vidhir avatiṣṭhata iti vidhirūpaḥ śabdārthaḥ syāt apohātmanaś ca turagādeḥ yo pohaḥ sa tasmād vilakṣaṇaḥ anyathā vā vailakṣaṇye tasya bhāvātmatā bhakte availakṣaṇye tu yādṛśa evāpohyaḥ tādṛśa eva tadapoha iti gaur apy agauḥ syāt kiṃ ca apohaśabdārthapakṣe nīlam utpalam ityādau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahārā vilupyeran na hi ekasminn arthe dvayor apohayor vṛttir upapadyate na caikaḥ kaścid artho sti yatra tayor vṛttiḥ svalakṣaṇasyāśabdārthatvāt anyasya cāsaṃbhavāt na ca vṛttir api kā cid asti sadjñeyādiśabdānāṃ apohyanirūpaṇāsaṃbhavāt nāpohavācitvam na hy asad ajñeyaṃ vā kiñcid avagatam yat vyavacchidyeta jñātaṃ cet sad eṣa tat jñeyaṃ ceti ataḥ kathaṃ sacchebdena sad eva jñeyaśabdena ca jñeyam evāpohyate ajñātaṃ tu na nitarām apohyam kalpitaṃ tu tat vaktum aśakyam kalpanayaiva sattvāt jñeyatvāc ca apohaśabdasya kiṃ vācyam iti cintyam anapoho na bhavatīty apohaḥ kaś cāyām anapohaḥ kathaṃ vā sau na bhevati abhavan vā kim avaśiṣyate iti sarvam avācakam pratiṣedhavācināṃ ca nañādipadānāṃ kā vārtā atra na bhavatīti neti ko rthaḥ upasarganipātānāṃ ca katham apohaviṣayam ākhyātaśabdānāṃ ca pacatītyādīnām apoho durupapādaḥ nāmnām eva jātiśabdānāṃ apohaviṣayatvam iṣyate yeṣāṃ bhavanto jātivācitvaṃ tadvadvācitvaṃ vā pratipadyanta iti cet tato nyeṣāṃ tarhi kā vārtā bāhyārthavācitve jātiśabdeṣu ko dveṣaḥ nirālambanatve jñānāṃśāvalambanatve vā jātiśabdānām api tad evāstu kim apohavādapramādena yathaiva pratibhāmātraṃ vākyārthaṃ iti kalpitaḥ padārthe pi tathaivāstu kim apohāgraheṇa vaḥ ityādidūṣaṇaudāryaṃ apohe bahudarśitam ataḥ śabdārthatām asya vadeyuḥ saugatāḥ katham ucyate tad etad aviditabauddhasiddhāntānām abhidhānam apoho yadi bhāvātmā bahir abhyupagamyate tato bhavati bhāvatkaṃ vāgjālaṃ na tv asau tathā kin tu khalv ayam āntaro jñānātmā saugatānām apohaḥ sammataḥ tathā bhyupagame ceyam apohavācoyuktiḥ svāṃśaviśayaṃ padārthajñānānām ity etāvad eva vaktum ucitam etad api nāsti nāyam āntaraḥ na bāhyo pohaḥ kin tu jñānārthābhyāmanya eva nanu yad vidyate nāntaḥ na bahiḥ paramārthataḥ tan na vidyate eveti kathaṃ śabdārtha ucyate pāramārthikaśabdārthasamarthanapipāsitāḥ nehāgatāḥ smo yenaiva anuyujyemahi tvayā yata eva tan nāntar bahir asti tata eva mithyeti kālpanikam iti ca gīyate kiṃ punas tat āropitaṃ kiñcid ākāramātraṃ vikalpoparaṃjakam nanu bāhyārthavyatirekeṇa kim īya ākāraḥ āntarasya jñānasyoparaṃjaka ucyate dṛśyacchāyaivānuraṃjikā vikalpānāṃ na dṛśyo rthaḥ vyāvṛttaṃ hi vastu darśanānāṃ viṣayaḥ tac ca spraṣṭum akṣamā vikalpā ity uktam atha tacchāyām avalambamānā vikalpā vyāvṛttasyāgrahaṇāt vyavṛttiviṣayā ucyante nanu vyāvṛttitadvator abhedāt yā vyāvṛttiḥ yac ca vyāvṛttiṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tad ekam eveti vyāvṛttigrāhibhir vikalpair vyāvṛttam api gṛhītaṃ syād iti darśanatulyā eva te bhaveyuḥ vaitad evam na vikalpair vyāvṛttaṃ vastu gṛhyate na ca pāramārthikī vyāvṛttiḥ api tu kaścid āropita ākāraḥ vāstavatve hi vyāvṛtteḥ vastusaṃsparśina ete doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ na tv asau tayety uktam ata eva yat kecana paryacūcudan kila vyāvṛttagrahaṇapakṣe tritayagrahaṇaṃ prāpnoti yat vyāvṛttaṃ yena ca nimittena vyāvṛttaṃ yataś ca vyāvṛttim iti na ca tritayagrahaṇam astīty ataḥ kathaṃ vyāvṛttagrahaṇam iti tad apy apāstaṃ bhavati yadi hi vyāvṛttaṃ gṛhṇīma ity evam ullekho bhavet vyavahartṛjanasya tadaivam asau paryanuyujyeta na tv evam astīty acodyam etat nanv evam āropitākāraviṣayā eva vikalpā uktā bhavanti vyāvṛttiviṣayatvavācoyuktir ananvitety uktam smāhitam etat darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvibhiḥ gaur ityādivikalpaiḥ atatkāryaparāvṛttā ākārā ullikhyante na hi govikalpair atatkāryāṇām aśvādīnām ullekhaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ ca spṛṣyate sāmānyaṃ ca vāstavaṃ nāsti tasmād atatkāryaparāvṛttiviṣayatvam eva vikalpānām avatiṣṭhate ity evaṃ yuktyā teṣām apohaviṣayatvam ucyate na pratipattiḥ nanu atatkāryaparāvṛttam iva sajātīyavyāvṛttam api dṛśyasvarūpam tatra sajātīya vijātīyavyāvṛttam apy ākāram ullikheyuḥ na hi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttī svalakṣaṇaṃ cānyat na caikatarākārollekhananiyamanahetum utpaśyāmaḥ dhīman maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ niścayātmāno nirvikalpāḥ sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttākārollekhe ca sarvātmanā tanniścayāt vikalpāntarāṇāṃ śabdānatarāṇāṃ cāpravṛṭtiḥ syāt tathā ca gaur iti śabdād utpadyamāno vijātīyavyāvṛttākārollekhyeva vikalpaḥ saṃvedyate ba sajātīyavyāvṛttollekhī tulyaviṣayāś ca vikalpaiḥ śabdā ity anyāpohaviṣayās ta ucyante so yam āropitākāro na bahiḥ āropitatvād eva nāntaḥ abodharūpatvāt ataś cāsau na kiñcid eva na kiñcid api bhavan apoha iti phalata upacaryate ataś ca bāhyam apoham āśritya dūṣaṇopanyāse kaṇṭhaśoṣam anubhavan asthāne kliṣṭo devānāṃ priyaḥ api ca vikalpabhūmiḥ arthaḥ vikalpāntarasannidhāpitabhāvābhāvākṣepī niyatarūpo bāhyasadṛśaś ca pratīyate na cedaṃ rūpatrayam api bāhye vastuni yujyate bāhyasya hi vastunaḥ svarūpeṇāvagatasya na vikalpāntaropanītabhāvasambandha upapadyate vaiyartyāt nāpy abhāvasambahdhaḥ vipratiṣedhāt niyatarūpatā ca vikalpaviṣayasya gaur eva nāśvaḥ ity evam avagamyamānā vastvantaravyavacchedam antareṇa nāvakalpata iti balāt vyavacchedaviṣayatvam anyathā niyamaparicchedāsaṃbhavāt sandigdhaṃ ca vastu na gṛhyate evaṃ bāhyavastuviṣayatve ca niraste vikalpānāṃ ekasyārthasvabhāvasya iti nyāyena paunarukyād abāhyaviṣayatvaṃ khyāyyam abāhyaṃ cāropitaṃ rūpam tac ca bāhyavad avabhāsate na ca vyāvṛtticchāyam apahāya bāhyāropitayoḥ sādṛśyamanyad astīti vyāvṛttiviṣayā eva vikalpāḥ phalato bhavanti yady api vidhirūpeṇa gaur aśva iti teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ tathāpi nītivido nyāpohaviṣayān eva tān vyavasthāpayanti yathoktaṃ vyākhyātāraḥ khalv evaṃ vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ iti so yaṃ nāntaraḥ na bāhyaḥ anya eva kaścid āropita ākāro vyāvṛtticchāyāyogād apohaśabdārtha ucyate itīyam asatkhyātivādagarbhā saraṇiḥ atha vā vikalpapratibimbakaṃ jñānākāramātrakam eva tadabāhyam api vicitravāsanābhedopāhitarūpabhedaṃ bāhyavad avabhāsamānaṃ lokayātrāṃ birbhati vyāvṛtticchāyāyogāc ca tadapoha iti vyavahiyate seyam ātmakhyātigarbhā saraṇiḥ nanu ubhayathāpi vastuviṣayatvābhāve vikalpānāṃ kathaṃ vastuni vyavahāraḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe pi kvacid vastuni tṛṇādau pravṛttyabhāvāt arthitvaṃ tu pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam nanu arthitāvat darśanam api kāraṇam eva arthino py apaśyatas tatra pravṛttyabhāvāt apohapakṣe ca pravṛttasya vastuprāptaḥ katham iti vaktavyam ucyate pravṛttis tāvat dṛśyavikalpyayoḥ ekīkaraṇanibandhanā dṛśyadarśanānantaram utpanne vikalpe vikalpatayā na pratipadyate pramātā darśanānantaryavipralabdhas tu dṛśyam eva gṛhītaṃ manyate tad abhimānena ca pravartate idaṃ tad ekīkaraṇam āhuḥ dṛśyavikalpayor bhedena vastuno dṛśyāt vikalpo yan na gṛhyate na punaḥ bhinnayor abhedādhyavasāya ekīkaraṇam iṣyate dṛśyād vibhinnasya śukter eva rajatasya nirdeṣṭum aśakyatvāt abhedādhyavasāye copāyābhāvāt nābhedādhyavasāye darśanam upāyaḥ vikalpāviṣayatvāt na vikalpaḥ dṛśyaviṣayatvāt tasmāt bhedānadhyavasātād eva pravṛttiḥ prāptir api dṛśyasyaivārthakriyākāriṇo vastunaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa tanmūlatvāt kāryaprabandhasya dṛśyād darśanaṃ tato vikalpaḥ tataḥ pravṛttir iti arthaṃ hi mūlavartinam upalabhya pravartamānas tam āpnoti apavarakanihitamaṇiprasṛtāyāṃ kuñcikāvivaranirgatāyām iva prabhāyāṃ maṇibuddhyā pravartamānaḥ yatra tu mūle py artho nāsti tatra vyāmohāt pravartamānaḥ viprakabhyata eva dīpaprabhāyām iva tathaiva maṇibuddhyā pravartamānaḥ evaṃ ca bāhyavastusaṃsparśaśūnyeṣv api vikalpeṣu samullikhiteṣu bāhyo rtho mayā pratipannaḥ tatra cāhaṃ pravṛttaḥ sa ca mayā prāptaṃ ity abhimāno bhavati laukikānām na tv ayam arthādhyavasāyamūlaḥ tad uktaṃ yathā dhyavasāyam atattvāt yathā tattvaṃ cānadhyavasāyāt iti svapratibhāse narthe rthādhyavasāyāt pravṛttiḥ ity atrāpi ganthe arthādhyavasāyaḥ bhedānadhyavasāya eva vyākhyeyaḥ evaṃ dṛśyavikalpyāvathau ekīkṛtya pravartate prāpnoti cārtham iti tad evam eva lokasya vyavahāro vakalpate vivekināpi voḍhavyā lokayātrā ca lokavat tasmād vikalpapratibimbakasya śabdārthatām āhur apohanāmnaḥ pratītimārgas tv avivicyamānaḥ janasya jātibhramam ātanoti yāvāṃś ca kaścin niyamaprakāraḥ pravartate jātiṣu vṛttyavṛttyoḥ tāvān apoheṣv api tulya eva bhavaty avastutvakṛtastu bhedaḥ tulye pibhede śamane jvarādeḥ kaścid yathaivauṣadhayaḥ samarthāḥ sāmānyaśūnyā api tadvad eva syur vyaktayaḥ kāryaviśeṣaśaktāḥ viśeṣaṇādivyavahārakptiḥ tucche py apohe na na yujyate naḥ ataśaca mā kāri bhavadbhir eṣā jātyākṛtivyaktipadārthacintā atrābhidhīyate kiṃ jātyāder bāhyasya śabdārthasyāsattvāt apohapakṣapātaḥ ata pratītivalād eva iti pratītis tāvat apohaviṣayā bhavadbhir eva nāṅgīkṛteti kim atra kalahena nāpi jātyāder asattvam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannabādhasandeharahitapratyayagamyatvāt svalakṣaṇavat ādyam eva hi vijñānaṃ arthasaṃsparśi cākṣuṣam na taduttarabhāvīti kim idaṃ rājaśāsanam tad evāstu pramāṇaṃ vā tenāpi tv avagamyate vyāvṛttaṃ vastuno rūpaṃ nānugāmīti kā pramā tathāhi nirvikalpakakālasyātisūkṣmatvāt kiṃ pratibhāsate kiṃ na pratibhāsate iti katham eṣa kalirāvayor upaśāmyatu bhavān brūte vyāvṛttam eva bhātīti ahaṃ bruve anuvṛttam api pratibhātīti evaṃ kalahāyamānayor ābhayoḥ kaḥ paricchedaḥ na khalu śapathasya krośapātasya vaiṣaviṣayaḥ tasmāt nirvikalpakānantarotpannasthūlakālakāryaparyālocanayā tadvyavasthā kartavyā tatra ca bhaved yadi viśeṣaikaviṣayaṃ nirvikalpakam sāmānyādhyavasāyo yaṃ akasmāt katham udbhavet śābda eṣa vikalpa iti cet maivam paśyaty anugataṃ rūpaṃ avijñāte pi vāceke dākṣiṇātya ivākasmāt paśyann uṣṭraparaṃparām anavagataśabdārthasambandho py abhidhānavān ekapadārthasannidhāne teṣām anugataṃ ca vyāvṛttaṃ ca paśyaty eva rūpam api ca prathamākṣisannipāta evāṅgulicatuṣṭayam avalokyamānaṃ anyo nyagāminā ca rūpeṇāvagamyate tat kathaṃ kevalaviśeṣāvalambī cākṣuṣaḥ pratyayaḥ api ca purāṇaśābaleyapiṇḍam avalokyataḥ kālāntare bāhuleyaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyataḥ pūrvadṛṣṭaśābaleyapiṇḍaviṣayaṃ smaraṇam utpadyamānaṃ saṃvedyate tasmāt sāmānyānavagamo nopapadyate anyasminn asādhāraṇe svalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭe nya smaraṇasya kiṃ vartate asti ca tat tena manyamahe dṛṣṭam ubhayānugataṃ rūpam iti kiṃ ca vyaktyantaradarśane pi sa evāyaṃ gaur iti pratyabhijñāyate tasyāś ca prāmāṇyaṃ darśitam darśayiṣyate ca vistarataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge tasmāt anugatarūpaviṣayaiva sā pratyabhijñā vyaktibhedasya vispaṣṭasiddhatvāt yatra ca laghutaraparimāṇatilam udgādipracayasannidhāne vicchin na sikthasvalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatrānuvṛttam eva rūpam indriyeṇa gṛhyate ata nirvikalpakakevalāyām eva vyāvṛttavat anugatarūpāvabhāsān na sāmāṇyāpahnavo bhedau dvāv api vāstavau sāmānyam idam ity evaṃ kutas tatrānupagraḥaḥ vyāvṛttam idam ity evaṃ kiṃ vā buddhiḥ svalakṣaṇe samānavṛttisāpekṣaṃ na ca sāmānyavedanam tatra sannihitatvāt tu vyaktivan nānupagrahaḥ samānavṛttyapekṣatvāt sāmānyasyānupagrahe viśeṣo pi hi mā grāhi vyāvṛttiṃ sa hy apekṣate anuvṛttir hi yeṣv asya kā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ vyāvttir api yebhyo sya yā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ athānuvṛttivyāvṛttinairapekṣyeṇa kevalam vastv eva gṛhyate kāmaṃ kīdṛk tad iti kathyatām nirvikalpakavelāyāṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ tan na śakyate tad utthās tūbhayatrāpi sākṣyaṃ dadati niścayāḥ vastuno ṅgīkṛtā prājñaiḥ ata evobhayātmatā yau brūtas tv ekarūpatvaṃ tāv ubhāv api bāliśau yad apy abhihitam itaretaraviruddharūpasamāveśa ekatra vastuni nopapadyata iti tad api na samyak parasparavirodho pi nāstīha tad avedanāt ekabādhena nānyatra dhīḥ śuktrajatādivat yatra hi virodho bhavati tatraikatararūpopamardena rūpāntaram upalabyate prakṛte tu naivam iti ko virodhārthaḥ chāyātāpāv api yady ekatra dṛśyete kiṃ kena viruddham abhidhīyeta adarśanāt tu tadviruddham uktam na caivam ihādarśanam ity avirodhaḥ ata eveha mithyātvaṃ eti nānyatarā matiḥ na hy anyonyopamardena buddhidvitayasaṃbhavaḥ tathā cāha yathā kalmāṣavarṇasya yatheṣṭaṃ varṇaniścayaḥ citratvāt vastuno py evaṃ bhedābhedāvadhāraṇā iti ity evam avirodhena bhedābhedāvadhāraṇāt ubhayātmakataivāstu vastūnāṃ bhaṭṭapakṣavat etat tu vṛttivikalpādibhyaḥ bibhyatevābhyuparataṃ tatra bhavateti tiṣṭhatu tāvat kim atra vimardena vyaktivyatiriktaiva jāiḥ vyaktiṣu vartata iti brūmaḥ yac ca vṛttivikalpādidūṣaṇaṃ tatra varṇitam tat pratyakṣamahimnaiva sarvaṃ pratihataṃ bhavet yat tāvad avādi bhedena kuvalayāmalakādivat anavabhāsanād iti tatra pratītibhedo darśita eva yat tu deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt tadagrahe tadbadhyabhāvād iti tatra tadā śritatvaṃ kāraṇaṃ jāteḥ na tv asattvam vyaktivṛttitvāj jāteḥ pṛthagdeśatayā nupalambhaḥ tadagrahe tadagraho vā na punas tad atiriktāyā abhāvād eveti yad apy uktaṃ vṛttyanupapatter iti tatrāpy ucyate pratipiṇḍaṃ kārtsnyena jātir vartata iti piṇḍāntare tadupalambho na syād iti cet kiṃ kurmaḥ kam upalabhāmahe piṇḍāntare pi tadupalambho sty eva kathaṃ ca bhavantam enaṃ nihnumahe ekadeśāstu jāter na santy eva yair asyāvartanaṃ brūmaḥ kvedam anyatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet aho nipuṇatā tava dṛṣṭāntaṃ yācase yas tvaṃ pratyakṣe py anumānavat kiṃ nāmadheyaiṣā vṛttir iti cet na nāmadheyaṃ asyā jānīmaḥ piṇḍasamavetā jātir ity etāvad eva pracakṣmahe nanu ayutasiddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ sa ca vipratiṣedhād eva nirastaḥ na śakyate nirasitum pratītibhedād bhedo sti deśabhedas tu neṣyate tenātra kalpyate vṛttiḥ samavāyaḥ sa ucyate avayavāvayavinoḥ guṇaguṇinoś ceyam eva vṛttiḥ tayor arthāntaratvam upariṣṭād darśayiṣyate darśitaṃ ca amunaiva mārgeṇa deśabhedaś ca tayor nāstīti vispaṣṭam ayutasiddhatvam yad apy ucyate nāniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yutasiddhatā iti tad api parihṛtaṃ ācāryaiḥ jātiṃ ca sambaddhaṃ cety ekaḥ kālaḥ iti vadadbhiḥ sarvaṃ caitad abādhitapratītibalāt kalpyate na svaśāstraparibhāṣayā vibhūnām api sambandhaḥ parasparam asaṃbhavād eva neṣyate na svaśāstraparibhāṣaṇāt na saṃyogaḥ teṣām aprāpter abhāvāt aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ na samavāyaḥ tadāśritasya tasyānupalaṃbhād ity alaṃ prasaṅgena ye ceha vṛttī sraksūtrabhūtakaṇṭhaguṇādiṣu jātyādīnām anaṃśatvāt tābhyāṃ vṛttr vilakṣaṇā tasmāt vṛttyanupapatter ity adūṣaṇam yad api sarvagatatvaṃ piṇḍagatatvaṃ ca vikalpya dūṣitam tad api yat kiñcit yathā pratītir ādiśati bhagavatī tathā vayam abhyupagacchāmaḥ sarvasarvagatā jātir iti tāvad upeyate sarvatrāgrahaṇaṃ tasyāḥ vyaṃjakavyaktyasannidheḥ vyaktir vyaṃjakatām eti jāter dṛṣṭyaiva nānyathā dṛṣṭir yatra yadā vyakteḥ tadā tatraiva tanmatiḥ sarvata vidyate jātiḥ na tu sarvatra dṛśyate tad abhivyaṃjikā yatra vyaktitas tatraiva dṛśyate vyakter anyatra sattve sya kiṃ pramāṇaṃ tad ucyate ihāpy ānīyam ānāyāṃ gavi gotvopalambhanam gopiṇḍena sahaitasyāḥ na cāgamanasaṃbhavaḥ dehenevātmanas tasmāt ihāpy astitvam iṣyatām abhivyaktis tu tatkālā yatkālaṃ vyaktidarśanam tasmāt sakṛd abhivyaktā nānyadā pi pratīyate abhivyaktitaś ca taddeśā yaddeśā vyaktir īkṣyate tasmāt tasmād abhivyaktā na deśe nyatra dṛśyate vyaktisarvagatatve pi svayūthyaiḥ kaiścid āśrite bhaviṣyaty adya jātāyāṃ gavi godhīs tathā grahāt jāyamānaiva hi vaktiḥ jāyate pratiyoginī eka eva hi kālo syāḥ jāteḥ sambandhajanmanoḥ neha jāteḥ puro stitvaṃ na ca saṃkrāntir anyataḥ kin tu svahetoḥ sā vyaktiḥ tādṛśy evopajāyate katham etad itīdaṃ ca ye vā paryanuyuṃjate idam apy aparaṃ hanta tena paryanuyujyatām vṛṣaḥ viśaṅgo gauḥ kṛṣṇā sā ca nīlatṛṇāśinī tābhyām utpādito vatsaḥ kathaṃ bhavati pāṇḍaraḥ yathā rūpādisambaddhā sā vyaktir upalabhyate tathaiva jātiyukteti kā te vyasanasantatiḥ agovyāvṛttatāyāṃ vā naiṣa praśno nivartate kasmād agonivṛttaṃ tat adya jātaṃ svalakṣaṇam tasmād vastusvabhāvasya vidhitvā nanuyojyatām cyodyacuncutvam utsṛjya pratipattir nirūpyatām pratipattiś ca viśeṣeṣv iva sāmānyeṣu ca nirapavādā darśitaiva tasmāt viśeṣavat apratyākhyeyaṃ sāmāṇyam tatraitat syāt viśeṣātmana eva vastunaḥ sāmānyajñānajananaśaktiyuktatvāt kiṃ sāmānyakalpanayeti tad ayuktam viśeṣavat pratyakṣatvāt sāmānyasya kaḥ kalpanārthaḥ yadi hi kāryānumeyaṃ sāmānyaṃ kalpayema tata evam anuyujyemahi kāryasyāpy anyathāsiddheḥ kiṃ tatkalpanayeti pratyakṣe tu sāmānye ko yam anuyogaḥ kā ceyam anuvṛttijñānotpādikā śaktiḥ viśeṣebhyo vyatiriktāḥ vyatiriktā vā nityā anityā vā iti vikalpyamānā vācoyuktyantareṇa jātir eva kathitā bhavati na vā kiñcid iti yat kiñcid etat nanu yathā gotvādijātiḥ niyatāsv eva vyaktiṣu vartate nāsāmaṃjasyena tathā kābhiścid eva vyaktibhiḥ kācid gavādibuddhir janyate iti naitad evam viṣayātiśayavyatirekeṇa pratyayātiśayānupapatteḥ upāyātiśaye tu pratyayātiśayakāriṇīṣyamāṇe viṣayātiśayaṃ prati ko dveṣaḥ siddhe ca viṣayātiśaye durapahnavaṃ sāmānyam nanu ca anuvṛttibuddhiḥ vinā pi sāmānyāntareṇa sāmānyāntareṣu dṛśyata eveti ko tra visraṃbhaḥ ucyate na cāśeṣeṇa paṃcāśad bhavitum arhati yadi hi senāvanādipratyayāḥ karituragadhavakhadirādivyatiriktam artham anapekṣya jāyamānā mithyā bhavanti kim etāvatā ghaṭādi pratyayair api mithyā bhavitavyam bādhakasadasadbhāvanibandhanā hi vaitathyā vaitathasthitiḥ pratyayānām tatra sattādau sāmānyāntaravirahān mithyā pratyayāḥ upādhinā kenacit pravartate na tv evaṃ gavādāv iti yat kiñcid
