api tatsiddhisaṃbhavāt tathā ca mumukṣur nityanaimittikaṃ karmāvaśyam anutiṣṭhet ananutiṣṭhan pratyaveyād iti tat kuto sya bandhaḥ syāt kāmyaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca karma svarganarakakāri vispaṣṭam eva bandhasādhanam iti tatparihared evety evaṃ tāvad uttaro yaṃ na karmasaṃcayaḥ pravartate tad āha nityanaimittike kuryāt pratyavāyajihāsayā mokṣārthī na pravarteta tatra kāmyaniṣiddhayoḥ iti prāktanasya tu karmasaṃcayasya bhogād eva kṣayaḥātmavidaś ca mumukṣor ayam anuṣṭhānakramo bhavati nenarasyeti sa evettyam apavṛjyata iti āha ca ātmajñe caitad astīti tadjñānam upayujyate tatra jñātātmatattvānāṃ bhogātpūrvakriyākṣaye uttarapracayāsattvāt deho notpadyate punaḥ  nanu nityakarmanuṣṭhānapakṣe nāsty eva mokṣaḥ yāny eva hi nityani darśapaurṇamāsādikarmāṇi yāvaj jīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta ityādicodanopadiṣṭāni tāny eva phalavanti śrūyanta iti kāmyāny api bhavitum arhanti darśapaurṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta agnihotraṃ juhuyānsvargakāmaḥ itinaphalābhisandhānapūrvakatvenāprayogāt tathā ha prārthyamānaṃ phalaṃ jñātaṃ nānicchos tadbhaviṣyati iti so yaṃ pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ prayoge pi viśeṣaḥ kāmyaṃ karma sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa prayujyamānaṃ phalasādhanam iti na yathāśakti tathā tathā prayoktavyam iti nityakarmaṇaḥ akaraṇāt pratyavāya iti yathaśakty api tat prayoktavyam ananuṣṭhitāt yādṛk tādṛk anuṣṭhitaśreyaḥpratyavāyaparihāropapatteḥ kāmye tu sarvāṇy aṅgāni yady asāv upasaṃhartuṃ na na śaknuyāt mā pravartiṣṭa na hy apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyād iti evaṃ ca tad eva darśapaurṇamāsādikarma yāvaj jīvaṃ iti codanayopadiṣṭaṃ nityaṃ sat tatphalānabhisandhānāt prayuktaṃ na bandhāya kalpate kva sā svargasādhanatvaśaktiḥ asya gateti cetnana vayaṃ karmaṇāṃ śaktimaśakti vā pratyakṣataḥ prapaśyāmaḥ śāstraikaśaraṇās tu śrotriyā vayam codanaiva dharme pramāṇam iti naḥ kulavratam etat sā ca codanā ekatra kāminam achikāriṇam āśritya pravṛttā tadadhikāraś ca phalanirvṛtter vinā na syād iti phalaparyantatāṃ pratipadyate anyatra tu yāvatpadopabaddhajīvanapadārthāvacchinnādhikārilābhena pravartamānā na phalāya prabhavati akriyamāṇe tu śāstrārthe pratyavāyāya bhavati adhikṛtena satā śāstrārthastyakta iti kāmye tv anutpannakāmo dhikṛta eva na bhavatīti nādhikṛtena satā vidhis tyakta iti na pratyavaitīti upakramya tv antarāle tyaktuṃ na labhata eva vītāyāṃ phalecchāyāṃ āvāpte vā phale tatkarmasamāpanavad avaśyakartavyam eva tad iti alaṃ śāstrāntaragarbheṇa bhūyasā kathāvistareṇa sarvathā suṣṭūktaṃ nityanaimittike kuryāt iti nanu bhogāt prāktanakarmakṣayapakṣe dīrghakālāpekṣaṇāt apratyāsanna iva mokṣo lakṣyatekiṃ tvayā jñātam adhunaiva huṃkṛtvā nirvilambam eva mokṣam āpnuyād iti na khalu sulabho yaṃ puruṣārthaḥ kiṃ na śrutam idam āyuṣmatā vyāsavacanam anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gaim iti jñānāgnidāhavacanaṃ tu jñānapraśaṃsārtham eva so yaṃ jñānakarmasamuccayān mokṣa ucyata iti atrābhidhīyatena khalu phalopabhogadvārakaḥ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayaḥ janmakoṭiśatair api śakyakriyaḥ uktaṃ hi ekam evedṛśaṃ karma kartum āpatati kvacit janmāyutaśatenāpi yatphalaṃ bhujyate na vā dehaistatkarmabhogārthaiḥ karmānyanna kariṣyate dehabandhanam ity eṣā durāśaiva tapasvinām  tadīṛśam enaṃ mokṣapatham upadiśadbhir yājñikaiḥ mokṣopekṣaṇamanakṣaram upadiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti tasmāt pūrvoktanītyaiva karmaṇāṃ bandhahetutvamapākaraṇīyaṃ nanu pakṣacatuṣṭaye pi doṣa uktaḥnacaturthapakṣasya niravadyatvāt sahakārivaikalyāt kusūlāvasthitabījavat karmaṇām anārambhakatve sati na kaściddoṣaḥ eṣa eva ca teṣāṃ dāhaḥ yat kāryānārambhakatvam nanu avinaṣṭasvarūpāṇi kusūlabījavad eva kadā cirād ārapsyante kāryam tasmādvaram ucchidyantām eva kim idānīṃ nityamātmānam apy ucchettuṃ yatāmahe sa hi purā bhoktā bhūd iti mukto pi punarbhoktṛtāṃ pratipadyeteti varam ucchidyantām eva sāmagryabhāvāt katham asau punaḥ bhoktṛtāṃ gacchetiti cet karmāṇy api sahakāryabhāvāt kathaṃ kāryam ārabheranna ca karmaṇāṃ bandhakaraṇe rāgādayo na sahakāriṇa iti vaktuṃ śakyatevītarāgasya jatmādarśanāt ity asakṛduktatvāt tasmād ayam eva sūtrakāropadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ peśalaḥ na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīnakleśasya iti yac cedam ucyate jñānakarmasamuccayān mokṣa ititatredaṃ vaktavyam karmaṇāṃ kīdṛśo mokṣaṃ pratyaṅgabhāvaḥna hi tatsādhyo mokṣaḥsvargādivad anityatvaprasaṅgāt api ca ātmaiva svarūpāvasthito mokṣa ity ucyatena cātmasvarūpaṃ karmasādhyam anādinidhanatvena siddhatvāt nanu nityakarmān anuṣṭhāne pratyaveyād iti taddvārakabandhaparihāropāyatvāt karmāpi mokṣāṅgaṃ syātnasanyāsavidhānasya pratyakṣopadeśād ity uktatvāt aparipakvakaṣāyāṇāṃ śanaiś śanais tatparipākaupayikatvena karmānuṣṭhānaṃ pāramparyeṇāpavargopāya iti tu bāḍham abhyupagamyate yathā ha manuḥ mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ iti adhyātmavidaś ca jñānakāṇḍaupayikam eva kriyākāṇḍaṃ manyante sākṣāt tu karmasādhye pavarge svargavad apāyitvaprasaṅgāt kṛtakasya sarvasyānityatvāt tattvajñānam eva mokṣopāya ity uktam yad api yamaniyamādisādhyam aṅgabhūtaṃ karmajātam tad api tadaṅgatāṃ gacchan na vāryate tatkāryatve piyāvadguṇapradhvaṃsābhāvasvabhāvatvāt mokṣasya na kṣayitvaṃ svargavat anyas tu na mokṣa ity uktam tatpūrvoktaprakrameṇāpavargaprāpyes tattvajñānam evābhyupayaḥ karma tv aṅgaṃ tatra śaucādi kiñcit kiñcit tat syād ātmasaṃskārapūrvam āhatattvajñānam idānīṃ vicintyatāmkiṃviṣayaṃ tadapavargāya kalpatekuto vā tasya niḥśreyasasādhanatvam avagatam iti nanu ātmajñānam apavargahetur iti bahuśaḥ kathitam evaitad iti ko yaṃ praśnaḥ navipratipatteḥ vipravadante hy atra vādinaḥ eka evāyam avidyāparikalpitaḥ jīvātmaparamātmavibhāgaḥ paramātmatattvajñānād avidyāpāye mokṣ iti brahmavādinaḥ śabdādvaitaniścayād iti vaiyākaraṇāḥ vijñānādvaitadarśanād iti śākyabhikṣavaḥ prakṛtipuruṣavivekavijñānād iti pāramarṣāḥ īśvarapraṇidhānād iti cānye tad evaṃ kasmai tattvajñānāya spṛhayantu mumukṣavaḥ iti vācyam ucyate bhinnās tāvad ātmān iti gṛhyatām ātmajñnam eva niḥśreyasāṅgam iti yat tu kutas tasya niḥśreyasasādhanatvam avagatam iti akṣapādavacanād iti brūmaḥ akṣapādas tāvad evam upadiṣṭavān ātmajñānān niḥśreyasādhigamaḥ iti na ca niṣpramāṇakam artham eṣa ṛṣirūpādiśad iti bhavitavyam atra pramāṇena tat tu vaidikaṃ vidhivākyaṃ ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti sa eṣa tāvan na niradhikāraḥ vidhiḥ adhikārarahitasya ca vidheḥ prayogayogyatvābhāvāt adhikārānveṣaṇam upakramaṇīyam paraprakaraṇaparipaṭhanavirahāc ca nāsya samidādhividhivat pradhānādhikāraniveśitvam ataḥ viśvajidadhikaraṇanyāyena svargakāmam adhikāriṇam iha yāvad upādātur eva hṛdayapatham avatarati rātrisatra iva pratiṣṭheti tām evāsya phalatvena tipadyāmahe sā ceyaṃ sādhyamānāpi rūpād eva hi śāśvatī cakāstyapunarāvṛttiḥ na svargavad apāyinī nanu dṛṣṭaprayojanālābhe sati adṛṣṭaprayojanaparikalpanāvasaraḥ iha ca dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam ātmajñānasya karmapravṛttihetutvam upalabhyate nityenātmanā vinā bhūteṣv evācetaneṣu śmaśānāvadhiṣu bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhyāni ko nāma jyotiṣṭomādikarmāṇy anutiṣṭhed iti nitya evātmā paralokī jñātavyaḥ evaṃ hi nirviśaṅkaḥ karmasu pravarteteti tad idam anupapannam anyata eva siddhatvāt pratyabhijñāpratyakṣapratyayena jaiminīyaiḥ anumānamahimnā ca naiyāyikādibhiḥ ātmā nitya iti niścita eva kim atra vidhiḥ kariṣyati itikartavyatākalāpopadeśaś ca tadānīm atyantaniṣprayojanaḥ syāt amī ca tathā nāmātimahānto vedagranthā iyaty eva paryavasannā iti tad idam upanatam seyaṃ mahato vaṃśastambāt laṭvā kṛṣyata iti tasmād arthavādasamarpitam apunarāvṛttirūpam eva phalam ātmajñānavidhir avalambata ity evaṃ kecit sūkṣmadarśinas tv āhuḥ iyam api mahatī durgatiḥ yatt arthavādasukhaprekṣitvam asyoktam adhikāravidheḥ viśvājiti rātrisatre vā kim anyat kriyatām na hi viśvajidrūpaparyālocanataḥ kaścid adhikārī labhyata iti balāt svargakāmādiḥ kalpyate vā arthavādasamarpito vā valambyate yatra tu vidhisvarūpamahimnaiva tad upalambhaḥ tatra kiṃ kalpanayā kim arthavādavad anāvalokanadainyena vā iha ca svādhyāyo dhyetavyaḥ itivad agnīn ādadhīta itivad vā kṛtyena dvitīyayā vā īpsitatamatvanirdeśāt tanniṣṭhatvam evāvatiṣṭhate tatra yathā gnyarthatayā dhānavidhir avagamyamānaḥ agnīnām anekavidhipuruṣārthaupayikakarmakalāpopayogāt tadārjanenaiva kṛtārthatvam upagata iti na phalāntaram apekṣate yathā vā svādhyāyo dhyetavyaḥ ity akṣaragrahaṇārthatvāt asya vidheḥ akṣaragrahaṇasya ca phalavat karmāvabodhadvāreṇa paramapuruṣārthopāyatvāvadhāraṇān na tadatiriktadhṛtamadhukulyādiphalāntarāpekṣitvam na cādhyāpanavidhyaṅgatvaṃ svamahimnaivepsitatamasaṃskāradvārakādhikāralābhāt evam ihāpy apahatapāpmādyātmasvarūpaparijñānam eva tasya paramapuruṣārthatām avabodhayann asya vidher anyaprayojanatām āpādayati kaścit kila saṃskāravidhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇaniṣṭho pi saṃskriyamāṇaprayojanāpekṣayā paramukhaprekṣī bhavati vrīhīn prokṣati itivat kaścit tu saṃskriyamāṇaprayojanam alabhamānaḥ tadīpsitatamatvānirvahaṇāt saṃskāravidhitvam eva jahāti saktūn juhoti itivat yathoktam bhūtabhāvyupayogaṃ hi dravyaṃ saṃskāryam iṣyate saktavo nopayokṣyante nopayuktāś ca te kvacit iti yasya tu saṃskāryam anardham iva ratnam aparyuṣitam ivāmṛtam anastamitav iva candrabimbam aparimlānam iva śatapatram asti kas tarhi prakaraṇapāṭhāpekṣāyāṃ arthavādamukhaprekṣaṇena phalakalpanāyāṃ vā bhilāṣaḥ ata eva na kāmaśrutiprayuktatvam ādhānasya na cācāryakaraṇavidhiprayuktatvam adhyayanasyeti tasmāt svādhyāyādhyayanāgnyādhānavidhisamānayogakṣematvāt ātmajñānavidheḥ tatkṛtam ātmajñānam apavargārtham avagamyate tathāvidhasvarūpa ātmaiva paropādhijanitadharmarahitaḥ apavarga ity ucyate yataḥ tad idam ittham ātmajñānam eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ ananyalabhyam iti tad evopadiṣṭavān ācāryo kṣapādaḥ yat tu vijñānasattātmaśabdādyadvaitadarśanaṃ tat mithyājñānam eveti na niḥśreyasasādhanam iti nanu katham advaitadarśanaṃ mithyā kathyate tat prayuta dvaitadarśanam avidyā māyā pi mithyājñānam iti yuktam tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat nipuṇaṃ nirūpayatu bhavān tatra hi yad anyānapekṣatayā jhagiti padārthasvarūpam ava bhāsate tat pāramārthikam itarat kālpanikam iti gamyate sadrūpam eva ca ca tatrābhinnam anyanirapekṣam avabhāti bhedas tv anyāpekṣa iti nākṣajavijñānaviṣayatām upayāti tatra yathā mṛdrūpatātaḥ prabhṛti yāvat kumbhāvasthety asminn antarāle āvirbhavatāṃ tirobhavatāṃ ca ghaṭakapālaśakalaśarkarākaṇādīnāṃ kāryāṇāṃ rūpam aparamārthasad eva vyavahārapadavīm avatarati paramārthatas tu mṛttikaiva yathā huḥ mṛttikety eva satyam iti evaṃ tad api mṛttikārūpaṃ sattāpekṣayā na paramārthasad iti sattaiva sarvatra paramārthā tad eva sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmety āhuḥ āgamaś ca ekam evādviṭīyaṃ ityādiḥ abhedam eva darśayati neha nānāsti kiñcana mṛtyos sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati iti ca na ca pratyakṣaviruddhatvam abhedaśaṃsino vaktuṃ śakyam āgamasya na hy anyaniṣedhe pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati svaūpamātragrahaṇe parisamāptavyāpāratvāt pararūpaniṣedham antareṇa ca bhedasya durpapādatvāt bhede kuṇṭham eva pratyakṣam iti katham abhedagrāhiṇaṃ āgamaṃ virundhyāt tad uktaṃ āhur vighātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ naikatva āgamas tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate  nanu yady ekam eva brahma na dvitīyaṃ kiñcid asti tarhi tadbrahma nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvatvāt muktam evāste kena tadbaddham iti kim artho yaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ prayatnaḥ kutastyo vāyaṃ vicitrajagadavabhāsaḥ avidyocchedārtho mumukṣuprayatna iti brūmaḥ tatastya evāyaṃ vicitrajāgadavabhāsaḥ keyam avidyā brahmaṇo vyatiriktā cet nādvaitam avyatireke tu brahmaiva sā tato nānyāsty eṣeti katham ucchedyeta maivam vastunīdṛśi kutārkikacodyāni kramante avidyā tv ayam avasturūpā māyā mithyāvabhāsasvabhāvā bhidhīyate tattvāgrahaṇam avidyā agrahaṇaṃ ca nāma kathaṃ vastudharmaiḥ vikalpyate nanu tattvāgrahaṇarūpā pi kasyeyam avidyā na hi brahmaṇo nityabuddhasvabhāvatvād avidyā bhavati anyas tu nāsty eva tadāśrayaḥ na ca niradhikaraṇam eva mithyājñānaṃ bhavirum arhati ucyate jīvātmanām avidyā na brahmaṇaḥ nanu ke te jīvātmanaḥ te pi brahmaṇo nyānanyatayā cintyā eva āḥ kṣudratārkka sarvatrānabhijño si brahmaiva jīvātmānaḥ na tato nye na hi dahanapiṇḍād bhedenāpi bhāntaḥ sphuliṅgāḥ agnisvarūpā na bhavanti tat kiṃ brahmaṇa evāvidyā na ca brahmaṇo vidyā yathā hy ekam eva ghaṭādyāvaraṇopahitabhedatayā bhinnam iva vibhāti nabhaḥ paṭākāśaṃ ghaṭākāśam iti tadāvaraṇavaśād eva ca rajodhūmādikaluṣitam api bhavati tadāvaraṇaviratau tu galitakāluṣyam ale tatraiva parame vyomni kīyate tathaiva jīvātmāno pi avidyākalpitabhedāḥ tatkṛtam anekaprakārakāluṣyam anubhavanti taduparame ca pare brahmaṇi līyante iti nanu evaṃ saty apy avidyāparikalpita eṣa brahmajīvātmavibhāgaḥ sā ca jīvātmanām avidyety ucyate tad etad itaretarāśrayam āpadyate avidyākalpanāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvātmānaḥ jīvātmasu ca satsu avidyeti bhavatv itaretarāśrayam avidyāprapañca evāyam aśeṣaḥ kasyaiṣa doṣaḥ yadi vā nāditvam asya parihāro bījāṅkuravad bhaviṣyati bhavadbhir api cāyam anādir eva saṃsāro bhyupagataḥ avidyayaiva ca saṃsāra ity ucyate nanu anāder avidyāyāḥ katham ucchedaḥ kim anāder ucchedo na bhavati bhūme rūpasya bhavadbhir vā katham anādis saṃsāra ucchedyate nanu upāye saty anādir apy ucchidyate advaitināṃ kas taducchedopāyaḥ avidyaiveti brūmaḥ śravaṇamanananidhyānādir apy avidyaiva sā tv abhyasyamānā satī avidyāntaram utsādayati svayam apy utsīdati yathā payaḥpayo jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati yathā vā dravyāntararajañ kṣiptaṃ rajaḥkaluṣite mbhasi tac cātmānaṃ saṃhṛtya svaccham ambu karoti evam iyam avidyaivāvidyāntaram ucchindantī vidyopāyatāṃ ptaripadyate nanu svarūpeṇāsatyaiveyam avidyā kathaṃ satyakāryaṃ kuryāt ucyate asatyād api satyārthasampattir upapatsyate māyāsarpādayo dṛṣṭāḥ satyapralayahetavaḥ rekhāgakārādayaś cāsatyāḥ satyārthapratītyupāyā dṛśyante svarūpeṇa satyāsta iti cet kiṃ tena kriyate gakārāditvena hi te pratipādakāḥ tac caiṣām asatyam iti nanu brahmaṇo nityaśuddhatvāt jīvānāṃ ca tato nanyatvāt kathaṃ teṣv avidyā vakāśaṃ labhate parihṛtam etat ghaṭākāśadṛṣṭāntopavarṇanena api ca yathā viśuddham api vadanabimbaṃ ambumaṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādyupādhivaśena śyāmadīṛghasthūlādirūpam apāramārthikam eva darśayati tathā brahmaṇas tad abhāve pi jīveṣu tadavakāśa iti nanu paramātmano nityatvāt jīvānām apy anyonyam ananyatvam ity ekasmin buddhe mukte vā sarve baddhāḥ muktā vā syuḥ api kutarkaluṣitamate kathaṃ bidhyamāno pi na budhyase ghaṭākāśe hi ghaṭabhaṅgāt paramākāśapratiṣṭhe jāte na paṭākāśo pi tathā bhavati ekasyāpi jīvātmanaḥ upādhibhedāt sukhaduḥkhānubhavabhedo dṛśyate pāde me vedanā śirasi me vedanā iti tīvratarataraṇitāpopanatātanutaraklamasya ca yatraiva ca śarirāvayave śiśiraharicandanasthāsakam uparacayati parijanaḥ tatraiva tadduḥkhoparamānubhavaḥ nānyatreti evam ekasminn api paramātmani kalpanāmātra pratiṣṭheṣv api jīvātmasu baddhamuktavyavasthā siddhyaty eveti ekātmavāda evāyam āgamānuguṇaḥ upagantuṃ yuktaḥ nānantyam ātmanām atrābhidhīyate kapaṭanāṭakarahasyaprakriyākūrcoparacane tadanuguṇadṛṣṭāntaparamparopapādane ca kim ucyate paraṃ kauśalaṃ bhavatām pramāṇavṛttanirūpaṇe tu tapasvina eva bhavantaḥ tathā hi bhedasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt kim ayam abhedābhyupagamaḥ bhavatām uta svit abhedasyaiva pramāṇasiddhatvād iti dvayam api nāsti pratyakṣādīni hi sarvaṇy eva bhedapratiṣṭhāni pramāṇāni yat tāvat bhedasya parāpekṣatvāt akṣajajñānagamyatā nāstīti tad ayuktam abhedasya sutarāṃ parāpekṣatvāt mṛtpiṇḍāt prabhṛti ghaṭakarparacūrṇaparyantakāryaparamparāparicchede tadanugatamṛdrūpatāgrahaṇe ca sati mṛdas tadabhinnarūpatvam avadhāryeta nānyathā bhikṣavastv ācakṣate cākṣuṣaṃ vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇagrāhi nābhedaviṣaya abhedasya parāpekṣatvād iti ayam asmād anya itīyaṃ parāpekṣā pratītir iti cet ayam asminn anusyūta itīyam api parāpekṣaiva tad atra bhavān bhikṣavaś ca dvāv api durgrahopahatau bhedābhedagrahaṇanipuṇam akṣajam iti parikṣitam etadvastarataḥ sāmānyacintāyām aṅgulicatuṣṭayaṃ hi pratibhāsamānam itaretaraviviktarūpam apy anugatarūpam api prakāśata ity uktam vyāvṛttir anuvṛttir vā parāpekṣā stu vastuṣu asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvas tu bhāvā bhānty akṣabuddhiṣu yad uktaṃ āhur vidhātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣeddhṛ iti tad apy asādhu vidhātṛ iti ko rthaḥ idam api vastusvarūpaṃ gṛhṇāti nānyarūpaṃ niṣedhati pratyakṣam iti cet maivam jñānaṃ tarhi na tadbhavet anyarūpaniṣedham antareṇa tatsvarūpaparicchedasyāpy asampatteḥ pītādivyavacchinnaṃ hi nīlaṃ nīlam iti gṛhītaṃ bhavati netarathā tathā cāha tat paricchinatti anyadvyavacchinatti iti bhāvavad abhāvam api gṛhītuṃ prabhavati pratyakṣam iti ca sādhitam asmābhir evaitat tasmād itaretaraviviktapadārthasvarūpagrāhitvān nābhedaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam śabdānumānayos tu sambandhagrahaṇādhīnasvaviṣayavyāpārayoḥ bhedam antareṇa svarūpam eva nāvakalpata iti tāv ubhāv api bhedaviṣayāv eva viśeṣaviṣayatvābhāve pi liṅgasāmānyasya taditaravilakṣaṇasya paricchedāt bhedaviṣayam anumānam śabdasya tu padātmanaḥ tadvadādivācyabhedarūpasya tu parasparoparaktapadārthapuñjasvabhāvaḥ itarapadārthaviśeṣitānyatam apadārtharūpo vā vākyārtho viṣaya iti pūrvam eva nirūpitam ataḥ sarvathā na bhedasya pramāṇabādhitatvam nāpy abhedagrāhi kiñcana pramāṇam asti yathoktenaiva nyāyena santu āgamaḥ paṭhitaḥ ekam evādvitīyam neha nānāsti kiṃ cana ityādiḥ tasyārthavādatvān na yathāśruta evārtho grahītavyaḥ nanu siddhe py arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagatam eva bhavadbhiḥ bāḍham abhyupagatam kin tu dhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nāciḥ ity evamādīnāṃ pratyakṣādiviruddhārthābhidhāyināmarthavādināṃ mukhyāṃ vṛttim apahāya gauṇyāpi vṛttyā vyākhyānam āśritam evam idam api vacanaṃ itarapramāṇaviruddham artham abhidadhat anyathā vyākhyāyate ye tu pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthānuvādino na bhavanti arthavādāḥ teṣām astu svarūpe prāmāṇyaṃ vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā ity evamādīnām tasmāt sukhaduḥkhāvasthābhede pi nāvasthātur ātmano bhedaḥ dehendriyādinānātve pi vā na tasya nānātvam ity evaṃ yathākathaṃ cid ayam arthavādo yojanīyaḥ abhedopadeśī tu tatparaḥ śabdaḥ vidhirūpa iha nāsty eva evam āgamabalād api nādvaitasiddhiḥ yat punaḥ avidyādibhedacodyam āśaṅkyāśaṅkyaparihṛtam tatrāśaṅkā sādhīyasī samādhānaṃ tu na peśalam tattvānyatvābhyām anirvacanīyeyam avidyeti ko rthaḥ anādinā prabandhena pravṛttā varaṇakṣamā yatnocchedyāpy avidyeyaṃ asatī kathyate katham astitve ka enām ucchindyād iti cet kātarasantrāso yam satām eva hi vṛkṣādīnāṃ ucchedo dṛśyate nāsatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnām tad iyam ucchedyatvād avidyā nityā mā bhūt satī tu bhavaty eva nityaṃ na śakyam ucchettuṃ sad anityaṃ tu śakyate asattvam anyat anyā ca padārthānām anityatā na ca tattvāgrahaṇamātram avidyā saṃśayaviparyayāv apy avidyaiva tau ca bhāvasvabhāvatvāt katham asantau bhavetām grahaṇaprāgabhāvo pi nāsann iti śakyate vaktum abhāvasyāpy astitvasamarthanād iti sarvathā nāsatī avidya asattve ca niṣiddhe syāḥ sattvam eva balād bhavet sadasadvyatirikto hi rāśir atyantadurlabhaḥ sattve ca dvitīyāyā avidyāyā bhāvān nadvaitam yat tu brahmaṇaḥ satataprabuddhatvāt avidyākṣevatā neti jīvānām avidyāspadatvam abhihitam avidyoparame brahmaṇi parame ta eva ghaṭākāśaval līyanta iti ca tad api na caturaśram ākāśāvacchedahetoḥ ghaṭāder ghaṭamānatvāt avidyāyās tv asattvāt tatkṛtaḥ paramātmano vaccheda iti viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ avacchedakābhāvāc ca jīvavibhāgakalpanā pi niravakāśaiva yac ca itaretarāśrayatvaṃ parihartum anāditvam āveditaṃ avidyāyāḥ tatra bījāṅkuravat vādyantaropagatasaṃsāravac ca tasyāḥ satyatvam eva syāt anādiprabandhaprapravṛttatve sattve cāsyāḥ pratikūlahetvantaropanipātakṛtam apākaraṇam ucitam ekātmavādināṃ tu tadatidurghaṭam ity anirmokṣa eva syāt yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ svabhāvikīm avidyāṃ ca nocchettuṃ kaścid arhati vilakṣaṇopapāte hi naśyet svābhāvikaṃ kva cit na tv ekātmā bhyupāyānāṃ hetur asti vilakṣaṇaḥ iti yat punaḥ avidyaiva vidyopāya ity atra dṛṣṭāntaparamparodghāṭanaṃ kṛtaṃ tad api kleśāya nārthasiddhaye sarvatropāyasya svarūpena sattvāt asataḥ khapuṣpāder upāyatvābhāvāt rekhāgakarādīnāṃ tu varṇarūpatayā sattvaṃ yady api nāsti tathāpi svarūpataḥ sattvaṃ vidyata eva nanu gakāro yam iti gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa rekhāsanniveśaḥ arthapratyāyako bhavati na cāsau tena rūpenāsti maivam svarūpena sato rthasya rūpāntareṇāpi gṛhyamāṇasya kūṭakārṣāpaṇāder iva vyavahārahetutā dṛśyate ca yuktā ca yas tu svarūpata eva nāsti na tasya svātmanā paratmanā vā vyavahārāṅ gatā samasti rekhāsanniveśaś ca svarūpeṇa sann iti varṇātmatvenāsann api tatkāryāya paryāpnuyāt na tv ayam avidyayāṃ nyāyaḥ svarūpāsattvat tasyāḥ sarpādau tu sarpādisvarūpavat tadjñānasyāpi tatkāryatvam avagatam ata eva śaṅkāviṣasyāpi svaśāstreṣu cikitsām upadiśanti evaṃ vanaguhākuharadeśād eṣa niśṛtaḥ kesarī saroṣamita evābhivartate ity asatye py ukte yad bhīrūṇāṃ palāyanādi śūrāṇāṃ ca sotsāhamāyudhodyamanādi satyaṃ kāryam upalabhyate tatra siṃhajñānasya tatkāryatvāt nāsata evopāyatvam etena pratibimbadṛṣṭānto pi pratyākhyātaḥ khaṅgādeḥ mukhādikāluṣya kalpanākāraṇasya tatra sadbhāvāt iha tu tadabhāvād iti yad api baddham uktavyavasthāsiddhaye pādavedanādyudāhṛtam tad apy evam apākṛtam avacchedakasya pādādeḥ tatra tāttvikatvāt iha tu bhedakalpanābījam advaitavādināṃ durghaṭam iti bahuśaḥ pradarśitam tatrāyaṃ vastusaṅkṣepaḥ avidyāyām asatyāṃ sarva evāyaṃ yathodāhṛto vyavahāraprakāraḥ tatkṛta iti nāvatiṣṭhate satyāṃ tu tasyāṃ nadvaitam iti ata evāha sūtrakāraḥ saṅkhyaikāntāsiddhiḥ pramāṇopapattyanupapattibhyām iti yadi tāvad advaitasiddhau pramāṇam asti tarhi tad eva dvitīyam iti nādvaitam atha nāsti pramāṇam na tarām advaitam apramāṇīkāyāḥ siddher abhāvād iti mantrārthavādotthavikalpamūlam advaitavādaṃ parihṛtya tasmāt upeyatām eṣa padārthabhedaḥ pratyakṣaliṅgāgamagamyamānaḥ etena śabdādvaitavādo pi prayuktaḥ anādinidhanaṃ brahma śabdatattvaṃ yad akṣaram vivartate rthabhāvena prakriyā jagato yataḥ iti ucyate tatra anādinidhanapadaniveditāpūrvāparāntarahitā vastusattā nityatvam brahmapadapratipāditaṃ ca vyāpitvam ity ubhayam api śabdasya prāg eva nirastam niravayavaś ca sphoṭātmā śabdaḥ pratikṣipta eva yat tu nityaṃ vyāpi ca kiṃcid ucyate tat śabdatattvam ity atra kā yuktiḥ āha śabdopagrāhyatayā ca śabdatattvam tathā hi sarvapratyaya upajāyamānaḥ nānullikhitaśabdaḥ upajāyate tadullekhavirahiṇaḥ anāsāditaprakāśasvabhāvasya pratyayasyānutpannanirviśeṣātvāt evam īdṛśam ityādiparamārśapramuṣitavapuṣi vedane vedanātmakataiva na bhavet ye pi vṛddhavyavahāropayogavaidharyād anavāptaśabdārthasaṃbandhaviśeṣavyutpattayaḥ bāladārakaprāyāḥ pramātāraḥ te pi nūnaṃ yat tat tat kim ityādiśabdajātam anullikhanto na pratyanti kim api prameyam ataḥ śabdonmoṣaprabhāvaprāptaprakāśasvabhāvatvāt sarvapratyayānāṃ śabdānuviddhaṃ  bodhakatvam iti sarvaśabdatattvam ity avadhāryatām tad āha na so sti pratyayo loke yaś śabdānugamād ṛte anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gamyate iti evam anabhyupagame tu saṃvidaḥ prakāśaśūnyatayā anadhigataviṣayaḥ sarva evāndhamūkaprāyo lokaḥ syāt āha ca vāgrūpatā ced utkāmedavabodhasya śāśvatī na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti ataḥ krameṇa tāvad evaṃ bodhyase śabdākhyaviśeṣaṇānuvedhaviśeṣā bhāvāt sarvaṃ nirvikalpakam indriyajaṃ savikalpakaṃ vā jñānaṃ śabdaviśiṣṭam artham avadyotayati gauḥ śuklo gacchatīti jātiguṇakriyāvacchinnaviṣayāvabhāsini pratyaye śabdaviśiṣṭa evārthaḥ sphuratīti budhyasva evaṃ ced boddhum avatīrṇo si śabdākhyaviśeṣaṇānuraktasya tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śabdenaiva darśayasi śabdāparityāgalabdhaprakāśasvarūpasyaiva vānubhūtyānubhavasīti so pi viśeṣyaḥ śabdarūpa eveti jānīhi tad evaṃ śabda evārthopārūḍhaḥ pratibhātīti vyavatiṣṭate ittham iyantam adhvānaṃ cet prāpto pi tad adhunā yad upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ prakāśate tasya pṛthak pradarśayitum anubhavituṃ cāśakyatvāt śabda eva tathā tathā pratibhātīti śabdavivarta evāyam arthaḥ nānyaḥ kaścid iti pratipattum arhasi yathā cāyam indriyajeṣu pratibhāseṣu prakramaḥ tathā śabdeṣv api pratyayeṣu śabdaviśiṣṭo vārthaḥ pravabhāti śabdo vārthārūḍhaḥ śabda evārtharūpeṇa vivartata iti gṛhyatām ataś ca śabdabrahmedam ekam avidyopādhidarśitavicitrabhedam avidyoparame yathāvasthitasvarūpaṃ prakāśata iti yuktam atrābhidhīyate na khalu prakāratrayam apīdam upapadyate padapadārthasaṃbandhavyutpattivirahiṇām asav āptaśabdayojanāvairūpyasvarūpamātrapratiṣṭhaviśuddhavastugrahaṇapravaṇendriyajapratyayadarśanāt vṛddhavyavahāraparicayādhigataśabdārthasaṃbandhasaṃskṛtadhiyām api śabdasmaraṇasaṃskāraprabodhahetubhūtaprathamodabhūtaviśuddhavastvavabhāsasyāparihāryatvāt yatra hi vastuni niviśamānaḥ śabdaḥ śabdavid vyavahāreṣu yo vadhṛtas taddarśane tatsaṃskāraprabodhāt sa hi smṛtipatham eti nānyatheti sāmānyaśabdeṣv api yat tat kiṃ ityādiṣu viśeṣaśabdeṣv iva saiva vārtā teṣām api vyutpattyupayogavirahe vividhavanavihāri vihaṅgakūjitādivad arthapratītihetutvānupapatteḥ savikalpakadaśāyām api na vācakaviśiṣṭavācyaṃ mecakaguṇakhacitam eva kuvalayam avalokayati loka iti vistaraśaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe parīkṣitam etat āha ca na śabdābhedarūpeṇa buddhir artheṣu jāyate prākśabdādyādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdād api hi tādṛśīti saṃjñitvamātram adhikam adhunā dhvanisannidhāne buddhim adhirohati na tadviśiṣṭo rthaḥ tasya hi na netreṇa na śrotreṇa nobhābhyāṃ na kevalaṃ manasā vā grahaṇam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt śabdo hi anekadharmake dharmiṇi eka taradharmāvadhāraṇābhyupāyo bhavati na tatrātmānam āropayati na hi dīpendriyaprabhṛtayaḥ pratītyupāyāḥ tadupeye rūpādāv ātmānam āropayanti ata eva tadupāyatvabhramakṛtas tadabhedavādo pi na yuktaḥ na hy upāyād abhinnatvaṃ tadupeyasya yujyate rūpasya na hy abhinnatvaṃ dīpād vā cakṣuṣo pi vā api ca yadi śabdād abhinno rthaḥ pratibhāty eva ko dhyāsārthaḥ abhede pi śabdam ayam eva viśvam iti tatrāpi ko dhyāsārthaḥ adhyāsa bhramas tu vaiyākaraṇānāṃ ekākāranirdeśadoṣanirmitaḥ yathāha gaur ity eva hi nirdeśaḥ vācyas tadbuddhivācinām iti kas tvayā dṛṣṭo rthaḥ iti pṛṣṭo vakti gauḥ iti kīdṛśaṃ te jñānam utpannam gauḥ iti kīdṛśaṃ śabdaṃ prayuktavānasi gauḥ iti tata eṣā bhrāntiḥ vastutas tu viviktā evaite śabdajñānārtāḥ taduktam gavi sāsnādisadrūpā gādirūpābhidhāyake nirākārobhayajñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ iti evaṃ indriyajeṣv iva śābdeṣv api pratyayeṣu na śabdasvarūpam adhyasyatīti yuktam yadi ca śabdaḥ svarūpeṇārthaṃ pratipādayati tadā akṣaśabdasyaikyāt devanavibhītakarathākṣeṣu tulyā pratītiḥ syāt na cākṣaśabdāḥ bhinnā iti vaktavyam svarūpapratyabhijñānānapāyāt taduccāreṇe cārthatrayyāṃ saṃśayadarśanāt bhavatiśabdayoś ca suptiṅantayoḥ tulyarūpatvāt adhyāsapakṣe tulyārthapratītihetutvaṃ prāpnoti tathā ca siddhasādhyabuddhiḥ saṃvedayamānāpi nihnūyeta evam agādity aśva iti ajāvaya ityādāv api draṣṭavyam śabdasya siddharūpatvāt tadadhyāsenārthabuddhāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādau na kvacit sādhyabuddhir bhavet siddhādhyāsena sādhyabuddher ananurūpatvāt jātiguṇakriyāśabdāś ca gauḥ śuklo gacchatītyādayaḥ kena kāraṇena niyatam adhyāsam anurundhata iti nāvagacchāmaḥ śabdasyārthānapkekṣanisargasiddhavaiśvarūpyakalpanābījābhāvāt pratiniyataśabdavṛtteś ca kasyacil lakṣaṇasyānualakṣaṇāt vṛkṣaplakṣaśabdayoś ca ghaṭapaṭaśabdayor iva svarūpabhedā viśeṣāt arthānapekṣitvāc ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇye śabdādhyāsavādino na bhavetām na hy ekatra vastuni vācye kvacid anayoḥ śabdayor vṛttiḥ etena nīlotpalam api pratyākhyātam tatraitat syāt na nīlaguṇaviśeṣatam idaṃ utpalaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti viśeṣyam api tu tat nirastāvayavārthaṃ aśvakarṇādivat arthāntaram evedaṃ vyutpattiprakāramātraṃ tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhvavavarṇanam iti tad etad asamīcīnam anubhūyamānāvayavārthapratītinihnavanimittānupalambhāt aśvakarṇādau hi yuktam arthāntaratvaṃ tatra hi nāśvārthaḥ na karṇārthaḥ niravayavākyārthavādaś ca prāg eva vistareṇa nirasta ity alaṃ punaruktālāpena atha śabdadvayādhyāsamātranibandhanam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ ity ucyate tad api na cāra vṛkṣas taruritiparyāyayor api tatsaṃbhave sati sāmānādhikaraṇyaprasaṅgāt api ca paryāyeṣu hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādiṣu śabdarūpabhedādhyāsapakṣe arthabuddhibhedaḥ prāpnoti na cāsāv astīti nādhyāsaḥ kiṃca saṃbandhagrahaṇanirapekṣo pi śabdaḥ svasāmarthyam anurudhyamānaḥ svādhyāsena buddhiṃ vidadhyāt tadapekṣāyāṃ vā kasya kena saṃbandha iti na budhyāmahe śabdārthasya pṛthagvyavasthitātmanaḥ tvanmate durlabhatvāt śabdavyatiriktārthopagame vā kim anena śabdādhyāsasamarthanāṅambareṇa viramyatām ato mṛgatṛṣṇānusaraṇaraṇikāt api cādhyāsaḥ kvacit sādṛśyād bhavati śuktāv iva rajatasya kvacid anurāgād bhavati lākṣāyā iva sphaṭike śabdārthayor mūrtāmūrtatayā tidūrabhinnasvarūpayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ tāvad anupapannam anurāgo pi tata eva durghaṭaḥ pṛthagdeśatvāt bhinnendriyagrāhyatvāc ca pratibimbavarṇanam api sundaram dūradeśatvena śabdārthayoḥ prāptyabhāvāt aprāptayoś ca pratibimbe dvārakodyānanivāsi vāsudevasundarīvad anatāmarasāni sāgarataraṅgapavanaparicayacaladalakalatakālāṃcchitāni svaccheṣu jyotsnāvadātadyutiṣu tuṣāragirigahvaragatatuhinaśilākarpūradarpaṇeṣu pratibimbitāni dṛśyeran atha sarvagatatvena śabdānām arthadeśe prāptir abhidhīyate tarhi sakalaśabdasārthasādhānaṇyāt atyantam adhyāsasaṅkaryam asavadhāryamāṇaviśeṣaniyamakāraṇam āpadyata ity alam atiprasaṅgena sarvathā na saṃbaddhaḥ śabdādhyāsavādaḥ vivartavādo pi na samaṃjasaḥ tathā hi vivartate rthabhāvena iti ko arthaḥ na tāvad arthātmanā śabdaḥ pariṇāmam upayāti kṣīram iva dadhirūpeṇa pariṇāmitvena vikāritayā vā kṣīrāder ivānityatvaprasaṅgāt tathābhāve pi ca nādvaitasiddhiḥ dadhna iva kṣīravikārasya śabdavikārasyārthasya tato nyatvāt anyatvāc ca bādhakāraṇakāluṣyādyupaplavavirahapratītisamarpitabhedatvāt athārthapratibhāsam asatyam apīndriyajālavad upadarśayati śabda ity ayaṃ vivarto rthaḥ so pi na yuktaḥ bāhyasya vastunaḥ padābhidheyasya jātivyaktyādeḥ vākhyavācyasyāpi bhāvanādeḥ pūrvaprasādhitatvāt avayavavyādeś cādūra evāgre samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt na cendriyajālam āyādivad ayathārthatayām iha kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ athārtharūpeṇa śabdaḥ śuktir iva rajatākāratayāvabhāsata itīyaṃ vivartavāco yuktiḥ iyam api na sādḥīyasī śuktikā hi rajatavatprakāśata iti śakyaṃ vaktum śukter ākārasārūpyeṇa ca jñānaṃ bhaved arthaprakāśakam dhūmavad dīpavad veti vaktavyaṃ yadi dhūmavat bhaved arthānumeyatvaṃ tat tvayaiva ca dūṣitam ākāradvayasaṃvittivirahān na ca dīpavat ghaṭaṃ dīpena paśyāmīty asti dvitayavedanam na tu jñānena vijñeyaṃ jñānāmīti dvayagrahaḥ yad api prakāśatvāt jñānasya pradīpavat pūrvaṃ grahaṇam uktam tad api vyākhyeyam prakāśatvād iti ko rthaḥ prakāśayatīti prakāśaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ prakāśatvam iti tat cakṣurādibhir anikāntikam uktam eva atha prakāśanaṃ prakāśaḥ tarhi prakāśatvāt iti asiddho hetuḥ na hy artha grahaṇakāle buddheḥ prakāśanam asti atha prakāśaśabdo bodhaparyāya eva prakāśatvāt bodharūpatvād ity arthaḥ tadā sādhanavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradīpasya bodharūparvābhāvāt ataś ca svasaṃvedanapakṣo na yuktiyuktaḥ svataḥ prakāśasya kasyacid apy adṛṣṭatvāt nanu jñānaśabdadīpāḥ yatraḥ svaparaprakāśā ity āhuḥ tad ayuktam śabdadīpayoḥ svagrahaṇe rthaprakāśane ca sāmagryantarasavyapekṣatvāt śabdaḥ arthaprakāśane samayagrahaṇam apekṣate svaprakāśane tu śrotram dīpo pi cakṣurādyapekṣa eva gṛhyate grāhayati cārtham iyāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ ghaṭādigrahaṇe ālokasāpekṣaṃ cakṣuḥ pravartate ālokagrahaṇe tu nirapekṣam iti naitāvatā dīpasya svaprakāśatā syāt itthaṃ ca mārjārādiniktaṃcaracakṣurapekṣayā sarva eva ghaṭādayaḥ svaprakāśāḥ syuḥ jñānasya paraprakāśakatvam eva dṛśyate na svaprakāśatvam arthaprakāśakāle tadaprakāśasya darśitatvāt mudhaiva nasmādbhaṇitasta ete trayaḥ prakāśāḥ svaparaprakāśāḥ pradīpabodhadhvaninām adheyāḥ vibhinnasāmagryabhivedyavedakāḥ ātmapratyakṣavādināṃ tu avasthābhedena grāhyagrāhakāṃśayor bhedo vidyata eveti sarvathā na svaprakāśaṃ jñānam yad apy abhihitaṃ utpadyamānam eva jñānaṃ anapekṣatvāt apraribandhatvāc ca tadaiva gṛhyate na vā kadācid iti tad apy asāṃpratam tadānīṃ tadgrahaṇasāmagryabhāvāt na cāvibandhamātreṇa pratītir avakalpate upāyaviraheṇāpi tadā jñānasya na grahaḥ na ca jaiminiyā iva vayaṃ jñānaṃ nityaparokṣam ācakṣmahe jñāto mayā yam arthaḥ iti kālāntare tadviśiṣṭārthagrahaṇadarśanāt śuklaḥ paṭa iti jñāne yathā sau bhāti tadguṇaḥ tathā jñāto rtha ity atra bhāty artho dhīviśeṣaṇaḥ na viśeṣye ca saṃvittiḥ agṛhītaviśeṣaṇā nānusāyadhiyaṃ vetthaṃ pratīyata kramāgrahāt na ca  nityaparokṣā buddhiḥ anumātum api na śakyata iti ca vicāritam eva tad alam anayā kathayā kim iti śakyasutsṛjya śrītriyam idānīm anuyujmahe ataś ca yad uktaṃ jñānapṛṣṭāvamarśadarśanāt jñānagrahaṇapūrvakam arthagrahaṇam iti tan na sārvatrikam api tu kvacid eva jñānaviśiṣṭārthasaṃvedanāt tathā bhyupagamyate tasmāt arthagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ jñānasyānavabhāsāt nirākāravasāyavirahāc ca jñānasyaivāyam ākāra iti kadāśāpralapitam etad aruṇāmbarāṇām yat punar abhyadhāyi jñānākārapakṣe kalpanā lpīyasīti tatra yathoktanītyā pratyakṣagamye bāhye grāhye rthākare kalpanoktiḥ kīdṛśī kīdṛśaṃ vā tadalpatvam mahattvaṃ veti ubhayasiddhatvam pai yad avādi jñānasya tatra yadi pramāṇāyattā vastusthitiḥ artho py ubhayasiddha eva icchādveṣanibandhanāyāṃ tu vastusthitau jñānam api katham ubhayasiddhaṃ syād iti yat kiṃcid etat yat punar idam abhihitaṃ abhyupagamyāpi bāhyam arthaṃ apratyākhyeyaḥ pratikarmavyavasthāsiddhaye jñānasyākārayoga iti tad api na sāṃpratam pratikarmavyavasthāyāḥ prakārāntareṇāpy upapatteḥ yady api anekasannidhāne nīlajñānam upajāyate yady api ca bodhasvarūpatvam aśeṣasādhāraṇam tathāpi nīlenaiva karmakārakeṇa tad upajanitam iti nīlaniṣṭam evāvatiṣṭate cakṣurādinā pi tajjanitam iti cet satyaṃ janitam na tu karmaṇā satā nīlena tu karmabhūtena tad utpadyata iti tad ekaviṣayam eva bhavati kuta eṣa niyama iti cet vastusvabhāvakṛta eva ākārapakṣe pi samāno yaṃ paryanuyogaḥ yad ucyate kim iti nīlam eva karmakārakam kim iti vā karmaviṣayam eva jñānam iti tatra vastusvabhāvair uttaraṃ vācyam ākāram api ca jñānam upādānaṃ karmakārakasyaiva katham upādadīta na kārakāntarasya ity atrāpi vastusvabhāva eva śaraṇam iti arthasya ca jñānajanakatvaṃ anvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate yadā hi devadattārthī kaścid vrajati tadgṛham tatrāsannihitaṃ cainaṃ gatvā pi na sa paśyati kṣaṇāntare sa āyāntaṃ devadattaṃ nirīkṣate tatra tatsadasattvena tathātvaṃ veti taddhiyaḥ anāgate devadatte na devatattajñānam udapādi tasminn āgate ca tad utpannam iti tadbhāvabhāvitvāt tajjanyaṃ tad avasiyate itthaṃ ca tajjanyatvenaiva tatra niyamasiddheḥ alam ākārakalpanayā etena puruṣapravṛttir api niyataviṣayā vyākhyātā sādhakatamatvaṃ tu sāmagryāḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇe nirṇītam eva yas tu lokiko vyapadeśa udāhṛtaḥ so pi vyabhicarati nīlo rtho yam yatas tadviṣayaṃ jñānam utpannam ity api na vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ tasād arhte saty api sākāraṃ jñānam eṣitavyam iti yad uktaṃ tad anupapannam yad apy avarṇi sahopalambhaniyamād abhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ iti tad api bālabhāṣitam iva naḥ pratibhāti abhede sahārthānupapatteḥ atha ekopalaṃbhaniyamāt iti hetvartho vivakṣitaḥ tad ayam asiddho hetuḥ nīlādigrāhyagrahaṇasamaye tadgrāhakānupalambhāt grāhakākārānuvedharahitatadvicchinnabāhyagrāhyamātrapratibhāsa evāyaṃ nīlam idam ityādiḥ darśitaḥ kvacic ca grāhyākārānupaśliṣṭakevalagrāhakāvamarśanam api dṛśyate na smarāmi mayā ko pi gṛhīto rthas tadā iti tad evam itaretaravibhaktajñānārthākārasaṃvedanāt katham ekopalambhaniyamād abhedo nilātaddhiyoḥ ity ucyate nīlataddhiyoḥ iti vadatā bhavatā ṣyeṣa bheda eva nirdiśyate paramatānuvādamātram etad iti cet na abhede pṛthaṅnirdeśasyāpy aghaṭamānatvāt tsmād api na jñānasyāyam ākāraḥ yad apy uktaṃ asaty api bāhye rthe svapnagandharvanagaramāyādiṣu jñānasyākāravattā dṛśyata iti tasyaivāyam ākāro yukta iti tad api durāśāmātram sarvatra jñānād vicchinnasvagrāhyākārasya pratibhāsanāt tathā hi bhramajñāneṣu catuṣṭayo gatiḥ ātmakhyātiḥ asatkhyātiḥ akhyātiḥ viparītakhyātir vā tatra rajatam idam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikārthapratibhāsāt tanmate ca saṃcitter aparokṣatvāt rajatādhigamābhimānena tadarthinas tatra deśakālavyavahitānubhūtapūrvapadārthaviṣaya eva bhrānto pi pratyayaḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ bhavati na tv atyantāsadarthaviṣayaḥ tathā hi dvividhā bhrāntiḥ bāhyendriyajā mānasī ca tatra bāhyendiryaje bhramajñāne āveditam jñānatve tu tasya kā yuktiḥ na ca jñānayoḥ yugapad utpannayoḥ kramabhāvinor vā grāhyagrāhakabhāva upapadyate yaugapadye savyetaragoviṣāṇavat grāhyagrāhakaniyamābhāvāt kramapakṣe pi pūrvam nāma sāmānyaṃ grāhyagrāhakayor anugatam gotvam iva śāvaleyādau vibhāt ato vicchinnaś cet grāhakāt grāhyāṃśaḥ so rtha eva bhaved iti na jñānasyāyam ākāraḥ yat tu saṃsargadharmaḥ ākāro na bhavatīti evāvayavāvayavaparyālocanayā ṇusaṃcayamātram evāvaśiṣyate nānyat saṃcayo pi ca vyatiriktāvyatiriktatayā cintyamāno nāsty evety aṇava evāvaśiṣyante paramāṇavo pi ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt paramāṇoṣṣaṅaṃśatā vadantaḥ prāktanebhyo pi bhikṣubhyaḥ kṛpaṇatarā iva lakṣyante apūrvaṃ eṣa tarkamārgaḥ yatra pratītim utsṛjya tarjanīvisphoṭanena vastuvyavasthāḥ kriyante dṛḍhena cet pramāṇena bādhādirahitātmanā gṛhīta evāvayavī kim ebhir bālavalgitaiḥ atha nāsti pramāṇena kenacid tad upagrahaḥ etad evocyatāṃ vṛttivikalpaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam na ca śaknuyaḥ pade pade vayam ebhir abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid apaśyadbhiḥ tad eva punaḥ punaḥ pṛcchadbhiḥ śākyahatakais saha kalahamatimātraṃ kartum savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti sādhitam nirvikalpakenāpi śabdollekhamātrarahitaṃ savikalpakagrāhyam eva vastu gṛhyata iti ca darśitam ekākāraviṣayavyatirekeṇa ca tadbuddher ekakāryatvaikadeśādyanyathāsiddhinibandhanatvam api na kiṃcid vaktuṃ śakyata ity api varṇitam kvacid vā pṛtanāvanādau bādhakopanipātāt ekāvagatimithyātvāt na sarvatra mithyātvakalpanā yuktety apy yuktam kiṃ vā tad asti yat sāmānyasamarthanāvasare nākathitam tasmāt tayaiva nītyā vayavy api siddha eva tadgrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya nirapavādatvāt yat tu deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād iti tatrāvayavāśritatvam eva nimittaṃ nāsattvam deśabhedena hi jñānaṃ taddeśasya kathaṃ bhavet na hi kaścit svatantro sau api tv avayavāśritaḥ yāvatāṃ grahaṇo py asmin buddhir bhavati tāvatām apekṣate sau  grahaṇaṃ na sarveṣām iti sthitiḥ vivicyamāneṣv aṃśeṣu yuktas tadanupagrahaḥ tadāvayavināśo hi buddhau viparivartate avayavavabibhāgo hy avayavino nināśahetuḥ tasmin buddhyā samullikhyamāne vayavivināśo pi nānullikhito bhaved iti katham avayavī tadānīṃ gamyata bṛttiś cāvayaveṣv asya vyāsajyaiveti gamyate na praty avayavaṃ tasya samāptir vyaktijātivat vyāsajyavartamāno hi na khalv avayavāntaraiḥ vartate tadasaṃvitteḥ kintu vartata eva saḥ tathā cāhuḥ vartata iti brūmaḥ anāśritasyānupalaṃbhāt vṛttir evaṃvidhā nyatra kvadṛṣṭeti yad ucyate pratyakṣadṛṣṭa evārthe dṛṣṭāntānveṣaṇena kim tasmāt pratyakṣata evāvayavavṛtter avayavinaḥ upalabdheḥ na tadvṛttau vikalānām avasaraḥ sraksūtrādivṛttir api tathā darśanād abhyupagatā tad iyam avayavivṛttir apīdṛśī dṛśyaprānā kim iti nihnūyate na cāvayavigrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya kaścid api vādaḥ samasti adṛṣṭakāraṇodbhūtaṃ anāvirbhūtabādhakam asandigdhaṃ ca vijñānaṃ kathaṃ mithyeti kathyate na ca senāvanavad avayavigrahaṇaṃ abhidhātum ucitam abādhitatvāt senādau bādhakasadbhāvāt api ca gajavājipadātipīlupalāśaśiṃśapādidarśanasya tatra ghaṭamānatvāt tatsamavāyi senāvanādipratītir upapadyetāpi iha tu kiṃ samudāyaviṣayaḥ paṭapratyaya iti cintyam tantusamudāyālambana iti cet tantupratyaya idānīṃ kim ālambanaḥ so pi svāvayavālambana ity evam avayavāvayavanirūpaṇe paramāṇavaḥ pratyaśvaśamīśiṃśapādisthānīya vaktavyāḥ teṣāṃ ca tadvat grahaṇam anupapannaṃ atīndriyatvād iti na tadālambano vayavipatyayaḥ tasmād avayavī pratyakṣagrāhyo stīti siddham paramāṇavo pi kāryānumānapariniścitanityaniravayavasvarūpāḥ santīti pūrvam eva samarthitam ato na ṣaṭkayogādinā sāvayavatvam eṣāṃ upapādayituṃ pāryate mūrtatvam apy anityatāyām aprayojakam iti darśayiṣyate ataḥ prameyaparyālocanavartmanā pi śūnyavādasamarthanaṃ na suśakam prameyavicāne pi hi pramāṇavṛttam eva parīkṣyate ataś ca pramāṇacarcāto bibhyadbhiḥ prapalāyya yā prameyakathābīthī tathāgataivalambitā tasyām api saiva bhīṣaṇamukhī pramāṇacarcikaivopanatā sarvatī vipadā mārga ādeśayitum udyate vidhau vidhuratāṃ yati prapalāpya kva gamyate tasmāt pramāṇato śakye śakye vā vastunirṇaye evaṃ prāyam ayuktaṃ vaḥ kuśakāśāvalambanam evaṃ niṣphalam utsṛthya śūnyavādabakavratam bāhyenaivārthajātena vyavahāro vidhīyatām atha asthāśaithilpajananāya sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ nirālambanaṃ ity upadiśyate tarhi kim anena mṛṣodyena saty apy ātmani satsv api sreṣu padārtheṣu viṣayadoṣadarśanadvāreṇa bhavaty eva vivekavatāṃ vairāgyam iti tadupajananāya śūnyavādādivarṇanaṃ vakraḥ panthāḥ pratyuta pājāo mumukṣuḥ kṣaṇikanirātmyaśūnyatādivacanaṃ yuktibādhitam avabuddhyamānaḥ vaṃcanām ayam iva tadupadeśam āśaṅkate sa eṣa buddhiśūnyānāṃ śūnyavādaparigrahaḥ pratāraṇaparāṇāṃ vā na tu tattvārthadarśinām tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇo yaṃ śabdādyadvaitapakṣavat vjñānādvaitapakṣo pi gandharvanagarāyate tad evam advaitadṛśā na dṛśyate janasya niḥśreyasasaṃpadāgamaḥ ato yathoktātmasutattvacintayā kṛtī vyavasyed apavargasiddhaye sāṅkhyair yas tv apavargasādhanavidhāv uktaḥ prakṛtyātmanoḥ anyatvāvagamo bhyupāya iti sa prāg eva nirvāsitaḥ ajñā śaktimati vikārabahulā badhnaty kiṃcitkaraṃ bhūyo na prakṛtiḥ pumāṃsam iti vā kas tāṃ niyantuṃ kṣamaḥ puṃsā na kiṃcid api bandhanidhānabhūtaṃ atyalpamātram api karma kṛtaṃ kadācit mathnāti taṃ prakṛtir eva niraṅkuśaiṣā mattā kareṇur iva padmavanāni bhūyaḥ kacaniluṃcanadikpaṭadhāraṇakṣitidharākramaṇakramapūrvakam kṣapaṇākās tv apavargamuśantyamī hy tiratāṃ paramārthavidas tu te lomnāṃ nityasaṃbhavāt khalatayo mokṣaṃ kṣaṇāt prāpnuyuḥ saṃsāroparamo digambaratayā sadyastiraścāṃ bhavet muktāḥ syuḥ giriśṛṅgavāsi na ime śaśvattadārohaṇāt jantunām apavargavatmaṃ nikaṭaṃ kenedṛśaṃ darśitam tasmād ātmajñānaṃ santaḥ mokṣaprāptau hetuṃ prāhuḥ tīrthe tīrthe tac cācāryaiḥ tais tair uktaṃ saṃjñābhedaiḥ yad apīha kecid vikalpam īśvarapraṇidhānam āhur apavargaṃ sādhanam idam ātmadarśanam avādi tair api prathito hi pūraṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ dṛṣṭā vādyantarāṇāṃ gatir iyam iyatī nāpavargasya mārgaṃ spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ samarthāsti iti ciram iha śvabhra eva bhramanti nedīyān eṣa tasmād bhavamarupatitaiḥ pramāṇaprameyapadasaṃgṛhītasyāpi nyāyapravṛttiprayojanatayā pṛthagvyutpādanīyatvasya prāg eva samarthitatvāt prathamasūtre ca prameyānantaraṃ saṃśayoddeśāt uddeśānukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitum āha samānānekadharmopapatter vipratipatter upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ  nanu saṃśayasya samānadharmopapattyādikāraṇabhedena paṃcavidhatvāt sāmānyasakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣalakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni tatra sāmānyalakṣaṇe vibhāge ca sūtradvayam viśeṣalakṣaṇārthaṃ ca paṃcānāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ sūtrapaṃcakam ity evaṃ saptra sūtrāṇi praṇetuṃ yuktāni ekaṃ cedaṃ sutraṃ śrūyate tat katham etad bhaviṣyati ucyate satyam āha bhavān kiṃ tv ekam evedaṃ sūtram āvṛttinyāyam āśritya saptadhā kalpayiṣyate tatra ācāryās tāvad evaṃ vyācakṣate samānadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ itīyatsūtraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇā pratipādikam samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ceti vibhāgasutram punaś ca samānadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśaya ity etad eva sūtraṃ prathamasya saṃśayasya viśeṣalakṣaṇapratipādikam iti nanu etad eva sūtraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇārtham iyad eva ced ayam anyūnānatiriktaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇārtham iti katham etat ucyate viśeṣasmaraṇakāraṇabhūtasādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣāgrahaṇāt viśeṣāsmṛteś ca saṃśayo bhavatīti pratyātmavedanīyaṃ tāvad etat sūtre viśeṣāpekṣa ity anena padena viśeṣasmaraṇam upadiṣṭam upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāpadena ca viśeṣāgrahaṇam itīyattāvat dvayoraṇi sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayoḥ tulyam samānaśabdas tv ākṣiptasāmānyavacanaḥ san tatsāmānyalakṣaṇam āha anugatasāmānyavacanas tu viśeṣalakṣaṇam iti kathaṃ punar ayam evākṣiptasāmānyavacanaḥ kathaṃ cānugatasāmānyavacana iti ucyate saṃśayotpattyaiva samānadharyamātram ākṣipyate yad gṛhyamāṇaṃ viśeṣasmaraṇabījasaṃskārodvodhanimittatāṃ pratipadyate tadvyatirekeṇa saṃśayānutpādāt tathā hi viruddhaviśeṣāvamarśasvabhāvas tāvat saṃśayaḥ na ca viruddhaviśeṣṇāṃ puro vasthite dharmiṇi sannihitānām avamarśanam viruddhatayaivaikatra sannidhānābhāvāt ataḥ smṛtyupārūḍhānām avamarśanam smṛtiś ca nākasmāt udbhavatīti yatsahacaritānāṃ teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ paryāyeṇa grahaṇaṃ vṛttam taddarśanasaṃskāraprabodhadvāreṇa smaraṇakāraṇam avaśyam evāśrayaṇīyam tat tu anugataṃ vā bhavatu vyāvṛttaṃ vā vipratipattyātmakaṃ vā āntaram upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthārūpaṃ vety evam ākṣiptasāmānyavācini samānaśabde paṃcasādhāraṇarūpāvagamāt sāmānyalakṣaṇārthatā yadā uv anugatam eva dharmam ārohapariṇāhādisvabhām ācaṣṭe samānaśabdaḥ tadāviśeṣalakṣaṇārtha iti tatra cetthaṃ sūtrayojanā samāno dharmaḥ pariṇāhādiḥ tasya guṇatvena prati dravyam anyatve pi tulyarūpāvagativiṣayīkṛtatvāt samānatvam upapadyate tasyopapattiḥ upalabdhiḥ athāpi sattā upapattiśabdenocyate sā py upalabdhyadhīnasthitir eva bhavatīti sarvathā samānadharmopalabdheḥ saṃśaya ity uktaṃ bhavati nanu samānadharmaḥ arthāntaraṃ dharmiṇaḥ na cārthāntaree dṛṣṭe nyatra saṃśayo bhavitum arhati na arthāntaraviśeṣatvāt arthāntaraviśeṣas tu dharmy evocyate arthāntareṇa pariṇāhādinā viśeṣyata iti tasminn eva sādhāraṇa dharmādhyāsitavastuṣi dharmiṇi nayanapathavartini tadgataviśeṣāvamarśātmā tatraiva saṃśayo jāyate yo yam ūrdhvatvaviśiṣṭo dharmo dṛśyate saḥ sthāṇur vā syāt puruṣo veti nārthāntaratvaṃ dūṣaṇam tathāpi vakrakotaratvakaracaraṇādiviśeṣadarśinaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti kāraṇāntaram ucyate upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāta iti viśeṣāgrahaṇād ity arthaḥ kathaṃ punar upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāta ity anena viśeṣāgrahaṇam ucyate ittham ucyate idantayā nidantayā vā tatropalabdhiḥ na vyavatiṣṭate anupalabdhir vā iti viśeṣagrahaṇe hi sati tadvyavasthānaṃ saṃbhavati sthāṇur ayam na puruṣa iti vakrakoṭarādiyiśeṣagrahaṇe śirāpāṇyādiparicchede tu puruṣo yam na sthāṇur iti evam anena padena viśeṣāgrahaṇam uktam tathāpi praṅkhārūḍhasya sādhāraṇadharmadarśinaḥ viśeṣānupalambhamānasyāpi na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti kāranāntaram ucyate viśeṣāpekṣa iti viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa ity arthaḥ nanu viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃśayotpattāv apekṣā nānabhūyamānatayā anubhūyamāneṣu hi teṣu saṃśayacchedo bhavati na saṃśayaḥ apkeṣāśabdārthanirūpaṇād eva vā smṛtir labhyate viśeṣāṇāṃ apkekṣā ākāṅkṣā te cānupalabhyamānāḥ pūrvānubhūtāś ca ākāṅkṣyante itīyaṃ sā teṣāṃ smṛtiḥ saṃpratyupalabhyamāneṣu ekāntān anubhūteṣu vā teṣv ākāṅkṣā  nupapatteḥ nanu samānadharmopapatteḥ viśeṣasmṛteś ceti kāraṇadvayam evāstu kiṃ viśeṣāgrahaṇena api ca viśeṣasmaraṇād eva nanv ākṣiptas tadā grahaḥ grahaṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ caiva bhavetāṃ yugapat katham asty etat kintu nātidūragatāyāṃ nijapramadāyāṃ anurāgavataḥ kāminaḥ samānadharmadarśane tadgataviśeṣādarśane tadanusmaraṇe ca sany api na bhavaty eva saṃśayaḥ ataḥ saṃśayotpattyavyabhicāre deśakālavyavahitaviśeṣāgrahaṇasiddhaye padāntaram upādīyate deśāntare kālāntare vā ciradṛṣṭānāṃ viśeṣāṇām idānīm agrahaṇaṃ saṃśayakāraṇam na viśeṣāgrahaṇamātram evam amunā padatrayeṇa saṃśayalakṣaṇam idam uktam nanu ca saṃbhūya kārakaiḥ kāryam ārabhata iti nyāyāt samānadharmopalabdhiviśeṣānupalabdhi tatsmṛtilakṣaṇakāraṇatrayajanye saṃśaye jñānayaugapadyam āpadyate kramabhāvitve hi buddhīnāṃ naikakāryotpattau yugapadvyāpāraḥ samasti viśeṣāś ca bahavo pi saṃbhavatīti tatsmaraṇāny api yugapad bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ naitad evam samānadharmagrahaṇānantaraṃ pūrvopajātavividhaviśeṣānubhavaparamparopacita pīvarasaṃskāradvārakam ekam eva tadviṣayaṃ smaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā varṇānām arthapratītau varṇitam upalabdyanupalabdyavyavasthāsūcitā ca viśeṣānupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhir eva na sā jñānātmikā kintu jñānānutpāda iti tat tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam api bhavan na jñānātmakam iti dve eva jñānātmake kāraṇe samānadharmagrahaṇam viśeṣasmaraṇaṃ ca tayoḥ prathamaṃ samānadharmagrahaṇaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ viśeṣasmaraṇaṃ ca dvitīyam avinaśyadavasthaṃ saṃśayam upajanayataḥ īdṛśayoś ca jñānayoḥ yougapadyam aviruddham iti śāstre sthitam evaṃ samānadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣāgrahaṇāt viśeṣāsmṛteś ca saṃśaya iti paratrayeṇa saṃśayalakṣaṇam anavadyam ucyata iti tad etad ācāryavyākhyānam arocayantah pare parathā vyācakṣate sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat vimarśapadenaiva pratipādyate na hi paryāyoccāraṇamātram idaṃ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kintu saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam vimarśa iti lakṣaṇapadam pramāṇapadavac ca nirvacanasavyapekṣam etatpadaṃ lakṣaṇapratipādanakṣamaṃ bhavati viruddhārthāvamarśo vimarśaḥ sthāṇur vā puruṣo veti iyatā ca sajātīyasaṃśayapaścakānugataṃ vijātītebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavaccinnaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati saṃśayītpādakakāraṇaparigaṇanaṃ punar indriyārthasannikarṣotpannagrahaṇavad ihāpi nopayujyate kāraṇāntrāṇām api ātmamanaśannikarṣādīnāṃ aparihāryatvāt athānyāsādhāraṇakāraṇanirdeśaś cikīrṣitaḥ tenāpi ko rthaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇasya pratipādayiṣitatvāt tasya ca vimarśapadād eva siddhatvāt upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāpadapratipādyamānaviśeṣāgrahaṇavarṇanaṃ cātīvakliṣṭam iti punaś ca viśeṣalakṣaṇaprasaṅge yathāśrutam eva tadvyākhyeyam ity atibhāraḥ evaṃ vimarśapadena vijātiyavyavacchedakāriṇi sāmānyalakṣaṇe varṇite samānadharmopapatteḥ ity ekam eva padaṃ sajātīyasaṃśayāntaravyavacchedakāri viśeṣalakṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavatīti tatrāpi padatrayajojanaṃ nopāyujyata iti atra vyākhyānadvaye pi kataras sādhv iti tadvidaḥ pramāṇam anekadharmopapatteh ity atrāpi tripadaparigrahaṇenaina lakṣaṇam ācāryā varṇayanti anekadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣa ity asādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣagrahaṇāt viśeṣasmṛteś ca saṃśaya ity arthaḥ ekaikapadopādānaphalaṃ ca pūrvavad atrāpi darśayitavyam na cendriyamanaśaṃyogādikāraṇāntaraparigaṇanacodanaṃ yuktam teṣāṃ sarvabuddhijanmasutulyatvāt ihāsādhāraṇasaṃśayajñānakāraṇopadeśaprastāvād iti anye tu sāmānyalakṣaṇasampādite vijātīyavyavacchede kevalasajatīyavyavacchinnalakṣaṇapradhitapādananipuṇam anekadharmopapattipadam eva pūrvavad varṇayācakruḥ nanu anekadharmaśabdena katham asādhāraṇo dharma ucyate evam ucyate samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekam tasmāt parāvṛtto dharmaḥ anekadharma iti yad vā kim anayā kliṣṭakalpanayā asty ayam ekaśabdaḥ samānaparyāyaḥ tatra spaṣṭa eva nañsamāsenāsamānadharmaḥ anekadharmaḥ sādhāraṇadharma ucyate eveti bhavatv evam asādhāraṇadharmasya tu kathaṃ saṃśayakāraṇatvam iti cintyam viruddhaviśeṣānusmaraṇakāraṇakaṃ hi saṃśayam āhuḥ viśeṣāṇāṃ ca smaraṇahetoḥ saṃskārasya tadudbodhakaṃ bhavati yena sahaite pūrvaṃ paryāyeṇopalabdhāḥ asādhāraṇadharmasya tu asādhāraṇadharmatvād eva na kenacit saha pūrvaṃ grahaṇam abhavat bhāve tu asādhāraṇadharmataiva hīyetety ataḥ katham asau tatsmṛtihetuḥ vyāvṛttatayaiva tu smṛtihetutve sya tailokyasmaraṇanimittatā prasajyeta tato pi vyāvṛttatvād iti naiṣa doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇāsya smṛtihetutvāt iha hi keṣucit keṣucit asādhāraṇadharmā dharmiṣu bhavantaḥ tadgatasādhāraṇadharmāntarasahacaritā bhavanti tad yathā pṛthivītvagandhatvādayo dharmāḥ pṛthivyām asādhāraṇās santaḥ snehavattvādidharmāś ca tathaivāpsu dravyatvasahacāriṇo dṛṣṭāḥ rūpādiṣu rūpatvādidharmāḥ guṇatvasahacāriṇaḥ utkṣepaṇādiṣu utkṣepaṇatvādidharmāḥ karmatvasahacāriṇaḥ evaṃ prakṛte pi dharmiṇi kaimiścid asādhāraṇo dharma upalabyamānaḥ kenāpi sādhāraṇadharmam antareṇa sahacarito bhavatīti bhavati viśeṣānusmṛtidvāreṇa saṃśayasādhanam nanu evaṃ tarhi vyāvṛttatvād eva samānadharmādeṣu saṃśayaḥ nānekadharmād iti maivam anekadharma evāsau tena vartmanā viśeṣān smārayan saṃśayajanmane kalpate asati hi tasmin kim ālambanaṃ vyāvṛttatvaṃ syād ity alam atisūkṣmekṣikayā tasyodāharaṇaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaṃ  śabde vibhāgajatvam yathā hi pṛthivyādau pṛthivītvādiḥ vyāvṛtto dharmaḥ dravyatvādyanugatadharmasahacarī dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ śabde vibhāgajatvaṃ dharmaḥ kenacit dravyatvādīnām anyatamena dharmeṇa sahacaritaḥ syād iti saṃśayaḥ nanu vibhāgajatvam asādhāraṇo na bhavaty eva śabdadharmaḥ vibhāgajavibhāge pi bhāvāt tathā ca prayogah guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāgajatvāt vibhāgajavibhāgavat iti tatra kecid āhuḥ satyam asti vibhāge pi vibhāgajatvam śabde tu viśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ dvividho hi vibhāgajo vibhāgaḥ kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakaḥ kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvakaś ca kāraṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇam atrābhipretam kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakas tāvat tantuvibhāgāt tantvākāśavibhāgaḥ kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvakas tu aṅgulyākāśavibhāgāt hastākāśavibhāgaḥ hastākāśavibhāgād api śarīrākāśavibhāga iti śabdas tu niyamenaiva kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakavibhāgaprabhavaḥ vaṃśadalavibhāgāt dalākāśavibhātaḥ dalākāśavibhāgāc cāsamavāyikāraṇāt śabdo niṣpadyata ity anena viśeṣeṇāsyedṛśavibhāgajatvasyāsādhāraṇatvaṃ śabdadharmasyocyata iti anye tu vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathāśrutasyaiva śabde vibhāgajatvasyāsādhāraṇadharmatām ācakṣate nanu kim iti vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgaṃ te na mṛṣyante asti hy ayaṃ tatsiddhau nyāyaḥ yadā hy avayave karmotpannaṃ avayavāntarād vibhāgaṃ karoti na tadākāśādideśāt yadā tv ākāśādideśāt na tadā ayavāntarād iti sthitiḥ kiṃ kṛtā punar ayaṃ sthitir asti cet ucyate yā hy avayavakriyānabhobhāgavibhāgakāriṇī nāsau dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratipakṣabhūtaṃ vibhāgam ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate dinakarakiraṇaparāmarśopajanitakam aladalavikāsakārikriyāvat tad eva katham iti cet kamalasya mukulavikāsadaśayoḥ pratyabhijñāyamānatvenāvināśaniścayāt iyaṃ tu pāṭyamānavaṃśalakriyā dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvibhūtavibhāgārambhikā dravyānāraṃbhika saṃyogapratidvaṃddvivibhāgajanikopalabhyate iti nāsau nabhao vibhāgam ārabhetety ata eṣā sthitir astīti vibhāgajavibhāgakalpanā krityate saṃyogāntaṃ karmeti tāvat sthitam anyathā hi tasya kālāntarasthāyitvaṃ nityadravyasamavetasya ca nityatvaṃ syāt tasmāt karmaṇo  cirajīvitatvāt tadvināśakena saṃyogena bhavitavyam uttaras tu saṃyogaḥ pūrvasaṃyogoparame sati jāyate nānyathā na ca vibhāgavyatiriktaḥ kaścana saṃyogasya hantā samasti karma tūttarasaṃyogajanmanirjātakauśalam na hi prāktanasaṃyogavināśāya prakalpate tasmāt vibhāgenaiva saṃyogavirodhinā bhavitavyam yad adhikaraṇo vibhāgaḥ tadadhikaraṇam eva saṃyogam upaśamayati na tv aṅgulivibhāgaḥ kuṇḍavadarasaṃyogopamardāya prabhavatīty ataḥ na vaṃśadalavṛttivibhātaḥ dalākāśasaṃyogam upahantum alam iti nūnaṃ dalākāśasaṃyogavairiṇā dalākāśavibhāgena bhavitavyam tad idānīṃ tasyotpattikāraṇacintāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ vaṃśadalavibhāgamātropajanane caritārthatvāt taṃ nirmāya vibhāgāntaranirmāṇe viramya vyāpārāsaṃvedanāt avaśyaṃ vaṃśadalavibhāta eva prtyāsannatayā dalākāśavibhātārambhako bhyupagamanīyaḥ evam anabhyupagame karmanityatvaprasaṅgād iti atra vadanti na karmanityatvaṃ anabhyupagamyamāne pi vibhāgaje vibhāge bhaviṣyati uttarayogasya karmavināśahetor astitvāt pūrvasaṃyogānuparame kathaṃ tadutpāda iti cet bāḍham uparata eva pūrvasaṃyogaḥ kas tasyoparamahetur iti cet karma hy uttarasaṃyoganimittaṃ yad upeyate tad eva pūrvasaṃyogadhvaṃsakāri bhaviṣyati na yajjanane śaktam aśaktaṃ tadvināśane hetur dahanasaṃyogaḥ pākajotpādanāśayoḥ yathā ca vibhāve dhikaraṇaniyamaḥ yadādhāro vibhāgaḥ tadādharam eva saṃyogaṃ niruṇaddhi tathā karmaṇy api niyamaḥ karmāpi svāśrayasya yad anya diksaṃyoganibandhanaṃ tat tadviruddhadigvṛtteḥ saṃyogasyopamardakam iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ evaṃ karmāviṣṭasyottarasaṃyogadarśanam adūṣaṇaṃ vigantarasaṃyogasya tenopamardanāt api ca yad eva karma vaṃśadalanavibhāgakāri kathyate tad eva dalākāśavibhāgakāri bhaviṣyati ko doṣaḥ nanu vyomavibhāgakāri karma na dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratyanīkabhūtavibhārambhakaṃ ambhoruhakarmavat ity uktam satyam uktam ayuktaṃ tu śatapatrapatrakarmaṇo pi dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratikūlavibhāgārambhakatvāt tac ca karma kuṅmalakamalāt vikacakamalasyānyatvaniścayāniścitam nanu tad evedam aravindam iti saṃdehaviparyayarahitatāmarasapratyabhijñādarśanāt kathaṃ saṃkocavikāsadaśāmātrabhedāt tadanyatvam iti kṛtam anayā durā śayā śarīre pi suspaṣṭopalabhyamānaśaiśavayauvanavārdhakādidaśābhedabhinnasvarūpe pratyabhijñānadarśanāt na ca śarīrakuśeśayayoḥ viśeṣaleśam atikṛśam api paśyāma iti kutas tad ekatvam bhavatu vā puṇḍarikasyāvināśaḥ nidarśanamātram idaṃ tu varṇitam na tu pratibaddhaḥ kaścana hetur astīty abhyadhāyi yena vaṃśadalakarmaṇaḥ kokanadapallavakarmasāmyaṃ kalpyeta kriyātvaṃ tv aprayojakam eva tatkarmaṇām vicitrakāryahetutvāt yadi vā nānyo vaṃśadalavibhāgaḥ nānyaś ca tatkāryo dalākāśavibhāgaḥ kintu eka eva vibhāgo yaṃ bhedo syāśrayabhedataḥ ekatra deśe vasthānāt vyomno vaṃśadalasya ca samānadeśe vṛttitvaṃ mūrtānāṃ hi viruddhyate vyomnas sarvagatatvāt tu vidyate tatra sannidhiḥ ekadeśāśrayatve tu yad ekasmād vibhāgakṛt tad evānyata ity asti na vibhāgo vibhāgajaḥ apare punaḥ vibhāgajavibhāgaparākaraṇopārūḍharabhasāḥ saṃgirnte tiṣṭatu tāvat dūrata eva vibhāgajo vibhāgaḥ karmajo pi na vibhāgo nāma kaścid asti saṃyogavirodhini tasminn abhyupagamyamāne mudagarādivat pūrvasiddhatā vaśyaṃ bhāvinī tataś ca pūrvasiddho vibhāgaḥ saṃyogam unmūlayatīti ghaṭamudgarayor iva saṃyogavibhāgayor ekatra yugapadupalabdhir bhavet na caivam asti tasmāt saṃyogābhāvaviṣaya eva bibhaktaprtyaya iti na vibhāgālambanatāṃ pratipadyate saty api vibhāge tasmin kṣaṇe saṃyogasyāvināśāt na bhavati vibhaktapratibhāsaḥ kṣaṇāntare ca saṃyogavināśe sati bhavatīty anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ saṃyogābhāvaviṣaya evāvasīyate ity ato na pratyakṣagamyatā vibhāgasya saṃyogabhaṅgaliṅgena ca tatparikalpanakriyeva taṃ hinastīti purastād upapāditam kathaṃ tarhi vibhāgajatvaṃ śabdasya bhāṣyakāra udāhṛtavān ucyate trividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryotpatti pratividhatte samayāyikāraṇaṃ asamavāyikāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ceti tatra samavāyikāraṇaṃ tad ucayte yatrāśritaṃ kāryam upalabhyate yathā paṭasya tantavaḥ asamavāyikāraṇaṃ tu dvividham kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannaṃ kāraṇaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā vā saṃbaddham tatra kāryaikārthasamavāyena pratyāsannaṃ yathā paṭasya tantusaṃyogaḥ kāraṇaikārthasamavāyena tu pratyāsannaṃ yathā paṭarūpasya tanturūpam iti avadhṛtakāranaṃ ca tadasamavāyikāraṇam āśrayaṇīyaṃ ato buddhijanmani saty apy ekārtham amavāye nānyeṣām ātmaguṇānām icchādīnām asamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ api tv avadhṛtasāmarthyasyātmamanaśaṃyogasyaiveti samavāyasamavāyivyatiriktaṃ tu kāryotpattau nirjñātasāmarthyaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat nimittakāraṇam ucyata iti evaṃ sthite śabdasya nityatve niraste kārtyatve ca sādhite tadutpattau ākāśaṃ tāvat samavāyikāraṇam nimittakāraṇāni tu bhūyāṃsi santy eva asamavāyikāraṇaṃ tu cintyam tac cākāśāśritam avaśyam anyathā pratyāsattyabhāvāt tadguāṇntarāṇāṃ ca vibhūtvādīnāṃ anavadhṛtaśaktitvāt vaṃśadalapāṭanasamanantaraṃ ca śabdotpādadarśanāt evaṃ manyāmahe kriyā yadaiva saṃyogaṃ hanti vaṃśadalāśritam tadaiva gagate kaṃcana karoty atiśayaṃ ghruvam ākāśātiśayo yaś ca kriyājaḥ śabdakāraṇam asau vibhāganāmeti śabde tajjanyatocyate tad evam etat yathāgamamācāryamatam abhihitam asmābhiḥ etac ca matimadbhivicāraṇīyam kim ākāśātiśayamātraṃ kiṃcit asamavāyikāraṇam uta yathā mudgaradaṇḍasaṃyogakāryaṃ śabde bherīgaganasaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam evaṃ vaṃśadalavibhāgakārye tasmin dalagaganavibhāgasyeti dalākāśavibhāto pi kiṃ dalavibhāgajaḥ uta karmaja eveti sarvathā kaścid asādharaṇo dharmaḥ saṃśayahetur udāhartavya itīyatā na prayojanam viruddhā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ asty ātmety eke nāsty ātmety apre seyaṃ vipratipattir upalabhyamānā viśeṣasmaraṇadvāreṇa saṃśayam āvahati na ceha kaścid anugato vyāvṛtto vā dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ api tu vipratipattir eveti kiṃ tatrāpi tripadaparigraheṇa lakṣaṇavarṇanam ekenaiva vā padeneti pūrvavad ācāryadvayamatam anusaraṇīyam upalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ lhalvavapi bhavati saṃśayaḥ sac codakam upalabhyate yathā hradādiṣu kvacid asac ca bhāskarakarnikarapratiphalanataralitāsu maruthālīṣu tad evam upalabdhekhyavasthitatvāt kvacid upalabhyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim idaṃ sad upalabhyate kim asad iti anupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ kiṃcid asad eva nopalabhyate nabhaḥsamādi kiṃcitsad api nopalabhyate mṛdantaritaśaṅkumūlajalādi tadanyatrānupalabhyamāne saṃśete pumān kim idam asad eva nopalabhyete uta sad iti avyavasthaśabdenātra pūrvaṃ paryeyeṇa pravṛttasadasadāśritaviśeṣādarśanaṃ sūcitam idānīṃ punaḥ arthakriyāsamarthatādiviśeṣadarśanaśūnyacetasāṃ upalabdhyanupalabdhimātropapatteḥ saṃśayo bhavatīti varṇyate na caivaṃ sati sarvatrānāśvāsa iti śaṅkanīyam yathānubhavaṃ saṃśayābhyupagamāt sarvatra ca tadutpādakaviśeṣāgrahaṇatatsmaraṇādikāraṇasānidhyāsaṃbhavād iti atrāpi padatrayeṇa ekena vā padena lakṣaṇopapādanaṃ pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam nanu ca upalabdhyanupalabdhī sadasatoḥ samāna eva dharma iti pūveṇa gatārthatvam naitat pūrvanirdiṣṭasyordhvatvāder dharmasya jñeyasthatvāt upalabdhyanupalabdhyīś ca jñātṛsthatvāt ata eva ca mānasam imaṃ saṃśayam ācakṣate na bāhyadharmisaṃbaddhasādhāraṇordhvatādidharmādhigamādhīnasaṃśayavat bāhyendriyajam nanu ca upalabdhitvaṃ anupalabdhitvaṃ vā tra saṃśayakāraṇam tad dhi na jñātari vartate kuntu buddhāv iti katham ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyam evam asamānadharmo py upalabdhitādikaḥ yadāśritaḥ tad dhi boddhati vartate ato viśeṣāt pṛthag eva kathyate yathā hy asādhāraṇatāśrayaḥ evaṃ  prakāram eva ca viśeṣam āśritya kiṃcit paṃcavidhatvaṃ vipaṃcyate paramārtatas tu sarvatrānugatasaṃbandho duṣpariharaḥ viśeṣasmaraṇajanyatvāt saṃśayasya viśeṣāṇāṃ ca yena saha pūrvaṃ darśanabhūta tasminn anupalabhyamāne smaraṇāsambhavāt atas tasyānekaviśeṣānugāmitvāt samānatvam aparihāryam ata eva cākṣiptasāmānyavācinaṃ samānaśabdaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe vyācakhyur ācāryā ity alam vistareṇa iti paṃcavidhaḥ prapaṃcitaḥ muninā darśita eṣa saṃśayaḥ phalavad vyavahārahetutāṃ anumānāṅgatayā vibharti yaḥ anumānirapkeṣa eva vā kila dṛṣṭe viṣaye rthasaṃśayaḥ vahati vyavahāravartanīṃ iti pūrvaṃ ca vicāritaṃ budhaiḥ iti saṃśayaparīkṣā yamartham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam  yam ity atra deśakālapuruṣadaśābhedabhinnaprayojanaviśeṣavyāptaye vīpsā draṣṭavyā arthaḥ arthyamānaḥ ucyate na vasturūpa eva abhāvasyāpi prayojanatvasaṃbhavāt adhikāraḥ arthasya vyavasāyaḥ yaṃ yam arthaṃ āptavyaṃ hātavyaṃ vā dhikṛtya vyavasāyaḥ pravartate tat prāptaye parihārāya vā ceṣṭate puruṣaḥ tat prayojanam iti tac ca gauṇamukhyabhedena dvividham mukhyaṃ sukhaprāptiḥ duḥkhaparihāraś ca tatsādhanaṃ tu gauṇam sukhasādhanam api candanadhanasārahāramahilāri prāptavyatvāt mukhyatvena yadā vivakṣitaṃ bhavati tadā tadavāptyupāye gauṇatā draṣṭavyā tac ca prayojanaṃ deśakālapuruṣaviśeṣābhedād avyavasthitaṃ bhavati tad yathā grīṣme marusthale niśātamalātakanikaram iva kirati kiraṇamiṣeṇa pūṣaṇi tṛṣāturasya tuṣārakaṇotkaradanturamambu paramaṃ sukhasādhanam tad eva śiśire sakalajagatkampakāriṇi dāruṇasamīraṇaśithilīkṛtanīreṣu kāśmīreṣu śleṣmopacayajanitajaḍimajaṭharaśikhinaḥ khedāya jāyate tasyād aniyata evāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanabhāvo bhāvānām yady api ca yad ekadā sukhasādhanam iti viditam upayuktam atikrāntaṃ vastu tat tathāpi tajjātīyatvaliṅgāvadhṛtasukhasādhanabhāve bhāvāntare dipravartanta eva tadarthinaḥ nanu prayojanasya pravartatvam yuktam sadasadvikalpābhyām anupapatteḥ sattve karṇanāsādivat na tadarthā pravṛttiḥ asattve tu khapuṣpādivat na tarām naiṣa doṣaḥ īpsājihāsāviṣayīkṛtasya tasya pravartakatvāt na hi tat khapuṣpādivad asādhyam nāpi śiraḥpāṇyādivat siddham eva api tu sādhyatvena buddhyupārūḍhaṃ tat pravartakam iti sarvalokasākṣikam etat tasmāt icchāviṣayīkṛtaṃ tat pravartakam  iti yuktam itthaṃ pravartakatve  prayojanasyopapadite muninā bhagnā bhavanti sarve prerakapakṣāḥ parābhihitāḥ prayojanamato khilaividhivacobhir ādiśyate prayojananibandhanās tanubhṛtām aśeṣāḥ kriyāḥ krimer api yathā tathā kim api jīvitaṃ bibhrataḥ prayojanabahiṣkṛtaṃ na khalu ceṣṭitaṃ dṛśyate vaitaṇḍikaḥ prayatate nijapakṣasiddhayai tāṃ caiṣa veda parapakṣaniṣedhalakṣyām tasmād iyaṃ svamatasādhanavarjitā pi yuktā prayojanavatī bhavituṃ vitaṇḍā iti prayojanaparīkṣā laukikaparīkṣakānāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisamyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ  laukikaparīkṣikau vādiprativādinau dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇaprastāvād veditavyau na tu mūrkhapaṇḍitau prakṛtāsaṅgateḥ tayoś ca saṅgatyabhāvāt tayoś ca yasminn arthe bhāvasvabhāve abhāvatmake vā buddhisāmyaṃ prayojyaprayojakabhāvavyavasthitasādhyasādhanadharmādhikaraṇatve sādhyavyāvṛttipūrvakasādhanadharmavyāvṛttatāyāṃ vā tulyarūpā buddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasya tathāvidhadharmādhāratvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ vā vakṣyamāṇād udāharaṇalakṣaṇān mantavyam yathā cānumānalakṣaṇe tatpūrvakaṃ iti pratibandhagrahaṇopāyamātram praipāditam tatsvarūpaṃ tu avayavalakṣaṇe nirṇītaṃ udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti evam hi vādipraivādiprasiddhimātraṃ dṛṣṭāntasya darśitam rūpaṃ tu tasya dvividham api tatraiva vakṣyate sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam tadviparyayād vā viparītam iti anityaḥ śabdah kṛtakatvāt yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa iti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ yat punar anityaṃ na bhavati tat kṛtakam api na bhavaty eva yathā kāśa iti vaidharmyadṛṣṭānataḥ yathoktalakṣaṇavaikalyāt tu dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavati ābhāsabhedavibhavaḥ kathayiṣyate tu teṣām udāharaṇalakṣaṇavākprasaṅge ābhāsatā vcanadoṣakṛtā pi kācit astīti sā vayavalakṣaṇa eva vācyā dvividho pi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sudṛṣṭibhir yatno dhigantavyaḥ sa hi niścalaḥ phalanidheḥ anumānamahātaroḥ skandhaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaparīkṣā tantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ siddhantaḥ  tantryate nena padārthasthitir iti tantraṃ pramāṇam ucyate adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ tantram adhikaraṇaṃ yasya saḥ tantrādhikaraṇaḥ pramāṇamūlaka ity arthaḥ abhyupagamaḥ svīkāraḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāvavayvasthā dharmaniyamaḥ idam ittham iti idam iti sāmānyanirdeśaḥ ittham iti viśeṣanirdeśaḥ evaṃ ca tantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhānta iti sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati anye tu vyācakṣate tantram itaretarasaṃbaddhasyārthasamūhasyopadeśaḥ śāstraṃ adhikriyate ity adhikaraṇaṃ pakṣa ucyate abhyupagamaḥ yathoktaeva saṃsthitiśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate tantrasaṃśitiḥ adhikaraṇasaṃsthitiḥ abhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ ity anena tantranirdeśasāmyāt sarvatantrapratitantrasiddhāntayoḥ sūcanam itarābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ uttarayoḥ adhikaraṇabhyupāgamasiddhāntayor iti etat tu apavyākhyānam na hy evaṃ siddhāntacatuṣṭayānugataṃ kiṃcit sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati na cedaṃ vibhāgārthaṃ viśeṣasakṣaṇārtha vā sūtram tatpratipādanasyottarasūtraiḥ kariṣyamāṇatvāt ukatasya ca punarvacane prayojanābhāvāt ataḥ pūrvaprakrameṇaiva siddhāntasya sāmānyalakṣaṇavarṇanaṃ śreyaḥ tasya svakaṇṭhena vibhāgam āha sa caturvidhaḥ sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthityarthāntarabhāvāt  caruṣprakāro hi siddhāntaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ pratitantrasiddhāntaḥ adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti tatra sarvatantrāviruddhaḥ svatantre dhikṛte rthaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ atra tantraśabdena śāstram ucyate svaśāstre ya upadiṣṭo rthaḥ sarvaśāstrāviruddhaś ca sa sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ yathā cākṣuṣaṃ pramāṇam iti nanu atrāpi vividante brahmavādināṃ hi sarvaiveyaṃ avidyā avidyā ca kathaṃ pramāṇam iti na vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tair api tatprāmāṇyābhyupagamāt saṃkhyālakṣaṇaviṣayavipratipattis tu pratiśāstraṃ bhavatu cākṣuṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ itīyati sarvavādinām avivādaḥ tantre adhikṛte rtha iti varthate yathā smākam īśvarecchāpreritaparamāṇunimitāni samānatantre kaṇavratamate tathaiva siddhāni paratantre ca saṃkhyāśāstre tathā nābhyupagamyanta iti yathā vā guṇatryātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ mahadahaṅkarādirūpeṇa bhūtasargati sāṃkhyānāṃ svatantrasiddho rthaḥ samānatantre pi pātaṃjale yogāśāte siddha eva paratantraṃ tu vaiśeṣikādimate na siddha iti nanu asya kathaṃ pramāṇamūlatā sthāne praśnaḥ satyam etat āsmākīne hi pratitantrasiddhānte pramāṇamūlatvaṃ yathārtham eva sāṃkhyasiddhāntasya tu pramāṇa mūlatvābhāve pi paratantratvakhyāpanāyodāhṛtaḥ tadabhiprāyeṇa vā sya pramāṇamūlatā vaktavyeti yatsiddhāv anyaprakaraṇasiddhaḥ sā dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ  prakriyata iti prakaraṇaṃ pakṣa ucyate yasyārthasya siddhau satyāṃ prakaraṇāntarasiddhiḥ bhavati so dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ tad adhikaraṇānām artāntarāṇāṃ siddheḥ kaḥ punaḥ yatsiddhau iti sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyate pakṣaḥ hetur vā kiṃcātaḥ pakṣaḥ kathaṃ pakṣāntarasiddhaye kalpate hetunā hi pakṣasiddhiḥ kriyate na pakṣeṇa hetoḥ hetos tv adhikaraṇasiddhāntatve kathaṃ siddhāntāśrayā nyāyapravṛttir iti tad uddeśaprayojanaṃ varṇitam nyāyo hi hetur eva sa eva cādhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ na ca hetur hatv āśraya iti ucyate ubhayathā py adoṣaḥ hetur api kvacit pakṣībhavati pakṣo pi hetubhavaty eva tatra tāvad āṃjasyena hetvadhinā pakṣasiddhir iti hetur eva sarvanāmnā vamṛśyate tatsiddhāv anyaprakaraṇasiddheḥ sa evādhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ kathaṃ tarhi tadāśrayā nyāyapravṛttiḥ ucyate hetur api tadanyatarā siddha iva sādhyamānatvāt pakṣībhavan nyāyāntarāśrayatāṃ pratipatsyate api vā pakṣa eva sarvanāmnā vamṛśyamānaḥ bhavatv adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ sa ca spaṣṭa eva nyāyasyāśrayaḥ sa ca siddhyan pakṣāntarāṇy ākṣipann eva siddhyatity adhikaraṇasiddhāntatāṃ bhajate tasyodāharaṇaṃ indriyavyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād iti atra indriyavyatirikte jñātati siddhyati tadanuṣaṅgīṇy arthāntarāṇy api siddhyanti nānā indriyāṇi niyataviṣayāṇi guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ ity evamādīni aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇaṃ abhyupagamasiddhānataḥ  atra aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt iti yathāśrutapaṃcamīnirdeśam anurudhyamānāḥ pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkṛto rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ca sāmānyalakṣaṇam anusarantaḥ kecit evaṃ vyācakṣate dharmiṇaḥ śabdādeḥ nityānityatvavicāracarcāyāṃ aparīkṣitasyaiva ākāśaviśeṣaguṇatvādidharmaparīkṣārahitasyaivā bhyupagamaḥ kartavyaḥ tato parīkṣitābhyupagamāt kiṃ siddhyati ucyate tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇam iti tadgatanityānityatvaparīkṣaṇaṃ hi sāmānyena dharmiṇy upādīyamāne vyomaviśeṣaguṇatvādidharmaparīkṣārahite saty upapadyate yadi punar ākāśaviśeṣaguṇatvaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dharmitvenopādīyate paraṃ pratyasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo bhaved iti evam api kṛte yadi purodharmiṇaṃ vikalpayet kīdṛśasya sataḥ śabdasya bhavatā nityatvaṃ sādhyate dravyasya guṇasya veti sa evaṃ vikalpayan arthāntaragamanāt tāvat parājita eva bhavati jitam apy enaṃ punar jetuṃ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñayā ca vādī bravīti astu dravyaṃ śabda iti etat tu vyākhyānaṃ na buddhyāmahe evaṃ vyācakṣāṇānām eṣāṃ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti ko nu vyavasita iti yadi tāvat anityaḥ śabda iti dravyaguṇādiviśeṣarahitaḥ śabdākhyadharminirdeśo yaḥ prathamam upāttaḥ sa evābhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ tatra abhyupāgamārthaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kaś ca pratitantrasiddhāntād asya viśeṣaḥ athāstu dravyaṃ śabda iti svabuddhyatiśayābhimānena paścād abhyupagamyamānadravyatvaviśiṣṭaśabdanirdeśaḥ abhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ tarhi sūtram aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt iti na yojitam anyatraiva tais sūtrārtho nīta iti tasmād evaṃ vyākhyāyate aparīkṣitābhyupagama eva svamatikauśalyena kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ astu dravyaṃ śabda iti pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tu sāmānyalakṣaṇe pauḍhavādyabhiprāyeṇaiva yojyam dravyatvam api pramāṇamūlaṃ śabdasya bhavatu tathāpi tasyānityatvam iti kila niravayavaṃ dravyaṃ anityam iti nāsty eva śabdasya tu tādṛśasyāpy anityatvam ahaṃ sādhayāmīti kathaṃ tarhi paṃcamī kiṃ paṃcamyā vastu tāvad īdṛśaṃ yathā vyākhyatam asmābhiḥ paṃcamy api cetthaṃ yojyate kimarthaṃ punar ayam parīkṣita eva śabdagatadvavyatvābhyupagamaḥ kriyata iti pṛcchate uttaraṃ paṃcamyā bhidhīyate yasmād aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt tadviśeṣānityatvaparīkṣaṇam avakalpate tasmād aparīkṣitābhyupagamo pi abhyupagamasiddhānta iti na tu tadviśeṣaṇaparīkṣaṇam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśāt abhyupagamasiddhānta iti mantavyaṃ parīkṣaṇasya siddhantāśritatvāt tasmāt tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇārthaḥ aparīkṣitābhyupagamaprauḍhavādinā kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti sūtrārthaḥ ittham eva ca tatra tatra pravādukānāṃ vyavahāraḥ imāś ca siddhāntabhidāś catasraḥ nyāyapravṛtteḥ prathamaṃ nimittam pravartate naiva parīkṣakāṇāṃ anāśritā nyāyakathā kadācit iti prayojanaparīkṣā iha hi svayam avagatam arthaṃ anumānena parasmai pratipādayatā dādhanīyasyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tāvat prayoktavyaḥ tam eva ca parārthānumānam ācakṣate nītividaḥ nanu naiva parārthānumānaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti vaktrapekṣayā śrotrapekṣayā vā tadanupapatteḥ vaktrānvamāyi sa hy arthaḥ nedānīm anumīyate śrotuḥ svārthānumānaṃ tat vākyāvagatihetukam yathā pratyakṣato dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā gnim avagacchati tathā tadīyād vacanād iti kasya parārthatā āgamas tv eṣa bhidyeta kaścid arthopadeśakaḥ kaścit tatpratyayopāyanyāyamārgopadeśakaḥ iti satyam na paramārthataḥ parārthānumānam upapadyate kintu dvividhaḥ pratipattā svayam avagatayathāprakṛtaliṅgavyāptikaḥ tadviparītaś ca tatra svayam avadhṛtapratibandhaṃ prati nopadiśyata evam anumānam svata eva tasya tīty upapatteḥ anavadhṛtavyāptikasya tu vyāptir eva vyutpādyata iti taṃ prati parārthānumānaṃ tadupadeśakaṃ vākyam evākhyāyate tathā hi vaktā svapratyayenedaṃ na hi vākyaṃ prayujyate pato madvacanād eva tamarthaṃ buddhyatām iti kiṃ tv enam anumānena bodhayāmīti manyate kintu vyāptimato liṅgāt svayaṃ tat tu na paśyati tatpratītyabhyupāyatvāt parārtham idam ucyate ataś ca śrotuḥ svārthānumānam evedam vaktā tu tathā paraṃ pratipādayan parārthānumānaṃ prayuṅkta ity ucyate na cānuvādamātraṃ tat vaktur ity upapadyate yato vyāpriyate samyak parasya pratipattaye tenānadhitarārthopadeśakatvāt nānuvādamātram svāvagamāpekṣayā tv anuvādatve nedānīm āptravacanaṃ ananuvādarupaṃ kiṃcid bhavet sarvasya svopalabudhipūrvakatvād iti tasmāt parārthānumānavākyopapatteh tad ekadeśāḥ avayavā yuktā iti lakṣyante pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayananigamanāvayavāḥ  etac ca sūtram ekam eva sāmānyalakṣaṇam avayavānām abhidhatte vibhāgaṃ ca pramāṇānām iva pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāh pramāṇāni iti tatra avayavāḥ bhāgāḥ aṃśāḥ ekadeśāḥ ity evaṃ avayavaśabdaḥ sādhanīyārthapratipattiparyantavacanakalāpaikadeśatvam avayavānāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe yady api caikavacanavinirgatānāṃ nisargabhaṅgurāṇāṃ adīrghāyuṣāṃ aparihāryakramajanmanāṃ varṇānāṃ drūmāṇām iva pāramārthikas samūho na samasty eva tathāpi siṣādhayiṣitārthapratipādanarupaikakāryopayogamūlīkṛtātmanāṃ teṣāṃ kālpanikaḥ kalāpaḥ pūrvam eva vākyakalpanāvasare samarthita iti tadbhāgā api saṃbhavaty eva na ca padānām evānumānavākyavatvam api tu khaṇḍākyānām ekaikena padena pratijñodāharaṇādīnām abhidhātum aśakyatvāt hetuvacanaṃ tu ekam api padaṃ kvacid bhavati kṛtakatvāt iti tad api vā saviśeṣaṇaṃ prayujyamānaṃ padam udāyenaiva pratipādyate vastutve sati kṛtakatvāt iti udāharaṇavacanam api ghaṭavat ity ālasād eva prayujate tad dhi vyāptipradarśanāya evaṃ vaktavyam yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti tasmād avayavānām avayavatvam eva lakṣaṇaṃ na padatvam vibhāgo pi pratijñādipadasannidhāv avayavaśruter evāvagamyate pratijñādayaḥ paṃcāvayavāḥ na nyūnāḥ nātiriktā iti nanu atra vivadante kecit nūnatām avayavānām ācakṣate tryavayavaṃ dvyavayavaṃ vā sādhanavākyaṃ vadantaḥ anye tu jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanam śśayavyudāsa iti paṃcabhis saha pratijñādīn daśāvayavān āhuḥ ucyate nyūnatā yathā vasaraṃ pratisamādhāsyate ādhikyam apy ayuktam jijñāsādīnāṃ aśabdasvabhāvatvena vākyāvayavatvāyogāt tathā hi apratīyamāne rthe pratītiprayojanasya pravartikā jijñāsā sā cecchāsvabhāvatvād ānantaraḥ pramātṛdharmaḥ na vākyāvayavaḥ arthakriyāsādhane rthe vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim evam ayam ayathaivam iti so pi jñānātmakatvān na vākyāvayavaḥ pramātuḥ pramāṇāni pravartamānāni prameyam arpayituṃ pārayantīti sambhāvanā śakyaprāptiḥ sā pi tathaiva na vākyāvayavaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃśayitasya nirṇayaḥ kathaṃ vākyāvayavatāṃ spṛśet saṃśayavyudāsas tu pratyakṣopālambhaḥ sa ca vacanasvabhāvatve pi na sādhanavākyasyāvayavatvaṃ pratipadyate tad ime saṃśayādayaḥ prakaraṇapravṛttihetavo bhavati na vākyāvayavā iti sūktaṃ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanāny avayavāḥ iti teṣām sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā  pratijñeti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ sādhyanirdeśa iti lakṣaṇam śuddhasya dharmiṇo vā dharmasya vā dvayor vā svatantrayoḥ dharmiviśiṣṭasya vā dharmasya sādhyatvānupapatteḥ dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhya ity anumānalakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat tasya nirdeśaḥ parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñeti nanu sāvadhāraṇatvād vākyānāṃ kiṃ sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñety avadhāraṇam uta pratijñaiva sādhyanirdeśa iti yadi sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñety avadhāryate tadā yata evakārakaraṇam tato nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti pratijñā niyamyate sādhyanirdeśa mā hāsīr iti sādhyanirdeśas tv aniyamita iti pratijñām apahāyāpi bhaved ity ativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam atha pratijñaiva sādhyanirdeśa ity avadhāryate tataḥ sādhyanirdeśo niyamyate pratijñā mā tyākṣīd iti pratijāñ tv aniyamiteti sādhyanirdeśam apahāyāpi bhaved iti sādhyanirdeśena pratijñāyā avyāptatvāt avyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam iti tad etad ayuktam na hi sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati yathā eṣa panthāḥ srudhnaṃ gacchati iti na hi tatra eśa eveti srudhnam eveti vā gacchaty eveti vā niyantuṃ śakyata iti athāpi avadhāraṇam amaśyāśrayaṇīyaṃ tadbhavatu sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñati na cātivyāptiḥ pratijñām apahāyānyatra sādhyanirdeśasyādarśanāt aniyamito py asāv anyatra na ca dṛśyate eveti tasmāt sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñeti sthitam tad yathā anityaś śabda iti nanu atrāpi kim anitya eva śabdaḥ ity avadharaṇam uta śabda evānitya iti tatra anitya eva śabda ity ukte tadgatadharmāntaratiraskārāt kṛtakatvam api tatra na bhaved ity asiddho hetuḥ śabda evānityaḥ iti tv avadhāryamāṇe ghaṭāv anityatvapratiṣedhād anvayaśūnyatā hetoḥ syād iti naiśa doṣaḥ niravadhāraṇasyāpi vacanaprayogasya darśitatvāt anitya eva śabda ity avadhāraṇe vā nānityatvavyatiriktatadaviruddhakṛtakatvādyaśeṣadharmāntaraniṣedhas tatra vidhīyate kintu tadviruddhanityatvamātraniṣedha eva anitya eva śabdaḥ na nitya ity arthaḥ taduktam niyamas tadviruddhāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhinaḥ iti tasmān na hetor asiddhatvam nanu sādhanavākye pratijñāvacanam asaṃcatam asādhanāṃgavacanatvāt hetudṛṣṭāntavacanābhyāṃ hi sādhyasiddheḥ te eva vaktavye na ca svapratipattāv upalabdhaṃ sarvam eva parasmai ākhyeyam ākhyāne vā dharmimātram ākhyāyatām svapratipattau hi pūrvaṃ parvatādeḥ śuddhasya dharmiṇo grahaṇam siṣādhayiṣitahutavahādidharmaviśeṣarūṣitavapuṣaḥ evam abhyupagame numānavaiphalyaprasaṅgāt ataḥ kathaṃ prathamam eva sādhyadharmādhyāsitasvarūpadharminirdeśakaraṇam api ca vivādād eva pratijñārtho labhyate iti kiṃ svakaṇṭhoktena tena prayojanam ucyate svapratipattim anusaratā parasya pratipattir utpādanīyeti svapratipattau prathamam upalabdho dharmī tāvat ākhyeya eva anucyamāne hi dharmiṇi niradhikaraṇo hetuḥ kva sādhyaṃ sādhyeta dharmiṇy anavacchinne ca dharmamāte numānam anarthakam avivādasiddhatvāt asti hi yatra kvacit anityatvam iti āśrayāsiddhaś ca dharminirdeśād vinā hetur bhaved iti avaśyanirdeśyo dharmo yady api dharmimātradarśanam eva prathamam abhūt tathāpi kiṃ sādhayitum eṣa hetuh prayukto bhavet ity upaplavaśamanāya sādhyadharmanirdeśo pi kartavyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti hi prayujyamānaṃ tad idaṃ andhapadam ivāsādhanaṃ bhavet atha vyāptipradarśanapravaṇena yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ iti dṛṣṭāntavacasā tasmād anityaḥ iti nigamanavacanena vā viraṃsyati sa upaplava iti tathāpi śrotṛbubhutsoparamapariśramaphale sādhanavākye sādhanādhigamākāṅkṣā saṃpādanāya sādhyaṃ nirdeṣṭavyam na hi śabda ity etāvat yukte tatra sādhanam ākāṅkṣati kaścid iti sādhanavacanāvasaratatprayogasāphalyotpādanāyaiva nūnaṃ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāvacanaṃ prayotavyam yac ca vivādād eva pratijñārthasya labdhatvam abhidhīyate tadabhyupagamanam eva śābdāntareṇa pratijñāyāḥ yataḥ viruddho vādaḥ vivādaḥ eka āha nityaḥ śabdaḥ itras tu anityaḥ ity āha so yaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vivādaḥ pratijñaiva sa tu pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ tad ahar eva bhavatu dināntare veti kim anena viśeṣeṇa aparihāryaṃ pratijñāvacanam iti pratijñaiva ca pakṣa ity ucyate tad evaṃvidhe pakṣalakṣaṇe pradarśite balāt pakṣābhāsāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ bhavanti tad yathā anuṣṇo gniḥ iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ na rūpagrāhi cakṣuḥ iti anumānaviruddhaḥ śabdaviruddhas tu vahuśākhaḥ brāhmaṇena surā peyā ity āgamaviruddhaḥ janayitrī me vandhyā pitā me brahmacārī iti dharmidharmaparayor eva vipratiṣedhāt svavacanaviruddhaḥ na candraḥ śaśī iti lokaprasiddhiviruddhaḥ upamānaviruddhas tu na gavayapadavācyo yaṃ gosadṛśaḥ iti aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ nabhuḥkusumakṛtāvataṃsaḥ caitraḥ iti aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ sugandhi gaganakamalam iti aprasiddhobhyayaḥ khapuṣpakṛtaśekharaḥ bandhyā sutaḥ iti yatrāpi viśeṣyaṇayor ubhayor pai pramāṇantarataḥ svarūpaṃ niścitam eva tannirdeśo pi pakṣābhāsa eva śītaṃ tuhinaṃ uṣṇo gniḥ iti sādhyatvābhāvena anumānaprayogāvasaravirahād iti iyam eva ca sā siddhyasādhyatocyata iti ye caite pratyakṣaviruddhatādayaḥ pakṣadoṣāḥ ye ca vakṣyamāṇāḥ sādhanavikalatvādayo dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ te vastusthityā sarve hetudoṣā eva prapaṃcamātraṃ tu pakṣadṛṣṭāntadoṣavarṇanam tathā cābādhitatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇam evoktam dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayā ca hetor eva lakṣaṇaṃ anvayavyatirekayor anyat hīyata iti sarve ca te hetudoṣā eva ata eva ca śāstre smin muninā tattvadarśinā pakṣābhāsādayo noktāḥ hetvābhāsās tu darśitāḥ kaścid dhetvanapekṣo pi pakṣamātrapratiṣṭhitaḥ bodho numānānurūpasya svāvākyādikṛto yathā evaṃ lakṣaṇako hetur iti tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇe sati tadabhidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ mukham eva lakṣyate ity arthātmakahetulakṣaṇaṃ tāvad ucyate udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ  iti nanu arthātmako hetuḥ anumānam tac ca lakṣitam eva pūrvam tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam iti sātyam tatra tatpūrvakaṃ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭapratyakṣamūlatopavarṇanena pratipandhaparicchedopāyamātranirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam iha tu pratibandhasvarūpam api pratipādyate tathā hi arthātmake hetau lakṣye paṃcamīmapāsya udāharaṇasādharmye sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti vyācakṣate ca sādharmya hetur ity ucyamāne gandhavattvāder asādhāraṇahetoḥ sādhyadharmivyaktibhedavṛttitvena sādharmyarūpasaṃbhavāt viruddhasya ca pakṣavipakṣavṛtteḥ tatsādharmyasvabhāvatvāt hetutvaṃ prasajyata iti tannivṛttyarthaṃ udāharaṇagrahaṇam udāhṛyate smin sādhyasādhanayorḥ prayojyaprayojakabhāva ity udāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tena sādharmyaṃ kasyeti prakṛtatvāt pratyāsatteś ca sādhyadharmiṇa ity avagamyate udāharaṇasādharmye sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmisādhāraṇo dharmo hetur iti nāsādhāraṇādau tathāvaprasaktir iti evam api prameyatvāder naikāntikahetoḥ tathā bhāgasiddhasyānityatvasiddhaye caturvidhaparamāṇupakṣīkaraṇe gandhavattvādeḥ prakaraṇasamakālātyayāpadiṣṭayoś ca udāharaṇasādharmyasaṃbhavāt hetutvaṃ bhaved iti tadvyavacchedāya
